review: Informative and friendly. Our waiter explained the origins of our bottle of wine with knowledge and confidence . We watched the world go by in magical surroundings after a wonderful day wandering around the old town of Dubrovnik

Absolutely amazing, by far the best food and service in Old Town Dubrovnick. Obran made us feel welcome and really made our night special.
High quality food and service without the extra expense. Get the harbour view, so beautiful.

We had a very nice evening at this restaurant, sitting on the terrace facing the square. Service was fantastic and food was very good. Both of us had different types of steaks and they were to the point.

10/10. We booked 2 days in advance and on a whim I asked in the notes if we could have a table by the water if available - upon arrival we were taken straight to a table at the front which was absolutely perfect. Breathtaking views to eat your dinner, the food was really lovely, couldn’t fault at all. I had a couple of glasses of Prosecco, and they gave me the second one on the house. Really good prices too, considering location. We didn’t wait long at all to be served - service was fab. Really easy place to find too, central location with helpful staff to show you where to go.
Amazing restaurant with spectacular views. Orben provided us the best service and gave a detailed explanation of the menu. His recommendations were so delicious. Highly recommend this restaurant!

Amazing food and location!
We had seafood risotto and truffle pasta are super!
Especially our server Obren is so attentive and give us billiant servise!
We'll definitely come back!!

If you are looking for an elegant and scenic location for dinner this will be your favorite place in Dubrovnik. Our server Marco was very attentive and made great food and drink suggestions. Food looked and tasted good. Highly recommend.
Our waiter Marijo was absolutely the nicest and the views were unbeatable. Very relaxing atmosphere and didn’t feel rushed at all.
Obren is a wonderful waiter, pleasant , attentive and a true pleasure. Welcoming atmosphere with delightful gastronomic delights.

We visited the restaurant Gradska kavana in our days in beautiful Dubrovnik by the harbour. The Service was top, very professional and friendly. Marko served us. The food was also very tasty and reasonably priced. There is also a good selection of open wines.

Ordered 2 coffee and 2 cakes had to ask 3 times for the cakes time we got the cakes the coffee was cold then asked for some hot water that arrived 10 minutes after we finished the coffee not very good service from the staff at the front restaurant as the only reason we returned was we had dinner here before at the back restaurant and it was excellent but this episode has now put us off as we felt ignored from the staff.

Yes, its a fantastic location whether you're on the street (quieter) or seafront (hustle and bustle of tourist groups walking by and trips getting organised) but felt the food was average. Service was good but few gluten free options meant we weren't tempted to come back. Great for a coffee or cocktail and some people watching!

Had an amazing time with my daughter and son in law .the service was perfect. 
Professional 
Friendly 
And prompt service throughout. 
Our waiteress was marijeta 
5 stars all round .
Thank you very much
Really enjoyed our dinner here. We didn’t make reservations but we were seated immediately with a great view of the harbour . Delicious food and attentive service. We are going back !
I’m not sure what was better, the food, the service, or the view; all were fantastic! Marco was super attentive and very professional! I highly recommend!

We ate on two occasions here, once for a light meal and another for a full dinner.

One thing to note first, if you have the Dubrovnik pass, mention it to get 10% off the bill.

The restaurant is right by the harbour, so if you are looking for the classic sunset view, get there early on for a balcony table (you may still need to wait). We were lucky and got a table, although as it had just rained on the day, it was awfully chilly (but the restaurant is prepared with small blankets for you to wrap up in).
Cannot fault the service, the staff were patient in explaining the menu and provided good service.

The food, hmmm, this is where it is not consistent, so some work is needed.
The bread basket is nice and varied, the grilled squid is also decent quality, but the fish soup was bland and plain (with very little fish in it).

The second time we visited, we ordered a fish stew and the grilled squid again. The fish stew was nice, would recommend.

All in all, a decent restaurant in a good location. Prices are typical of Dubrovnik Old Town so just be prepared for that.
Marijo was an attentive waiter and made excellent suggestions. We appreciated his checking in and making us feel so welcome.
Beautiful view and amazing food. Our waiter Obren was the best. He was so friendly :) Gave us some great tips about the menu. Made us feel so welcome

Great service (Obren was our waiter). Very attentive, great food and fabulous views. 
Definitely worth a visit when in dubrovnik.
Very friendly local in the old town, extremely friendly staff. We ate very well and paid fair given the prices of the city. He deserves to go back. Congratulations!!!

A stunning restaurant with a terrace overlook the old harbour.
Service is excellent and the food superb.
A small menu which always indicates great cooking and the wine is excellent.

Even though we had specifically visited earlier to book our table for 20:30 we were greeted by a very stoney faced, slightly condescending waitress who couldn’t find our booking and she went off to talk to all the other waiting staff to see if we had truly done this ! Eventually we were led to a table … so maybe someone had remembered us. 

The Dubrovnik Food Festival is on and there was a Set Menu on the table with two options - a Meat option and a Fish Option. In addition to the usual menu. 

We opted for the Special menu. 

The fish starter (strangely included meat so not suitable for a Pescatarian) was delicious. Fine slices of tuna, capers, veal pate and fresh basil. 

The main course was the blandest beige-est plate of food. Fish, cauliflower puree - so boring. Desperately needed some spice, some flavour or some green vegetables. 

Final course was a take on the chocolate Raffello and was interesting. 

The staff were attentive but not friendly. The view was lovely. 

The smell from the neighbouring diner’s heavy tobacco habit was not good. Although technically we were “outside” so we had to put up with it. 

Tonight we are going to try a more intimate restaurant … of which there are plenty here thankfully. 

Three stars is probably too generous.

We could not get a reservation so went early as a walk in and got a great table. Mario/Maki was amazing, he was very personable and gave great recommendations. The black risotto was spectacular, as was my husband’s tuna. High marks all round!

Located by the old port area of Dubrovnik, this restaurant sits beautifully under the stone arches overlooking the small harbour — a lovely spot with great views. It’s part of the same group that runs other well-known places like Panorama, Dubravka 1836, and the fine-dining restaurant Nautika.

We hadn’t made a booking but managed to get a table in the second row facing out through the arches. The setting was charming and ideal for a relaxed lunch or early dinner.

We started with a glass of white wine and some bread. The bread selection (€3) included three different types — reasonable but nothing special, and we didn’t end up eating much of it. Prices overall were on the higher side, even by European standards.

For the main course, I had the cuttlefish on a bed of potato purée with a squid ink sauce. This dish was excellent — perfectly cooked with a tender interior and crispy exterior, and the black squid sauce added great flavour, though I wish there had been a bit more of it.

Service was friendly and professional. Our waitress, Draga, and the hostess, Maya, were both helpful 
, and I particularly appreciated that they offered a small tasting before ordering a glass of wine — a nice touch.

Overall, Gradska Kavana Arsenal offers a beautiful setting and solid food, with standout seafood and good service, though prices are a bit above average for what you get.
Just enjoyed a fabulous lunch here. The perfect location, fabulous food and the best service. Thank you Maria for looking after us so well. Would definitely recommend a visit

Amazing food, amazing view. This restaurant made our anniversary absolutely amazing! The service from Djana was exceptional! One of the most pleasant lads i have ever met. He made us want to come back again in thr future! 

Thank you!

Very good!!! Very good food very good service, in the ancient city a crowd of expensive restaurants appear to be very good value for money, the point is also delicious, recommend everyone, risotto is delicious, spaghetti is delicious, even a few more times to order different food, should also be able to receive discounts to other stores!!

Beautiful restaurant serving beautiful food with beautiful views of the harbour. In the old covered warehouse where the Ragusans used to load and unload ships secretly, you have a spectacular view of the port while eating your breakfast, lunch or dinner. I had dinner during Dubrovnik Restaurant Week and then had breakfast the next time.

Friendly staff, excellent food, would definitely go again.

Marjo was our server for dinner tonight and he was absolutely amazing! He was extremely helpful with not only the menu but what to do around town and giving us all the best recommendations. We last minute came to the restaurant and we left with having the best experience. Marjo was so engaging, funny, and by far the best server. Definitely recommend coming and requesting to be in his section.
Our waiter Marino was great, very friendly . The food is amazing, one of the best fish dishes I’ve ever had. Definitely recommend this amazing place. Worth coming
Excellent views, food and service. Had the cuttlefish risotto. Delicious! Dominik was an excellent server. A delightful experience.
Fantastic food, beautiful once in a lifetime view, excellent service. O’Brien was our server and was incredibly attentive, charming, and kind. Would recommend!

Wonderful place and even better food. We had dinner here on Monday and ordered a fish tasting menu with tuna and sea bass. Excellent plating and amazing food. All in a wonderful setting and in a very well kept place. Service very up to scratch. You can't ask for more

This was our first trip to Dubrovnik and it was my responsibility to book a restaurant to celebrate my wife's birthday. What a daunting task considering all the amazing dining options in such a magical city. After whittling it down to a dozen or so options, the coin flip(s) finally favored Gradska Kavana Arsenal and I made an on-line reservation. When we arrived in the city, I dropped in early into the restaurant and spoke with the hostess and asked whether she could reserve a prime table for the special occasion. She assured me that she would do so.
When we arrived later in the evening, we indeed had a prime table along the waterfront. Now the atmosphere was excellent, how would the rest of the evening turn out.....and it started with a very friendly and most efficient water. His service along with other wait staff was excellent. And the food.....from appetizers to entrees to the wine.....equal to the views and the service. All combined for an incredibly memorable evening in an incredible city!

I wasn’t able to book a reservation at first, as the restaurant was fully booked due to the opening of the summer festival. The following evening, I decided to try again and was told there’d be a short wait. They said I could enjoy a drink in the bar area in the meantime. This turned out to be perfect! We sat next to a pianist and saxophonist, sipping on a refreshing Hugo Spritz before dinner.

After about ten minutes (much quicker than expected), we were seated. Our waiter came over right away to take our drinks order, and the service throughout the evening was impeccable. The food was absolutely delicious. I still have no idea how they make the chicken so tender and full of flavour!

We had a lovely view of the harbor from our table, though if you’d like to sit right by the water, I’d recommend booking in advance. Overall, a wonderful evening. I’d love to come back!

Good location with lovely view. The service was friendly, professional. We were seated immediately and the service was excellent. Lovely tasty well presented food. Good choice with gluten free options available. It was lovely sitting along the front but if visiting on a gusty day it would probably be worth sitting further back in the restaurant as our drink was blown over by a gust of wind. Although it landed on my husbands plate luckily my drink missed his food.
The service was what I expect from a michelin star restaurant. Even without it the service was beyond amazing all the way

Our server, Marco, was simply excellent! He was so attentive and polite, he had a clear mastery of the available dishes and their preparation and was very adept at continually clearing our table of used dishes throughout our meal. His quiet professionalism stood out and added to the delicious, expertly prepared meals…..and their presentation was fantastic. We can’t recommend this restaurant and Marco enough. Glowing praise

We had a fabulous experience at this gorgeous seaside restaurant. It was a rainy, cold day so we had to sit inside, but the dining room is lovely and a pianist was playing nice dinner music. Our server was attentive and friendly, and he did not rush us at all. We thoroughly enjoyed our truffle pasta and seafood risotto dishes. Homemade focaccia bread, olives, grilled vegetables and an amazing chocolate orange cake rounded out the meal. 

I would love to go back on a sunny warm day to enjoy amazing views from the seaside terrace.
Delicious seafood pasta and chicken entrees. Marco was a wonderful server, Beautiful view even on a windy night. Music was lovely and all in all an amazing night.
great view！great dishes！great service！very nice experience in croatia。find marijo and he will arrange everything，you can trust him nice guy！

Well, if you don't pop in here, you have possibly missed out! It's a fantastic restaurant with a grand facade and gravitas!

We stopped twice for breakfast because it did breakfast well....breads, Eggs Royale, Orlando, Mimosa, and bloody Mary. Plus, great coffee.

The service is impeccable, everyone is pleasant and very efficient, with views far out to sea or looking back into the old town.

On a cool day, it was nice to cuddle up under a blanket. It is enjoyable and not to be missed if you are visiting.
Took a long time to order and took forever to order coffee after dinner. The food was very good so it weighed up, plus the beautiful view.
Ivo was our server and was excellent. He was very attentive and descriptive. We had an amazing experience with him. The live music was lovely too.

location is very good they managed to give us the sea side view even though we didnt make reservation, the food is amazing we ordered fish stew that my wife love so much and i had veal which is good as well. cheese cake i recommend for dessert as recommended by Stjepan with cappuccino. We also had breakfast on our first day here and food were lovely and good portion. Service is second to none specifically Stjepan who’s very friendly and helpful. Dubrovnic is pricey in general whichever place you go so I would say the food they serve is good value for money.

From the moment we walked into town restaurant to when we left we were treated like royalty. We loved it so much we went back 3 times. Best staff I have ever experienced in a restaurant. Food excellent and view was special
Fabulous food in an amazing setting. Make sure to get a seat on the terrace and it won’t disappoint. Best service we experienced also on our visit to Croatia
Delicious food, gorgeous atmosphere, great service. Would recommend and will definitely be back. It wasn’t that warm so very happy with the blankets!

Famous Dubrovnik restaurant does not disappoint. Very lively with great views of people and harbor. Terrific food - grilled tuna, vitello tonnato, prosciutto-- and lovely Croatian wines. Special thanks to Marco, a most charming and knowledgeable server!

In fact, Dubrovnik is one of the finest restaurants in terms of location, quality, and service. 
Prices may be a bit higher than all of Dubrovnik, but we had the best food here for 3 shots and good service here. 
One critical appetizer. Sorry, not successful. 
Highly Recommendation.
Delicious food with lovely atmosphere. We were overlooking the square and was lovely and chilled. Delicious risottos and cocktails

Excellent food and brilliant service from our waiter Marco. We were visiting on our honeymoon and he made our experience enjoyable, giving us a table with a great view too. We will definitely be back.

You won’t be disappointed with your visit to Gradska KA. The stunning setting by the harbour as the sun sets, great cocktails, the live cello and piano music and the great service from Stjepan. And that’s before you even sample the delicious food! A memorable night in Dubrovnik-we’ll be back.

We had a 9pm booking but arrived 30 minutes early. No problem - we were well looked after and give a lovely table in the bar. Before our cocktails were ready (I had a fantastic signature coffee negroni - picture attached) we were taken to our table outside. What a location! Stunning views and a fantastic atmosphere. We started with the burrata salad which was delicious and fresh. To follow, I had the seafood risotto and my wife had the tuna. Both were excellent. In addition, the service was top class throughout and delivered with a personal touch.
Excellent and very cozy place, beautiful view, very good breakfast (and also dinner) and Bers attention very dedicated and friendly, we will come back!
Lovely view, decent food, ok welcome but for us not a 5 star lunch. Price was not bad at 70 euros for two including a glass of wine

We met our son and his young family, who live in Europe, for a 10-day holiday. Dubrovnik offered lots of activities - exploring the city, short cruises, beach excursions to islands by ferry and right by the city walls. The weather was wonderful in September and the seafood was amazing.

Some suggestions: pack light, there are endless stairs and no transport in the walled city. If you take a tour make sure there’s adequate time at the destination. Our day trip to Mostar and the Kravice Falls was a big disappointment with 7 hours on the bus and little time at either destination. 

We enjoyed the trip but if we did it again, we would make our base a less touristic town and go to Dubrovnik for a night or two.

Having twice been thwarted in booking this place pre-trip, we chanced our collective arm on passing on a Saturday night and waddayaknow, they had a table. The conditional 40 minute wait in the lovely lounge barely lasted 10 minutes, enough time for us to get two G&Ts started. And then to the table overlooking the magical little harbour in Old Town. 

Service was prompt, indeed the bread, oil and olives were barely down before mains arrived - not to worry, there's worse things in life. Fillet for her, ribeye for me. Mine came with a pot of new potatoes covered in a cheese sauce. Hers was accompanied by mushrooms which is the only food I dislike (not too keen on semolina either...). 

It was more satisfying than spectacular, but I have no gripes. The price was what you might expect for that location but I thought it was fair for what we had.

I probably wouldn't rush back but that's less about this restaurant and more about the proliferation of fantastic alternatives.

This is our best meal experience in Croatia. The setting, with the view of the harbor, is marvelous. Service is impeccable. Food quality is everything we expected in a high standard restaurant. Our server Anthony is the most attentive and courteous we’ve experienced. Thank you, Anthony.

We arrived late from the airport and were starving. Loads of people said the kitchen were closed. The staff at Arsenal took pity on us and said they were find a table and would serve us despite it being after 10.30 pm. Not only did they find us a table but a table with a view. The food was great and reasonably priced for Dubrovnik and the wine exceptional if a tad expensive. The staff were so nice.

Having just paid twice as much at their sister restaurant we much preferred here. First off our waiter Bero was the best! Then apps, entrees, cocktails and desserts were all delish.
Loved the marina view and activity too.

Amazing experience!!!
I had the truffle past was delicious.
The ambiance is beautiful, perfect for a romantic dinner. 
The waiter Zac is really nice and service was impeccable. I recommend.

Amazing dinner! The food was delicious and the staff was very kind with me and my wife. The waiter Zac was very attentive as well.
The restaurant os beautiful and in a beatiful location in old town.

Have been here in breakfast 10days ago with my friends.
Really suprised with quality and speed of preparation.
Good service and spot of the caffeteria.
Recommended.

Absolutely superb! We had a table by the waterfront which added to the occasion. The food was exceptional. This was the only restaurant we found in Croatia that truly catered for a coeliac diet and provided delicious options. Well trained and friendly staff. All round excellence!
Ana was incredible! She recommended the seafood risotto and it was delicious. She gave us a carob aperitif for after the meal. I would highly recommend this restaurant.
Ana was so sweet and helpful about the food and suggested some amazing dishes. The seafood risotto was a highlight for my party. Ana was such a treat.

Beautiful day on the patio, at the edge of the old port. A nice breeze cooled us after a ride up the tram and walking in the hot sun. The staff was welcoming and friendly. Marco took exceptional care of us, right down to the surprise birthday dessert for her with a large sparkling candle. The restaurant spontaneously broke out in a chorus of Happy Birthday! What a memorable wrap up to our day in Dubrovnik!

Yesterday I had lunch at this restaurant, ordered a tuna salad that was good, but with strong taste. I had a really bad night. The location is good and the Mood very nice. Unfortunately, I did not have a good experience.
The view is beautiful. The squid ink risotto was amazing! Best I’ve ever had. My husband’s burger was also delicious. Highly recommend.

Such an amazing restaurant with spectacular views of the old city and harbor. 

We ate here several times for breakfast, my wife said it was the best iced matcha she has ever had!

Prices are reasonable and the food is amazing. If you’re in the mood for a little snack or a full meal, the portions are spot on.

I highly recommend making reservations because it is always busy, but you can luck out a grab a table without one. The reservations for the portion in the old city go fast and are booked days in advance. 

If you like sipping coffee and people watching, book early! Well worth the visit, they have a great menu and situated in one of the most beautiful parts of the old city!

This place is excellent and our server Ana was amazing !! Food is fresh and delicious - pasta with truffles was amazing as was the tomato pasta . Pasta was hand made and the food was overall delicious ! And the view , of course, is fantastic !! Highly recommend !!

We went to both Dubravka and Nautika (for breakfast and lunch) and they were both high quality and reasonably priced (not tourist traps). Marijo was our waiter at Nautika and he was awesome. We had great views from both and I would recommended them to anyone visiting Dubrovnik.

Atmosphere and view,
And the food and drink were good.
Especially my friend Marco, my desk staff, was so pleasant and friendly.
A grateful heart, a happy feeling. ^0^

We enjoyed a terrific meal. The food was great — tuna and sea bass. The service was excellent. Our waiter, Marko, was attentive, friendly and very knowledgeable about the menu. And the view was unbeatable!
Marco and the staff was very friendly. Food was great! View was even better. Highlight recommend visiting and spending some time.

Friendly staff we had been advised to arrive before 7 to get a table and we were seated within 20 minutes. Food was lovely and service was relaxed no rushing you after finishing. Highly recommend for a lovely evening meal.

Beautiful food and view . We couldn't book but went a bit earlier to see if we could walk in and dine. We were seated a row away from the front with a lovely view of the harbour . Staff were excellent and the food was gorgeous. I had the fillet streak medium and it didn't disappoint. Worth a visit.

We had three different people who had been to Dubrovnik in the last 6 months tell us we had to eat here. They were right. The view is spectacular. And the service staff is extremely attentive. And there is a large range of food items and all of them were top notch. Put all of this together and it worth putting this restuarant on your “to do” list in Dubrovnik.
Obren was great! Food was delicious! I ordered the truffle pasta and my husband ordered the burger. The view is beautiful

I booked far in advance so I could secure a table on the waterfront. My table was on the waterfront but there was a large wedding dinner table adjacent to us; the restaurant even added a small table to serve wine to the wedding group that actually intruded on our space. And our waiter was very busy with the wedding group. Food was fine but their attention was directed to the large group rather than the two of us and that is really unacceptable.

The vibe was set when we entered the restaurant to live piano playing. What a relaxed atmosphere but with attentive service. The pre-dinner cocktail was very good (not expensive for this standard of establishment). Steak & sea bass for main courses along with side dishes of grilled vegetables & rosemary potatoes were delicious. Happy with the menu prices for this quality.

I was discriminated for being alone. I kindly asked for a table for one, preferably with a nice view, and was kindly told that there were no tables at the moment. There was a couple behind me, and - while I was leaving - I heard the ask if the same applied to them (this means they had no reservation) , and I saw them being received. Sad 🤕
Amazing place. Wounderful atendiment. Stephan is the best. Thanks for all. I remember forever. Luiz Eduardo e Carol Ferraz
Fantastic! Good food, lovely atmosphere, fabulous view and lovely service from Marko, Cocktails are fabulous, I recommend the Hugo
Great waterfront setting (especially if you get a frontline table), good food, unfortunately let down by very slow service

The location is excellent and the view spectacular. We had a delicious meal of rib eye steak and a hamburger. We shared a bottle of wine from the area.
Our server, Maki, was superb. He was attentive, professional, knew what wine to recommend and made our dinner out a special event.

There’s a lot to praise. The restaurant is rather large and offers seating options on a raised patio off the street (Pred Dvorom) or in the back on another covered patio overlooking Old Town’s port. There’s quite the coterie of service staff, so at no point were we left unattended or in need. The food is robust, spanning multiple cuisines, and portion sizes are generous, meaning everyone will find something to enjoy and have a lot of it. My wife and I considered it one of our best meals in Croatia.

Classy restaurant at the top of the main street through the heart of Dubrovnik - the people watch if you get a table on the raised terrace at the front - is unmatched.
Menu has plenty of crowd-pleasers - the truffle and mushroom pasta was superb.
Wine - like most other restaurant in this city - is pricy.
best to book, but worth turning up early or late and they'll find you a table quite quickly.
One of the best restaurants in town.

Super tasty food and great service (stjepan).
This is for tourists and locals a great place, also with a wonderfull view. If you go to Dubrovnik, this is the place to be.

We arrived without a reservation, it was busy but we could first have a drink inside. Soon we could take a seat on the terrace. Great views and the food was delicious. Our waiter Obran has completed the evening.
We had a wonderful meal with excellent service and attention. Our waiter, Dominic, was extremely professional and efficient.

Update: please note that since this review was posted I have been contacted by the restaurant so that my issues could be addressed. I have to comment that I found the interaction and resolution extremely helpful and professional and this has provided us with confidence that the restaurant is very professional in addressing issues and hopefully our experience will not happen to other customers.

Original review:
Exceptionally poor service and facilities despite good food and lovely location We arrived for a pre-booked dinner at this restaurant which had been highly recommended by friends and colleagues. We were really excited as this was to be the highlight of our culinary experience of Dubrovnik.
On arriving we were directed by the bar staff through to the restaurant. We proceeded to the waiting sign... and we waited.... and we waited....
Whilst numerous staff of varying seniority walked past us and completely ignored us.
We stopped a member of staff saying we had a reservation…we were essentially ignored and continued to wait until eventually somebody said that they would check if our table was ready.
We were approached by the hostess who asked us to wait before we were finally shown to our table.
After being provided with menus we again...sat waiting....we were not acknowledged or
approached. At this point we were about to leave. It had become evident that the service was extremely poor and was ruining our experience. As we were about to leave we were finally approached for our order and decided to remain.
The waiter thereafter provided a good level of service.

It should be acknowledged that the food was excellent, the venue was beautiful (apart from the ladies facilities that were very substandard for a high end restaurant and more akin to a holiday camp) and that we had a great position near to the
sed.
The low score is based on the poor service, which ruined our experience prompting us to leave as soon as possible. Noting that we have had an amazing holiday in Dubrovnik and experienced fantastic food, wine and service throughout our time here. This restaurant has unfortunately been the exception.

An incredible experience, one that we will remember for a lot of years to come. We will be highly recommending this restaurant to our friends and family. The food and atmosphere was incredible, but the service was a highlight. Waiter Stephan and colleagues were all outstanding and provided service second to none.

Everything was extremely delicious, especially the tuna and the chocolate carob orange cake. Our waiter also gave us great recommendations of what to order. Not to mention the beautiful view of the port. 100% would come again!

The food was incredible, the chef made an off menu rice dish that was delicious! Fantastic & thoughtful service from Antun, made the experience even more enjoyable. Would recommend to all & don’t be disheartened if you don’t get an online reservation - we just walked in!
Excellent brkfast and astounding morning glory beneficts ans BREAD... GO THERE EARLY MORNING EXCELLENT LICATION THX
Such a nice experience. The most beautiful restaurant I have seen in my life. Ana, one of the workers, made our dinner better, super nice and helpful.

Dominik the best waiter everything perfect and the food amazing 🤩 
The view is perfect all experience amazing lovely time .

Extremely hot day in a crowded old town, we were in need of a cold drink--chose Arsenal for convenience, location and views. Service was slow and slower, drinks were small in relation to what we were used to and the prices were absurd for what you received. Oh well that's what happens with a tourist destination in high demand!
Had breakfast here our last day in Dubrovnik. Great food and great service with an amazing view - Marijo was our waiter and he was great!!

For my dear friend, Dubrovnik is more than just a destination — it is a second home. For over 30 years she has returned, in summer and winter alike, sometimes even more than twice a year. And for just as long, Gradska Kavana Arsenal has been a part of that tradition. Breakfasts, lunches, coffees with cake — they were moments she looked forward to, cherished, and shared with friends. For me too, in the last ten years, visiting Gradska Kavana has been almost a ritual, a guarantee of good service and warm memories.

That is why what happened yesterday hurt so deeply.

We sat on the terrace, enjoying a sunny Sunday morning. We ordered breakfast, coffee, and a double coffee, and felt the familiar comfort of being in a place we had trusted for years. The terrace was busy, full of people, but no one was waiting for a table. When we finished, we politely asked for the bill, paid it, and even added a tip of more than 20%. We were just about to leave — I had gone to the restroom — when a waiter approached my friend and asked her to hurry up and clear the table.

In that moment, it felt like all those years of loyalty and respect counted for nothing. Around us, other guests who had sat longer remained undisturbed. Yet my friend — someone who has given her time, her love, and her loyalty to this city and to Gradska Kavana for three decades — was singled out and asked to leave as if she were unwelcome. She was genuinely hurt, and so was I.

Dear Gradska Kavana Arsenal, this is not how you treat your guests. After so many years of loyalty, both at this location and at others under your brand in Dubrovnik, being asked to leave in such a manner feels disrespectful. Hospitality is not only about serving food and drinks — it is about respect, gratitude, and valuing the people who return to you again and again. Yesterday, you failed us. It leaves not only a bitter taste but also creates a poor image of Croatian tourism in this otherwise amazing city.

After so many beautiful memories in this place, it is not easy to write these words. And it is a sad reminder that true hospitality is fragile — and must never be taken for granted.
Primo location in Old Town. A gorgeous, large restaurant with tables inside and next to the strand by the Port. Delicious food and attentive, experienced staff.
Stjepan is amazing and super nice! Very tentative and great recommendations! Definitely look for him if you can! Will come back again during my trip in Dubrovnik

We wanted to eat again down by the harbour, and we liked the fact that once in this restaurant you are just off the side where people walk. We love the atmosphere of people about and watching whilst not necessarily breathing all over your food as they walk past.
Anyway onto the food.
We had the break and oil, I don’t think it’s just being on holiday that does it, but the selection of breads here are so tasty and so reasonably priced too.
Mains of spaghetti in tomato sauce and sea food stew (honestly this was superb!) we couldn’t fault the food in the slightest.
It’s a big restaurant and busy too, tables well spaced apart and the addition of the live music makes it really relaxing. Service was attentive without being invasive.
Thoroughly enjoyed our meal and the view watching the boats come and go.

Incredible. I’ve been in Europe for 2 weeks now and this was arguably my favorite meal. Obren was lovely, the view was great, and the food was incredible!! 

No notes!

Amazing place, view, food and staff. We also went here for dinner and loved everything.

Our server, Obren, was so nice and friendly.

Really recommend!

charming, great location, wonderful views, food was very good, service was ok (they were busy), a bit overpriced but it is in the heart of the touristy area. Reserve ahead to get an outdoor table overlooking the harbor.
Breathtaking view by the water. We had breakfast and fresh oysters. So yummy! Thank you Roberto for the 10/10 service!!

Fair prices comparing to good quality an taste. 
The only restaurant that provided free bread and butter along with the breakfast. 
Good service
We loved our dinner! Delicious food, tasty wine, great service (thank you Davor!) and a beautiful view. We would totally recommend this place!

We don't like the food and I think it's wellmmmm far from being Dubrovnik's restaurant 5. We ordered two entries that were quite ok that was the carpaccio and the tartar tuna. And for lunch the risotto of seafood and the file mignon were both graceless and bad. Anyway. I do not recommend

amazing food and view! price is fair. 
Obren was our server and he was super kind!!!
would definitely come back here!
(we came for dinner)
Perfect! Good food, good view and good service. Came all the way from the States and it was worth every second! Totally recommend - the restaurant and Dubrovnik as a whole.

This place was recommended to us by a good friend who spends part of the year here every year. It is in a perfect picturesque location, with one patio facing the square, which is shaded in the morning, and another patio facing the harbor, which is sunny in the morning, but more shaded in the afternoon. We came for breakfast on the shady patio on the square, right when it opened at 8 am, and it was lovely. 

We had a fresh squeezed orange juice, a cappuccino and eggs Benedict. It came with a basket of home baked bread, butter, and jams. The eggs were perfectly cooked with yolks slightly runny. Service was quick and friendly. Definitely recommend!

We had the most amazing meal and view!! Our waiter Jepan provided great service, prompt, 
courteous and recommended great dishes. We had fish stew, truffle pasta and perfectly cooked tuna!! Phenomenal!!

The food here was absolutely exceptional! I got the beefsteak and it was delicious and tender, well cooked and presented beautifully. The prices were also good and we opted for cocktails as our drink of choice and they exceeded our expectations. Our server Marijo was so accommodating and made sure we were satisfied with our meal throughout. He went above and beyond to ensure we had a great experience. I will definitely be recommending this restaurant to anybody coming to Dubrovnik as the views are spectacular and the service is exceptional! Overall it was a great experience.

Just after a fabulous meal at Gradska Kavana Arsenal served by Marijo. The food was great quality and reasonably priced given the superb location. I got the pasta and asked to add chicken as an extra, it was very creamy but very tasty!’ Not too heavy either. We also went here for breakfast yesterday morning and the salads were second to none. Definitely worth a visit if you are in the Old Town Dubrovnik area. Marijo was an excellent waiter, the service was very quick!

We had a wonderful evening at Gradska Kavana Arsenal. The food was excellent. The chicken, beef steak & pasta were all cooked perfectly and full of flavour. Drinks were equally enjoyable and the atmosphere was made even more special by a fabulous pianist providing live entertainment. Considering the prime location, the prices were very reasonable. A huge thank you to Marijo, our server, who was polite, friendly and prompt throughout the evening. Highly recommended!
Food was amazing here and our server Marijo was so accommodating and friendly. Highly recommend visiting Gradska Kavana Arsenal when in Dubrovnik.

Order octopus salad and truffle pasta. It was very delicious!
Mr. Roberto's service was also great!!
The views and food here were amazing! The staff was lovely, especially our waiter Roberto. If you have the time to visit this restaurant, it’s a must!

We had an amazing experience at Arsenal Dubrovnik. Roberto took great care of us — the cocktails and breakfast were fantastic, the service was excellent, and the view of the harbour was absolutely stunning. Definitely a must-visit!
It was a very satisfying breakfast with a good view and delicious rice. It was the right restaurant for our last trip to Dobrognik on Day 7! Mr.Obren Unkovic made a great time!

This is a fantastic place with great food, service and ambiance. We had previously heard that the kitchen is especially good at classical food from the Adriatic coast and this rumour turned out to be more than true. 

I had the black cuttlefish risotto (Crna Rižot) which was really wonderful, I don’t think I can order this anywhere else again after having this one. They nail the classical taste profile with an elegant and modern twist as they serve it with burrata and sage. It was so balanced and soooo tasty. We also had the octopus served with potato’s and capers, also a very balanced and well cooked dish. The octopus was perfectly treated and the pairing was just divine.

It’s also super beautiful here, and the service was great. I cannot recommend this place enough.

We had a wonderful evening celebrating our friends birthday at this beautiful location with the best waiter Obren! He made sure we had a good time at any moment + surprised us with a birthday cake for free ◡̈ The food was amazing, so we would definitely recommend stopping by 💫

Our people serving the table were the best. Anna and Gaby were making our evening!
Will recommend whoever goes to Dubrovnik to experience this.
Great location, staff and ambiance!!
Food taste amazing on top.
Really enjoyed the local wines and cuisine, will definitely pass by to thanks once again during our stay!

We came back for the second time after 2 years and it was so worth it!
Anna made sure our experience was even better than the previous one! With her kindness and great advice, she helped us to really experience the wonders of Croatia.
Gaby couldn't be more approachable and it was a pleasure to be served by both of them.
The food was absolutely gorgeous, so please share with the chefs at the kitchen and the wine & advice topped it off.
Please take care of the people as they were the ones which for us madMe the difference.
We are looking forward to the next visit!

The view is amazing and the dishes are delicious and we had rib eye, fish stew and black risotto 😋😋😋
Obren who served us is very friendly and professional and always keep smiling ☺️ 
Highly recommended 👍🏻👍🏻
They are cery nice and kind like the perfect weather. The man who served us is Obren who is great and friendly! He made amazing Croatia trip for me, which is first!
A superb meal with a great table outside overlooking the Marina. The Octupus salad starter and Tuna and Squid mains were super nice

A fantastic dining experience starting with the receptionist who was very accommodating giving us options to consider - to our waiter, Obren who was obliging responding to all our questions about the menu and restaurant itself. His personable yet professional engagement - and charm to say the least was the cream on the pudding. We’d have loved to stay on and soak in the atmosphere and scenery a while longer while having our dessert have but we were also respectful of the 1.5hr we were given to occupy the spot. What started well ended well. Thank you, Arsenal. While in Dubro, we’ll try your two other restos. Kudos to you.

We went here for dinner on the first night of our honeymoon and it was the best dinner that we ever had. Our waiter was amazing and all of his recommendations were spot on and delicious. We had the best octopus salad ever. They even gave us a complimentary honeymoon cake with some alcohol! Definitely a 10/10 experience and we highly recommend that everyone go to this restaurant!
Amazing experience for my friends birthday!! So kind and accommodating! Great service especially from our server Zeliko! Beautiful ambience outdoors.
Marvellous restaurant, great location, plus we were lucky to have a grandstand front row table over looking the harbour and sea view. Food was lovely.

The restaurant is lovely inside. It might seem posh, but it's not too expensive. 
Food was delicious and served quickly. 

Staff all seemed very friendly and were attentive. 

Overall, I highly recommend.

Probably our best dining experience in Dubrovnik! Amazing ambient, delicious food and great wines. Our host Marcos was excellent and everyone was very kind and helpful. Would definitely come back and recommend.
Recommended by our daughter as the perfect place for our anniversary. Delicious food in a beautiful setting and splendid service from Marko.

We were referred to dine here by my husband’s friend who was born and raised here in Dubrovnik and now lives in the United States. What a spot-on recommendation. We had a lovely lunch with the most gorgeous view and our server, Marko was outstanding! Highly recommend!!

We had a wonderful experience at this restaurant for breakfast. The place is beautiful, the food was really good and the prices are correct for the area. We were served by Obren, who was very attentive and efficient with us.

As a family of 5 we ate twice here for breakfast and brunch, and both times were excellent.

We sat on the side closest to the sea and had the beautiful views you expect. Great service, good quality drinks and food, a small but good breakfast menu and reasonable price.

They did gluten free bread and the omelette was GF, so I was happy.
We spent 15 days in Europe and this was our favorite restaurant! With typical Croatia and delicious food! Cost on average of the restaurants.

Fabulous ambience and location overlooking the harbour, although the downside is the fumes coming from the boats coming and going. Nice food - I’d recommend the Bourbon Gnocchi and Tuna Tatare. Generally easy to get a walk-in table here around 6-6.30 - I’d have this restaurant on your list!

I don’t usually leave reviews, but this place absolutely deserves one. From the moment we walked in, the atmosphere was warm and inviting – stylish without being pretentious, and just the right balance of buzz and comfort.

Now let’s talk about the food… The steaks were out of this world. Perfectly cooked, juicy, tender, and packed with flavor. Easily some of the best I’ve ever had – and I’ve had my fair share!

The cocktails were next-level – creative, beautifully presented, and dangerously delicious. Whoever’s behind the bar clearly knows what they’re doing.

But the highlight of the night was the service. Josip went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and well looked after. Friendly, attentive, and genuinely passionate about what he does. He made the whole experience even more memorable.

If you’re looking for a top-quality meal with excellent drinks and standout service in a lovely setting, look no further. Can’t wait to come back!

Marko made sure my girlfriend and I were looked after. Incredibly wonderful service, the food was phenomenal, and the recommendations for drinks without trying to upsell, was very appreciated.

Although all the staff were very helpful, and the restaurant is fantastic, we were very thankful for Marko providing us with a memorable dinner.

Recommended by our tour guide and impressed by the online photos, this was a restaurant where we really wanted to eat. Although all tables were booked online, we walked by the day prior and were able to directly make a reservation for the following day. 
One might think that this restaurant, right at the beautiful harbor, might be a tourist trap that charges high prices and delivers very little. Luckily, this was not the case at all! The restaurant actually served our favorite meals during our Croatia trip. Service was impeccable as well!
When coming to Dubrovnik, this restaurant is a MUST!

Dubrovnik is so crowded with tourists and so dominated by brash bustle that the beauty of the city can only be experienced in the winter months. We have literally escaped from this gem of the Adriatic coast. What sticks in the memory are some architectural monuments and natural beauties , but also a really first-class restaurant that we visited twice. Almost everything was right there. It is only advisable not to drink the overpriced regional wines by the glass, but to order a bottle immediately.
Gherardino
Marco was fantastic. We had a lovely meal and Marco gave us fantastic suggestions and a great meal! Would recommend to everyone!
Magical setting. Delicious food. One of the best places to eat in Dubrovnik. A very special experience. Our waiter Marko was extremely friendly and professional.
Wonderful restaurant, incredible views and looked after perfectly by our waiter Marko. Couldn’t recommend highly enough.
The views are beautiful and the food is lovely + great value. Our waiter, Marijo Krkić was great chat also! Thank you Arsenal!

Amazing experience 
Great food 
Lovely music
Beautiful view 
Obren is a great waiter ! 
Best place located in the old town ! :)
Beautiful location, excellent service. Maki was very helpful. Food was lovely and plentiful. Most importantly, the coffee was great. We will be back.

Top location, once city view of Stradun and other side of the sea and old port. Very good service, very fair (popust za domace goste!!), very fine food and great coffee, were 2x there and would love to return!

If you’re only going to eat at one place in Dubrovnik – make it Arsenal. The view? Straight out of a dream. The kind that makes you question whether you're in a movie or just incredibly lucky.

Marco took care of us with the perfect mix of charm, professionalism, and that rare sixth sense of knowing exactly when you need a top-up or a tip about what to try next.

The food? Delicious!

Go for the view. Stay for the food. Come back for Marco
beautiful experience, food and service! we had the full breakfast plate and yogurt and eggs and it was delicious. the view is incredible. making, our waiter was so friendly and attentive.

Mario Krkić our waiter was very nice and helpful with everything, he even brought us some beautiful Croatian liqueur at the end for free. The meal was so delicious I got the veal and it was cooked perfectly but I wasn’t the biggest fan of the gnocchi. Definitely recommend this restaurant if you’re here in Dubrovnik.
Gorgeous atmosphere overlooking the port, food was excellent but very pricey our waiter Marijo was also incredibly lovely
Very nice place!! We come here for breakfast and dinner. All the staff were very polite, especially Josip. You should definitely try it.

Lovley food and drinks - would recommend booking as we got a seat right at the front. Obren was our server and he couldn’t have been more helpful - a must do while in Dubrovnik. We came on our final night of our trip and it was a great way to celebrate.

A wonderful place to start the day. The breakfast is fantastic, the ladies and gentlemen in Service, especially Marco, are super friendly and accommodating and the view over the busy harbour with nothing to outweigh.
We look forward to the next visit!
The setting for this restaurant overlooking the old port in Dubrovnik is wonderful, sit and watch the boats come and go whilst eating beautiful cuisine, a must place to eat in the old town
We had an amazing time at this restaurant, the view of Dubrovnik port was great, especially with the sun setting. Marijo was our server and he was excellent.
Warm Welcoming, Service by Obren really at the top a waiter who makes all the difference both with his sympathy and his joviality. Quality meals in front of a magnificent view 😍
Marijo was very attentive and helpful. We loved our dinner and dining experience here. The beef carpaccio and fish stew were delicious
Great Service from Marko, best guy! And the Food was the best since 1 Week in Croatia. We had a Great evening, the Wine was good too

We were there for drinks and deserts. Charming atmosphere and Staff (Marko) very kind and professional.
Great location in the middle of the old town. 
See you again!

Super nice restaurant with very good food and incredibly nice Service. Marko our waiter was fantastically nice and service minded. Everything about the evening was fantastic and we can more than recommend others to go here.

The service was not good, I had to call a server for him to get our orders. I ordered a matcha latte that was not good it tasted like soup and it had too much foam, and we also ordered a cake. On the menu it says that if your order a cake you have to ask the server what flavours they have but instead of telling us the server said « u have to get up and see yourself » so we did and they only had two flavours. The cake took 10-15 minutes to arrive which I dont understand why because it was a cake already prepared and it tasted not good. At the end when it was time for the bill we had to get up to ask the server for the bill.
A lovely restaurant. It is well worth a visit. The staff were very friendly and the food was tasty and a good price. If you sit outside you have a lovely view of the old port.
Good food and warm Service in high class – but it’s the terrace overlooking the harbor that really makes the place unforgettable.
Beautiful place, with a nice view near the sea. Exquisite food!!!!!!!!!!! Both first and second. Obren number 1.
Obren fantastic! Beautiful place but above all excellent food! All very good!!! Even complimentary liquor!!
The service was great. Obren, the waiter was wonderful!!! The food and view were amazing!!!! Would recommend a lot!!!!

Wow! Many restaurants say they are great, but this one surely is. From the entree, main and then guiltily the dessert, everything was amazing. The wine recommended was superb as well. However, the five stars come from the service - Marco attentive, friendly, knowledgeable and just made the dining experience top notch. Coincidentally it is my birthday and I could not have requested a lovelier meal and environment

Wonderful setting looking out at old town port. Fantastic food. Pasta with truffle and squid ink risotto. Marvellous bottle of local wine - Malvasija white wine. But best of all was the service from Marco.

We came here for breakfast and were served by the very attentive waitstaff. We were served promptly and they were able to accommodate to my partners request to make her omelet vegetarian. Impressions of our food:

- Orlando: Very tasty. The sausage and bacon were highlights.

- Omelette: Was also tasty. Note: reserve some of your bread from the basket if you want some bread with your omelette. The bread comes first so it's very easy to finish it before the main dish arrives.

- Crème Caramel: not a breakfast item but they will serve it if requested. A very good crème caramel with an orangey flavour to it.

We ate here in July. It is actually a massive place with two sides (one facing St Blaise's Church and the other facing the pier with a massive space inside). We were on the city side although would have probably preferred the pier side if we knew. Still it was handy as we were going to the Rector's Palace for an event afterwards. 

The restaurant holds itself out as high end albeit we felt the servers sort of rush and are not so genuine, probably due to size and business. It is also on the pricier side. 

Still, the food and drinks were very nice. We got the bread, octopus salad and seafood pasta as well as Mojitos, Mai Thai and wine and had no complaints, it was all good.
They fitted us in without a booking despite being very busy. Our food was beautiful and fresh and light, and our waiter (Maki) was friendly, attentive and did a really great job

The restaurant is located near the pier giving a beautiful view across the water. The food was delicious and our waiter Mario was very friendly and accommodating. He even gave us his favourite desserts on the house so generous of him.such a good start to our holiday in Dubrovnik. Would definitely come back here

The food was delicious and service even better! Sea bass was everyone's favorite. 
Mario was an amazing server. Thank you for a great evening!

Very friendly staff and helpful staff.

Good food that is a bit more expensive but perfectly affordable. Take the opportunity to try seafooood
Very good service and delicious black risotto. Waiters were kind and informative. Probably the best scenery in Dubrovnik too :)

Amazing view with such a good and friendly staff specially vlaho he cames with smile and with alot of patience for explaining about the food. First time in Croatia and we would love to come and visit again.

Ivan and the team at Gradskw Kavana made the whole experience exceptional. We were provided beautiful front row harbour seating and a gorgeous experience where every need was catered to, with the magical view of the water glistening and accompanied by ice cold wine and the sounds of live piano. The recommendations were perfect, the black squid was to die for. Thank you for a perfect evening xx

Stunning views! Food was amazing. Its only our first day. A Must do when your here!! We got a bit of everything definitely visit. Staff were great, has something for everyone as had vegan options but my friends said seafood was unreal.

This is an absolute treasure!! If you are in Dubrovnik you must eat at this spot. 
The food is amazing and service is excellent!! It's hard to get a reservation but I was lucky!! Anthony made it happen. I even had a ocean view!! This place is must!!
This is the best restaurant in Dubrovnik if you want something special at a reasonable price. The location looks great and the food is good. Try the cocktails.

Food and service excellent. The view even better. 
A little pricey but I think the atmosphere might just be worth it. Would recommend if visiting.

Our waiter tonight was Dzoni and was knowledgeable about the menu and had great advice on what to order!! Very attentive staff and great tasting food !! View was beautiful too. Would recommend definitely.

Beautiful view, great atmosphere, delicious food but yet the best part was the implacable service from Marco. He’s very kind, attentive, and made sure to provide an unforgettable experience to my friend as it was her bday!! With a nice bottle of prosecco and a cake with happy bday wishes! Thank you Marco and Gradska for such a memorable experience!!
Great and nice place, it is right next to the sea. Food and service are great. I would definitely recommend. Right in center

We had an unforgettable evening, made even more special by the most outstanding gentleman, Josip. We had just gotten engaged, and he went above and beyond to make our night truly memorable while we were abroad.

His attentiveness, kindness, and genuine care made all the difference. We can’t recommend The Arsenal highly enough — especially if you’re lucky enough to be served by Josip.

10/10 service, and smiles all night long.
Two very happy customers.
Absolutely amazing experience. The food was sooo good I would highly recommend eating here. Josip was an amazing waiter.

My friend and I came for dinner from a recommendation. My friend and I took a few photos when we first sat down. Bero was such a good sport and even offered to take a photo for us and was in one! He made the whole dinner fun, while providing excellent recommendations. I hope everyone has as great an experience here as we did!

This restaurant is outstanding,
The view is magnificent, the food is great and the service we got from Obren is outstanding.
This is a must go to restaurant in Dubrovnik!
Thank you!

Great spot for people watching , amazingly delicious food. My palate was in serious treat. Very sophisticated refined feel whilst very relaxing ambience at reasonable prices. For 2 people with delicious starters abd main course, and a glass of wine each €140
Such a beautiful restaurant with great views, the service is amazing and staff is very friendly. The espresso is a must, best in Dubrovnik!

Sat here writing this review with an amazing view of the port. We are here for breakfast. We had booked a table for two and stated on our reservation we are here for our honeymoon. We were greeted with a mimosa each after we had been seated. After we had finished our breakfast our lovely waiter Mark brought us a chocolate orange cake. Mark took some photos for us. Book this place if you’re in the old town. And hopefully you’ll be served by Mark too.
Great location with a nice view. The food and the service were also very good. Obren was a great waiter. Highly recommend for a lovely meal.
Super Good Service ( Our waiter was Mark) Good local wine, good food and especially great view. I recommend 100%. A must

We have dined here twice during our visit to Dubrovnik once we came for dinner and another time for breakfast. Both times we truly enjoyed everything. Delicious food , gracious service and great spot for people watching.

Absolutely fantastic experience! The food was incredibly delicious — every bite was a treat. The black risotto, in particular, was out of this world! Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for authentic flavors and great service.

Excellent service, good food👍
Antony was very helpful, would definitely recommend this restaurant.
Very clean,food was freshly cooked the fish was excellent
This restaurant was absolutely wonderful! The food was excellent and the view was amazing. Our waiter, Anthony, was so kind and welcoming!
The food was really great and our waiter Berislav was superb with his recommendations. Definitely recommend this place!

Service is polished yet warm — mario krkic was attentive, knowledgeable about the menu, and happy to recommend wine pairings or share local insights. Prices are on the higher side, but reasonable considering the location, quality, and overall experience.

We had two meals at Gradska Kavana Arsenal. Lunch one afternoon was wonderful. The location is great right on the water with lots of activity of boats coming and going.
We were walking by and didn't realize this was Gradska Kavana. We had dinner reservations the next night but were happy to stop for lunch. Besides,, it is rated as a top restaurant in Dubrovnik. 

 Drinks were refreshing and good, a pina colada for me a Corona for my husband.. We each had spaghetti with marinara sauce, it was good, nothing special. Portions weren't that large and 2 pastas, a beer, water and a cocktail were $78.00 US without tip. We thought the setting and atmosphere made up for any shortcomings with the food.

Dinner the next night was a total failure. We were seated inside but still had a nice view of the water. The place had no vibe or energy and was practically empty. There was piano player and singer in the back corner, they weren't good at all. Drinks were OK, and the burrata was not bad. The chicken entrees however were awful. Unfortunately, we both had the same thing as the other offerings were not appealing. The chicken was rolled and looked like sausages. It was served with some broccoli. The whole dish was bland and tasteless. Service wasn't great either. We were supremely disappointed and sorry we went.

 Over $100.00 US for tasteless, bland food..not good. This is not one of the best restaurants in Dubrovnik tha'ts for certain. Atmosphere sitting near the water at lunch OK. Dinner NO.

Food was delicious, serviced was outstanding!!!!!
Obren was our waiter and an absoulete Gentlemen 5 star service!!!!
This is not only a beautiful spot but the food and service are superb . Ivo and Anna delivered a fantastic hour and a half of peace and culinary excellence

This spot is so beautiful. Overlooking the water as the boats come in from their tours. Great food and amazing local wine recommended by Marko who did a great job looking after us. This place has a great vibe. It’s a must!
Mark was a fantastic waiter! we loved our breakfast and conversation. the views are stunning! would absolutely recommend!

We showed up without a reservation and the hostess was able to get a great table that opened up with a great view in an amazing setting. Service was excellent, the server was extremely attentive and polite, even though the restaurant was extremely busy. The food was well prepared and tasted excellent. This is definitely a spot to check out.

Incredible food in the most amazing location near the Old Town Port. We came here for my 30th birthday and I had the best birthday meal! Our waiter Stjepan was amazing! Fabulous service and we couldn’t have asked for better. He was funny, attentive, polite & very helpful. An absolute credit to this restaurant. Highly recommend this place if you are visiting Dubrovnik Old Town!! :)
Amazing service, Obren was fantastic. Food was delicious and atmosphere very nice. Would definitely return and recommend!
Really nice place with good food and the most beautiful view out to the sea. We were served by Obren, who was friendly and professional.

Amazing food at an amazing restaurant, with an amazing view. Whether you sit outside at the port, inside with the beautiful interior design and architecture, or on the terrace which is in the square, you will have an enjoyable view and vibe with your meal. We had two different pasta dishes, both really nice, with some drinks to match. Our waiter, Josip, was so lovely and friendly, recommended some beautiful side dishes for our meal and was very polite when we wanted to change some things. He even brought us some lovely cake and cherry brandy complimentary at the end of our meal! 

If you’re in Dubrovnik and are wanting a nice, memorable and fancier than usual meal that isn’t too fancy or expensive, this is the spot!

Beautiful venue, unreal views, food was delicious and the staff went above and beyond! So nice we came back twice! The black ink sea food risotto is a must try! Our waiter Dzoni was so friendly and made our dinner extra amazing!

We came back twice it was so nice! You have to get the black risotto it was incredible I had it both times. The staff are super friendly we couldn’t have asked for more! Special shout out to Dzoni who was our waiter! Amazing service!

We had breakfast in this beautiful place close to the marina of Dubrovnik. molto elegant excellent service and fair prices for the location .è also recommended for lunch and dinner but you have to book well in advance
Didn’t have a reservation but got there early and got right in. The service was exceptional and the food was superb. The best location for dinner in Dubrovnik.

Excellent service from Josip, went beyond to make our experience amazing. Picturesque setting on the patio behind stone arches with a view of the old fort, the beautiful blue bay and coast-side hills. To top it off the food was delicious. The dessert, Torta Scorpa, was unique for us and a perfect ending to a great day.

We booked prior and got the best table right next to the bay, so perfect for the view. The service from Ovren is also great. 

We ordered tuna tartar, fish stew and truffle pasta. Loved tuna tartar the most, very recommend to everyone to try if you can eat raw fish.
We had a lovely, casual lunch. The cheese plate and service were great! We sat on the patio for great people watching and views. This is located centrally to everything.
Obren was an amazing waiter and very good with allergies!! Awesome brunch and beautiful view on the water. Nice spot if you are staying in old town.
Great restaurant! Obren was our waiter and was extremely helpful and accommodating. Loved this spot and would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik.
Great place with beautiful view and really good food! The staff are extremely nice and helpful :) I recommend this place in Dubrovnik
We enjoyed an amazing breakfast this morning. Fantastic food and incredible service from Obreh. Highly recommended ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
The restaurant was not able to cook the food as ordered. When a kindly remark was made the restaurant made new food that was even worse.
Amazing Risotto. Very polite and attentive staff. Stephan was great. We celebrated a birthday and they brought us a lemon cheesecake. It was delicious
Delicious food and Bero is handsome，nice and has good memory！gooooooood！Beautiful sea view！！！comfortable seat，warm service！
What a beautiful restaurant in a prime location. Service very friendly. Food very good, just a pity that the appetizer the tuna tartare was not served fresh enough, otherwise 5/5.
Great restaurant with amazing view!! Food and drinks were delicious!! Our waiter Josip is the best and kindest ever!!!
Great and fast service from the best waiter "Josip"! We had the eggs Benedict, coffee and cocktails, the food and the drinks were delicious...
Dzoni was great, very nice, accommodating and made sure we had everything we needed the dessert at the end was the perfect finisher!

We tried to book in person but were advised they are booked up to a year ahead - I’m sure as much because of the food as the location. 
However they only reserve 50% and the rest is left to walk ins. So choose your time right and you’ll be seated as my daughter and I were
Best meal in our visit to Croatia and best service

What a beautiful evening! We were seated super quickly in spite of having no reservation, the service was excellent and the food was beautiful. My partner had the seafood pasta and I had the chicken, both were 10/10. Would absolutely recommend a visit here and we’d definitely return next time we’re in Dubrovnik.

We had an amazing time here! The ambience is incredible right on the beautiful harbor lit up at night. We had a short wait for a table, but we had a beautiful experience drinking espresso martinis (which were made to perfection) with a view! The food was delicious, the drinks were refreshing, but nothing compared to the service offered by Marijeta! She was knowledgeable, friendly and so kind during our dinner! I highly recommend stopping in for food & drinks!

Visiting this restaurant is a must! The food is fantastic ( you have to order the truffle mushroom pasta) and the cocktails were delicious! The ambiance is unmatched and so is the service. Our server, Marijeta, was incredibly sweet and professional! She made sure our dinner and our experience was 5 stars. From the warmest welcome, to a well paced dinner, she went above and beyond. Needless to say, in my short stay in Dubrovnik, I will definitely be back!

Lovely romantic waterside meal - just perfect for our honeymoon.
Staff and food were both amazing - would highly recommend any time you are in the area

First visit to the restaurant, needless to say that it did not disappoint. The view alone is enough to justify the time we spent here. Despite my intial hesitation, we tried the black risotto and it was delicious (despite my intial hesitation ordering it). Special mention to Obren who was very attentive during the entire meal, highly recommended to anyone visiting Dubrovnik but I would recommend booking a table in advance.

Lovely setting,wonderful staff.The food was good but the staff definitely made this visit special.My wife,through no fault of the restaurant didn’t like her meal that much (personal taste)and the waiter was upset she didn’t enjoy it,so gave her complimentary dessert to make up for it,lovely touch

Our hotel host recommended this place, we felt it was going to be a bit touristy, but pretty much everything is there. The food was really good and the location was fabulous. We were lucky to get a table without a reservation and had a wonderful evening eating and looking at the amazing water view and lights of Dubrovnik at night. Got the famous black risotto and truffle pasta I read so much about online and loved both. I would definitely recommend this place.
Perfect setting, lovely quality food, but most importantly we had wonderful service from Marc. We would come again for his service alone.
Fabulous location just inside the old town. Great food and drinks. Mark was a very attentive server. Our group ordered the sailor’s risotto, tuna, and the gnocchi. All dishes were exceptional.
Best truffle paste I've ever eaten. Very much taste in the food, good service and nice atmosphere. Good wine and nice view.
It’s a great spot in the heart of the Old Town to stop for a coffee and enjoy some delicious pastries. The atmosphere is charming and relaxing — perfect for a break while exploring the city
Absolutely fantastic service from my waiters, first restaurant I visited in Croatia and I was so pleasantly surprised. Tried multiple meals at the table and everything wowed me!
Dzoni was absolutely amazing and treated our group so well. He gave great recommendations and had insight into the city.

There’s two views you can sit at. You can choose to sit out at the front or out the back. I’d recommend on a hot sunny day to go towards the back along the sea front like we did, was much cooler and an inviting seat away from the heat. 
We ordered the steak sandwiches with fries which was lovely. I got the strawberry spritz followed by a Hugo spritz, my husband got a pina colada followed by an old fashioned. They were also delicious.
Note: if you want a table right by the sea you might have to reserve.
Great service with Obren! We received our drinks and food quickly and it was so delicious. Not to mention the views from the terrace were breathtaking. Highly recommend!
Great meal with an amazing view! Obren was a great waiter, super helpful for dietary restrictions (gluten and dairy free)
The most beautiful restaurant in Dubrovnik! Amazing food, amazing views, and amazing service ! Mark was our server and he was so sweet ! 10/ 10 reccomend

After all the good reviews we had to visit this restaurant. We had an early dinner. The location is stunning. Service was really awesome but the food was good not great. Not quite understanding all the hype.
The food and drinks were perfect here!! In particular, I love the black risotto very much. The view was also amazing. Love it !!
Scenery is stunning. Food is unexpectedly good. Glad I can have my meal here. The waiter Roberto is very kind and talkative. I am very pleased with my trip here.

We can’t say enough about how wonderful our experience was here. Due to weather we were not able to get to their sister restaurant (panorama) we stopped hoping they could assist us in contacting panorama so we were not a no show. They immediately helped with this situation and had us seated with the most beautiful view in 5 mins. Food was excellent 
( squid and black risotto) even better was our waiter Bero. The kindest young man and a night we will remember for many years. Highly recommend coming here if you have the chance!!
This was recommended for great cocktails by our guide. I had 2 great margaritas as I was tired of wine. I then had beef carpaccio which was wonderful! Highly recommend.
Stunning iconic view over the port. Wonderful atmosphere. The truffle pasta was a 12 out of 10 - best I’ve ever had! Our waiter Obren was really friendly and switched on.

Love this place and highly recommend a visit. The food and service are great as is the view. It’s nestled right on the harbor with shaded patio for great people watching. Mario, our waiter could not have been better. He was very polite and accommodating. The breakfast was delicious - oriented eggs and fresh bread were the best breakfast we had in Dubrovnik. Will definitely be back!

We managed to get in for brunch without a booking and had a seat near the fan and with a seaview. Bero was our server for the meal and was exceptionally friendly. We had the squid, oysters and the black risotto which were all fantastic. Would visit again!

Josip’s service was incredible! He was very warm, friendly and attentive. 🙏😍Pair that with the Chardonnay, delicious octopus salad and a cake to finish off (which was so delicious) and it made for an amazing experience!
Great food, great wine, great views and even better service. Stjepan was very attentive and made it the best meal me had in Dubrovnik.
Beautiful views and an excellent lunch. Great stopover from the heat. Our waiter, Marijo Krkic was very friendly and gave us great recommendations for other restaurants. Would come back again!
Best Margarita I’ve had in quite a while! Beautifully presented, perfectly chilled. Gorgeous view from the lounge. Thank you Mario for the perfectly made cocktail!

This spot is great for an afternoon coffee as well as for dinner. It is central and brimming with people. The cakes and the food are amazing. They also serve traditional dishes. The staff was very friendly and gave us great recommendations (special thanks to our weighter Josip!). The place was also dog friendly.
Mark our server was wonderful. Attentive, professional and friendly. The food was perfect. We came here last year several times & decided to return this year. It didn’t disappoint
Excellent food and wine. The service was excellent and we had a fantastic view of the harbour from our table. Would highly recommend

This restaurant is incredible. You will rarely find a better location, staff and service are perfect, and food is outstanding.
Second time we have visited - book early to get a great table by the marina, and you will not be disappointed.
Tuna main course is fantastic.
Massive recommend - please go there!

Excellent meal with a great view of the harbour
The altarpieces are not on top of each other, nice towels.
Very professional service.
Mediterranean cuisine of very good quality, everything was good.
Incredible value for money considering the situation. 
Not to be missed!!!

We scoured through different restaurants online looking for decent reviews ... and we found this gem. The black risotto is a must-try. I had the sailor's risotto and really enjoyed the meal. Marko looked after us. Top marks experience and I highly recommend this restaurant without any hesitation. Additionally, for its location and customer service ... I also consider this place excellent value for money.

This is a fabulous bar and restaurant with a patio for people watching on the main street and then a beautiful terrace at the other side overlooking the harbour. We had coffee at the one in the morning and then returned for lunch at the other later. Although it was clearly very busy, the staff were very kind on accommodating us. We were able to have a drink in the bar while we waited for a table to come free and then seated as soon as this was possible. The food was fantastic. I had a veal and tuna salad and my partner had beef carpaccio. Although we were on a cruise, it was the best food we had all holiday.
Beutiful place, excellent food and our waiter Stjepan and host Anna were so kind and made our evening perfect 😍 Thank you from Finland.

I have been visiting Arsenal's sister restaurants Dubravka and Panorama for a number of years now and i prefer them compared to Arsenal. My 3 star review is in no way supposed to put people off going here, its just my personal preference when comparing all of the Nautika restaurants. The service was friendly enough it's just the vibe here doesn't feel as relaxed as the other two. It felt a little more pretentious, which is not for me. The location is fantastic and i'm sure the food would be as good as Dubravka and Panorama. I will continue using the other locations.
A must try while in Dubvronik. The black risotto is a must order. It is fantastic. Great service from Marijo and great views.
