A fantastic spot for dinner! Antony took great care of us and made the experience extra special. The seafood and black risotto are must tries absolutely delicious. The atmosphere is incredible and made for the perfect ending to our trip.

The cuisine is just Devine, the service is impeccable, and you get to sit on a terrace either facing the Old Port or Stradun. I have been coming here countless times but today, I had the best of the best: grilled squid with potatoes lightly toasted, served with capers, a bit of finely chopped marinated red onions, squid ink, parsley, and the most flavorful Croatian virgin olive oil 👏👏👏
Fantastic dinner to end our stay in Dubrovnik! Obreh was a great server, providing us with great suggestions for our meal. Highly recommend!

Beautiful restaurant in the Old Town overlooking the harbour. I booked for a party of 10 and they were all very helpful in making the arrangements. Food was delicious, service was great! Recommend this restaurant to anyone visiting Dubrovnik

We had a fantastic dining experience at Gradska Kavana Arsenal! The view was absolutely stunning – you can enjoy a relaxing meal right by the sparkling blue ocean, with the view of ancient city walls. The food was delicious and beautifully presented, and the service made it even better. A special shout-out to Anton, who was incredibly friendly, attentive, and helpful throughout our visit.

We booked online before our arrival a table with sea views. 
The decor, the service, the dishes everything was perfect! It was really great... 
Great value, especially at lunchtime with the lunch formula. One of the best restaurants in town. 
We recommend 100%

Gradska provided a beautiful, peaceful and relaxing setting with lounge music in the background as we sat by the port and watched the boats coming and going. Our waiter, Marco, was lovely and even located a mobile phone charger. We ordered just one course and enjoyed a fresh, tasty, beautifully presented meal followed by a cup of tea. We’d definitely go again although, for a vegetarian, there weren’t many options but they were accommodating.

5 Star service and food. We didn't have a reservation and ever though they're booked 20+ days in advanced, Mark found us a walk in table. The foods was the best I'd had and Marks service was brilliant. Highly recommended.
Fantastic spot, lovely service by our server Mark. Friendly helpful and definitely has good recommendations.Good views, good food, good atmosphere.
Mark was a fantastic waited, looked after us at the table and was a gentlemen. Food was incredible. Would 100% recommend.
Amazing restaurant, big shoutout to our waiter Marc!! He was so nice, he always made sure we had everything we need!!! The food was also very very good, I recommend the truffle pasta

This is a big restaurant in a Touristy location. DON’T be put off. 
The welcome, service and food were all excellent. They are geared up for their size and very effecient. 

I had a steak which was really good. Others had fish - very happy. 
House Wine was excellent value - served in a huge bottle. We actually shared with another table! (A first)

The friendly waiter, when he realised that I was not impressed with their selection of ice cream recommended an Expresson Martini. It was as good any I’ve had in London and half the price!
The food, service and sea view are very special. Especially the friendly condition is very creditable. Thanks to Mark
So good! Marijo was wonderful and so helpful. My husband had the best burger of his life and I had the tomato pasta which was DELICIOUS! Highly recommend and ask for Marijo!!

I made reservations online for dinner after hearing great things about the restaurant from others. Josip provided excellent service throughout the meal. The food was fantastic! I ordered the Ston Oysters, fish stew, focaccia and a glass of wine and was happy with each item. The views you get from the outdoor seating are great as well. Definitely would recommend this restaurant to anyone visiting Dubrovnik!

We came here for breakfast one morning while in Dubrovnik and had a wonderful time. They sat us right away without a reservation, and inside there are so many seats with a great view in the shade. Breakfast was delicious and our waiter Marijo was very friendly and funny. We would definitely come again!

We had breakfast with a view of the sea, so we were able to spend a very relaxing time. I ordered eggs Benedict and it was delicious. I think it fits the taste of Japanese people.

The service was also very good, and I could feel the care and care they showed me when I visited without reservation, trying to guide me to the most scenic place possible.

This store has several affiliated stores nearby.
All the shops were so nice, so make sure to visit them!

I think lunch and dinner reservations are mandatory!

I was allowed to pass through the terrace seats overlooking the harbour. The service was very friendly as they showed us the shade seats. Breakfast was delicious, especially the baguette and honey. It is a popular restaurant, but if it is early in the morning, you can basically go in without reservation, so it is recommended for morning activities while enjoying the seaside scenery.

I came here to have a quick breakfast, and I really enjoyed the breakfast. I was told that I wanted to sit in the shade, and they let me sit in a nice place. I was touched by the wonderful view and the delicious food. The kindness of the staff was good. And I liked the service of the "Marijo" waiter.

The view from this restaurant was really fantastic and the food was great. In particular Marijo Krkic servers were also very friendly and comfortable and left a good memory here. I want to come back to this beautiful restaurant!!! :)
We had a wonderful iced coffee overlooking the square and the service from Marijo was fantastic! We’ll definitely be back next time we’re in Dubrovnik!
Great time for dinner and drinks! Had some pasta dishes and Hugo spritz, delicious! We loved Josip and the rest of the staff

We were a walk in and due to how popular the restaurant is we were expecting a wait for a table. The host was super transparent and told us there was one couple ahead of us on the waitlist but we could wait in the bar. We were shown a table that was ready instantly but it was quite far from the water view whereas we were told if we wanted to wait the 10–15 minutes they would make sure we had a water view table. The food was excellent as well as the drinks. Can’t fault the service. Overall super positive experience.
Josip and Marko were very welcoming! Definitely recommend stopping by for a quick lunch. Octopus salad is great and the oysters are fresh.
Excellent Mediterranean food with a view. The restaurant is child friendly and promptly brought out the food for the kids.

Had a wonderful meal here celebrating my birthday. It's in a perfect location overlooking the port in the old town, and feels very sophisticated while still being relaxed and comfortable.
I had the black cuttlefish risotto which was rich & creamy with generous chunks of cuttlefish.
Roberto was a charming and enthusiastic waiter, and helped make it feel like an extra special occasion, really looking after us and ensuring we had a brilliant evening!

An incredible evening to celebrate my husband’s 30th. We booked during a visit to the old told a few days prior. It was very easy and convenient! The food was unreal & the service was EXCELLENT! ROBERTO went above and beyond with his service! He recommended 3 different mains for all of us and we LOVED each dish! The seabass, the cuttlefish risotto and the rib eye steak were 10/10

We had heard good things from our uber driver and reviews on other sites. They were all correct and we weren’t disappointed! We will definitely be back next time visit Croatia!
A lovely evening! Great view, with nice piano playing. I had the Sea Bass (€32) which was really excellent. Feels like a fancy restaurant. Roberto was really lovely to us! Thank you!

We absolutely love this restaurant. The steak and the black squid risotto is out of this world. The staff are wonderful and gave us the best table. We had the most wonderful view over the marina and we feel so very special. Thank you to Roberto who served us , to all the wonderful staff and to the manager who was superb. This is our second visit and we will be back again. Highly recommended!
Food was delicious and our server Mark (from Serbia) was so nice and so helpful! 10/10 service. The view was beautiful as well. Highly recommend!

We pre-booked for the first night of our honeymoon and the communication was excellent with the staff, who reserved a front row seat for the occasion. The view from the terrace is amazing. The food was delightful and so was the bottle of Sauvignon blanc. Definitely the type of place to celebrate a special occasion! Prices in Dubrovnik are high but this is comparable to them all but in a superior setting. Highly recommend!

This place is gorgeous, views are amazing. We had no booking and they were more than accommodating to us and sat us in ten minutes even when the place was packed. Food was superb and the customer service was spectacular. Obren was our waiter and he was top star, he made our last night in Croatia really specially. Would recommended to everyone 10/10
Amazing food, lovely view of the harbour. Waitor Obren was so friendly and accommodating, we will definetely be visiting again!
Excellent atmosphere, views, and food! Obrew was especially excellent, providing exceptionally perfect and quick service! If we’re ever in Dubrovnik again, we would definitely return!

We came in for a nice dinner that didn’t break the bank, extra points for the amazing view! The Sailor’s risotto was lovely and balanced, and the bread selection was affordable and filling. Our host Mario was lovely, attentive and we could not have asked for more. Recommend for the food, the view, and the hospitality!

The location is excellent, it has a terraced view of the Plaza and the other side of the Marina, as well as a large enclosed living room, which has a huge stained glass window that allows you to see the marina even when you are inside. The service is excellent from everyone, and the food exquisite! Good atmosphere in general. Definitely a super recommended place.
Great tasting and good value food with an amazing view. The portions were also very sizeable. Mario served us excellently. Would come again

Stunning location, beautiful food, wonderful waiting staff. I wonder if some people, arriving by boat walk past this place assuming it’s too expensive and keen to see what else is on offer. My advice would be to get a table there!! It won’t disappoint. Service was swift and staff second to none.. lovely and spaced out (sometimes in smaller places in the old town you can feel a little hemmed in). Steak sandwich and octopus salad were outstanding!! And all value for money!! Not cheap but not as pricey as you might imagine on first impressions.
Great location overlooking the harbor and people walking by. Food was good and the staff was attentive. Like it here so much we visited their sister restaurant!
We had a lovely breakfast here such an amazing location and very well priced for delicious food and great views would definitely recommend.

Beautiful setting and an exquisite cocktail bar to wait in while your table is being prepared. The menu choice is small but this means that all of the dishes are tasty and worth the money. We went back again because we had such a lovely evening the first time. The waiting staff are excellent and polite and attentive. Highly recommend this venue.

We went there in our last night in Croatia and it was a great way to end vacation .We had as appetizers the beef carpaccio which was the best we ever had a smoky flavor sliced perfectly Some kind of dressing, took it to the next level and tuna tartare it was awesome. my Wife had fish. It was so good me and my son. We had pasta and baked chicken. We never tasted chicken like that it was unbelievably tasty perfectly spiced and cooked to perfection.
This place should be on anybody’s pocket list if you visit Croatia.
The view and ambiance was amazing. The Tuna, Chicken and Pasta was great. Need a reservation during peak season but we were able to be seated quick while here the end of May.
We had a lovely meal here, the food was very tasty and we had great service from Dzoni! Highly recommend this restaurant!
I love the wine, the food, i love the Service especiely josip, Everything was Perfect also the view, i love this Restaurant
Obren was our waiter and he was absolutely amazing! Truly made our experience helped us picked the best meals was so accommodating for allergies and even celebrated a birthday with us!!
Obren is the best waiter ever!!! The food and service was incredible and the view makes it even better!!! A MUST GO TO!!!!
The service was excellent, attention to detail and personable. Advice on food, quick to seats even though it was busy. Could not fault!

Firstly thanks Roberto!

Loved this place and the waiters were soo sweet, kind and helpful. I came here for my friends surprise birthday celebration and they were too kind and up to point on celebrating! Especially Roberto for doing everything soo nicely! And the communication was soo good! Can’t wait to be back here 🤗❤️

Thanks once again to the team and especially Roberto 🥰

Amazing service and very delicious food. And every single person was so kind and helpful. We had and amazing experience thanks to Roberto. 

Definitely recommended.
Absolutely delicious. Stunning views. The truffle pasta and beef steak were so good. The Riesling was delicious as well. Great service- shoutout Roberto:)
Incredible tasting food, great attentive service and amazing views! Highly recommend :) Roberto was a great server also!

We found this place in our travel books and it was exceptional!!!
The waiter was prompt, friendly and explained dishes well-was also knowledgeable about the wines. The sea bass, veal dish and fish stew were superior. And the desserts were creative and delicious. 
Definitely check this place out-they take walk-ins and they don’t rush you. 
Definitely try to have

Bero was a great server—friendly, attentive, and genuinely helpful! The food and drinks were fantastic, and he even shared some great tips for getting around the city, which made our visit even better. Highly recommend!

We came here a number of times mostly because the location on both sides (one on the busy square and one right by the harbour on the water). The staff are lovely and the food is really good. Drinks are very reasonably priced for such a high end place and the location. Would definitely recommend the food and drinks - see photos for an our lovely lunch.
Stopped here for a pit stop and managed to get a seat outside on a walk in. Great service and smiley staff. Would have returned for dinner.

Absolutely gorgeous view of the marina with fantastic food! 
Remember to bring a jacket if sitting outside at night. 
Beautiful seafood risotto and excellent desserts. Lemon cheesecake was lovely

Holy smokes…I about decided not to leave. I could hang out with Anthony for hours he’s a darling, a princess - a master at his craft, and he knows precisely what to suggest. I could eat here 4 meals a day, every day, for the rest of my life. Although, perhaps this experience was too good for “life”…this sort of immaculate culinary journey should be reserved for heaven. You have my heart Anthony and Gradska Kavana Arsenal.

With Love,
Ryan

Such a lovely setting and wonderful food, recommend to book they did fit us in but we set at the back but still a lovely view, food is really good we had the chicken and it melted so good we also had the soup of the day tomato which was good too. Would recommend a visit if you’re in the old town.
The waiter was really attentive.
Fantastic meal and service thanks to Ana who made some great recommendations and hosted us with genuine friendliness!
Stunning views, great food and beverages! The waiter Ivan was absolutely professional and took our wishes into account.
My friends and I are only here for a day trip from Split. Thank you to one of the servers, Obren, for your friendly and efficient service! Definitely a great welcome to Dubrovnik.
What a beautiful restaurant with a beautiful view! We had a fabulous time and Stefano took sucky good care of us! We were a party of 11 and everything was impeccable!
Simply WOW! Gradska Kavana Arsenal's back side dining was pure romance. An unforgettable evening. Lovely... Amazing Food and service
Marijo was amazing as our server. We had a beautiful meal and I would highly recommend. We came for dinner and everything came out very fast and our meal was delicious.

With a reservation we were seated immediately. Roberto was a very friendly server. He recommended the wine for our dinner as well as the choice of dishes. The restaurant is in a lovely setting, and we had a table right at the water. Would highly recommend the restaurant and would re-visit if ever in Dubrovnik again.

Great place 
Great food 
Great service
I definitely recommend this gem with a great view too. The cuttlefish risotto was absolutely amazing, very good portions and perfect value for money ❤️.

Had dinner here with my fiancée. Spontaneously got a table inside, but at the window, which was very nice. The waiter Josip gave us excellent recommendations, specifically about the wine and the main course (the fish was delicious). Thank you for the great food and service!

To our surprise, the prices of this restaurant so well located and with a beautiful view were below other much more modest. The staff is very polite, we borrowed cell phone charger, and the food is delicious. It's worth trying.

The environment is great! Everyone comes for the water view, but sitting on the terrace facing the old city is perfect in the late evening. Food was delicious and the service was excellent! Thank you Josip for a great night and providing us with a fun dinner! He takes great pictures too haha

Great views, service, ambience. The food was delicious..fresh and beautifully plated. We went at 8pm in May and, although you can’t see the sunset, we watched the sky through the great arches slowly turn through twilight and dusk, beautiful! Reservations are recommended but we were walk-ins and they were able to accommodate us within 10 minutes. Highly recommend for a delicious evening.
This is a beautiful spot to eat breakfast with a great view of the water. The food and service were excellent, especially our waiter Obren.
Great breakfast spot on the terrace. Obren was a fantastic server. View was amazing and they have blankets for the cool breeze coming off the water!
Great breakfast spot overlooking the water and city walls. Both the food and coffee were excellent. Out waiter Obren was very friendly and attentive.

What an absolutely beautiful restaurant! Such a perfect setting with fabulous food, we loved every minute. The experience was made even better by our waitress Ana, who was delightful, friendly funny and so helpful, great service!

Great combination of everything for a really enjoyable evening. From super delicious food , great location over harbor and faultless service. Every course of food we selected was superb (some were recommended by a local). Our waiter Anthony was attentive and helpful and made a good night great (twice!)
Beautiful food and ambience. Sea bass was excellent. Josip accommodated our every need and made us feel very welcome, can’t thank him enough for the experience.
The breakfast was delicious and the view was beautiful. We loved our server, Dzoni! He made our experience truly great.
Džoni was lovely, polite and attended to our meal very pleasantly. Lovely meal with a great view and great staff- Thank you

Perfect and exceptional everything.
Fair value for money, with impeccable service and amazing views.
Try the risotto with cuttlefish ink!
Overlooking the harbour we spent a great evening here. The food was excellent and so was the service. They sat there so nicely that we ordered another cocktail to be able to stay there even longer 😉

Wonderful setting. We stopped for lunch here on trip to Dubrovnik - the menu is lovely - Beef Carpaccio is a highlight - the staff are very friendly and attentive . The views over the harbour are very pretty .
Fantastic food. Truffle pasta is one of the best I’ve ever had. Views are second to none. It’s a special place to dine, the restaurant is beautiful, I’d recommend coming here!

My husband and I both enjoyed our lunch at Arsenal. The views of the harbor were gorgeous, and the we liked the casual atmosphere. We were there for a late lunch, and were able to get a table right away without a reservation. We both had burgers, which were good. I will say the majority of patrons looked and sounded like tourists, so if you're looking for a place that is a favorite with locals, this probably isn't it.
We had a delicious dinner here. The mushroom and truffle pasta was excellent, and the views from the terrace are beautiful. Obren was an excellent waiter!

You can’t miss this restaurant when you visit Dubrovnik as it sits directly on the harbour side with an open dining room overlooking the sea. 

The view is clearly incredible, and they also have the food and service to match. 

We booked for dinner and had the tuna from the specials, and it was cooked to perfection, as well as being a generous portion. The cocktails and desserts are fab too! 

We also retuned twice for breakfast during our stay and were impressed with the value and quality. 

Overall highly recommend this restaurant for that special holiday meal. Tip is to book in advance to secure one of the coveted front row tables overlooking the harbour.
We got the steak and it was cooked perfectly with vegetables that were seasoned perfectly! The ambiance was great and Josip, our waiter, did a great job making sure we had a great experience!

Absolutely loved this place in Dubrovnik! The view was stunning, the food incredibly delicious, and the service was top-notch. Ivan, our waiter, was super kind and made the experience even better. Highly recommend

Had an amazing time at this restaurant! The view is absolutely stunning, the food was super delicious, and the service was top-notch. Big shoutout to Evan for being so friendly and attentive—made the whole experience even better. Highly recommend!
Everything is good, especially, Marijo Krkic was so kind and nice! The food was good and my mom and I really enjoyed the food 😋
Wonderful service from our waiter Davor and incredible views made our dinner extra special. Thank you. Highly recommended.

More hype than good food. The views of the harbour were excellent. Went for breakfast, service was excellent. Ordered the eggs Benedict and was surprised when they arrived in less than 10 mins, eggs were underdone, sauce didn’t have any flavour and bread was cold, ham was just like shop bought sliced ham. Oh was good and freshly squeezed. Bread rolls were rubbish mass produced ones and crappy packet chocolate spread, but did have good honey. I left half my eggs and was asked what the issue was. I wasn’t going to say anything as couldn’t be bothered but the waiter was clearly good at his job and noticed, so kindly took my eggs off the bill (which I didn’t expect or ask for). If you go just go for drinks and the view- much better places to eat elsewhere, don’t believe the hype.
This spot is so unique! Great view and great service! Dzoni was so kind and suggested a wonderful dish. Would definitely come again!

This restaurant is in a great location and part of the hotel. We were lucky enough to score a table with water views. We had a friendly waiter who was attentive without being pushy. 
We weren’t rushed at all. 
We ordered seafood with tuna tartare followed by the squid ink cuttlefish risotto. Both were delicious. For the type of restaurant with a great location, I thought the price was good for what we received

Fantastic view, excellent food, amazing service !!!!
Incomparable service. Specially from Igor and Obren !!!
Very knowledgeable and super pleasant ! Loved coming !thanks!

Amazing food with great views. Obren was a fantastic waiter. Helpful, attentive and fast service. I had oysters and squid and can recommend both. I chanced it on a walk up as no availability online and didn’t have any issues getting in even though it was busier than usual.

This spot was recommended by a local friend and it was so good, we came for breakfast twice! Highly recommend eating at the back of the restaurant to take in the incredible views of the sea. All of the food and coffees were delicious and the service was very special. Special thanks to Ovren, who was our server both times, for making our visit so amazing!

The setting is stunning, but the food was a big disappointment. My seafood risotto was salty, sandy, and poorly cooked — I had to send it back. The tuna steak was dry, and the octopus salad was overwhelmed with capers and olives. Only the vitello tonnato and potatoes were good. I wouldn’t return or recommend it, which is a shame given the amazing location.

When we arrived in Dubrovnik Gradska Kavana Arsenal immediately caught our eye. On our last night we got a table on the terrace with a fantastic view of the old city. Our waiter Josip was really nice and recommended the black risotto which was a great choice! We ended our meal with an amazing dessert with local ingredients.

We visited this restaurant mid afternoon, the welcome was warm and efficient. We had a table for 4 overlooking the harbour. The open air ambience and facilities were relaxing and fitting for a high-quality experience. 

We all had drinks and a main meal. The food was excellent, well presented cuisine and superb, steaks, veal and chicken. 

We were served by Stjepan Zelic throughout, and he was superb, timing, humour, language, and service. 

The overall experience was excellent and is highly recommended when visiting Dubrovnik.

The overall cost per head was approximately €40 and worth every cent.

Very good experience, the dishes are excellent and in a reasonable price range compared to the rest of Dubrovnik. The restaurant has two beautiful terraces, ideal for a romantic dinner. Our waiter Zac was very careful, and even offered us a homemade liquor.

A wonderful location with very good, friendly service. We had the truffle pasta and the seafood risotto. Both were fantastic and high quality and the view while eating was breathtaking. And conditionally make in good weather so that you have a nice overall experience (with the wind in your hair, wonderful)
When in the Old Town in Dubrovnik, go all the way to the old wharf to enjoy this restaurant. The setting is historic and beautiful. The service is friendly and classy. The food is very good.

This beautiful restaurant provided excellent service and delicious food. 
All the wait staff were excellent but Stepan was very attentive. 
We felt like welcome guests and nothing was too much trouble. 
We would highly recommend and are looking forward to returning again on our next trip.
Excellent food. Excellent location. Excellent service. Thanks so much to our waitor who was respectful and attentive. Really made our evening special thank you so much.
Very modest price for great-quality food, amazing atmosphere and views; and attentive and friendly staff. Would recommend the freshly-caught tuna blue and local Dubrovnik crème caramel.
The restaurant has a wonderful location with a breathtaking view, in addition to very friendly and kind staff. I will definitely come back again
This place is absolutely fabulous! The staff is incredible, especially Josip — he’s exceptionally kind and clearly passionate about his work. Highly recommend!
This place has wonderful sea views. The staff Berislav provided great services. He is so polite and nice. We really enjoy the food and view here.
Excellent restaurant with excellent food and service. David was our Waiter and he was polite and professional while still being able to converse naturally. We will return. Spectacular location.
Excellent food, service. view and stmerdphere. Fresh seafood, great surroundings by the ocean. Simply the best. Our waiter Bero is the best. Polite, handsome and knowlegible.

My husband and I made a reservation as we didn’t want to miss out, even though we are not in the high season. 
We duly arrived and were greeted like old friends. We couldn’t have had a better table, overlooking the old port. The choice of cocktails, beer and wine was extensive, sadly no Monkey 47 on this occasion, but was recommended Mare Gin which was just to my liking. The Sauvignon Blanc by the glass was outstanding. Now to the good part, the food. Partner had the fish risotto which was delicious full of shrimp, mussels etc. the stock it was cooked in was of the highest standard. My sea bass was beautifully cooked when looked a picture. I usually don’t have dessert as I don’t have a sweet tooth, but I opted to have the cheese selection which was offered on the cold starters menu. All the cheeses were delicious, all hard, cheese which suited me, it would have been nice to know what cheese I was eating. Beautifully laid out though, no crackers or bread but I didn’t mind as was full up on my main course. Highly recommend you visit this lovely restaurant, we have a few more days here and plan to return to try some other things on the menu. Thank you to all the staff you gave us a wonderful welcome and a reason to return.

Absolutely fantastic restaurant. Being low season we got a walk in table for 2 right by the water’s edge with a brilliant view. I’d sampled (many) whiskey sours across the city and this was by far the best. The food was the best we had during our stay in Dubrovnik. The service would have felt at home in a top end restaurant too, friendly, attentive & helpful. The best part is it’s all reasonably priced & initially could make you think it’s not as high quality as it is. Would be my top recommendation to anyone for a romantic dinner.
Service was amazing, Anthony was fantastic, the atmosphere was great and the food was delicious. We highly recommend.
Just amazing my food and service with the best view. Thank you Obren for wonderful service. The black risotto was amazing
Stunning restaurant with amazing food! Table service was very good. We had a fantastic waiter Zegkd who was very attentive!

Great spot by the water to people watch. Coffee was very good for the rainy day. Blankets on the chairs was a nice touch and my waiter Marijo was very attentive and gave travel trips for the area. Was a nice visit and will come back again for food next time :)

Great restaurant with a magnificent view. They even gave me a blanket because it was a bit chilly.
Very friendly service from Dzoni :)
Thanks!
Service was amazing and the view was incredible. The staff were very kind and attentive, Marijo made our visit amazing.

We stayed in this place for three nights, that is, every night of our holiday. We ate really well , very courteous staff , unique location , in particular we were struck by the kindness of Anna . Greetings
To you and to
All the staff. We will return soon to
Find you

We visited this restaurant tonight and were blown away by the quality of the food, how tasty it was, the service and the setting!!! Real feast for the eyes and the taste buds. We had fish soup and tomato soup to start with and then went for black risotto, a speciality of this restaurant, and seafood risotto. - all four dishes were exemplary - the best risotto I’ve ever eaten! Our waiter Obreh was so attentive, knowledgeable about the food and looked after us very well! Will definitely come back again whenever we are in Dubrovnik

Me and my partner went for breakfast, the food and view are nice but you don’t receive loads of food and we felt the waiter didn’t really want either of us there.
I presume this is due to attire and not looking as posh as some but we were in shorts and shirts, nothing terrible.

Only place in Dubrovnik I left feeling disappointed.

My wife and I dined at Gradska Kavana Arsenal during our stay in Dubrovnik over spring break. The service was nice and the ambiance was quiet. My wife had the charcuterie plate as her main and I had the chicken, broccoli and gratinated potatoes for my entree. My wife was disappointed with the menu at Gradska. She was hoping to have a menu that included lasagna or pizza, but they weren’t offered.

We ate very well. The dishes are good and the proportions sufficient. There are different choices. The servers are extremely nice and welcoming! We were on the terrace overlooking the sea, the place is very beautiful and quiet.

We had a wonderful experience and amazing delicious food at Gradska Kavana Arsenal. The service of Stjepam was attentive and he gave us very nice recommendations. We ordered the black risotto, fish stew and grilled squid for the main course. All the dishes were cooked to perfection and the best we have ever tasted. The black risotto was perfectly cooked and the best ever we have tasted. The squid dish was also cooked with perfection. The view from the restaurant was beautiful which added the perfect flavour to our experience. The cocktails were also very nicer We highly recommend this restaurant while visiting Dubrovnik. This visit to this restaurant should definitely not be missed.
Have been there for lunch and for dinner! Great location! Fantastic food! Especially the waiter Ivan was very nice to us!

We managed to get a table here as a walk in as the on line reservations showed it being full. The food was lovely and whilst the service was ok, it had been exceptional at all the other restaurants we’d been to. Lovely view.

Had an amazing meal with a stunning view in Dubrovnik! Highly recommend the sailor’s risotto and the squid ink risotto — both were packed with flavor. The sea bass was excellent too, fresh and perfectly cooked. Big thanks to Roberto for taking such great care of us.
We came back for a third dinner here with our friends! Lovely ambience view and the best black risotto! Service was always friendly and warm! Highly recommended and we enjoyed it very much :)
Ivan is very good at his job ;p very good first impression of Croatian service and deserves a good day off and a nice holiday.
Amazing! Service was seamless and the food delicious. The vegetables were perfection and the fillet steaks were devoured without a trace. Thank you

Beautiful setting, perfect evening!
We had an unforgettable dinner here—the ambience was absolutely magical, especially with the stunning location right by the bay. It’s the perfect spot for a romantic night out, with just the right mix of elegance and charm.

The food was spot on—every dish beautifully presented and full of flavor. We also got a fantastic wine recommendation that paired perfectly with our meal. Special thanks to Anton, who made the experience even better with his warm, attentive service and great local knowledge. Can’t wait to come back!
Both the views and the food were incredible. Anton gave us amazing service highly recommend !! Got the Black risotto and coconut dessert

Absolutely loved this restaurant! The food was delicious and the ambience was incredible. Anton, our server, was so nice and attentive. The gnocchi was amazing and the CHEESECAKE was SO good. Definitely recommend

This place was SO good. We stumbled upon it and the view was unreal. We didn’t make a reservation but they found a way to squeeze us in!! Anton was the BEST server. He answered all of our group’s questions and made amazing recommendations. All of the food was unreal. Must have the cheesecake & the gnocchi. 10/10!!
Amazing! Anton is the best server! Had an amazing experience here, dying to come back! So lucky for this amazing dinner!

Ivan was an excellent waiter and gave us great dinner recommendations! He told us about the town and was great when telling us we could stay until the rain dies down. The food was lovely and the view was even better!

Ivan was a wonderful server very kind and explained menu to us and suggested great dishes. Loved the outdoor patio. The black risotto was new to us but was delicious! The local beverage at the end of the dinner was fantastic and delightful way to end our dinner.

The restaurant is very well presented and in a fabulous location with a nice looking menu. The only down side was the service felt very rushed and our food was served within 5 mins or ordering so was clearly not cooked to order although tasted good.
Perfect lunch in a beautiful location and very nice service from Marijo! Definitely worth making a reservation (definitely do because it is crowded here).

Love the risotto! Really yummy! Good quality of seafood! 
Shout out to Bero! Great service! 
Will definitely come back next time!

Delicious restaurant in the old city of Dubrovnik. The Blackink-Sepia-Risotto and the truffle pasta are a must try for foodies.

P.S. Thank you dear Josip, for your delightful accommodation we enjoyed your service a lot.

Food was amazing! And Josip is very friendly and helpful. Moved us to a better spot to see the view 

We had the cappacio, black risotto and mushroom and truffle pasta. All of which was amazing
This was one of our favourite restaurants in the group of three the atmosphere was incredible and the food and wine was delicious definitely recommended
Be sure to get a table outside next to the walkway by the sea. Gorgeous view of the mountains and water and fun to people watch. Food was delicious, had the squid and fish.

Loved the location. Very busy on a Wednesday night which reflects good reviews or a good reputation. We had the fish stew and the beef gnocchi. Neither disappointed and the JD sauce on the gnocchi was particularly good. We had no room left for deserts. The view over the harbour was lovely
Beautiful venue overlooking the harbor. Marble arches and patio are lovely. Sea bass was great. Maria was a great server.
We had a great time at the restaurant. We were seated on the terrasse and had a beautiful view. The staff, especially Obren, was very nice and welcoming. The food was delicious.

We had an incredible dining experience! All of the meals on our table were phenomenal. Our server, Obreh, gave us really great recommendations and answered all of our questions. Our view for dinner was amazing. Highly recommend.
I went here for dinner and the service and food was spectacular. Obren was our server and he was wonderful throughout our whole dining experience.

Very good food. Žegko was very nice and always attended us with a bright smile!
Price is average for the city, but the italian food had a wonderful taste!
Very friendly staff, fantastic location with a magnificent view of the harbour - and all the food was excellent. We had lunch :-)

We had a wonderful lunch here! Jzoni (Jonny) was our waiter and he was fantastic! He told us a little bit about the food and wine of the region and gave us wonderful food recommendations. We didn’t feel rushed at all. We were encouraged to enjoy the ambience and relaxation of the patio and the views. Thank you for making our first time to Dubrovnik such a treat! Ps-must get the almond fig cookie cake dessert!

Obren and his team provided a perfect start to my day multiple times while visiting Dubrovnik. The food and coffee were both excellent and the location was ideal to watch the ocean waves. Obren and his team provided a welcome atmosphere which was the reason why I came back.
We had a delicious bottle of Dingac wine and an assortment of cheeses here in a lovely setting. Excellent service from Roberto, who was very informative about local wines and vineyards.

Me and my friend had a lovely lovely meal here, i recommend the Truffle and mushroom pasta!!!! our server tonight was anthony and he was so so nice and chatty, very welcoming. Would come back here again :)
Great spot for lunch. Loved our waiter, Josip, he was the best! Great food and drinks! Brought us blankets when we were cold. Love it!

I have to say we chose the restaurant mainly on the location, that is spectacular.
We should have spent more time looking at the menu, of the 6 pages, 5 are taken up by drinks. The food selection covers breakfast, lunch and dinner, leaving only 6 options for main meals. I ordered the beef fillet, asking if the potato could be fries. The steak was of a good size and well cooked and the fries had the skin on and were very tasty. Accompanying the dish were three small dishes containing, ketchup, mayonnaise and a mushroom sauce, and that was it. No mushrooms or garnish. My mistake in not ordering a side but in a good restaurant I would have been prompted. At the second attempt to order desert the cheese cake was just that. Now the same dish at the sister restaurant (The Panarama near the cable car) had raspberry sauce, redcurrents and a grated nut garnish.
The staff were friendly, but we didn't get a feeling we were welcome. 
Great location... not sure if it's a restaurant or bar

We had a great experience at this place. The atmosphere is great, near the temple, calm and shinny. The service was amazing, Josip was our waitress and he is super kind and polite - and handsome as well 😄 
The food was good, especially compared to other places. We visited the place many times while staying in Dubrovnik, it is one of our favourites!

What a gorgeous spot over looking the harbor! Landscape kept changing as boats came and went. Had a delicious brunch - omelets and Antun, our waiter, was most attentive and friendly. Highly recommend!
Came for my birthday dinner and it was incredible! Marijo was fabulous and so sweet! Would recommend to anyone traveling to Dubrovnik and would definitely return!!
We celebrated a friend’s birthday and were taken care of by Marijo who was absolutely lovely! All our dishes and drinks were perfect and we would definitely recommend!
We had a beautiful birthday dinner with friends! The food was delicious and the service was great. Marigo was our waiter, and we was the kindest man! Awesome experience, 10/10

Went eating here with friends, we enjoyed reasonable prices, if you compare them to the beautiful view you can lay your eyes on. The service was tiptop, thanks to Marjio, who was our host this evening. One to advice!

Lovely and calm spot. Amazing view on the port of the omd city of Dubrovnik. Warm and helpfull staff. Our waiter Marijo served us in the best way possible. The prices are correct for the food and service that has been offerd.

We came for lunch and sat with Ivan — the food, atmosphere and Ivan made this experience so amazing. We couldn’t be more grateful to have been here on this beautiful day and roughneck and had the best service and the best lunch!
Ivan was a wonderful host and server. He told us many things about beautiful Dubrovnik and served a delightful luncheon and is very charming.
Food and Service was amazing !!! Would 10/10 recommend it ☺️🙌 Got the black risotto which was really tasty. Generous serving of bread too!!
Best breakfast on the area!👍🏻 easy to get there from city. Beautifull view to the seaside from terrace. Dzoni gavr us excellent service. Thank you!

A beautiful dining experience - we are breakfast here every morning of our stay as the service was exceptional, the food was great and the view from the terrace was just wonderful. Robert waited our table and he was super efficient, friendly and professional - with great recommendations. 
We ate in their sister restaurant in the evenings which was also wonderful , 100% put this on your list as a must .
Fantastic service from John. Breakfast in Dubrovnik doesn’t get any better - view and food in the old port area. I would definitely come back.
Very beautiful restaurant with a stunning view on the see and barbour. An adorable service from Džoni. Highly to recommend!!

Super tasty and super friendly!
We went there for breakfast on my birthday. Got mimosa and piece of cake and song from the waiter. Lovely place on the small harbor. We went back to dinner the day after. Again very attentive service and beautiful table with sea view. Good food. Good food. Highly recommended. What a pity there is no good music coming out of the speakers, muzak everywhere... Put on good classical music or traditional Croatian music and no silly lounge music, then it would be really great! Without music in such a wonderful place is also possible! The murmur of the sea ..

Came to dinner w a girl friend of mine! Food and drinks were amazing and our waiter, Obren, was even MORE amazing! We love him! He was able to make an off-menu drink for us at our request. He took care of us very well and we will definitely be back to try their brunch!

Delightful hostess found us a table really quickly on the terrace at a busy time. Delicious food with good recommendations from our waiter Obren who made us laugh, great service! The view of the harbour is amazing and the piano is beautiful

Wanted a nice seaside dinner with one of my friends and succeeded!! The food was amazing and they even made our favorite cocktail upon request, even though it wasn’t on the menu! Obren was a great server, very attentive and kind! Will be back soon

Walked by this restaurant on a tour and made a point to come back—gorgeous view of the harbor. Outdoor seating and great service. Food is wonderful as is the wine and dessert. Our waiter was Marijo and he was great.
What a great and the prices are so reasonable.

Amazing black risotto and the waiter Mario was excellent! 10/10. The spot itself may look touristic for those who seek local experience but a must vist for everyone looking for good food and scenic views.
Excellent food, service (Marjio), and atmosphere! The black risotto and sea bass were amazing. Definely deserves every bit of the five stars.
Absolutely delicious food and fabulous service (thank you Marijo!) Would definitely come back in a heartbeat for the sea bass and the black risotto!

This spot was beautiful for a lunch time stop for 9 of us. Josip was incredibly accommodating for a big group of us and very friendly. We all had a great experience with the food and hospitality - 10/10 would recommend.
Delicious food with great flavors and generous portions. Everything was fresh and well-prepared. Definitely worth coming back for!
Dinner was awesome, great food & awesome server by the name of Robert! He was very detailed and very attentive. Would be back whenever I’m in the area!
Lovely dining venue, we had cocktails to start followed by fish stew and black risotto, the best I’ve ever tasted! Thoroughly recommend this place.
Nice restraint! You can see the sea from your seat. I ate truffle and mushroom pasta. it was great taste:) John is nice service stuff as well!
Amazing view with amazing food! Johnny who served us was simply great. He ensured that we were well taken care of :) definitely worth a visit

We’ve celebrated our friend’s 50th birthday. It was spectacular. The service was personalised. The waiter called Rale who’s attended to us was very attentive and very accommodating. The place is intimate and offers nice views outside. Good food and the bonus is a live piano and sax performance to entertain everyone. Overall, the experience was something to remember. I would recommend that you visit the place.

Very nice place in the old town of Dubrovnik. It has a space on the square, one inside, and one directly overlooking the old port. I was in the latter both morning and evening for dinner. In the morning beautiful views of the sea and the surrounding hills, distant tables, continental breakfast and choice of drinks. At dinner special atmosphere.... Impeccable service and really great dishes. Impeccable service. Adequate prices. Definitely a span above any other venue. We would stay again

Josip was our server today and honestly, we’re not sure if he’s a waiter or part-time magician. He gave us awesome recommendations, kept us laughing, and somehow convinced us to eat things we can’t even pronounce. No clue what we actually ordered, but it was a delicious mystery and we’re not mad about it. Now we just have to find out if we accidentally ordered champagne with gold flakes - wish us luck! All jokes aside great time at a great place!
Our server Ivan was fantastic! Great service, great food, a great time! A must go to spot for dinner in the evenings beautiful setting. 10/10!!

Beautiful marina view table with a heater close to us. 
The greeter was accommodating when we asked for this seating 
Waiter was top notch and attentive as you usually see in upscale restaurants. 
Food was delicious. We shared a vitello tonnato for appetizer and it was nicely presented and excellent. 
I had the gnocchi with bourbon sauce and my husband ordered chicken. We were both very happy. 
Our bottle of Istrian wine was decanted and we enjoyed it.
It made our last night in Dubrovnik special. 
Way better than other local restaurants we tried at similar prices.

During our stay in Dubrovnik, we enjoyed brunch twice and had dinner once at this establishment. The food and service were excellent, especially thanks to our waiter Roberto. He even pulled out a chair for me, which was originally meant for my girlfriend, leading to a humorous moment 😂! Both the front and back terraces offer beautiful views. We recommend sitting at the back for breakfast or brunch and at the front in the afternoon to soak up the sun.
Wonderful ambiance, walked in and was immediately seated. Roberto was fantastic, was very attentive. Food and drinks were delicious. Must try when in Old Town!
Our AirBnB host recommended this place for its food and atmosphere and indeed it didn’t disappoint us. Nice view, nice food and good attentive service from Dzoni.
Amazing views and food. It was a fantastic afternoon, brilliant service - our server roberto was great & accommodating.
Stjeran is great with good recommandation! He is very well knowledge on our question and gives us good recommandation on food. We enjoy the food, the view and the service!
Robert was a great waiter. I couldn’t decide what is better, the view or the food. Great to people watch while looking out at the marina. Wonderful lunch.
Location was perfect, lovely to watch the sunset, Jarak was very accommodating and ensured we had a nice meal. Highly recommend

Dining with a view. Exceptional service by our lovely waiter Dzoni, who went above and beyond so that we had an amazing experience. 
Excellent value for money considering we are in the heart of Dubrovnik 
Highly recommend

The views were amazing and the food was very tasty! We got the chicken and gnocchi and highly recommend both. Our food came quickly after ordering and same with the drinks. Thanks to our waiter Antun!

We had an incredible meal at Gradska Kavana Arsenal in the heart of Old Town Dubrovnik. The atmosphere was charming, with a perfect blend of historic ambiance and warm hospitality. Our waiter Josef was attentive and welcoming, making us feel right at home.

The food was absolutely delicious! We tried the truffle risotto, which was beautifully presented and bursting with flavor. The seafood was especially fresh, and the local wine selection complemented our meal perfectly.

Overall, this was one of the best dining experiences of our trip. If you’re in Dubrovnik, don’t miss the chance to enjoy a meal here! Highly recommend!

Great spot for a lovely lunch with gorgeous view. Our waiter Obren was amazing. Efficient, courteous and very professional. Delicious food. We didn’t have a reservation for the patio, but we had a beautiful view just inside. Highly recommend!

Service, spearheaded by our waiter Obren, was lovely. Restaurant offers both terrace seating with harbor views and piazza seating. I ordered the tuna salad for lunch and it was incredibly delicious and filling. I would highly recommend this restaurant.
Stjepan was wonderful he helped us select a local wine and his service was top notch. We will come back for dinner next time.
Excellent experience. We visited in March so quieter. The service was outstanding. Quality of food excellent. Would recommend.

We came for lunch and drinks, and came back again for desserts. The venue is beautiful and well located in the heart of the Old Town. The food seafood risotto and chocolate cake were delicious. The staff were very friendly, especially Josiip and Obren who recommended us these dishes. We will surely wil be back for dinner. We had an excellent time

Obren gave us the best service so far in Croatia! We had the lasagna and bread selection which was very filling. I’d definitely come again, and I’ve been told they have delicious deserts too, specifically the apple cake.
It was a great experience. The food was really good and service as well. Stuff speaks english and you don’t have to wait at all. Really nice place to have an excellent food and nice time.

Food is very delicious , must try the black risotto.
Staff are very nice and helpful, especially Josip and Ivan.
Highly recommend to go
This first time in Croatia and try this restaurant. Nice food, nice view and excellent services and warm welcome by staffs Josip and Ivan. we enjoy our time very much.
Josip and Ivan are excellent. They did their job so well. The food is good especially the back risotto. I will definitely recommend the others to come!

Went this restaurant for a lunch in March. 
The service is so nice, especially Josip and Ivan. They are so friendly and welcome us with a smile. 
The food is delicious and the black ink risotto is something to die for.

Excellent choice for having a lunch or dinner !!

The best truffle pasta and black risoto I have ever tried !!!
 The service was excepcional, the waiters were so sweet and attentive specially dzoni !!!
The good was very delicious. I totally recommend. Jhonny was the best waiter, very attentive and recommended us the best plates.

The truffle pasta was amazing and the risotto too, dzoni was a great waitress and really nice and had great recommendations for us. The food was amazing and the restauarant is really pretty with amazing views.
Perfect service with Marijo! Beautiful place! Really succulent dishes! I highly recommend. Bon appetite

Marjo is cool AF.

Cool calm and very thoughtful and helpful. 
Food was incredible. 

Will come back the next chance I get.

Thank you
I have steak tar tar quite a lot and honestly I can say it was one of the best I have had! Service was amazing and staff can’t do enough for you.

The service was excellent, speedy and efficient, but our server still took time to make conversation and ask about our visit. The food was incredible and I wish we could’ve eaten more, I highly recommend visiting if you’re in Dubrovnik, it’s beautiful, however very popular as we just managed to get a table, so booking is advised. Thank you for a delicious final meal in Dubrovnik.

Visited this restaurant during my solo trip in Dubrovnik, the food and the atmosphere is beautiful. I had the burger meal accompanied with fresh fries and creme caramel for desert served by Marijo who was a pleasant and attentive waiter! Highly recommend this restaurant!
Great service and nice food. The whole team were lovely, our server, Marijo was excellent going above and beyond for us.

This is a great find, with excellent menu and cocktail selection with reasonable prices considering its prime location. Marijo was very attentive and polite. I would highly recommend you check this restaurant should you find yourself in need of some food and drink :)
The staff was very polite and attentive, the atmosphere was great, and the food and drinks were very flavorful. The portion of black risotto was generous, and the matcha latte was delicious.
The food and wine here is fabulous. By far, the best food experience we had here is our four day visit. The quality of the food is top class and is accompanied by the exceptional service.

We arrived and it was pretty busy but the staff there managed to find us a table! The food was absolutely amazing I had the gnocchi bourbon beef and it was my favorite meal of the trip! They even let us take a cheesecake to go.
Obreh was our waiter and was lovely and made sure we had everything we wanted and more. 
I would definitely recommend this place!!

Both for breakfast, lunch or dinner = Reasonable price. Very good menus although the menu is not very broad, but what there is is very well, and very well presented. Exquisite service with nice, helpful and very professional waiters. 
And it is also in the center of the historic center. A place we discovered casually looking for breakfast, and we went another day to dinner and another day to breakfast. It's just a lovely place, highly recommended.
Marijo was the kindest waiter so attentive and make our last night in Dubrovnik so lovely. Food was great too!!!!!!!!!!
Marijo was an amazing waiter, so kind and fun. Amazing food amazing service, thankyou marijo!! I had a burger and my partner had the squid, and we shared an apple pie for dessert. All delicious

Excellent staff, food and drinks. Probably the best bar / restaurant I have been to in Europe.
Cocktails were quick perfectly balanced and authentic.
You must stop here soak up the vibes, sit back and people watch

We had a great evening with excellent food and a great server, Marijo! He went above and beyond making our dining experience wonderful. The sea bass was a delicious choice. The seafood risotto was also excellent. We would definitely come back.

What a lovely friendly place.. just so nice after a long flight.
Our waiter Obren was brilliant- so helpful when choosing wines and coffee and I wish I could speak Croatian as well as he speaks English.
Just go there and enjoy the people watching and wonderful service and drinks/ food .
Enjoy!
Excellent service and great food. There are 3 restaurants in Dubrovnik run by the same group. When you eat in one, you can get a 10% discount on subsequent meals in all.
Fantastic evening meal. The soup starter was amazing and main meals were delicious. Our server Mario was wonderful. Will definitely be back
Lovely restaurant, lovely atmosphere. Amazing service from Mario, amazing food. Definitely reccomend anyone visiting Dubrovnik to come here for a lovely meal :)

After a lovely day walking around the Dubrovnik old town I finished it off with a few glasses of wine at the Gradska Kavana Arsenal... Marijo was a great waiter even bringing gme water and peanuts to accompany my wine, but as a solo traveller it was lovely to have some conversation with someone friendly!
I had black risotto, octopus salad and creme caramel. Food and drinks came out quickly and everything was excessively good! Especially, a server named Marijo has been very nice to us!

I came here for a cocktail, breakfast, and diner here! Everything was delicious and well presented. The servers were very accommodating and friendly. The restaurant interior was gorgeous and the food was incredible! I would definitely recommend
I’ve been in this restaurant a few times and always love the service and the food is great! Waiter Obren is great, very attentive and friendly… top service here!

Great food, great location for girls trip brunch/lunch. Best mimosas I’ve ever had! Got to sample cherry brandy with an interesting history. Also got to try almond cake that was delicious! Highly recommend and will be back!
Marijo was very attentive and a great server! I had the sailor risotto and it was delicious. The seating outside was lovely! We will be back!

excellent cuisine, impeccable service! a little too fast , the dish arrived before the aperitif and it was a little cold , no worries the waiter took it back and warmed up! I think it's due to the low season , the city is deserted and everything is closed!
Took dinner with view on the harbor. Very friendly service, good food, good prices, ideal. Also took breakfast a few days later, very good food and friendly people.

This was one of our go-to spots in old town. We enjoyed coffee on the terrace facing old town in the morning. We ate lunch here twice, excellent food, service and lovely views of the harbor, you can't beat it. The restaurant looks beautiful lit up at night as well.

Top of the notch!!! Just go there and try their menu!!!
There is no single thing in this restaurant that can be a disadvantage!! Everything there is just like in the dream place!! Ambience and atmosphere inside is just 10/10
Service is 10/10
Food:
We have ordered black risotto with cuttlefish - it was so far the best risotto we have ever tried!!
We ordered also tuna which was 9/10 also top 3 I have ever tasted!!

You can't say, the place is beautiful. Nestled in a magnificent building on the main street that leads to the cathedral in Old Dubrovnik. Large terrace on the street, interior design, contemporary and warm... and a beautiful terrace sheltered but open to the sea on the back! 
Impeccable service.
Fish and sea oriented dishes.
Plates of mini octopuses, super well cooked
Correct prices similar to France.

We booked a table for New Year's Eve. At the time of booking, the rest of the party wanted to be seated inside, but minds changed when we arrived and saw how sheltered and picturesque the outside/terrace seating was. Thankfully, they were able to accommodate us at short notice!
I had a simple but delicious tomato soup to start, followed by a truffle/mushroom tagliatelle. All the food was excellent, as was the service. The food and drinks were very reasonable given the setting, standard of service, and time of year I thought. 
We could see fireworks going off around the harbour in front of us. The music, lighting and decor created a warm and sophisticated atmosphere. We'll be back when we next visit Dubrovnik!!

I must say it was an outstanding experience from start to finish. The atmosphere was warm and inviting, with stylish decor. The food was a true delight. 

A special mention goes Obren, who really made the evening even more enjoyable. He was attentive, friendly, and his recommendations for wine and dishes were spot on. He made our visit feel that much more pleasant.

All in all, a fantastic dining experience

This spot is an amazing place with delightful settings near the Harbour. The food was very delicious! Obren gave the best service and gave really good recommendations. I had the best truffle pasta - it was to die for. The potatoes with garlic and the foccacia selection were great as well 😋
Good food with great ambience and service in a great location. Perfect for all seasons. A lot of folks come here for dessert and wine.

This restaurant excels on every level - food, ambiance, and service. My server, Obren, recommended the black risotto with cuttlefish, and it was absolutely delicious. He was friendly and attentive, which made the experience even more enjoyable. The dining room is also stunning, offering a serene and inviting atmosphere - totally perfect for unwinding after a long day. I had an exceptional dining experience here and this place is absolutely worth a visit.

Best restaurant in Old Town Dubrovnik! We had an amazing and delicious dinner! Food quality and flavors were great and also the ambience and service. Thank you Obren por making us feel like home and giving us great recommendations!

Stunning restaurant right near the Christmas Tree and stalls in Old Town. Our waitperson, Obren, was incredibly helpful and lovely, ensuring we had a great view and giving great drink recommendations for two Aussie girls who were missing their Shiraz. The food was faultless, and dietary diversity with gluten free and dairy free options was no stress and catered for. Thanks Obren!

Everything was perfect, food, staff, ambient..... LOVE IT!
Don't have hundred letters to describe PERFECT SERVICE! ✨
“Delicious food, fresh ingredients, and impeccable presentation. Waiters are friendly. A must-visit in Dubrovnik!”

An excellent place to relax (sometimes with sunbathing between 11:30 and 14:00). A very nice terrace with a lounge music background. A rather small menu for meals but really good quality and at a reasonable price considering the location. Fast and pleasant service... In my opinion in the middle of the season it must be difficult to find a place without reservation. I went back every day for hot chocolate (November) or lunch.
Wow! The duck was unbelievable….the best I have ever had! The waiter Stejepan was superb and couldn’t have been more friendly and helpful! Totally professional with Micheline standard food. 5 out 5!
The food at this restaurant is amazing and the staff customer service is incredible. This is a must restaurant to try while in Dubrovnik’s old town. The fish stew is a local dish worth trying.
The atmosphere, especially facing the old port, is what this place is all about. The food and service were OK, but not exemplary.

This is a wonderful spot for a nice relaxed romantic dinner. The sea bass and the signature black risotto are exquisite dishes. We also had the pleasure of being taken care of by the legendary Josip who answered all questions and made some excellent recommendations - Thank you! We will be back!

We had an absolutely fantastic dining experience here! The food was nothing short of exquisite—every dish was delicious, with the sea bass and black risotto being standout favorites. They deserve more than just five stars—definitely 100/10!
We really enjoyed our visit. The food, service, and staff were truly exceptional. I highly recommend this restaurant. A must visit!
Oberon waiter excellent. Delicious fish, great service, nice atmosphere. I came here on November 12, 2024. Had great fresh fish and recieved very good service. Delightful!

We are here to celebrate the birthday dinner, we wish to have a cake with happy birthday and candle, Željko assist to prepare which make my birthday completed. We ordered octopus salad, truffle pasta and beef steak, all of them are tasty especially the beef is the best in the town we have tried. Last but not least, Željko who serves us is exceptional. It is recommended to have dining here when you visit Dubrovnik.

-affordable apero 
-nice sitting at the front, at the back of the harbor and inside.
-very friendly staff 
-truffle pasta and fish stew was very tasty.
-breakfast served quickly with all the trimmings. We ordered a basket of bread with the eggs and the waiter himself suggested to bring it afterwards because it might be too much. Do not take advantage of the tourist, put you very at ease

Fantastic food and lovely ambience. The service is very good, but not intrusive. Obren was a great server and we really enjoyed the whole experience. We were celebrating our anniversary and they made us feel very special
Our anniversary dinner was so memorable. Perfect setting, attentive, excellent service & divine food. Thanks Zeyko!
I could not recommend this place more. They have a terrace on the water with a gorgeous view. reasonably priced and great food. Mario was a fantastic server.

Marijo had great customer service. From start to finish really made the experience so much better. The eggs Benedict royale was delicious and we got to eat it with a great view by the waterside. I will be coming back again !

Set in the port of the old city the location speaks for itself, the service was perfect and we were made to feel special by our waiter. The food was delicious and this was a real treat, the price is very reasonable for what you are getting and location, highly recommend.

We had the most gorgeous night with the most beautiful view & delicious food. Every member of staff, especially Obren who took care of us, was so professional & personable - we had the best experience here!
It’s brilliant for a romantic night out with a beautiful view. Had the cheese board and pasta. Both were really nice, especially the dust aged cheese.

The terrace view is spectacular and the atmosphere somehow elegant, but still very friendly and calm. We were served by a really friendly waiter Obren, who offered good advice and made our stay even more relaxing and enjoyable. We tried some local Croatian wines and liquors and can surely recommend!
The food is the best and the view also amaying! The staffs are so kind and nice and it has the most delicious food in town. No need to go to old center for food, just come here!
This is a lovely location adjacent to the water with outdoor patio dining. I had a light salad with olives and a glass of chilled white wine. Included was a basket of excellent breads.

Went for dinner 4 th November. Location / view / service all fantastic. Ordered starters which arrived within 3 mins. Soup good but only warm and zucchini which was pretty good. Finished starters and main course arrived instantly. Fillet steak tasted like it was oven prepared and stuffed chicken was bland and processed tasting. Bill was reasonable. We were out for a good night but we had our meal and paid the bill and left in less than 50 minutes. We see all their good reviews and can only suppose we got them on a bad night.

Of course the view is good, the service is good and the price is reasonable in this location.
Squid ink risotto is a must-eat.
They were willing to let me in without reservation.
Marijo talked to me in Japanese many times and I had a wonderful time.

Incredible place for a wonderful night out! The food was phemonal. We had cuttlefish risotto and gnocchi in bourbon sauce. Both meals were fantastic! We stayed for dessert and were not disappointed. Our waiter Marijo was incredible and treated us so well. Highly, highly recommend this gem on the water!

Croatia's second dinner!
Too satisfied!
The seafood cuisine is really delicious and the atmosphere and service are so good 😀
Pleasant and friendly server marijo krkic, Thank you!

We had breakfast here and it was really nice. You have a lovely view out over the sea and the dinner menu looked good too! 

Friendly and attentive staff

31/10/24 - wonderful location and initially a good feeling. My wife is garlic intolerant and the approach by the waiter was very “so what”. The menu is very limited and my wife declined an appetiser, I had the Octopus Salad which was exceptional nice. My wife when for sea bass (only thing garlic free) however this came with celeriac mash, which was cold and overpowering for the fish. I had the Bourbon Gnocchi with strips of beef. Ok but below par and a gristle piece of beef killed it for me. The bread basket was almost the best bit ! Would not recommend.

A really good restaurant with spectacular views. We were lucky enough to have a dockside view. Excellent food and drinks and a cosy blanket to
Keep us warm. Highly recommended.

Amazing place to eat! Especially if you make reservations or get there early enough to get a table looking out at the harbor. Antun was a friendly waiter and gave us honest and excellent suggestions regarding the menu.

The location is perfect,the service was superb Marco from Serbia makes sure our lunch is magical specially to my friend who celebrate his bday. The cake was served beautifully and the food was very good.
I would love to come back again
We enjoyed our dinner here on our first evening in Dubrovnik. The food was delicious and beautifully presented, the wine was exceptional and the staff attentive throughout. Thank you!
This is a beautiful place to eat in the day time or evening. The views of you get a seat outside overlooking the water are stunning. Great staff, good food and wonderful ambience.
Great food and excellent location. The waiter Nemanja provided excellent, friendly service. The apple pie is a must try!

Loved my experience here. Was recommended to me by two tour guides and they did not steer me wrong. I loved the beautiful setting and sitting outside with a view. My server Marijo helped pair my dinner choice (black risotto) with a lovely wine. And he was wonderfully kind and attentive. I’m so glad I came. I highly recommend!

Breakfast at Gradska Kavana in Dubrovnik is a delightful experience. Set against a picturesque backdrop of the harbor, the restaurant offers a charming ambiance. The menu features a variety of options, from traditional Croatian dishes to continental favorites. The fresh pastries and local ingredients stand out, making for a flavorful start to the day. Service is attentive and friendly, enhancing the overall experience. It’s a perfect spot to enjoy a leisurely morning before exploring the city

We visited here 4 times over our 4 day stay…. For breakfast, coffee and dinner. All of which were absolutely perfect. The surroundings are just as amazing as the food. All staff were attentive and welcoming and remembered us which was really nice. The black risotto was really stunning, as was the seafood risotto and oysters. Highly recommend the iced coffee and Mediterranean croissant for breakfast. You can’t come to Dubrovnik and not visit here!
This is an amazing restaurant with amazing service and delicious food. Also if you want a one of kind view from every part of the restaurant, this is your place.

Beautiful location, wonderful quality food and drink but best of all the service was excellent, I’ve not had better service! All the staff are friendly, funny and knowledgeable. Definitely treat yourself to a drink or meal here whilst you’re in Dubrovnik. Thanks especially to Marijo 🥂❤️
Amazing food, perfect view! We were so lucky and had the best waiter in Croatia. Mario took care of us like family. He made the dinner a 10/10 experience

The food is wonderful! Amazing view. Wonderful service. We had the best time. I came here I I came here for my 20th birthday and my friends and I had the best time ever. The food was amazing. The tuna tartare I would totally recommend it was amazing. The bread is super good. I got the beef gnocchi that was fire.
Such good service and the food was amazing!! Especially the black risotto highly recommend :)) Amazing restaurant would definitely come back
From start to finish our waiter was amazing (Stjepan). Food was absolutely outstanding. Just lovely, atmosphere, food , attention to detail was spot on

This place is incredible! The atmosphere and location are magical. The servers are so lovely and very helpful. Marijo was very attentive and made our experience very pleasant. We ended up going 3 times on our trip away...Will recommend to anyone looking for a romantic evening with exceptional food and service!

I came to this restaurant because of the view, the food was delicious, and the servers were friendly! 

Marijo spoke Korean, and thanks to her, I had a great evening:) 

Thank you!
The view is very good and the food is delicious:) More than anything, Mr. Marijo was so kind to take care of me so I had a great time:)
Such a perfect spot to celebrate our wedding anniversary. Food simple, refined and delicious, setting and ambience beautiful, service was impeccable. Couldn’t fault it. Well done to the team 🙏🏻🙏🏻
Beautiful ambient, perfect food, came second time in 2 weeks, best beef carpacio ive had ever, and ive traveled a lot and everywhere!

We came to Arsenal for dinner allured by the magnificent view and ambiance and oh boy we were greatly surprised by the food and service. This restaurant is a dream, we’ve been traveling for a month to Italy, Slovenia and different cities in Croatia and this has been the best experience (together with Corte in Zadar). The food here is amazing, so good we came back a day later. Johny was our server and he was not only professional and savvy but also very friendly and patient explaining the dishes and drinks. He is a gem and this restaurant is the jewel of the crown. Highly reccomended!
Exceptional! The service and ambiance was beyond expectations. This is a must do when visititing Dubrovnik. You will be delighted with friendly, warm service. Highly recommend
Grab a reservation because this restaurant is almost touching the water in the old town port! Gnocchi was great and a beautiful view.
Was great food with a great view. Wine recommendation was good. Squid and chicken solid. Music enjoyed. Thank you Marijo!

We had an absolutely amazing time. The ambience was lovely, next to the water. The food was delicious with a lot of variety. Exceptional service by Dzoni, our server for the evening. He was super helpful with the recommendations and also helped us plan a birthday surprise. Would definitely come back every time we are in the city.
Can’t fault this restaurant. Views stunning but the food and service match it. Port side has the best views imo but city side would be fine too. Excellent seafood and amazing patisserie.
Lovely restaurant overlooking the harbour of Dubrovnik. The staff are friendly, attentive and helpful. Menu options are great. Our waiter, Obren, was awesome!
Came here on my own, last night dining out. The staff were lovely and made me feel very comfortable. Mario was great and very helpful. Food was unreal. Would come again if I’m ever back here.

Very kind and friendly staff, excellent food, reasonable prices for the restaurant in the heart of the old town with a spectacular view and atmosphere. It was a great experience at all and I would definitely go there again.
Delicious dinner- best meal we had in Dubrovnik. Marijo was our server and went above and beyond. Great atmosphere and views. Highly recommend!!
The highlight of our trip. Pero provides exceptional service. Food is delicious. It’s a MUST visit while in Dubrovnik.

This restaurant was amazing. We went during the Dubrovnik food festival and as part of this we got 3 courses for €30. The food was amazing and the staff were super friendly and helpful. They had a great selection of wine too.

The setting is also beautiful!

Absolutely fantastic restaurant. We visited on a few occasions, for coffee, drinks, and food. Great service, amazing food and brilliant drinks. Very reasonably priced too given its Old Town location. Can’t recommend this restaurant enough.

Lovely location looking out at the harbour.
Stayed 9 nights in Dubrovnik and this was by far the best meal we had. Presented beautifully and tasted great. Cost the same as other meals but this was superior.
The waiter, Marijo Krkic, was attentive and explained what was being served without being overbearing.
Really recommend this restaurant.

Loved having breakfast here, the sun was shining and we were put right in front of the harbour. The staff were very attentive (we had Roberto serve us), the food was beautiful. We've eaten at all three of this restaurants chain and the service had been impeccable at each. Would definitely recommend to anyone visitng the old town.
The food was great and the views are stunning!! 😀 Our waiter was really helpful as well. Highly recommend you visit this place.

many restaurants in Dubrovnik don't seem to like guests who want to sit down for coffee without eating directly .. this is different here. Super friendly service, great team play (you can literally feel the joy in the team) and you can't decide whether to sit on the lake side or city side. good, fine cuisine, delicious desserts

Amazing! Food, service, atmosphere were incredible. 
Special mentions to the beef carpaccio and their take on an Old Fashion. Both were SO GOOD that we went back for more. 2 days in a row and I would go back to Dubrovnik just to eat. 
We couldn’t get reservations online, so at 6pm both evenings we walked through the restaurant to the rear of the building where they have more dining and outside seating. We were immediately sat at a table with a gorgeous view of the bay and the hillside. After 7pm it really starts to fill up with some standing room at 8pm. If you don’t have a reservation, I arrive by 6.
