The service was impeccable, professional and so friendly. 
I would definitely recommend going for a lovely dinner.

We enjoyed our breakfast here so much that we came back again the next day. The food was perfectly prepared, the servers were friendly and professional, and the view was beautiful. 

If you can only eat at one restaurant, i would recommend this one. I was especially grateful to Mark, our server, who had gluten-free bread prepared for my husband, who has a gluten allergy.

The staff were very friendly and helpful and the food was fantastic. I was a bit skeptical when I watch out for tourist traps and read reviews from different platforms. Here I want to highlight that the restaurant really manages to combine class and quality with a location “in the middle of the action”. We had octopus carpaccio, black risotto as starters and tuna for main course. We were recommended a local Merlot which was suitable for all dishes. We were very pleased!

Views across the picture perfect harbour.
The team could not do more in making you feel welcome.
We have visited twice and like most things, expected the second time to fall short. 
I could not be further wrong! 

The waiter knew it was our second visit and made reference to when serving. 
It was my partners birthday and they went above and beyond to offer a desert gratis. 

Unbelievable team of people working at one of the very best restaurants in town.
Absolutely outstanding from start to finish. The food and staff were first class. Setting was incredible so comes highly recommended - don’t miss out
Great food, amazing views and great service! Roberto was very attentive and dinner at sunset was BEAUTIFUL! Would highly recommend!
Really lovely place! We had such nice food and would highly recommend other people going. Speedy service and friendly staff

Exellent service! From accomodating us with a heater to the serving of the wine. 
Very good food. 
We can highly recommend a visit.
Good menu and service, all and all The service was fast and The food was tasting everything was as to be expected very nice view in to the sea

We had breakfast here twice and it was brilliant and great value for money. We had the omelette and it came with a bread basket with rolls, croissants and spreads included. Our waiter was brilliant, I didn’t catch his name but he was Serbian. Highly recommend for a lovely, reasonable breakfast overlooking the harbour.

I had lunch at the Arsenal with a couple of friends and we were delighted with the food as well as with the service. The chef’s interpretation of traditional dishes was amazing. I had the meat menu and loved the duck with an apple chutney, caramelized walnuts, and more. The beef strogonoff came with a mushroom mousse that balanced perfectly the dish. The chocolate mousse with truffle infusion was divine. Our waiter, Roberto, was professional, efficient and very, very nice.
I highly recommend

Had breakfast here twice and dinner once in our four days in Dubrovnik, great service and food in a great location either looking out over the old town harbour or, at the other end of the restaurant, in old town itself. Would definitely recommend.

We heard this was a wonderful restaurant and their offerings during the Good Food Festival were amazing. I ordered the Fish Menu and all three courses were excellent. First tuna course visually joyful and more delightful to eat. Great citrus sauce. Second Applejack course beautifully prepared and with creatively prepared vegetables. Third berry dessert course was absolutely dreamy. Light. Just the right amount of sweetness. We appreciated the good service and humor of our server Roberto and our entire experience by the old port.

I can not stress highly enough what a treat we experienced, tasting the good food festival menu this evening. Obren explained each dish to us with such passion and the sauté Stroganoff cooked by Tomislav Zelić was divine. The meat just melted with every mouth full. 5 stars

Fantastic food, atmosphere, setting, and service. Our last night of a week in Dubrovnik was set off beautifully here.
Absolutely prefect way to spend an evening.
Wonderful view and food. Our waiter was the most enjoyable. I would definitely recommend and return. Perfect and wonderful

We wanted a nice lunch with the view of the Adriatic Sea & we were not disappointed! Super good food & our Waiter Slav was the most friendly & attentive. Highly recommended. Book in advance if you want the first row tables. We were lucky to be seated on the 2nd row as we didn’t reserve.
I like this restaurant so much!! We ordered Repitto, mushroom pasta, and squid and each one is fantastic. The environment is great with sea view. Roberto served us well.
The view is great and the food is very delicious. We love this place! And huge thanks to Roberto for his considerate and kind service.

Very very good food and hospitality.
Mr. Robert took care for us.
That's would be nice.
We took a sheet on terrace, that was also awesome. Great view.

Researched the top restaurants in Dubrovnik and this one was rated super high…and for good reason! Great location, quality food and outstanding service. Roberto was fantastic and provided us with recommendations that were perfect. All around great experience

We had a fabulous dinner here our last night in Dubrovnik. It was during their food festival so for 30 euro we had a wonderful 3 course meal that was very special. We had duck with an apple puree, beef gnocchi with mushroom pate and a chocolate truffle dessert. Everything was absolutely delicious and our server Obren took good care of us and gave good recommendations. The atmosphere at this restaurant is amazing with beautiful spaces both indoor and outside (we sat outside by the sea). A lovely meal in a lovely place. I would highly recommend.
Best spot in Dubrovnik for lunch. Outstanding food and service. Our 6th visit here. Back again soon. Thanks Ana again for best table.

Everything is really excellant!! The servers'(Mr. Roberto) service, food, atmosphere of this restaurant is the best restaurant in Croatia ever. I really enjoyed the time when I had lunch in here. If I visit Duvronik again then I'll visit this restaurant again! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ * I seleted Black risotto, truffle pasta. 

웨이터의 서비스, 음식의 맛, 레스토랑 분위기 전체적으로 모든게 다 좋았습니다. 점심으로 블랙 리조또와 트러플 파스타를 주문했는디 너무 맛있었어요~! 나중에 두브로브니크 다시오게 되면 또 방문할 것 같아요~!
5+ Amazing coffee with breathtaking views at Kavana Arsenal Dubrovnik. Perfect spot for a relaxing lunch or coffee break👌🏼👌🏼
Roberto was amazing! Service was flawless , food came quickly and everything was delicious. The location is unbeatable. I will be back.

Roberto was a great host on our honeymoon and we thoroughly enjoyed our time here! 

The eggs Benedict was well done, albeit a little salty but still lovely overall. 

The view is absolutely stunning. We enjoyed it so much. 

Thanks to Roberto and his team for catering a good seat with views of the pier and ensuring we enjoyed our time! 

Cheers.

Great place - beautiful views, good food. Very value for money as well - best in Dubrovnik. we had the eggs benedict breakfast set and it came with a bread basket for 11.7€! That’s super affordable here in Dubrovnik. Roberto was great in his service as well.

Beautiful setting and an absolutely delicious meal.
Our waiter Obren was very helpful and friendly, which made the experience even better.
Would definitely recommend.
Fantastic setting in old town marina. Beautiful cuisine and great service with excellent wine and friendly staff. Must try

Wonderful experience. Beautiful location and ambience. Staff friendly and very professional. Our waiter Davor explained the menu options and was very attentive. Food was delicious. Would definitely recommend.
Great fine dining restaurant with fresh seafood and perfect service!! Nemana was a wonderful waiter and we highly recommend

Celebrated our Anniversary with stunning views of the old port and Lokrum island.
The restaurant is huge, facing the Adriatic Sea and the rear being in a square near Dubrovnik Cathedral.
Although it was very busy the service was not compromised and was excellent.
The food was delicious and the Croatian wine was top notch.
I would like to especially thank Obren Unkovic fo making our evening extra special.
We had complimentary after dinner liqueur.
I highly recommend the restaurant.
Unbelievable value for gourmet food and impeccable service from Nemanja. Ask for the Dubrovnik Food Festival menu and you can’t go wrong.

We dined at Gradska Kavana Arsenal twice during our 10-day stay in Dubrovnik and thoroughly enjoyed our meals there.

Our hotel (the Excelsior) arranged our first reservation and we had a wonderful table directly overlooking the harbour (which we booked again for our second visit).

During our two visits we enjoyed starters of Dalmation smoked ham and Burrata with a salad of rocket and pesto For mains we had the black risotto with cuttlefish and sage, and the chicken stuffed with feta cheese with gratin potatoes and broccoflower. on our second visit we were presented with complimentary deserts due to being return guests. All of the food was very tasty and well presented. We chose wines by the glass which were very good. Service was friendly and attentive and prices were reasonable (including a 10% discount for Dubrovnik Pass holders!)

We love Gradska Havana Arsenal and will always dine here when in Dubrovnik.

Wow! What an amazing experience for dinner, the food was fantastic! I had the tuna and my husband had the seabass and both delicious as well as the charcuterie board appetizer. Of course the views are amazing at night with everything lit up. Just gorgeous! Robert was a fantastic waiter and highly recommend him. He was just a wonderful host. I travel to many high end places and dont usually write reviews but had to for this place. Just magical and romantic.:)
Beautiful views & delicious food! Would highly recommend trying this restaurant. Roberto was a great waiter and very attentive!

At last, at last, at last. A restaurant with standards and affordability. Went there for a late breakfast. Reminded me of an old English experience. Fresh breads with a variety of jams and spreads, delicious teas and a fantastic “fry up”, if I can use the word, to really set you up for the day and all at a respectable price unlike many other restaurants in the vicinity. I would highly recommended this place for the ambience, high quality service and attention to detail. Add a stunning view and you will be in for a treat.

We had a wonderful evening with fantastic jazz played by Dzemal of the Dubrovnik orchestra. The ambience, view, the staff with wonderful sense of humour, ‘Marijo Krkic and the delicious locally sourced gastronomic food. A delightful evening

Our waitress, Ana, gave us one of the best experiences we’ve had in Croatia. Never have we felt so welcomed at a restaurant, truly an all time experience, we’d be lucky to have the chance to dine here again. The food was amazing and the atmosphere was unbeatable.
Ana was an incredible server. She made us feel so welcome and really made the experience wonder for us. The food was also incredible but the service put it over the top for us

Arsenal has wonderful foods and atmosphere. We live iis bottle fish risotto and special fish menu. We will definitely come back again when we are in the area. Marijeta was our server who had some great job!!

Great food and service, I highly recommend dining here! Breads, salads, main dishes were wonderful!
Antun our server was friendly and attentive!

One of the highlights of our stay in Dubrovnik was our lunch at Arsenal. The historic building is the perfect setting for this must-visit restaurant. We sat outside, overlooking the harbor, and enjoyed the beautiful view. Vlaho, the manager, ensures your experience is exceptional. His hospitality and dedication to customer service are unparalleled. Vlaho goes out of his way to make sure every guest feels welcome! Vlaho's genuine warmth and enthusiasm make you feel at home. Obren was our waiter, and his knowledge and recommendations were perfect. Obren helped us select each item and course for our party of 5. Everything was delicious, and he encouraged us to try menu items I probably would not have. Obren's knowledge of the menu is impressive, and his service is remarkable. If you are fortunate to be served by Obren, you are in for a treat! It is easy to see why Arsenal is one of the city's gems.
Excellent service, food, and atmosphere. I highly recommend the tuna tartare and the fish stew. You will not be disappointed.

Recommended a tasting menu that was absolutely amazing. Lovely place for people watching as well. Three courses and impressed with every one. The wait staff never left me wondering what was next 10 stars of if I could.
Our server Obren was amazing and the food was perfect. Try the octopus carpaccio. Highly recommend this spot if you’re looking for a great view and great food!
Best place to eat breakfast, lunch ir dinner. Amazing position out the back next to harbour- beautiful at night. Food very good. Great atmosphere.

Lovely restaurant with an excellent location and beautiful surroundings. Tried to book online but restaurant was already booked so took a chance and was able to get a walk in table. Really reasonably priced and would recommend.
Fantastic food, location and attention to detail. A special birthday made even better by our harbour side table and great service by Slaven Cvenic. Thank you

Food: great
Views: spectacular
Service: even better!

Our group of 11 had the BEST experience here. Our waiter Rale was the sweetest and one of the best we’ve had:)
This place was amazing! The view is absolutely beautiful and Rale was the best waiter :) Me and the girls had so much fun here and we cannot recommend this place more!
Had a great time with all of my friends!! Lovely food, service and atmosphere. Definitely recommend coming when in old town.

Antum out waiter, was very caring and generous. He suggested very good food and he was smiling.all the time. The restaurant is so clean and organized and they have the perfect view. We recommend the truffle and mushroom pasta! Very delicious

came here for lunch today and we had the chicken and mushroom truffle pasta and it was absolutely delicious! would come back again. Marijeta was our server and she did a splendid job. make sure to try the foccacia bread basket 😊

It's an excellent restaurant in every way: the service attitude, the quality of the dishes, the side meals and the liquor, the location and the dining environment are almost perfect. There's nothing to say. I'll definitely visit Dubrovnik if I still go!

We took 30 people here from all over the world for a celebration of our top achievers in our company. We have very high standards, and the service was impeccable. I’ve traveled all around the world, and am the owner of these events and the timing of every meal was amazing and well done. No one‘s drinks was left unfilled no one‘s water with left unfilled, and that type of service is all we need to celebrate our people. Our server Mark took care of 30 people knowing exactly what they ordered individually. Thank you, Mark, and it was a beautiful view and place. Also we’re pretty tough critics. We hope to come back soon!
Great food, view and service . Recommended by Antun Rakidzija to have steak and it was a great choice. Excellent experience
We had great service from Antun! Lovely views and great food. We would definitely come back! Easy walk from the old town and slightly less crowded.
Great location awful coffee. Worse still the waiter was utterly disinterested in serving us, took ages despite only two other couples to serve. Will not return

What can I say! 
This venue holds a very special place in my heart as we held our wedding reception there.
Whether you sit facing the beautiful water or the square it’s absolutely outstanding. 
All of the staff go above and beyond to make every occasion special. 
It was my wife’s birthday and I requested some flowers for table, they were absolutely amazing. 
A huge special thank you to Mario you are incredible and a an asset to the restaurant. From the special birthday cocktails to the handmade ‘flowers’ you made specially from the napkins you always blow us away! 
You are a huge reason we always return to Dubrovnik and see it as our happy place. 

Did I mention the food is also delicious and the local wines are incredible, all the staff have a very high knowledge of the all the wines also. 

Best espresso martinis in town also! 

Thank you thank you thank you xxxxx

Gradska kavana Arsenal has certainly not lost its touch after coming here for the past couple of years. My sister and her daughter joined me for dinner on this visit and they were simply amazed by the spectacular views and ambiance, delectable Mediterranean cuisine, and most of all, the exceptional professional service of Marijo Krkic he consistently demonstrates. Complimentary tickets to the Wine Museum were a nice surprise! His extensive knowledge of local wines, perfectly paired with each dish, along with divine desserts make it truly a Michelin Star-level experience when Marijo is your host! Hvala puno and bravo to team Arsenal as well!

We received exceptional service from Sijepan, who was very knowledgeable and recommended a fantastic Posip wine. The food was amazing and beautifully presented. The seabass, pasta, and burrata salad made for a delightful combination that we thoroughly enjoyed. The location and ambiance were perfect, situated in Old Town Dubrovnik next to the famous Cathedral. Dining at an outdoor table on a beautifully lit patio, accompanied by live music, truly captured the essence of the Croatian atmosphere. Thank you for a memorable evening! 33rd Wedding Anniversary.

Expensive dishes and much less sophisticated than their name.
Small portions, very small for pasta.
Welcome much less friendly than in the other restaurants of the Nautika group, precious waiters, want to sell with insistence malaise (4 requests!) a cocktail while we simply wait for a table!
Under beautiful arcades with a view of the old port for the front tables

Perfect location for breakfast.
Excellent service, friendly and efficient staff. - our waitress was Marijeta
Thoroughly recommended 5⭐️
Amazing spot! Beautiful view, really good food with appetizer (see photo) and lovely morning cocktails. Waiters were very friendly especially our waiter Marko. We absolute recommend going here!
Excelent food and even better service! Johnny was a super waiter, super nice and recomended amazing food and tourism! Will be coming back while on our trip!

Arsenal is an excellent restaurant with breathtaking views of the sea on one side and the main square of Dubrovnik’s old town on the other! We had exceptional service from Marco during several visits!
This is the best restaurant in Dubrovnik! The food is excellent, we had breakfast and dinner here. Antun was a great waiter, the place has amazing views!!! Totally recommend it

we ate here one very windy evening, we were on the terrace but everything started to fly away, my glass of wine fell on my husband. the waiters rushed to move us inside where it was warmer, they brought me another drink, thank you for the impeccable service. at the meal level, full of good flavors the fig duck is excellent, as well as the chicken.

No complaints at all. Fantastic food and amazing views. 
We arrived about 6pm and there was no wait. Great time to go in our opinion.

The fish was amazing, served par a fantastic waitress and with a wonderful view on the harbour! Everything was perfect!
Thank you Marijeta 😉

Overlooking the boats. Lovely place to people watch, Nice atmosphere.
Food was good. We had a late breakfast after walking the walls but all of the food looked nice.

Very good service by Ivar and Rala. 
Delicious lunch with stunning bay views in Dubrovnik Croatia. Thick plume

The most elegant place to enjoy coffee with a delicious piece of cake is at the bottom of main street Stradun. The same location turns into a large restaurant on the harbour side with magnificient views over the hills.

I had the burger with a glass of Saint Hills, recommended by my waiter Marko. 
Marko made me feel very welcome and kept an extra attentive eye as I was dining solo. Well done folks, great food, great service 👌🏻👏🏻
So good we went twice. Great views of the harbour and old town. Staff attentive and food great. The seafood risotto and the black risotto were amazing.
The place is beautiful, very friendly staff, delicious meals and decent Awards! Thanks to Marija for the warm welcome and the perfect service!

Sat on the patio right off of the quay. Famous Dubrovnik location and stunning at night. Loved the ambience of this restaurant. The food was very good. I had the beefsteak which was done extremely well. My wife had the Tuna which was also extremely good. One of our friends had a pasta that was also very good. Unfortunately, our fourth meal was the sea bass which was not good - lacked flavor and the accompanied potatoes were under cooked. Would give this place a 5 star rating if it for the sea bass and still would recommend it.

Beautiful location and wonderful service. 
The food was simple but nice (we had breakfast). Our waiter Marco gave all that little extra that made our experience truly wonderful. Thanks Marco!
Great service by Nemanja and good quality for reasonable price! Friendly staff and excellent view on one of the cosiest squares in Dubrovnik.

Amazing food and location. Our waiter Stjepan was amazing and recommended the perfect wine pairing for our fish dishes. Recommend the black risotto, it was delicious paired with Chardonnay. Best food experience yet in Croatia

My partner and I had a super light lunch here. The chicken and tuna salads are plentiful (quite a challenge to eat the lot) and tasty. Not the cheapest restaurant but good value for money. We went through the restaurant from the square, to the other side to sit by the water. What a lovely location to enjoy a bottle of wine, watch the small boats go in and out, and the crowds walking by.
Very nice restaurant, eat well but not fantastic. Service, same thing. Very pleasant terrace. That restaurant has two terraces, one on site and one on the harbor.
Delicious food, great views, wide range of choice! Prices are on the high side though you are in the middle of Old Town with great views so that's worth something!

We had two lunches, one breakfast and stopped here for drinks a few times too.
It has two sides one facing the town the other facing the old harbour.
The Strawberry cake is to die for and the Mussels were superb so much so when the waiter noticed some had not opened I was brought another bowl
We were looked after at all our visits and became our go to place to watch the world go by

Food and service were absolutely amazing. I was here with my wife during our honeymoon and the atmosphere was pleasant and romantic with a very nice view. The waiter even offered us a free piece of cake to celebrate our honeymoon. One of the best dinners of our lives for sure!

We ate at Panorama the night before so thought we’d had our incredible views for the holiday but wow, the views across from our table were gorgeous. 
It was our first visit to the Old Town and we were blown away on looking for the restaurant. We gave our reservation details to the host and were initially disappointed to not be sat overlooking the town but when we were shown through to the back, wow, what a stunning view. 
Food was all really nice and again staff were all really pleasant. As we ate at Panorama the night before (and this is part of the same group) we were given a 10% discount card which was useful. 
Lovely evening.

We were served by Marijo, he was attentive and very friendly. We throughly enjoyed our food and drinks, and as we sat on one of the tables overlooking the port we had an amazing view. Thank you so much for a lovely meal for our last night in Dubrovnik!

Absolutely fantastic seafood. The restaurant is located at the harbor with lots of tourists walking about. Amazingly this place actually does have great food. The staff excellent and professional. The hostess told us it would take her a moment to get us a table and she did a fancy job by moving some reservations around. Couldn’t have been better. The food was so fresh and tasty

Good breakfast and kind service. I took the Orlando breakfast and my partner the Eggs Benedict, both tasted fresh and made of quality ingredients. Coffee was good too, also the decafinated! Homemade ice tea was delicious. I loved how they brought the chocolate spread, honey and jams in tiny, cute jars for the selection of breads! Great experience overall 👍

We went to this restaurant because of the rating. It absolutely did not disappoint. The octopus carpaccio and Tuna Tatar what were both outstanding. But here’s a tip, we lucked out because someone with a table right at the boardwalk overlooking the harbor canceled. We got their table and it was an amazing experience. Definitely recommend making reservation for a table with the view in advance.

Having found this restaurant for breakfast I wouldn't go anywhere else. Everything was perfect - the food was delicious, the service was excellent, the location was beautiful and it offered great value for money.

We came here for breakfast our last day & I'm just sorry we didn't discover this gem when we first got here. The food was delicious & our server Marijo couldn't be any nicer. So helpful & made our experience by providing free tickets to the wine museum. Thank you again Marijo.

Our dinner here was a wonderful experience. Our meals were delicious, including octopus carpaccio and gnocchi, beef in bourbon sauce. The hospitality was great, especially by our server, Obren. The live music was a nice addition to an already amazing ambiance.

Most wonderful experience at Gradska Kavana Restaurant! Top notch experience from the minute I walked in. Incredible hospitality, excellent food, amazing wine list… Very memorable night! Highly recommend to try tuna tartare, Zlatan Plavac wine and tuna main course.

We had a great time at the restaurant. Special thanks to Obren, who was wonderful during our visit. 
The food was really delicious. We especially enjoyed the black risotto and the tuna steak.

Milos was a delightful host, we’ve only arrived to Dubrovnik this afternoon and stumbled across the restaurant on a walk around the old time this evening. The views are stunning across the marina. It has been lovely to see the sun go down in such an idyllic setting. The cheese platter was a fabulous start to the meal with a wonderful selection of wines to enjoy a romantic main meal. We weren’t rushed, service was second to none and our main courses were delightful. 
We will be back again I’m sure, before the holiday is over.
Thank you Milos

Stunning location, great food, friendly and attentive service. What more do you want! Burrata to start.. excellent ..Sea bass fillet was cooked en papillote and was divine. Worked perfectly with the local rosé (Kutjevo).

Service was great, food delicious and the atmosphere was unique and wonderful. Beautiful view onto the bay and a piano/trumpet providing terrific music - we couldn’t have enjoyed it more. One of our best dining experiences in Croatia!

Absolutely beautiful evening! Excellent food (we had tuna steaks and black risotto— and amazing burrata), perfect service—Robert was a gem, a true professional—and you can’t beat the seaside setting. A top choice for dinner in Dubrovnik!
The food and service is spot on. The view isn’t bad either. Our waiter Robert was the best. So thankful we were able to get a table.

We had the most amazing dining experience. The food was off the chain and some of the best we have had in Croatia. The view and ambience are phenomenal. We had the oysters, tomato soup, mushroom truffle pasta, black risotto, and a bottle of the local wine. Robert was our server and he was outstanding. Highly recommend this restaurant!! You will not be disappointed!
Marijo was very kind and was the nicest waiter when I came to Croatia. The food was very good and we had a rich seafood risotto. When I come to Croatia again, I definitely want to go ^_^
Food was amazing, really high quality and all tasted amazing. Service was efficient and all staff were lovely, Marijo in particular was very friendly and made our visit special!

What a great experience at Restaurant Arsenal. Great selection of spirits and beverages with an amazing view. Our server, Rale made great suggestions for lunch. Recommend reservations in advance, the black risotto and truffle mushroom pasta. Will definitely be back for our next visit. Thank you Rale and Dubrovnik!

Beautiful location for very relaxing meal. Always busy but staff try to accommodate you. Had brunch of eggs Benedict royale. Prices very good considering its waterfront location. Looked after by waiter Džoni who was so kind and caring. 100% recommend.

Beautiful restaurant, beautiful location, overlooking a raised terrace on one of the central squares of the citadel, tables set with tablecloths, top service, exceptional food! We had, as an appetizer, a sublime shrimp carpaccio, and, as a first course, the traditional black rice from Dubrovnik, also exceptional, the best I've eaten in Croatia! The restaurant is not cheap, but if you consider the location, the service, the quality of the food, it is absolutely acceptable and is not more expensive than other restaurants within the citadel, where prices are high! We absolutely recommend it!

I can see why this such a popular choice – beautiful location with a lovely sea breeze. We tried to get a table waterside without any luck, but were accommodated overlooking the main square, which was equally picturesque. The staff, typical for Dubrovnik, were excellent and very welcoming – something we'll miss on our return to the UK. We were seated and served very quickly, opting for the fresh bread selection served with lovely, local olive oil. The main courses of Tuna, skilfully cooked blushingly pink and Duck, equally well-cooked together with a selection of fresh vegetables were both very good. I had a couple of reservations about the traminac and plum sauce, but overall it was a very good meal. Great location, welcoming staff and a refreshing through breeze made for a memorable evening.

When you enter along the side of old Drubrovnik you enter a beautiful room with vaults that lead you to the terrace overlooking the harbor of old Dubrovnik. 
The place where we are going to eat is at the rear of the building with a view of the harbor and serves as the restaurant. On the other hand, the side of old Dubrovnik is the brasserie/tavern where you can go for a piece of cake and a drink. 

The restaurant was a pearl to the eye despite the fact that when we went to eat there was a heavy storm over old Dubrovnik. We initially sat on the terrace but since the wind was stronger and we got wet we were kindly offered to take a seat inside to continue enjoying our meal and evening. 
The food was typical Croatian from starter to main course to dessert and was really worth its price quality despite not expecting this given the framework you are in and this compared to other things within the city walls. 

ATTENTION:
The restaurant requires a reservation to ensure your seat
You can join the brasserie if a seat becomes available

This restaurant was picked by our best friends to celebrate our 30 th anniversary whilst visiting Dubrovnik. 
The whole setting of this place is beautiful, looking out at the old port. 
The food was delicious and the ambience just perfect with a pianist playing in the background. 
When visiting dubrovnik this is a fabulous restaurant to dine in. Highly recommend.

This is our first time in Dubrovnik and we walked by this restaurant and the hostess was very attentive and seated us at an outside table with amazing views! 👍😁

Our server, Joseph was fantastic from the start as he seated us and was friendly and kind. He helped us with our choices and very knowledgeable about the menu and ingredients. We took his advice and ordered the black risotto and it was a hit! 

Joesph was busy with other tables but managed to check on us the right amount of times. Joseph interacts with people well and we had such an amazing experience! 

We highly recommend Gradska Kavana Arsenal as the restaurant is top notch with the ambience and there are lots of options for food but more importantly the service was high end and make our experience even more special!!! A BIG Hvala to Joseph!!!

Keep up the great work!!!😁

We will be back! 👍

Not easy to get a table we booked once and waited the second time, but it's well worth the planning
Brilliant food, great location and great service what more do you want

Great food great people are beautiful view. Excellent wine. Everything was just best of the best thank you so much.
Ciao
We had a great experience with the restaurant. The amazing food, I especially recommend the (fantastic) duck. The attention of Miloš amazing, very friendly and kind to us! Anyway to repeat!!

We had some lunch here, truffle and mushroom pasta was absolutely amazing, wow the flavours and texture were lovely. We also had some Rose wine which was also delicious. Highly recommend this restaurant!

Located next to the port, it is a very tastefully decorated, spacious and comfortable place in its furniture.
Regarding the service , the waiters are very nice and always willing to take any suggestion you request.
The food is Mediterranean, very well cooked and with hearty servings 
After visiting several places on our holidays I think it is the best restaurant we met in relation to quality price and very important , 
👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏🏆🏆🏆🏆🏆

It’s the first time I’ve visited as a Solo traveller, yet it felt as inviting as always. The food was delicious and beautifully presented. The atmosphere relaxed, happy and welcoming. The staff were attentive and supportive and discreet. And the location is everything. 
On this visit, I was looked after by Robert and he took time and made space for me and I wasn’t tucked away in a corner but in the midst of the restaurant with all of life around me. And that definitely makes a change from the table in the corner scenario. This is definitely a special place and worth the time and the money!

Beautiful and elegant restaurant in the old town of Dubrovnik. We had dinner on the terrace overlooking the city harbor. 
We had not booked, but the very kind staff, after about 30/40 minutes, found us a place.
Great quality food. I ate a black risotto (cuttlefish ink risotto) on the menu of all the restaurants in the Croatian town and I can say, without a doubt, that it was the best risotto tasted in town. 
Fair price for what is the standard of Dubrovnik given the quality and location where this restaurant is located. 
I highly recommend anyone visiting Dubrovnik to spend an evening dining at Gradska Kavana Arsenal. 
I hope to return.

Fab food, fab service! 
Ambiance was wonderful with a live pianist and cellist. We had a lovely evening and would recommend!
Great spot. Such friendly staff. Beautiful view. More memories. Had such great conversations and such fun time with my friends.
This spot right on the water is incredibly lovely and the food is delicious, the best part was the stellar service- Marijo was charming, funny and made sure our experience was top notch!
Food and service is incredible. Marijo was very friendly and helpful. Would recommend to anyone visiting for a great stop for food.

In addition to the charming ambiance, the restaurant also stands out for its extremely friendly staff, ready to satisfy all your wishes and provide top-notch service. The waiter who served us is called Obren. Thanks to him we had a wonderful dinner. And thanks to manager Nikša, we had a beautiful table with a view! The food was excellent, all recommendations!

This spot is great! Lovely food and beautiful views. 

We had the beef bourbon gnocchi and the truffle mushroom and it was delicious. 

Staff absolutely lovely too. Especially Mario! 

10/10 recommend

Gorgeous food, and lovely setting. We had olives followed by truffle pasta & gnocchi beef bourbon. 
Yummy - would recommend this place!

I would like to extend a warm thanks to MR. Bero For his hard work and excellent service. He deserves a bonus for his service.

I would like also to comment about the food quality, it was the best food i have ever tried in my life. I will come to this place for sure in the future.

Orange juice, fish soup, sea bass are mandatory! Don’t order gnocchi with beef.

Wow, what an amazing dinner we’ve just had! Like its sister restaurant, the staff are just so friendly and attentive here. On top of that the food is rather good too! I had the Tuna coated in sesame seeds in an avocado cream - happy days, it was fabulous. Thanks to all for making it such a magical evening

Best restaurant we were at in Old Town during our 3-day stay! We had breakfast and it was phenomenal, so we can back from dinner and had the same experience. The wait staff in the morning and afternoon were incredibly courteous and the food was top notch. Highly recommend the Orlando or Eggs Benedict for breakfast and Risotto or Sea Bass for dinner. The drinks were great too. Marijo was our waiter for dinner and he was incredibly nice and professional.
The restaurant is simply perfect, the view is amazing, the food wonderful and Marijo's service was flawless! Very friendly and request! I would definitely come back! 10/10

Wonderful restaurant! Marijo attended us and was spectacular. I'd come back a thousand times. Worth it for a special dinner. service and food note 10, very different from other experiences we had in Dubrovnik.
The food was perfect and the staff 100%. Marijo was very corteous and gave us perfect suggestions for dinner, tottaly worth it!
Nice view, friendly and gentle servers (Marijo krkic), delicious meals.. We finished our last dinner in Croatia perfectly. Sea bass Recommendation.

I chose it as my last trip dinner and it was a great choice. Very friendly and very atmospheric, so it feels like decorating the last night's snack. In particular, Marijo Krkic's service was excellent. I think I'll have a good memory of Dubrovnik. Thank you :)
Marijo did a wonderful job recommending both wine and food to us. The black risotto was one of the best meals I’ve had in a while! Great atmosphere, food, and service.
Very nice good with a great view and excellent service from Marijo. Also great value of money considering the other places I’ve eaten at and paid the same amount or if not more.
A mix of good cuisine with an amazing atmosphere with wonderful port views!! Fish dish is indispensable and chocolate dessert a dream !!!

Visited twice - breakfast top notch at rear overlooking Strada - impromptu lunch inside w
during a rainstorm also excellent. Terrace overlooking old harbour needs reservations.

location: New York, New York, United States
review: Excellent restaurant. Best in Croatia so far. Outstanding service. Charming music too. Try the Fish Al Forno for sure.

We visited on our first and last evening in Dubrovnik. Drinks, food and service were fantastic, not to mention the view! We didn't catch the name of our first waiter, but on our final night we were served by Marijo K. He was knowledgeable about everything we chose from the menu and very friendly. Would recommend the tuna, duck and steak as mains and the tuna tartare as a starter, but all the food looked delicious! Would recommend a visit if you're in Dubrovnik Old Town!

The restaurant has a great location within the old town walls next to the cathedral. Great for just people watching. 
The service from our host (sorry we didn’t get your name) was outstanding he was very knowledgeable about the wine & each of our food courses. The food was excellent and we would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone visiting Dubrovnik. Great location, food, wine & the best service we had received all week. Lovely experience to end our holiday thank you.

Our last night in Dubrovnik (for a girls trip), we came to Gradska Kavana Arsenal. Our waiter was Marijo. Hands down, the best dinner out we have ever had. To say the service was a 10/10 would be an understatement. We were well taken care of, given menu recommendations, and told where to head over next! Food was immaculate, views were incredible, and the experience was unforgettable. We give this our utmost recommendation for anyone who is hungry!
Fantastic dinner with a great view and food. Exceptional service and staff in general. Especially, Nemanja was very professional and attentive.

Beautiful service, food and location. A friend recommended this restaurant and it exceeded expectation. 
A solo dinner on my own, reading my kindle and enjoying the people watching. I was warmly welcomed and cared for throughout the evening. Robert served and looked after me accomodating to my gluten free needs!

Nice Hugo coctail! 👌
We did not try food, but it seemed decent also! Also nice spot where it was not that hot like other restaurants in the the corners of old town

Not only is the location superb, the food was fantastic. You would expect a busy tourist hotspot of a restaurant to be churning out standard dishes but this place was such a gem! Our taxi driver recommended this restaurant as the best restaurant inside the walls of Dubrovnik! The food was delicious, service was prompt and attentive and they didn’t just keep turning tables - we sat and enjoyed a leisurely lunch by the harbour and it was so welcomed on a scorching day! Highly recommend and make a beeline for this establishment on your visit!
Obren was such a fun waiter and gave excellent service. Would come back again! The view was also amazing and it is beautiful day or night.

This evening we dined at Gradska Kavana Arsenal in Dubrovnik and it was an experience worth raving about!

Our waitress Anna was attentive, knowledgeable, and incredibly friendly, making us feel right at home. She went above and beyond to ensure that our meal was perfect, offering excellent recommendations and ensuring that every detail was attended to.

As for the food it was delicious. Every dish we ordered was bursting with flavor and beautifully presented. (The Tuna and duck were particular standouts! )

If you're looking for a place that offers both amazing food and a genuinely warm dining experience, this is it. We will definitely be returning on our next trip to Dubrovnik , and we hope to be seated in Anna's section again!

In our case my partner and I went to breakfast. We were given options to sit in front of the harbour, the views are spectacular and the atmosphere is even more pleasant. Waiters and very attentive staff, thank you. I ordered a healthy salad with lettuce, fruit, egg, etc. and my partner ordered an omelet with ham and cheese, everything was very very good. All that accompanied by coffees and multivitamin juices that they have on the menu and that we loved. They also serve you previously assorted different types of breads with different jams and other side dishes. I'm particularly looking forward to lunch or dinner. I RECOMMEND IT 100%.

Very nice place to come for breakfast for example. Great view of a small harbour, and Leader welcome. Breakfast continental type, pretty good, compensated by this superb place. Mention for the Antun server very smiling and friendly.

It was an AMAZING spot; live piano playing,views of the sea, and to top it off the service was incredible! Josip went above and beyond to make our experience excellent. Thank you again for the great service and restaurant! 🥰
Breakfast with beautiful view! Possibility to be in the shade while enjoying the view of the boats. Continental breakfast, good, but a little expensive.

Antun was a great waiter! 

We came here both days we stayed in Dubrovnik and loved it. We also went to their dinner restaurant as they offer 10% to their sister restaurants. Both great

Came here on our first night in Dubrovnik. We didn’t have a booking (I’d recommend making one) but after a short wait they found us a table. Beautiful food, attentive staff and a lovely setting over the marina. Not the cheapest but they gave us a 10% discount card for their sister restaurants which we have made use of……. Well that’s the tip sorted. Recommended
Enjoyed the beautiful scenery of the city walls before stopping here for breakfast. Beautiful patio, excellent service from Robert and amazing experience! We would gladly stop here again!
Beautiful dining spot with excellent service. Food is very good and our server Marijo was amazing. Definitely recommend!!
This location was perfect for having lunch with a view! We had a group and split some of the entrees, perfect serving size. Our server was Marijo and he was fantastic!! Very friendly service.
Beautiful place for lunch! Marijo was very kind and the perfect host! The serving sizes were generous and perfect for sharing.
Marijo was very welcoming towards me and my friends! We appreciated the amazing hospitality and we look forward to coming back again.

Very chic and tastefully decorated, this restaurant can be off-putting at Check-out thinking that it is too much for us.
It would be a big mistake because it would be to miss a magnificent place with a terrace under sublime vault overlooking the old port, hearty and refined dishes and all for a reasonable price with quality service.
No really, it would be a mistake to hesitate!
Went twice during our 3 day stay in Old Town! Food & service top-notch; servers Lulo & Obren were so attentive & spoke great English! Try the truffle pasta & octopus salad was yummy!

We visited this wonderful restaurant twice in August whilst on holiday in Štikovica. We were not disappointed! 

The first time we sat overlooking the square, which was beautiful. The food and service were exceptional, so much so we cancelled the booking we had made to celebrate my 50th birthday elsewhere so we could dine here once more before our return home. 

On my birthday we were fortunate enough to sit harbour side. The staff once again were very attentive and the food and whole experience was divine. Couldn’t find fault in anything. 

Highly recommended.
Very nice and good restaurant on the old port. Nice menu good products, good.service. book very well in advance. Award correct for the place.

There might be a little wait for a table - but it's worth it. Having eaten across Croatia this restaurant is in a great spot and has a good menu with good quality. In particular some restaurants are over priced in Croatia for the quality you receive but not here. In 10 days this was the best value for money we had, and with very good service and good cocktails.

Just arriving in Dubrovnik, we stumbled across this lovely restaurant as somewhere to get some shade and a drink! But the staff were so friendly that we ended up staying for an early dinner and being really impressed with the food. We had the black risotto, which was the best we’ve had on our trip, tuna, burger and meat pasta. All were brilliant. The lovely man serving us was so lovely with the kids and brought them a piece of chocolate cake on the house to finish. We loved it so much that we went back for breakfast and sat the other side of the restaurant - so we were able to enjoy both the view of the square and the sea.

Restaurant located in front of the port of the old town. The entrance is via the terrace under the arches. A clear view of the port and the Croatian mountains. A very nice view! Tablecloths and waitresses in shirts: restaurant of a certain standing despite the Awards which remain accessible.

You must book for your meals absolutely, at least for your dinners. The evenings were full. We have lunch without Reservation, a chance surely!

The dishes are refined, well made and rich in local products and Croatian specialties such as black risotto or their fish soup. It really is a treat.

The service is nice and the staff smiling and friendly. 

During your stay, I advise you to have this taste experience at least once.

Amazing restaurant with the best dining view in Dubrovnik. We had a great experience. Our staff were very attentive and were great at giving recommendations, both for food and for activities around Dubrovnik. We really enjoyed our starters. I opted for the Burrata which was especially refreshing, flavoursome and well plated. My partner chose the beef carpaccio, which was tender and delicious. I also loved the desserts here, especially the decadent chocolate mousse and crème caramel. There is only one thing I would fault about this place. My sea bass main was quite a let down. I love sea bass but truly feel that this main lacked flavour. It came in baking parchment paper surrounded by water that was also not flavourful. This left me feeling dissatisfied, but the lovely dessert brought my spirits back up. We really did have a great time here and I would definitely come back! I’d just order something else for main. Thank-you for a great evening meal :)

We tried to book to come here and it was fully booked for the next two weeks, at prime time, so we ended up coming for a very late lunch one day, around 5pm, before doing a sunset cruise.

I can see why it’s so popular! The food is delicious and the view out across the harbour is fantastic. We were lucky enough to get seats along the front so had prime views.

A great experience and I’d suggest, if this is somewhere you want to try, to book in advance of your holiday - it’s worth it!
Superb place, sea views and great professionalism, Recommendation for both a romantic dinner and an evening with friends / colleagues. Great professionalism, live music.

The food and ambiance provide a wonderful experience. The staff is very friendly. Given the location, the prices are quite reasonable, especially considering that you leave feeling really full. We came back twice, and we will do so again if we have the chance.

Found this spot as we wanted good seafood with a view, and it delivered on all accounts! We walked up and asked for a table and while, at first, they didn’t think they could accommodate 6 of us, they took another look and got us in as long as we kept the meal under 2 hours (not a problem). Food was really delicious, drinks as well, but the view of the harbor…spectacular. Highly recommend for the food, drinks, and the whole experience!

If you want a magical dining experience right on the port of the Adriatic, this is the place to be! It was such a delight—from the food to the service. Marijo was an incredible server and he took such good care of us. This was an unforgettable experience and I can’t wait to come back soon!

Kavana Noćni Bar in Dubrovnik’s Old Town is an absolute must-visit. The views from the terrace are breathtaking, with the city walls and the Adriatic Sea creating the perfect backdrop for a laid-back evening.

The food is fantastic—fresh, local, and full of flavor. The seafood dishes, like the octopus salad and grilled fish, are particularly great, but there's something for everyone on the menu.

What really sets this place apart is the service. Marijo Krkić, our server, was hands-down the best. He made the experience even more special with his friendly and attentive service. If you’re in Dubrovnik, don’t miss out on this spot!
Great food in a lovely location. Service was immaculate and staff attentive and friendly. Food maybe on the expensive side, but not too much. We loved every bit of our visit.

Marijo was a fantastic server and gave us great advice for what to see while in Dubrovnik! He also was able to seat us at a great table, without a reservation, even during the dinner rush. The black risotto and the truffle pasta were also phenomenal!

We ate here last year and gave it glowing reviews so went again yesterday.
It was superb from start to finish 
Ambience, service and food excellent!
Ok it’s not cheap but definitely worth every penny!
The Zucchini starters and the beef fillet and the veal entrecôte exceptional 
Well worth a visit hard to book a table so just turn up and wait in the cocktail bar for your table
Mario was an amazing server, so kind and accommodating . The food came within 15 minutes and it was so yummy, I recommend the truffle pasta and focaccia bread!

If you want to be treated like a dog, this is your place. The hostess was really rude. We were in a group of 4 (two couples), we waited over 25 minutes for the waiter. Overpriced drinks and food. There are best places to go in town.

This is was a truly wonderful experience made all the more fabulous by your attentive, kind and friendly waiter Mario! I would definitely recommend you visit this place even if you can’t get a reservation, show up and wait for a seat. We were told it would be a 45 minute wait but it only took 15! The food was delicious and the view was spectacular!

Amazing experience visiting this restaurant during summer 2024.
Service and staff are outstanding! Make you feel special and super welcomed. The food and drinks were also great and the flexibility of the staff adapting the dishes to the family requests were very much appreciated. To be frank it was one of the best experiences in restaurants during summer in my 8th year traveling in Europe. You can’t miss this place during your stay in Dubrovnik area.
Marijo is attentive, fun and treated us like queens. Get the Mediterranean croissant- fresh and delicious. Highly recommend!
Very good atmosphere!! We had not ordered the table, but sat in the bar and took some great drinks and got a lovely table after 20 min. Amazing views of the harbour, good food and wine for the money!
Amazing service and food from Marijo beautiful views and lovely pianist. Best food in Dubrovnik and fresh seafood in town.

Awesome night out. The food, drinks and the view were so great! Service was amazing. The atmosphere was very nice, low key. 
Best truffle pasta I’ve ever had.

Delicious food & great wine in a beautiful venue. 

We were lucky to get a table for 10 out the back with a fantastic view of the harbour. 

Food eaten included truffle pasta (delicious), chicken with dauphinoise potatoes (delicious), tuna tartare (not really enjoyed), plus an excellent gluten-free chocolate cake. We had the cheapest wine (38 Euros) and it was very good.

Great for coffee and breakfast looking over the street or the best meal through the other side looking over the harbour. We ate here in the evening and in have to say it is a great meal at a price that is excellent value. The location makes it. Staff are a delight and remember you every time. Bread and olives go down well here with a cold drink and for an evening meal the squid and new potatoes was ample and delicious. The risotto was incredible and gave us all black tongues! You will not be disappointed here.

Absolutely incredible food, atmosphere and staff. There were no tables available when we arrived but we were invited to wait in comfy chairs with a drink before being led to a table on the terrace with a beautiful view of the port and old ships. Our Waiter, Marijo, was kind, knowledgeable and really attentive and tailored our experience so well. 100% recommend

We went to this restaurant in 3 with a 3-year-old 

The welcome was very warm! Pencils and coloring pages for children, this is the only place where there was this intention for children 

The kitchen is great! Everything was very good! Carpaccio, tuna tartare, grilled squid and special tuna dedication! He was really excellent. 

We were lucky without Reservation we could eat without waiting. 

The best restaurant we make in Croatia!

To begin with, we wanted to settle on the terrace, but there was no room. So the waitress invited us to sit inside and wait 30 minutes. So we did so, and then something to drink in the meantime. 
One moment, I accidentally poured my glass of orange juice, and so the waiter brought me another. I was quite surprised when I saw on the Rating that he counted me two (which is very rarely done in France).

Then the waitress came to set us up outside. It had been more than an hour and a quarter waiting instead of 30 minutes as indicated. The time to wait for dishes was also very, very long, plates were very expensive, and not necessarily excellent but not bad. 

To conclude, it was expensive and fair.
Very good restaurant. Well placed with views of the port! The cuttlefish ink risotto was very good, the dessert (flan) also. Staff also very friendly. I recommend!

Simply delicious and great views. The food was the best we have had so far in our 10 day trip in Croatia. The sauces were superb. The duck and tuna were particularly delicious. Portions are on the smaller side. A bonus - the location is great with either views of three water or of the old city center
This restaurant is so wonderful! The views are beautiful and the wait staff is so lovey. Marijo was so kind to us! Definitely recommend.
A must go to in Dubrovnik. Marijo was an excellent host and even gave us free tickets to the wine museum. The food and drinks were exceptional.

Obren gave us amazing service. He was knowledgable in the dishes and very tentative. The food was outstanding and I even told my friend I wanted to eat here every night of our trip. I highly recommend the truffle & mushroom pasta.

What a beautiful place for lunch!
We had mussels, olives and bread to start. The mussels in white wine were amazing 💕
Our waitress was lovely and helpful.
Views of the sea were gorgeous but we chose to sit further back as cooler.
Great food and drink and would thoroughly recommend.
The food is delicious and the view is great! Marijo Krkic is good. It was a great time! The Black Resort and the Triple Pasta are delicious!

It's delicious, and it looks good. It's also delicious.
Everything I ate was delicious.
Try the same picture and you won't fail.
It's good for major sightseeing.
If you go to the walk-in and reserve your seat next day by the sea, you can have a good place.
Marijo is friendly!
We had a very nice evening at this restaurant. The food was great and so was the service of our waiter Obren! I recommend it for sure.

All food was so delicious.
Obren made our dinner more happier!
Everything was perfect. 
During our trip in Croatia, the best restaurant was here!
We came here for dinner and it did not disappoint! The view was incredible and our waiter Obren was extremely attentive and kind. The food was delicious, a perfect evening.

I pre booked this about 6 weeks beforehand as I’d read it’s extremely popular and gets very booked up! We were greeted by very friendly staff and swiftly taken to our table which I had pre booked the terrace looking out to the sea. Was a lovely table.
What would say is the portions are very generous and we shared 2 starts between 4 which was still a lot of food but nonetheless very delicious. We had the beef carpaccio to start and would highly recommend.
Overall was a lovely experience and would definitely go back

We loved our experience at Gradska. Obren was a delight and had the best energy. My burger was cooked to perfection and was very meaty and delicious. I highly recommend this restaurant if you’re ever in Dubrovnik!

This was a beautiful spot nearby the water with a fantastic view. Our waiter Obren was amazing and very attentive, always greeting us with a smile. The food was delicious along with a great atmosphere. Great stop to visit in Dubrovnik!

Friendly and good food, very popular, had to wait 45 mins to get a table, drinks took a long time as so busy. Food was good 7/10 for food 9/10 for presentation ordered a glass or red wine and the American waitresses brought me white

Beautiful restaurant with an amazing view. Service was good and quick. Nice breeze coming from the bay into the restaurant. Tourist prices compared to other popular US cities but the views make up for it. Food was excellent and tasty.

One of the best breakfasts I’ve ever had, and such great value. They could charge twice as much and it would be still worth it. Also had dinner here and it was the best meal we’ve had in Europe on this trip

Stopped in for a late lunch and was mightily impressed with the humour, friendliness, helpfulness, and professionalism of the staff from the time we arrived. Everything was exceptional. I had tuna, friend had gnocchi. Both were exceptional, as was everything during this wonderful experience. Incredible location. Prices very reasonable, considering the first class experience. Thankyou, it was a highlight!
Good food, good service, wonderful view. Menu and list of wines very similar to those of Panorama, since they are of the same group, but loses, and a lot, in all respects.
The best restaurant we visited in Dubrovnik. We had the most delicious meal. Marijo was particularly attentive and provided the best service. This place is a must visit if in Dubrovnik.

An excellent restaurant. It is our favourite restaurant in Dubrovnik. The service and the food was incredible. We went twice during our stay. We tried sea bass, squid and black risotto (amazing). All were very very delicious. The price is reasonable considering the location and being in Dubrovnik. Go and try you will not regret it.
Excellent restaurant, we stayed 2 times in 3 days during our stay in Dubronvik! Professional service, good choice of wine and if you like tuna, do not hesitate to take this plate!
Stunning views of the small harbour. Impeccable service. Excellent food. Strong advice. The most beautiful place in Dubrovnik.

During our stay in the city, we had the pleasure of eating at this restaurant which has a nice view of the main square. The qualified staff of both the dining room and the kitchen. It is definitely a property that has a medium-high price range but it is worth eating their dishes. Recommendation.

Great food and ambience. Outdoor seating was lovely and had a relaxed feel. Food was great quality and big portions. They also had fans blowing cool air on the terrace so was comfortable on a summer evening

A fabulous place: the restaurant is on a terrace overlooking the old town harbor. We had not been able to book, but the staff very kindly welcomed us at the bar and after 30 min. ca. we had our table. High quality food and service. I chose a fish soup (Fish Stew): simply fabulous! Prices are in the mid-high range, but fully responsive to the location, service and food served.

We came for our 25th wedding anniversary & were so spoilt! Roberto looked after us so well & had great knowledge of the food & wine & made great recommendations. The view was beautiful, on the terrace, & made the whole night so special. The special dessert toppped off the night. Highly recommend visiting this restaurant.
Obren, Mario and Ivan were so lovely! Best waiters ever :) the service is good here, highly recommend! Good food as well!
We stopped in here to escape the hear and get a drink. It has a lovely view of the harbour. Particularly great service from Obren!
The most magical restaurant! Excellent food, amazing staff, beautiful back ground music and wonderful atmosphere. The view over the harbour is amazing and it’s the best restaurant in Dubrovnik!

Stunning location over waterfront. Nice music entertainment in background. Food was AMAZING- have tried to recreate the fish parcel dish at home but will never be as good as the way they prepared it! 

Recommend turning up & putting your name on waiting list. Sit at their bar for 30-45 mins, enjoy a nice drink and the atmosphere & wait for a table to become free for dinner
The restaurant has an amazing view and brilliant service. The food is also lovely. Roberto and the team are really welcoming and friendly. Highly recommend.
Amazing food and excellent service from Roberto! Definitely recommend coming! Sat outside with excellent views and cocktails!
Marijo delivered our favorite meal in Dubrovnik! Service was through the roof - amazing oysters, mussels and tuna tartare. I had the sea bass for my main and would highly recommend
Fantastic place to dine in Dubrovnik! The food is high quality and the service is great. Marijo provided awesome service, make sure you ask for him if you can!

Food: incredible. Please try the sea bass as well as the mussels are a must. The cocktails: delectable. So delicate and the cold drinks kept us afloat in the heat. Marino was a fantastic server as well

What an amazing place! All of the seafood was extremely fresh, the veal was extremely tender and the cocktails are bright and boozy. Marijo was the best waiter, super friends and provided recommendations for our time in Dubrovnik. I highly recommend this place even if it’s in a touristy area. You need to come here!!
Marijo was outstanding! He went above and beyond during dinner and also provided recommendations for after. Highly recommend!

Marijo is the best one, he make us feel super comfortable with his service 
also the best view in dubrovnik and food is delicious
we have a very fun time with my friends marimar ana regina melissa valeria maitane natalia manuela 
i will completely recommended it

really tasty food and great service!
Marijo a great waiter!! (GOAT)
the sailor style risotto was incredible!!
Best view in old town and the place is really pretty!

일단 밥이 맛있습니다.. 와인도 디집니다..
웨이터가 너모 친절합니다.. roberto 너무 친절함

Very nice meal,with nice view also nice person when you come DU you have to take a meal here

Very nice food with beautiful view and nice staff. Especially, Roberto is so kind. 
Squid is so soft and the flavor of all food is excellent.

The harbour is such a lovely place to look out onto when dining and we were really fortunate to get a table in a prime spot. However eating inside would be fabulous too as it’s such an elegant and airy space. The staff were friendly and efficient, and the menu offers a good selection of food and drinks. The oysters were excellent, and the sailor’s risotto was delicious. Highly recommended.

We rarely return to a restaurant when holidays are short and you are in a city full of excellent dining options but we revisited three times.

The Orlando breakfast is superb, quality of the bacon, sausages and beans exceptional. 

Salad lunch quite the most relaxing affair, sit on the cool harbour side to feel the breeze and sit by the fan to watch the boat mayhem of this thriving harbour or sit cathedral side to people watch.

Great service, you can get a Dubrovnik pass discount too, just an all round excellent food venue right in the heart of the city. Excellent value.
Nemanja, Davor and Obren were the most attentive staff. The food is extraordinary and the view is unbeatable! This restaurant has been my favourite spot to visit.
Excellent food. Not cheap but worth the price. The bread selection was a dream. The salad with burrata fresh with good dressing. The duck just right!
Very nice! Great view on the water and food was amazing! Staff was very kind and helpful- shoutout Roberto. Will defiantly be back
The food was amazing! I got the sea bass and it was delicious. Roberto was very helpful and the ambience was wonderful. 10/10 recommend.

This restaurant was phenomenal! We started with the cheese board then each of our entrees were delicious (steak tuna, sea bass, chicken, gnocchi with bourbon, and sailors risotto). Our server Roberto gave excellent recommendations! It was an incredibly lovely dinner sitting out on their terrace, overlooking the water.
Amazing views and amazing food ! Marijo was very attentive and funny ! Would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik

Very good restaurant with a superb view from the terrace at the back on the port and castle. Good Value for Award. Marijo, our waiter, was very friendly and smiling and even made the effort to speak a few words of French. We went without Reservation and waited 40 minutes sipping a cocktail so book a Trip Tip.
Obren provided amazing service and made us feel like home away from our home! Food was amazing! Spectacular view! Definitely will be back! Highly recommend.

Obren served us for dinner and was an amazing server, he was so lovely. The food was absolutely beautiful with a great view. The octopus salad and mussels were delicious. Obren made our night fantastic

We walked by and decided to have dinner here. Obviously we didn't have a reservation. We were informed it would be a 30 min wait and we were welcome to go in to have a drink and enjoyed some live piano music while we waited. Rather than go look for another restaurant we decided to take the offer. Well 30 min became 60 min and then 75 min. After some inquiries we finally got a table at the edge of the terrace overlooking the port. It was in my opinion the best seat in the house!

Great ambience. The food was beautifully presented and tasted even better. The service was a bit inconsistent and slow at times, but overall we really had no complaints.

It was a perfect & memorable way to end our busy day in the old city.

Great place, tasty food, really nice service! 
I ordered a coffee and Eggs Benedict, they gave us additional free bread, jam, chocolate and butter. 
The atmosphere was also really nice
Very good restaurant, excellent seating, beatiful terrace, exceptional food wines and service. Strongly recommended

Exceptional, place, service, food... the night place magical and quieter 
So good we went back for lunch the next day...
Divine Carpaccio super recommended

My partner and I got up early to walk the city walls then headed to this beautiful little place on the harbour to watch the world go by as we had a spot for breakfast. The staff were very attentive and the food was excellent. Highly recommended.

This is a wonderful restaurant with a scenic view of the bay. My partner and I sat at the edge of the terrace facing the coast. Excellent service from Stjepan, excellent food. The Amberjack sea fennel risotto with capers is a must try. A uniquely simple, yet delicious dish with a crust on the amberjack that would have me travel back to this restaurant alone. Thank you, again, Stjepan for your excellent hospitality and service.

We had dinner with a great view out to the port. The service was excellent, and the food was beautifully presented and well cooked with a thoughtful blend of flavours. A really good experience, and refreshingly cool in the evening.
Perfect dinner for our first night in Dubrovnik! Mario our waiter was incredibly attentive and friendly. Would 100% return.

Spectacular restaurant: views, food, wine, service, overall ambiance. The truffle pasta and gnocchi were delicious! Thank you Marijo for your hospitality and lovely treat at the end of our dinner. Highly recommend!
I had a delicious and scenic dinner with my husband and baby here. Our waiter, Obren, was amazing and made our experience impeccable. Would highly recommend for a nice dinner in the old city.

This place is perfect place. 
Perfect view, friendly staff, perfect foods. Especially Marijo was so friendly to us. He asked my home country and he tried to speak korean. Thank you for your service!

The food tantalised our taste buds. All our meals were superior. The wait staff are all polite and friendly. Nemana was our waiter. He is a kind, delightful and helpful waiter. His smile is a winner. Thank you for a wonderful experience.

Amazing Staff and amazing food 10/10
Nemanda was a great staff member he was very friendly whilst also great at his job!!

Eveything was amazing truffle pasta wow 
Excellent service by Nemana wow 
Eveything was amazing truffle pasta wow
Eveything was amazing truffle pasta wow

A lovely dinner with a beautiful view! We didn’t have a reservation but was able to get a great walk in table for two at 6pm. Our lovely server, Bero, recommended some great dishes and we loved it all! Would definitely return :)

Magnificent place, attention to every detail. Stunning view. Very romantic place. The waiter who served us was very kind and very professional. Excellent food the best place we ate in Croatia and I must say it has nothing to envy to Italian restaurants. Average price, but also low quality I would say. I recommend it

We enjoyed a great evening at the restaurant this weekend.
Great service from the team members.
Very welcoming.
Lovely setting, right by the Old Town harbour.
Lovely choice of food, all presented with flair.
I especially enjoyed the sea bass cooked in the paper envelope.
Definitely worth a visit!

Nothing is labelled as vegetarian on the menu, I had the truffle and mushroom pasta which was nice but a bit sickly towards the end. There is nothing else at all on the evening menu for vegetarians or vegans. It’s such a shame as the restaurant itself looks stunning and I would expect more choices for veggies at a high end restaurant like this.
Lovley location for dinner. Davor was very attentive. Amazing Hugo Spritz. We would lucky to get a table late afternoon but book in advance for evening meals.

Book really far in advance so you can request a table with a sea view on the terrace. The ambience was magical with a live piano player in the background. My husband and I shared the truffle pasta as a starter and then followed with the tuna - both were incredible. Then we had both types of chocolate mousse cakes and they too were insanely good. I wish we ate there twice!

If you have the Dubrovnik pass, you get 10% off your bill and you can still pay by credit card.

The place is really magnificent, with the tables of the bar overlooking the Piazza della Loggia and the tables of the restaurant on the ancient Arsenal. The service is efficient, given the large number of patrons. I tried to book dinner to no avail a month earlier, but eventually managed to find a place for lunch by showing up at noon.
The food is of good quality: the vegetables were fresh, the cuttlefish tasty, the risotto tasty but unfortunately suffers from the habit (I think recent) of flavoring with cheese (in this case a little pecorino was used; in the original recipe instead I think it used only mascarpone), the rozata turned out to be a delicious orange pudding.
The price is fair considering the beauty of the place.
Absolutely delicious. A cool oasis from a hot day. Atmosphere was incredible. Highly recommend for a lunch or dinner away from the crowds

During our week long stay in Dubrovnik we visited this restaurant 4 times. On the second visit the staff remembered us instantly and gave us a lovely warm welcome. The staff are all professional, friendly & efficient & make the whole experience enjoyable. I left a dress I’d purchased under the table at 11.30pm and didn’t realise until I returned to our hotel. The staff at our hotel phoned the restaurant and they couldn’t find it (they were looking on the sea terrace). We went back the next morning just in case they found it, only to discover they had & had returned it to our hotel late that evening! Incredible & kind service. Never have I been to a restaurant or city that is so safe! Thank you all so much. We’ll be back again very soon. You’re amazing!

We ate at this great restaurant for two consecutive days.
It overlooks the old port of Dubrovnik with views of the pleasant activities that take place there throughout the lunch period. Superb everything we have optioned, especially risotto with cuttlefish ink and seafood followed by grilled squid with a side of extremely spicy potatoes and octopus salad with a mix of capers red onion and other herbs with a special flavor.
Very special food also for us Italians who are very demanding in terms of cuisine.
All served by extremely good staff and attentive to the needs of us users. Special thanks to the waiter Mario who followed us with extreme professionalism. Too bad to have discovered it in the last two days of stay in this pearl of Croatia, so if you are around here do not be enchanted by the other offers in the area but slingshot without thinking about it by Gradisca Kavana Arsenal.
Darko was a fantastic, professional and very knowledgeable person! We really enjoyed the food and the service! Thank you

Unbelievable, ambience and views of the sea. Beautiful open space with impeccable service. Great menu with a variety of local dishes. Recommend the fish soup, truffle pasta, and Seabass wrapped in parchment. When you were there, ask for the general manager blaze. A wonderfully friendly man I will get you a nice table with a great view.
Great food with an amazing view. Great wines, black risotto is very good and good music... Brazilian!!! Worth a visit.
Fabulous service from Josip who was efficient and super friendly. He kindly helped with some great recommendations. Excellent seafood and wine, lovely old town location. 10/10 people watching spot.

Such a nice experience, worth it every euro.
The food is delicious, the staff is friendly and the atmosphere is very good.
We thought of coming again, but unfortunately it was full and we didn't have a reservation.
I recommend it to everyone.
If you want the best view, service, food and drink, come here! Bero served us and he was excellent, friendly and efficient! You must also try the dessert!

The most beautiful breakfast and dinner spot. We came for a coffee and drink at midday, and then came back for dinner. The staff were so lovely, in particular Bero, was the most wonderful atmosphere and delicious food, drinks and coffee! Must do when in Dubrovnik
Amazing amazing food, service and view. You cannot get better than this spot when visiting Dubrovnik. Bero was the most lovely and fun waiter, we all loved him so much
This was the most beautiful restaurant we have been to in all of Croatia! Our waiter, Dero was so accommodating and attentive. The mushroom risotto is a must, as well as the strawberry spritz.
Such amazing service! We felt extremely special and we loved our waiter Beto! Make sure to try the cheesecake because it was delicious!
Absolutely gorgeous dinner! Our last evening here, and it will be a memory we cherish forever. The food was amazing, and the service was delightful.

Very accommodating of our walk in and even had a place for us to sit inside and have a drink while waiting for a table. Food and service were top notch. We got a bottle of white wine, bread basket, burrata, black risotto, and a special pasta with tomato sauce. Everything was excellent and I thought prices were reasonable for a place of this quality. The views were beautiful and the wait staff were incredibly attentive and personable.

Excellent view food and service. Rale was incredible. Fast, friendly and full of good conversation. Squid ink risotto, octopus salad and sea bass in bag were all among the best dishes we have had in Croatia

We came here after reading the great reviews of others. Slightly skeptical given the location right in the middle given generally tend to avoid those ‘tourist traps’ but this place was great. Cheese plate, truffle and mushroom pasta and steak both recommended!

I had visited this restaurant over 10 years ago and returning to Dubrovnik I wanted to go back for the seafood. I sent a reservation request and we had the best table overlooking the harbour. I opted for entree of breads, olives and oils etc. Lovely. For main I had an Octopus salad. Fresh and if anything too much octopus! Topped off with a glass of white wine it was just the most perfect lunch location. Smart waiters that were just the right balance of attentive. Can not fault. A highlight of my little trip down memory lane.
