Wow!!! What a place. The view was perfect and the food was absolutely amazing .The customer service is second to none. The best we’ve had in Croatia so far. Thank you Erman for your amazing service. Will definitely recommend!!!
Excellent. Lovely happy people !!!!!!!!!! Good great but rather expensive. Drink a bit small and view outdtsnding….. thank you

My sister and I came here on our last night in Dubrovnik and it was an amazing experience. Our waiter Robert was wonderful, the view was perfect especially as the sun was setting and the food was so tasty! Would recommend to anyone!
This places is great for a nice dinner. The atmosphere was so beautiful especially, as the restaurant overlooked the water. Would recommend the seafood risotto. It was delicious.
Excellent view of the Old Port in Dubrovnik. Good atmosphere with live piano. Great service from Marijo. Great food - had fish stew and duck, duck was a must try.
The food was really good with an amazing view of the water. There was a live pianist whilst we had dinner, Great atmosphere! Our Server Marijo was super lovely!
Excellent service from Nemanja...he was attentive and accommodating to our needs. I would love to have him part of my team.

Delicious dinner, we shared the octopus salad and cuttlefish risotto. The octopus was tender, not over cooked and the risotto was delicious. Our server Robert was also great and the view of the port in the back is beautiful.
The atmosphere was unparalleled and the service exquisite. Ivan was the best! The views were everything and made the drinks thrice as refreshing. Best first evening in a Dubrovnik

Beautiful views, amazing food and cocktails and the best service from Robert!

Highly recommend visiting if you’re in Old Town.

We went to Lokrum mid afternoon and finished our day off with food and drinks in the marina.

The seafood risotto was the best meal I had in old town 😄
Brilliant spot with amazing views and great food, Robert was very attentive and provided great food recommendations.

We came here twice for dinner with Obren as our server and he was excellent! So good we came back for breakfast the next day and had great service from Dzoni, and Obren also again. Made our time enjoyable and the food and scenery was excellent!
Extremely rude and poor service. We were pointedly ignored and waiters just looked "the other way". Service was surly and unfriendly.
The service and food were the best we had while in Dubrovnik. My tuna was amazing. It is in a very touristy location but they have not abused that, they still provide excellent food.
What to say. Words are not enough to describe how is this place. Exceptional food, service, beautiful terraces. Definitely the best in old town.

We saw several amazing reviews for this place and decided to stop by - we weren't disappointed! We had an amazing dinner overlooking the square and Robert was the most attentive waiter. He recommended an amazing wine, and the sea bass and duck we ordered were the best food we've had on this trip. Every server was extremely helpful and friendly. Definitely stop by!

What an amazing restaurant and experience! Perfectly situated and the food blew our minds! The layers of flavor were amazing (I had the duck and my friend had the sea bass). Robert was a gracious host and so friendly, explaining the menu and answering any questions we had. Highly recommend!
It was a very excellent time. The whiskey sour was to die for I could drink 100. Robert was a very excellent man. Great service big smile, clean shave very handsome.
Great food. Draco very nice server! I will be coming back in Dubrovnik to eat here. Also very nice atmosphere. Highly recommended
Very nice location on the harbor.Very friendly staff with professional service. The food and the recommended wine were delicious. Fair price / quality.

This restaurant could be described as a hidden gem. The exterior facing the square looks quite ordinary but go through to the back and you find a delightful restaurant with a wonderful view of harbour and sea. Food is great too and reasonably priced. The staff are friendly and go out of their way to explain things and make sure you’re happy. We’ve booked to return on our last night in Dubrovnik later in the week.
Amazing experience, amazing food and amazing service. The place is beautiful, family friendly and they have a big variety of drinks and food.
Great service from our waiter, very rich food, a rather cozy and quite calm place, located in a lovely place with great view.

Excellent food, service and location
Stefan our waiter was great - helped us choose our food, all of which was delicious. Rose wine and as a good choice too. We even had complementary puddings. We’d booked a few weeks in advance but could only have a lunch sitting but did get the waterside table we requested

I booked ahead for lunch here and as it was my husband’s birthday, requested a table with a sea view if possible. When we arrived we were shown to one in a fabulous position overlooking the old harbour. This restaurant is wonderful! The service is excellent and the food delicious and reasonably priced. We would highly recommend!
Brilliant experience in this restaurant. Good food, good view, good vibe. And excellent service by staff Obren. Highly recommend.
Lovely food with wonderful environment. The site was stunning. Obren our waiter was great with a sweet smile. The cocktail was nicely done.

What a find!!! It is perfect for morning coffee, cake, snacks, lunch, dinner or a glass of beer/wine. The quality of the food and drink is very high. The Staff are very friendly and genuinely welcoming and really appreciate your business. Even when it is busy the Staff take time to make sure everything is perfect… 

We were only in Dubrovnik for the day (on a cruise) we visited twice in the same day, as it was so good… 

 A special personal thank you to Josip and Maria who served us… they cannot do enough for you. Service with a smile! We have been to Dubrovnik lots of times before… and this is the best Cafe/Restaurant we have visited. 

Location… It’s right at the side of the church St. Blair’s & near the Orlando statue. 

We will be back!!! Highly recommend a visit…
We had such an amazing lunch here. Our waiter Obren was amazing, very fast and friendly! Very good service and all of the food was great! Beautiful view, and over all amazing experience.
Our waiter Obren was amazing. Excellent service and incredible food. Spectacular views and good people. Love this place, will be back!!!
Obren was a great help! And the food was delicious! Great views and rustic ambience! A must visit if you’re in Dubrovnik!

It’s a beautiful location, but it is a real shame to have rude waiters serving you as this makes the whole experience completely different. Who wants to have to bear rude waiters on a Sunday morning ? No one 

All waiters (men) were beyond rude not to say disrespectful (not one better than the other). They feel annoyed for every reminder you give for every item they forgot to bring. They keep avoiding people and tables and you need to call them 3 times to have someone coming. They all look at you in the eyes and make you wait. 
If you’re not happy to be working, please avoid putting that on us.

By far the most professional, kind yet speedy staff in Dubrovnik. Food is great value (we had the truffle mushroom pasta, which had the perfect amount of truffle taste (if you know you know), and the atmosphere both inside and outside is outstanding. We were not able to get a reservation as they were fully booked for the next month, but did a drop-in anyways and was able to get a seat overlooking the shore. Must visit!!

Absolutely super experience, both food, beverages and service. Lovely people working there! And an incredibly nice spot out to the water if you choose to sit inside / towards the sea. Recommend on the strongest!!

Me and my partner came here for breakfast twice in a row and was served by the lovely Darko. Couldn’t recommend the place, views and staff enough. The most gorgeous place we’ve ever been to for breakfast.

We had tuna tartar and beef carpaccio for appetizers, both delicious. Followed by squid and fish, both dishes are "classics", however they had a unique spin on it, sweet and savory taste, both lovely elevated. We loved the food, ambient and the staff was very kind. Will be back if we visit Dubrovnik again.

Slow service. Waiters were very slow to take the order. Hostess ignored calling the waiter over despite being requested. Food very average and overrated. ‘Bacon’ was just fat! The cook hid it under the sausages so you couldn’t see when the food was first delivered. There are better places in Dubrovnik with better food and friendlier vibes.

We tried to book in advance but were told fully booked. Thus, we walked in and luckily table was available. We tried fish soup, grill squid, truffle spaghetti. All were very tasty and delicious. Strongly recommended to have reservation in advance. 
If you had ice cream at the shop outside Pile Gate entrance, you would have a 10% discount coupon to dining here.

Recommend booking a table if you can! We tried Thursday night of our holiday and there was an hour waiting list, Friday no tables and hour + long waiting list... Saturday we hit the jackpot. They said there would be appox 30 mins to wait for a table, and so we sat with cocktail in the lounge by the piano and trumpet player, before we had even finished our drinks we were seated on the port side of the restaurant with a stunning view 

Food was impeccable, we had the dalmatia cured ham starter to share, then 3 of us ordered beef steak, duck, and gnocchi dishes, all of which were delicious and washed down with a local down and after dinner liqueur. 

Would 100% recommend as the service was top tier and the whole experience a delight

We ate here after walking The Wall. It was a delightful, delicious respite after a hot walk. The food was fresh and well presented and Rale was an attentive and fun waiter! Reasonably priced (for Dubrovnik) with beautiful waterfront views! Highly recommend!
Fantastic view, atmosphere, food and service! Rale provides wonderful and personal service. Stop by if you are looking for a good meal and experience!
Definitely a good recommendation from a local taxi driver! Other than being served great food, the ambiance is amazing. Its a bit expensive but Id suggest you go at least once when in Dubrovnik.
Delicious food and a beautiful view of the sea and surrounding hills. The staff were friendly. Overall a very nice experience.

An amazing place to have dinner in the heart of Dubrovnik old town. The service and ambience were exceptional. A special thank you to Mario and Robert who made our dining experience very memorable. Highly recommend.
Amazing food and fantastic service from marijo would recommend for the perfect meal in the perfect setting. Will definitely be back.
Great experience a most while in Dubrovnik, we order the tuna and the duck both dishes were delicious, excellent service from Stjepan
The back patio looked out to the port and it was a perfect place to enjoy an aperol spritz! Our server Marijo was great and the chicken salads were delish.

Tried to get reservations in advance, but they were booked. Suggested I try to walk in and see if tables were available and we were successful mid day.
Excellent views from plaza or marina/walls. Many options and helpful, attentive staff.
We choice the mushroom truffle risotto and a side order of grilled vegetables. Soo good the table next to us ordered the same dishes.
Beautiful presentation and great flavor. Reasonable prices and excellent wine.

Amazing spot with an amazing view of the harbour on the edge of Dubrovnik Old Town. 

Does book up very quickly so book well in advance but they do also talk walk ins but you may need to wait in the lounge area for a while but you can get drinks. 

The food was incredible, slightly on the pricier side but it was worth every euro! 

Good variety of food and drinks.

Excellent spot for a special dinner, great food and ambience. Somewhat irritating however is current policy of not taking bookings for couples (they do for groups). On first visit we did manage to get straight in. Second time, our last night in Dubrovnik, we had a 35 minute wait - admittedly softened by having a comfortable seat, drinking at the bar. However, accepting a booking would have been better.

Best spot in old town for seaside dinner! The black risotto is top notch, but also the seared tuna is a must-order. Can’t go wrong; worth splurging for the bottle of Prosecco too! Oh and Bero was top notch service; very thankful he recommended the tuna!

We waited 30 mins for a table outside next to the harbour. Whilst we waited the waitress recommended and served us a bottle of local wine. Once seated we had a wonderful view and ambience. Food and wine was excellent and reasonably priced. I recommend the Fishmans risotto. Service very good.

Our evening at Gradska Restaurant in Dubrovnik was truly exceptional! Located in the heart of the city, this gem offers stunning views of the historic Old Town. The atmosphere is both elegant and cozy, making it the perfect spot for a memorable meal. The fresh seafood was a highlight – the octopus salad and grilled Adriatic fish were cooked to perfection. The service was outstanding, with attentive and knowledgeable staff who made our experience even more special. We left Gradska thoroughly impressed and eagerly planning our return. A must-visit for anyone in Dubrovnik!

Loved this place's cappuccino! I returned to the Gradska Kavana several times during my few days in Dubrovnik. I'll gladly return the next time I'm in Dubrovnik.

Every time I went, I got seated on the front patio, near the Rector's Palace. You get a great view of the people wandering by (I saw not one, but two wedding parties!), and the surrounding buildings are simply beautiful, historic buildings.

The staff were all very helpful and friendly. I liked them all very much.

I ordered several drinks, including the best cappuccinos I had in Croatia, and aperitifs with sparkling wine. All were excellent. 

This is a great place to unwind and relax and enjoy this great town!
A special Saturday evening with great food, wine, service and views. Turned up on spec and they fitted us in. A very relaxing evening
One of the best experience in Dubrovnik. The service team is awesome! Young dynamic and good looking servants. LOL Highly recommended.

Gorgeous food, impeccable service and I love the Croatian white wine! Beautiful baby potatoes and steak and the pianist and trumpeter played beautifully. We felt like we’re in a bygone era. Thank you!

Wonderful generous breakfast! Yes it is a bit pricey but Dubrovnik Old Town is. We were lucky enough to get the perfect table with the most beautiful view. It was the perfect way to start a magical 3 days in Dubrovnik. Staff are also great.

One of the best views of the harbor in old city! Very reasonably priced for what feels like an expensive atmosphere, good portion sizes too! The wait staff was so friendly and the service was very fast but we never felt rushed. Would highly recommend! We were even treated with free wine and cheesecake at the end. Robe was our server and he couldn’t have been any more accommodating or helpful! Best meal we had in Croatia!

Fantastic restaurant located by the water with a dining area facing the water or a raised terrace in the main square. Service was impeccable as was the food. Considering the location and service it was very reasonably priced. Would definitely recommend

Marija was amazing! She had great recommendations (the sea bass and chicken were incredible with her wine choices) and very friendly and kind. 

She was attentive, kind, knowledgeable on the menu and took great care of me!

Will be back again!

Beautiful restaurant with the most amazing view over the harbour and inside a historic Venetian arsenal. Staff and service (including by our waiter Stjepan) is unusually helpful and kind and they do their best to accommodate everyone on a waitlist despite being fully booked. The food we ordered (seafood risotto and truffle mushroom linguine) was very good especially the risotto. Strawberry infused Aperol Spritz was lovely.
This spot is great for breakfast and evening meal. The waiters are friendly and extremely helpful. I would definitely recommend

Make sure to sit out back by the water. Incredible experience. Beautiful atmosphere and ambiance. Live music, great vide. The menu had something for everybody and the food was excellent. I had the veal and it was some of the that I’ve ever had. Very friendly staff, attentive. Highly recommend.

Deserves to be in the top 10. Great place for breakfast with decent prices. They have seating in back with a view of the harbor that is actually better. Wait staff were excellent! They provided a side of arugula to go with my eggs sunny side up!
This was such a treat on our first night in Dubrovnik! The view, drinks, and food were incredible. Our server Bero recommended wonderful dishes and wine. We will be back (hopefully)!
Restaurant has a great view of the port, perfect for a romantic dinner, has live piano music and a varied menu.

Lucky to have seaside seats without a booking!

Very nice environment & ambience

Food was fair (oyster: too small; squid: very good; seafood bowl: below average)

Excellent meal in beautiful surroundings. The food was perfect and I can highly recommend the black risotto. The chocolate mousse was to die for. Obren (I think that's how it's spelt) our waiter was informative and friendly. Perfect evening meal for a perfect day in dubrovnik.
We came here for dinner and drinks and were blown away by the beauty of the terrace! Marijo was an excellent waiter and answered all of our questions to help us have a great meal. Highly recommend.

Go to the sea terrace, stunning view of the Dubrovnik coastline and harbor. Marijo was a fantastic server, very knowledgeable about the menu and extremely personable. I ordered the tuna and it was cooked perfectly. 10/10, highly recommend for the view, food, and service.
Incredible view and excellent food! Marijo was an excellent server and gave us great recommendations. We got the tuna steak and two side salads, which was perfect for a light meal after a long day!

Obren and Ana the service was amazing, the food superb, the location, the view, white linen, etc., everything! Must try the duck and the sauce!! Best I’ve had. I would definitely come again and recommend to anyone.

Lovely spot overlooking the water. We had a late lunch after arriving from the UK and the food was great. Both had steak sandwich and local beer. Service was very friendly but professional . This place lives up to the reviews.
Everything was so good! We had the best time! We walked in with 7 people and were seated immediately. Our waiter Marijo made it such a fun night! Would highly recommend!
This restaurant was absolutely the best place in Dubrovnik. Marijo was our waiter and he was very helpful and kind! Very great food and drinks - really recommend!

I went here for dinner on a tried with my friends and we had the greatest service, food, time, and atmosphere!! Marijo was an incredible server and gave us great recommendations while also creating a fun dining experience!! Highly recommend.
Marijo waited on our group of 7 friends and was the absolute best! Our experience was better because of him. We all were also very pleased with all of the food and the cocktails were fabulous!
Obren was such an amazing host and we had such an amazing time. The food was so tasty and the atmosphere was incredible. The restaurant was truly one of the best I have ever been to.

We had the best experience. Obren was our waiter and he was absolutely amazing. He was so friendly and explained all of the food options. We had the best time and I came for my birthday where we were then surprised with a dessert. Highly recommend if you are in Dubrovnik.

5 out of 5. Restaurant is situated with a fabulous view. Ambiance was beautiful with piano playing in the background. 
Waiter “Obren” was very attentive and polite.
Food was perfectly presented and deciduous.

The restaurant, located seaside in the old town, offers a very nice view.

The black risotto is the most delicious in Croatia and definitely worth trying. 

The service is also very nice.

We chose this restaurant as we had planned a stay in Dubrovnik for our wedding anniversary. Everything was perfect from the start, with a table overlooking the harbour, excellent service from the staff and dishes to die for (beef carpaccio, sea bass and tuna steaks) with a complimentary chocolate dessert and drinks for our anniversary at the end. A fantastic evening, one of the best meals we’ve ever had.

Excellent food, service by Mariata, and the view was unbelievable 
Tucked behind the main drag so you feel like it is a hidden gem.

Absolutely beautiful first dinner of our holiday tonight at Arsenal! Walked in at half past 8 (without a reservation!) and were seated at the very front with a gorgeous night view of the port. We’ve been wined and dined by Obren whose been the perfect waiter and honestly think we’ve peaked on our trip already🤣 I’m also a coeliac and they had plenty of gluten free options for me to enjoy so I was lucky enough to have the Seabass and rosemary potatoes. 10/10 evening And I’d absolutely come here again🥰

This restaurant has an excellent setting by the harbour, and quality food to match. It’s no wonder it’s always busy. We tried to reserve a table before our arrival in Dubrovnik, but were told they were fully booked for nearly the next two weeks!! Nevertheless, we turned up early one evening to see if we could do a walk-in, and were promptly seated at a table with a good view out to the harbour! Service was professional and friendly, and the food was great ( burger, fish stew and tagliatelle were the three dishes ordered). Price-wise, very good, considering the prime setting. Worth a look in, even just for drinks, if you’re in Dubrovnik.
Trip May 2024. We had brunch and the eggs Royal were by far the best we've ever had. Croissants and rolls, medium. They could do better. The point is unique!

We had looked at the reviews and chose this restaurant based on them. We weren’t disappointed. A wonderful ambiance and atmosphere welcomed us. The staff were very attentive without being overbearing. The food was the best we have had in a long time. We had a wonderful evening and would return if we visited Dubrovnik again.

Be sure to make a reservation as this is a very busy restaurant. 

Views are right by the water. They have live entertainment at night. 

The octopus salad was delicious but they have a lot of black olives. Tuna tartare had crushed pistachio nuts and was very different but lovely. The seafood risotto was also delicious. Restaurant was very accommodating towards dietary requests.
They oysters were excellent! Robert recommended the cuddle fish risotto and it was fantastic as well. Nothing beats ending the night with Maraska Orahovac, too. Highly recommended!
This was some of the best pasta and sea bass i ever had. Our server Obern was amazing and deserves a raise. Would absolutely come here again
Amazing food. Anton, our waiter was exceptional. The dessert was also amazing. The view is incredible. We would definitely come back.

What a fantastic experience. Here we felt really taken care of. 
While waiting for the table we sat at the bar and had a wonderful good drink, the pianist played a song for us, so romance. 
Then we got a cozy table outside, with a view of the water. 
The service and the waiter were unique. 
It's been a long time since I've experienced being so well taken care of at a restaurant. 
The food is in a class of its own, I ate fish and my husband ate duck, I just say wow as a taste experience. We are very keen on good food and this was really in a class of its own. The wine was lovely, yes everything was perfect. 
Everyone should visit this restaurant.

Ate here for our last meal in Dubrovnik and we were so happy.
Firstly the setting is amazing with stunning views.
Secondly both starter and Mains we had were both beautiful and the service was great too.
They even had a piano playing in the background :)

We had dinner here as a party of 5 couples. Wonderful location right next to the harbour with lovely views. Lovely characterful building using with history. Considering the location, the value was excellent. There was a wide menu. The staff were very friendly and efficient. Excellent food and would certainly recommend.
This place was great!! Such a good vibe and amazing view! Food was delish and the staff was so nice. Miloś was great and had lots of fun with him! Would definitely go again and recommend!!
Amazing restaurant service is excellent a lovely place to sit and people watch we head here when we visit dubrovnik and are treated very well

The most amazing meal in a stunning setting
Every single aspect of this meal was 10 out of 10
Our waiter Davor was so attentive and helped with recommendations 
Definitely the best meal in Dubrovnik 
More expensive than some other restaurants but worth every penny for the quality and experience
The service was excellent, the view wonderful, and the food was great. The octopus salad was so good that we returned the next day for lunch!

Excellent address to enjoy a view of the port.
The service is attentive, friendly and warm.
The cuisine is excellent
Katarina white wine is divine.
We also had breakfast in this restaurant.
Numerous choices and generous plate.
The kindness and good attention of everyone, the food was very good, we ate black risoto, sea bass, and gnochi, for dessert an exquisite cheesecake
Amazing food an ambience! The view was also great by the water. Our server Marijo was so lovely and chatty with great service too, would definitely come back
Marijo was great, extremely attentive to our needs. View was fantastic and ambience is great as well. Food was tasty, would come back again next time i’m in Dubrovnik
Such a good place. The food was absolutely delicious, I got the truffle pasta. Marijo was so lovely, amazing service. Highly recommend!
Marijo provided us great service! Truffle pasta was amazing too:) overall great experience with good views good service and food

Great food and ambiance. Robert provided impeccable service. The tuna steak was fresh and prepared to perfection. Burrata salad beautifully presented, fresh and delicious. The must go restaurant while in Dubrovnik historic center.

We had a very relaxed and enjoyable lunch here. We requested a table with a view at time of booking and got front row overlooking the marina, which was terrific. We had excellent attention from the waiting staff and our food (sea bass and tuna for our mains) was delicious and beautifully presented. Would definitely recommend.
Obren was amazing! Great service and attention. The breakfast was delicious, I order Royal Eggs with smoked salmon and cappuccino.

Everything was incredible, the food was amazing and the attention of Obren was the best! He was very friendly and attentive.
100% recommended

We arrived after breakfast time and the staff, including Obren, were really kind and allowed us to still order from the breakfast menu.

Everything was delicious and the view is stunning!

We had a fabulous lunch on arrival in Dubrovnik. Black cuttlefish risotto is a must try. Beautiful restaurant, great service and amazing food. You can sit on the marina side overlooking the water, the old town side watching people walk by or inside. Wish we were here longer to try dinner here. 5 stars
Obren and Ana are passionate and kind. Place have good view. Highly recommended. It’s a place you must come! Love it and would like to share with others
Lovely view, best food in Dubrovnik. Lovely for a date night. Our waiter Stejepan was really friendly very and excellent service

Obren was a fantastic waiter and the food as ever was exceptional. 
The piano and cello added a beautiful atmosphere. The setting is perfect.
I really love this restaurant, and Marijo krkić was so kind to us, he is humorous and polite !!!!!! I will be there next time!!!!!
Fabulous location on the port. Friendly and efficient staff. We both had the tuna- huge cubes covered in sesame and poppy seeds and cooked to perfection

Worst staff experience at a restaurant in my life.

9:14 pm , Sunday May 19th. Waitress at west entrance had such a bad attitude that we walked right out. Wouldn’t let us look at the desserts.

Came across the restaurant by chance, and whilst outside was fully booked, we got a table just inside by the windows. Good selection of food, and waiter staff happy to provide more assistance on some of the dishes. Definitely worth a visit.

My favorite breakfast experience in Croatia! Sat by the seaside and enjoyed delicious coffee and food while watching the boats dock and gazing at the city walls. Our waiter Obren was extremely nice and helpful, and gave us some local tips! I would recommend to everyone looking for a relaxing morning experience in Old Town Dubrovnik.

The food was really great. We did not have any reservation, but they were so open to get a table very fast and we enjoyed a great food and with an excellent service. 
The best was Zeljko who was always helping us an recommending the beat they have innthe restaurant.

I stopped in here with my family spontaneously for drinks and a light dinner—wow what an experience. Josip was an exceptional waiter. He really went above and beyond in terms of service and hospitality. Thank you for a wonderful time!
Highly recommended spot for local cuisine and people watch. Today’s weather complimented the excellent staff and food.
Amazing food and the view can’t be beat!! Sit in the back on the water! Stjepan was excellent! You get a lot for your money as well!
Really lovely restaurant, great eggs Benedict with a perfect view. Amazing staff (stjepan) and service too. Would highly recommend!
Obren was a fantastic host with lovely recommendations. The view was superb and the eggs Benedict was delish! Would recommend and will be back!
Everything was perfect, including food, servise and price. The ambiance was outstanding. I have never had a better beefsteak. I highly recommend this restaurant.
Obren was a wonderful waiter. The food and wait staff was extremely attentive. The atmosphere and views are worth a stop by!

Delicious food, nice view, and kind server especially mr.Obren. We really had a great time in here and I recommend this place if you visit to Dubrovnik first time!

맛있는 음식, 멋있는 뷰, 그리고 직원들이 너무 친절해요(especially Mr.Obren) 두브로브니크로 여행 
오시는 분들한테 꼭 추천하고 싶은 레스토랑 입미다.
Excellent, relaxed atmosphere, superb view and attentive service from Rale. Delicious chicken with polenta and seafood risotto.
It's the best place for nice view of port. And nice foods and beverage as well. Staff also kind. Especially Rale is very kind for us.🙂

We visited Gradska Kavana Arsenal for breakfast. 

Our online booking was rejected due to being “full” but we walked past and the place was almost empty so we got a table right on the harbour. 

I ordered eggs royale and was hugely disappointed to be served overcooked eggs with hard yolks, which really spoilt the dish. 

Breakfast dishes are served with a bread/pastries basket which is nice touch and could have been great. However the basket is served between two and contained an odd number of items making it impossible to share fairly (3 mini bread rolls between two). The conserves were the best thing but the chocolate spread was poor quality. 

The service was slow and I had to repeatedly ask for milk. By the time the third person asked for bring some (which took a long time) my tea was already cold. 

Would not return or recommend
Excellent food, service and view! Rale was an excellent server explaining the local customs and food. Would highly recommend!!
Best dinner in Dubrovnik. My husband and I shared the Black risotto, grilled squid and octopus salad and it was all perfect. Our waiter Anton did a very good job. We would like to return.
Amazing view and food. Our waiter, Rale, was very kind and had great food and drink recommendations! Also live music during dinner which made the ambience even better :)
Very nice view directly in front of the old harbor and service was excellent (thanks rale). Food was good, cocktail delicious. Atmosphere very pleasant

I chose it for my birthday lunch with a great view, but everything was perfect! The food was delicious, the black risotto is really worth it! The service was impeccable, thank you very much for Josip's attention and care. Great experience in Dubrovnik

We had the truffle pasta and black risotto, and they were fantastic. The side salad and the bread surprised us by how delicious they were, and the bread is made in house and it shows. Džoni took great care of our table and made it a really special experience.

Very nice customer service. The waiter Marijo was amazing, funny, and charming. The food was delicious and the view with the city lights was incredible at night! If you do go, ask for Marijo and you will be sure to have a great time!

A fabulous meal. So beautiful. We are in hospitality in Ireland and know good service and good food. Would highly recommend if you are visiting Dubrovnik! Rale looked after us so well. We celebrate 40 years of marriage and he made it so special!

It was the best meal I had in Dubrovnik. The truffle mushroom pasta is also really flavorful, and the tuna dish with avocado sauce is especially great. hehe
I think I'll find it next time I come again.
And the view from the restaurant here is really great. Eating while looking at the port doubles the taste.
Everything was excellent. The staff was really nice, especially Marijo - He was the best :) We really enjoyed it - Would recommend
We had some coffee on the beautiful terrace with a nice view of the sea. Staff was really friendly especially Marijo, who also gave us some recommendations. Thank you!

This was the highlight of my trip. We went for breakfast overlooking the bay and diner overlooking the square 
The service in Dubrovnik can be poor but not here, the stuff make you feel special and gave us the best breakfast and dinner of our trip, and to be honest in a long time 
If you are staying in the old town you have to visit this gem. 
The food is amazing the atmosphere is amazing and the staff cap it all
Off. 5 star all the way. I think it’s the best evening I’ve had eating out in years and I am
Lucky to have visited many places In the world. 
Have a night you so t forget.
Beautiful restaurant, exquisite food. All dishes ordered were sensational. The Tartar starter and black risotto is my suggestion. Great service. Perfect!
Rale’s service was so nice!!!!!! The food was good. I ordered risotto and chicken as well as chips, I really enjoyed the meal.
Food was great! Service was great! Our waiter Rale was amazing very sweet and kind. We ordered the lasagna, the squid and the beef/meat it was great. The Croatian White Wine is very nice I recommend.
Superb. Perfect location by the harbour in the old town, lovely food and wine and sensible prices. Our waiter, Obren, was top class. So good that we’ve booked to go back twice more during the week.

A very lovely meal and the restaurant has fantastic view and vibe! Marijo is very friendly and professional, and we are really happy to choose this restaurant for our trip here! We will be sure come back
Davor was amazing. Couldn’t ask for better food or service. Stunning views and incredible atmosphere. The service is was brilliant and we couldn’t fault it

Amazing dinner and wine
Incredible service from Davor
Absolutely loved our dinner here, stunning view and surroundings 
Would definitely come back

Delicious food, great service and amazing views! Thank you Obren for looking after me!!
You definitely recommend to visit.
Marijo Krkic provided us with great service and the food that we got was tasty. Great view as well. Marijo gave us great recommendations for the meal.
Great views while eating! Mario was great. the food was good. we had the pineapple juice and it was so fresh and really yummy.
Marijo was an amazing waiter! Great food and atmosphere- have to get the truffle pasta and the burger. Drinks are great and they have iced coffee!
Marijo, who served our table and was the best. We had octopus salad, truffle pasta, and seafood risotto. Recommend. The view is so good that I recommend you to visit.

I enjoyed the truffle pasta, octopus salad, and seafood risotto. I asked for a little salt because it was salty. The sea view was also very nice, and the waiter was friendly, so I was able to have an even more delicious meal👍I highly recommend eating here when you come to Dubro😊😃

I really enjoyed this restaurant. All the staff were kind, especially Marijo, who served our table and was the best. He greeted us first in Korean and made us happy with a smile until the end of the meal. We had octopus salad, truffle pasta, and seafood risotto. Recommend.

Beautiful setting, friendly staff and tasty food what more could you ask for? We had no reservation and the Hostessfound us a rable immediately for a lunch sitting, However they were fully booked for Dinner so a reservation would be necessary in advance

Amazing scenery with yummy food! The service was brilliant, we had Džoni, he was super friendly, helped us take pictures and made us laugh multiple times! I only wish you all get to experience his service. Thanks again!

One of best services I have experienced in Europe. They treat customers like VIPs. I was offered a cake on the house. The service was quick and the waiters are courteous and friendly.
The restaurant is well-located, with a splendid view on the sea.
Big thanks to Marijo!

Given the location, I was a little afraid of tourist traps. The view of the water is very nice and the meal was excellent: we tried the
Calamari and octopus salad. Special mention for the squid!
Fair price given the location and
Quality.

This meal was the best of our week in Croatia. Even the olive oil served with the Focaccias was excellent.

Great view and deliciouse breakfast. 
Prices are great! Amazing waiter Stjepan, very friendly and attentive! Thank you!

The food was outstanding. The view of the port and the ambience was absolutely lovely. The overall experience was a perfect end to our visit to Dubrovnik. Robert, our waiter, was very attentive and provided us with excellent recommendations.
Top food in Dubrovnik, calamari and risotto were great. Excellent service from Robert! Thank you guys, we had a great experience here :)

We came here for a late breakfast/brunch and it was the best decision we made. They managed to fit us in despite not having a reservation. The food was excellent, the waiter was super friendly and professional. Good price for the portions. The view was splendid too. We are going back tomorrow for our last breakfast before we go home

Great service and food. Location is very central and the outdoor seating is perfect in the spring. I had the seafood risotto (~$20) and focaccia bread selection - both were excellent. There is a decent range of prices - both budget friendly (for Dubrovnik) and more pricey options. Service was super kind and welcoming.
Whether for a good breakfast, lunch or dinner, it is one of the best options in Dubrovnik. You won't miss him. You play it safe, excellence in everything.
Fabulous restaurant, been here for breakfast and dinner. Davor and Dzoni gave us wonderful service. Wonderful experience with beautiful view of harbour.

Came here for dinner after trying out their sister restaurant and we loved them both! Great food and a stunning view. We didn’t make a reservation and only had to wait for about 10 minutes in their indoor area, which was also beautiful, until they could seat us by the water. And the hospitality was great! Definitely worth a visit if you’re in Dubrovnik. 
Shoutout to our waiter Marijo!
The food, the location and the service was excellent. Iwan provided a fantastic service - he went above and beyond. My friends and I had a lovely evening.
We thank Dzoni Jarak and Anna so much for this wonderful amazing evening during our honeymoon and birthday! We loved it ♥️

The best meal and service I’ve had in all of Europe. Beautiful surroundings, extensive wine list, impeccable service by all staff, but in particular Dzoni and Ivan went above and beyond to ensure our evening was memorable. Thank you for a wonderful last evening in Dubrovnik

The food here was absolutely amazing! Could not fault a single thing. We only stayed in Croatia for 2 nights but we ate dinner here both nights because we loved it so much the first night. Highly recommend the squid ink risotto. The service from Džoni and Ivan was impeccable. The restaurant itself was stunning, beautiful views of the ocean from the back and gorgeous architecture from the front. Please give this place a try!!

What a treat! Visited based on these reviews, but didn’t expect such a nice experience. Given its location, could have easily been a tourist trap. But it’s not! Service was impeccable, oysters out of this world and our whole meal was delightful.

We sat on the terrace. The restaurant also provides woollen blankets should one feel cold. We had ordered Steak Tartare & Truffle and mushroom pasta. The preparations were excellent. Photos are attached. The service was warm and welcoming. Great meal and evening.

EXCELLENT. 
In tourist destinations, one is unfortunately used to a mediocre offering at inflated prices. We were all the more surprised by an excellent, plentiful fresh breakfast at a moderate price in a beautiful setting.
It was extraordinary. The food couldn't be any better. And Nemanja provided the best possible service. So attentive so charming. Thanks for having us we will come back.
A really lovely experience, great food and views! Mario was great! We reserved a table and asked for it on the front and was ready for us on arrival. Thank you!

We visited this restaurant twice for breakfast during our short stay in Dubrovnik. Great coffee and nice pastries - can’t speak for other meals as that’s what we had although the other meals we saw looked very good. The staff are excellent- extremely polite, helpful and friendly. We sat at the front looking out into a square but we noted that they also have seating looking out over the harbour area which looked amazing.
Incredible service, food and views at Gradska Kavana Arsenal! Romana was friendly and welcoming & can’t wait to visit again during our trip!

The food was wonderful. We got the cheese plate, which had a lot of interesting things to try and the cuddle fish black risotto, which was delicious as well. We were sat outside and the view was amazing even though it was raining. 
The service was also very good. Obren was a great waiter!
Fab location overlooking the harbour. The food and service were good. Our young waiter did everything to make our lunch a special one. Oysters excellent and fresh.
Great atmosphere and lovely service from Josip!!! He took such great care of us! Food and drinks were excellent! We will be back!!!
Spectacular views, delicious food, excellent service—a perfect dining experience! Ivan and the hostess were gracious. The duck was amazing.

Waiters Ivo and Stjepan aswell made out experience top notch. Kindness, generosity, professionalism, good service etc.
The food was amazing aswell...

Had lunch on the 1 May we pre-booked and were seated under the arch with a sea view of the harbour that we requested , it’s an amazing place in Dubrovnik. We had a few beers ordered the fish risotto and steak sandwich with bread selection. The staff were great people queuing to be seated would definitely recommend pre-booking. 

The prices were reasonable but above all the view of the harbour is fantastic and the ambience is great. 

Would recommend this restaurant if visiting Dubrovnik. 5 Star.
This place is a must!!! Obren was the best server and the food was unreal. The truffle and mushroom pasta was out of this world. Could not beat the view either - impeccable restaurant 1000/10 stars
This was the best dinner we had in Dubrovnik!! All of the food was amazing and the views were unbeatable. Obren was our waiter and made the experience even better. Highly highly recommend.

Such an amazing experience. Obren, our server made sure we were always taken care of and made our experience so enjoyable! The view was something from a movie and the truffle pasta was to die for!!! If you’re in Dubrovnik you have to come here and ask for a spot with the amazing view.
The views are the absolute best in the city! The food is amazing and the service (ask for Obren) is even better. Best restaurant in Dubrovnik!
This is a great spot for amazing food and the best food. Obren was amazing, his service was top notch. He was very friendly, and had great recommendations.

What a fabulous place for our party to have an evening meal! We had booked a table on the rear terrace which would have been beautiful but the temperatures were just a little too cold for us ladies, so we opted to be seated inside. Romana, our server was amazing - her advice about the food was spot on, and she was engaging and delightful throughout. Our food - we started with charcuterie and cheese boards, and between us then had beef steak, chicken, duck and gnocchi, all of which were delicious, and also had a couple of generously proportioned sides. The restaurant was happily able to accommodate our gluten free diner with equally delicious options. Shout out to Mario also who took over the reins once Romana had completed her shift - another member of staff with a lovely manner. Location, quality of food, and service were all outstanding and we would thoroughly recommend a visit,

Delicious food, amazing view, great staff, brilliant ambiance. Our waiter Robert was so helpful, friendly and knowledgeable, he made us all feel so comfortable and we would come again.

I had the oysters and black risotto and both were exquisite, every bite was a joy. Another member of our group had the truffle and mushroom pasta which was also a big hit! House wine was delicious and for the portions, flavour and ambience the prices were great! What a treat!

This is the most romantic restaurant in Dubrovnik with fantastic food and atmosphere! It’s a must visit when you come to Dubrovnik. I’d recommend the black risotto and I would like to express special gratitude towards our waiter Obren who gave us exceptional customer service and made the experience even better for us.
Great dinner, good food, amazing view, quick and impeccable service (thank you very much Obren!). I definitely recommend it.

Obren was very kind!! Food delicious! Octopus salad highly recommend! Amazing view! Posip wine very nice.

We will return soon!

Restaurant was Beautiful located overlooking the sea. Our waiter Stefan was absolutely brilliant and very accommodating and nothing was too much for him. The food was top quality, especially the sea bass and vegetarian spaghetti which I would recommend anyone to get! 
Service excellent t too! Would definitely and highly recommend
We were here for dinner. The service and the food were outstanding. Stjepan had perfect recommendations and was very attentive. The price/performance ratio is right and we would come back anytime.

We had a wonderful evening with excellent food. Stjepan's wine recommendation went perfectly with the meal. I had beef tartare which was just perfectly seasoned for me and duck as the main course. There was a cake for dessert. Great evening and I can only recommend it 😊

Every time I visit Dubrovnik I come to Gradska kavana Arsenal for the best service, fabulous Mediterranean cuisine, ambiance and spectacular views. They never disappoint as they consistently maintain the highest standards. 

From the moment I walked in, I was greeted by their wonderful host, Anna who was very welcoming and even remembered me from prior visits. Marijo Krkic, the icon of Gradska, consistently demonstrates the standards of excellence I have grown accustomed to over the years. Professionalism, friendliness and knowledge of local wines are impressive! Bravo to such top notch service! Hvala puno to the entire team as well. Such place is highly recommended!
Great view, staff Mr. Josip and Mario Krkic were super friendly and helpful, had a wonderful time. Highly recommended.

Very lovely place
The server who called Josip was so nice and friendly and also Mario
The food here’s also good
Highly recommended

City-side Arsenal served by a very knowledgeable & attentive waiter called Robert (strikingly similar to a young Ronaldo!). Superb street location for people watching and bell towers in all directions. The food was fantastic, beef carpaccio, duck, mushroom & truffle pasta finished with a crème caramel and walnut liquor. Would totally recommend!

Delicious food … the cuttlefish risotto was rich and creamy with a unique flavor, the fish stew was full of flavor. Our server, Neman,a, was very attentive and took great care of us! Would definitely come here again!

Solo traveler visiting Dubrovnik for the first time. The restaurant was recommended by owners of 7Oaks Noble House (another great recommendation. The restaurant, across from St Blaise church, is a beautiful little spot to people watch and taken the beauty of Dubrovnik. From start to finish the service was amazing from Robert.. He was gracious l, attentive, and accommodating. there was no rush even though I’m a solo traveler the food was excellent, his wine recommendation was spot on. Can’t recommend this enough.
excellent food! and the staff, Robert, is an amazing guy! the view is spectacular, but you need to make a reservation to make sure you are seated by the ocean.
Davor was very polite and lovely service. Food was excellent and the view was beautiful. Lovely restaurant matched with lovely food and a view

If you’re looking for a place to have breakfast / lunch with a view, this is the place to be. Had breakfast this morning, Obren, our server was very nice! The iced tea is a must! Had the Orlando formula, loved it! The view, again, was breathtaking ! Would totally recommend

This is the second time I’ve visited here for breakfast and it has been consistently great. The location overlooking the harbour in the centre of the old city has stunning views too. It’s also very reasonably priced compared to other places that don’t have this idyllic setting. I opted for the eggs Benedict - very good & highly recommended.
Thanks for Obren for his excellent service and for making me feel so welcome and giving me a great table right at the front. Sometimes that’s not the case for solo travellers elsewhere I’ve found and you can get hidden in a corner somewhere in the back of the restaurant, saving the better tables for groups of more than one. So this made it even better. Thanks.

Amazing food, good wine, efficient and friendly staff with a view to die for of the old harbour. 
Stumbled upon this on our first day, unaware until now how highly rated it is on Trip Advisor. I can see why it is number 3.

Perfect Eggs Benedict with mimosa/bellini. Tremendous value as came with assorted rolls and croissants and apricot/wild blueberry jam. Sat overlooking old harbour. Glad to be sitting there together not trudging round on one of the many cruise ship tours that passed by.. Great unobtrusive but efficient service. Bliss!
Obren was a great server, very kind and considerate. The food was amazing; I had the specials for the starter and main and both were incredible. The view didn’t hurt either. :)
Absolutely great food and friendly and professional service!! Black risotto 100/10!! Great scenery and all round full recommendation for this restaurant.
The food and service was excellent. The seafood was good but the truffle pasta was also amazing. Highly recommended.

It was my first trip to Europe and to Dubrovnik with my father, and i had an amazing time here it was very memorable. I had some fantastic food and amazing service! The scenery from the terrace was beautiful and our waiter Josip made it even more memorable. Thank you Josip!
Amazing view with fantastic food and service. Especially enjoyed our servers Josip’s friendly and enthusiastic recommendations - spot on!

Obren was gentle!Tasty food, normal price, amazing staff!!!!
A beautiful view of the sea gave us an unforgettable dining experience.
Visited twice in a four day trip. Was absolutely fantastic. The food was amazing and the service was wonderful. Could not recommend highly enough. Ivan was particularly attentive.

You can't ask for anything better. Elegant location, exceptional location in the center, impeccable service, superior food quality. Prices are in line with those of Dubrovnik, indeed even slightly lower given all the positive aspects listed. Octopus salad, cuttlefish ink risotto, grilled cuttlefish, water and beer total 72 euros. It should be considered that all the courses listed are more than abundant and can be divided into two. Absolutely worth trying

Food was spectacular. Service was in a class of its own. And the setting is unforgettable; watching the harbour light up after sunset - do yourself a favour and enjoy it like we did. If you’re lucky you’ll be waited on by Robert, who makes wine experience an art form.
“Beefsteak” turned out to be an exquisite filet. My wife had the Black Risotto - sounds weird but tastes divine. Really, give it a try - simply beautiful.
As madder bonus was the wonderful mood music from the grand piano player. A memorable evening. We’re so glad we went.
Robert was superb, the food, black Risotto was Devine . The piano player was just excellent. A MUST for your trip to Dubrovnik. Five stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Thank you for the birthday cake! Very nice service, good food and a fantastisc view over the old port. We have had both breakfast and dinner here. We highly recomend this restaurant when you are in Dubrovnik.
Excellent food, gorgeous views, and superb service. Thank you Robert for the kind service! Squid ink Risotto was amazing. Duck and Filet Mignon was divine.

I ordered the fish stew and an order of bread. The food was marvelous; the mussels and calamari were cooked perfectly and the bread was warm from the oven. The staff were very welcoming and attentive.

I had a lovely meal here. The staff were very kind and attentive and I got to dine on the waterfront and then move inside for dessert in the warmth by the piano being played live (and well). Obren was a great server and made very good recommendations and generously gave me a delicious dessert wine on the house. His colleague Robert was also very nice. The Sailor’s Risotto had a generous amount of perfectly cooked seafood and was very tasty. The Dalmatian Crème Caramel isn’t normally a dessert I’d go for but was also very good. Would 100% recommend dining here!

Unlike others, very honest!

In 5 days I paid absurd prices for food that wasn't worth it while here we ate very well at a great price!! The portions are really generous. I will put some photos in the attachment because it was a wonderful experience.
Fantastic service, all thanks to Robert. Delicious food, stunning views of the city, wine topped up frequently. It was perfect! Could not recommend more.

This has to be the best restaurant in Dubrovnik. Served by Dzoni & Ivan, all our needs were catered for including adjusting the heaters to warm our legs on a slightly breezy night. The food was superb, ambience excellente & service was beyond our wildest dreams. This restaurant is a must visit!

Breakfast Orlando at a very reasonable price considering the location, service and type of establishment! I
Too bad not to include a hot drink of your choice in the Breakfast formula!

My husband and I loved our experience, the food was delicious and service excellence. We ate breakfast here all 3 mornings of our trip in Dubrovnik. They have a seaside patio and old city walls patio. A must to try both options. We loved Anna and Obren as well, they provided some of the best hospitality in our time during Dubrovnik! Thank you!!

Stopped here for drinks on a hot April day. We were lucky to find as a table available outside. We ordered an American Macchiato & a sparkling water.
Drinks came quickly and were very good.
A really lovely location to people watch & watch the world go by.
The restaurant has a lovely dining area that looks out on the harbour side as well as into the walled city.
It was a little breezy and the team offered blankets to anyone who felt the need for one which was a lovely touch

My husband and I travelled on our honeymoon. We asked for the seaside front view for evening dinner. Robert provided incredible and attentive service, as someone who is gluten free and dairy free, he remembered my dietary requirements throughout making suggestions, without me needing to ask. Could not recommend any further. Food was exceptional! View and the generosity for our special night. EXTRAORDINARY

100% would recommend. The service by Robert was beyond amazing, he catered for all our needs, and my wife’s dietary needs too which was extra thoughtful. The food was superb and view is top tier. The service by Robert to make our Honeymoon extra special by proving free champagne and desert was extraordinary. Wonderful place and service.
Amazing restaurant! Amazing location with beautiful views of the old port, beautiful ambiance, incredible service, and delicious dishes. Had an incredible meal and would definitely come back.
Excellent dinner. . We spent a lovely moment thanks to Josip, our waiter, simply the best! Very good location and excellent food!

They were all kind and professional.
Especially NEMANJA was so nice, amazing!! The atmosphere of the restaurant was very good.

Nemanja is so nice! And his coworkers are nice as well!
I recommend this restaurant you guys 
They has super nice food and service

Poor experience. Seated at 630. Had to ask someone for menus 15 minutes later when no one came. At the 25 minute mark, still no server greeted us until I asked the hostess. She was fairly rude and said "it was busy" with serious attitude (there were 4 open tables around us). 

Our eventual server was great. 

Food was ok. 

We were excited because this restaurant has near perfect rating in Tripadvisor. I guess we hit it on an off day.

Had our anniversary dinner here, loved the atmosphere & the food was delicious! The drinks were amazing as well! 
We had the pleasure to have Antun who took well care of us!
Located in Dubrovnik, Gradska Kavana is a restaurant that makes the visit worth it. Quick and reliable service topped with great food. Would recommend!
Very good squid and black risotto, accompanied by delicious homemade focaccia. Excellent value for money compared to other places to eat in the city
Ivan and his team were outstanding! Food was fresh and delicious. Highly recommend! Beautiful place beautiful environment gorgeous day highly recommend
Fantastic spot with a great view- food was delicious and Josip made the experience great! Would definitely recommend!

We have been here for a week and in our opinion this restaurant was the best restaurant in town.
- the food was excellent (truffle pasta: Wow!!!)
- the drinks are delicious and are excellently presented
- the staff are super friendly and flexible
- all the staff speak English (including the cleaners)
- super child-friendly (one child was given painting supplies when he got restless)
- the prices are no more expensive than in the rest of the town
- the view is simply wonderful

Our waitress Josip was incredibly friendly. Thanks again. We will be back!

We had a lovely evening meal at this restaurant during our trip to Croatia. Obern was very friendly and helpful and made our experience all the more enjoyable. We would recommended to anyone visiting Dubrovnik, especially for beautiful views at dinner.
Obren took very good care of me. Thank you 🙏 I had good food and a pleasant time. The place is very pleasant and has a beautiful sea view.
Obren is good person and he gave me special moment. I came croatia for the first time and it have been great time for me. I would like to come here again someday!

The restaurant is ideally located facing the port.
The setting is magnificent, the dishes are quite good but the prices are soaring.
The service is correct even if we feel that the waiters are tipped (which we strongly recommend when paying)
Good, but we pay a lot for the place.

I had black risotto, and it was really great!! Of course, the rotation is also amazing（I think there is no greater location than here）and staffs(especially Mr. Evan)are good. I recommend here! Thank you very much :)
Everything was just perfect. The food tasted great, the view was wonderful. The service was very professional and very attentive. Special thanks to Marietta!
Wonderful people in wonderful place with wonderful prices in wonderful Dubrovnik. Obren attention was brilliant. Must repeat ! They were awesomeeeee
Very pleasant atmosphere, excellent service from Stephan. Very fresh and quality products. Wonderful calamari and the risotto, black and with seafood, very tasty. Unmissable restaurant!!!

Absolutely beautiful view. We were greeted by Ivan and Marijo who gave us recommendations for our trip and excellent food. Will definitely recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik. They treated us to some incredible cake and wished us well. They spoke and understood English very well so there was no communication barrier. Hvala Ti to Gradska Kavana Arsenal

This is an excellent restaurant a perfect place for fine dining. Marijo the waiter was incredibly professional and helpful and made the experience of this restaurant even better. You must visit this restaurant if you are in Dubrovnik
We had a wonderful dinner with great drinks!! Ivan Šare and Marino Krkić were great! We had a delightful evening and felt so welcome. Great food and great people!
Food was great, squid was tender and flavourful and well presented. In general it was good value given the excellent setting and views of the bay and great service by Davor.

I visited this restaurant because of TikTok review and it did not disappoint me, vice versa, the Black risotto was outstanding, my Pornstar cocktail was amazing. Also, I want to highlight the atmosphere that Josip and Ivo delivered to us, the service was phenomenal and I would recommend it to everyone.
A grand 3 course meal. Lovely setting could have sat there for hours. Food exceptional and extensive local wine list. Desserts fresh and good choice of locally produced / sought ingredients.
Lovely fresh breakfast with a view of the harbour. Excellent service by Robert. The homemade Iced Tea is very refreshing.
Perfect food perfect service of JOSIP and RALE. They are very passionate and kind. It’s a beautiful night in this restaurant!🥰😍👍

Had a lovely afternoon enjoying the view and the staff's hospitality. Thought Ivo how to make a mocha and he's now ready for more irish customers, just ask the waiter Josip for one, who loved the idea of mixing espresso and hot chocolate together 😊
Josip and Ivo were amazing, we received impeccable service! The food and drink were also really good ! Do recommend to visit as the location is really nice as well !
Hi! The best dinner in town, the atmosphere, the food and Vlaho is an amazing guy, so nice! I recommend you to come here for sure :)
Excellent dinner, very good food, our charming waiter Vlaho and spectacular views, totally recommended if you go to Dubrovnik.
Lovely food, lovely setting, great service and great view of the water. Will definitely be returning when we’re next here!

Had an amazing time here! The views were breathtaking, and the mood was perfect. But what really made it special was the exceptional service from Obren. He was incredibly nice and helpful, making our experience even better. Highly recommend this place for its great view, mood, and fantastic staff like Obren. Cheers!

The restaurant is amazing!!! It was my first time in Dubrovnik and this restaurant stood out straightaway! I had both breakfast and dinner here and both were absolutely delicious!!! My personal recommendation is black risotto! 

Atmosphere is beautiful! Servings, music, view- everything is gorgeous!

Also waiters were great! Their work is perfect, fast and very welcoming and nice! Special thank you to Josip!!! He was absolutely lovely, professional and nice!

Definitely recommend this place to everyone!!!!

The best restaurant in Dubrovnik. Very tasty awesome food and cocktails, highly recommend for every person. Josip is a very intelligent waiter in this restaurant! Thank you so much. Hello from Russian friends!)

This place is a must try if you are visiting Dubrovnik!! The food is amazing, the view is spectacular, and the service is 10/10. Order the truffle psta and the squid they were so good! Shoutout to Ivo who was really helpful and kind..
Had an amazing time and meal at this restaurant. Ivo and all Waiters were super friendly and their service was exceptional. Highly recommended in Dubrovnik

I had the pleasure of dining at this remarkable restaurant and I must say, the experience surpassed all my expectations. The food was absolutely divine, bursting with flavors that left me craving for more. Every dish was a masterpiece, showcasing the culinary expertise of the talented chef, Obren. The attention to detail and the quality of ingredients were evident in each bite, creating a symphony of taste that delighted my palate.

But it wasn't just the food that impressed me; the service provided by Obren was truly exceptional. His warm and friendly demeanor, coupled with his extensive knowledge of the menu, made the entire dining experience even more enjoyable. He went above and beyond to ensure that every aspect of our evening was perfect, and his genuine passion for hospitality shone through in every interaction.

The ambiance of the restaurant further enhanced the overall experience. The cozy and inviting atmosphere created a relaxing and intimate setting, perfect for an unforgettable night out. Whether it was the soft lighting, the tasteful decor, or the soothing background music, every element worked together harmoniously to create a truly memorable dining ambiance.

I can confidently say that this restaurant has set a new standard for excellence in both food and service. It is a hidden gem that deserves all the accolades it receives. If you're looking for an exceptional dining experience that will leave you craving for more, I highly recommend paying a visit to this establishment. You won't be disappointed.

I had such a wonderful experience at this restaurant. Food was delicious, staff was very polite and friendly and my table had a beautiful view on marina. It was just a pure pleasure to be there. Thank you so much.

Discovered this bar and restaurant on our first day in Dubrovnik and made multiple visits during our stay. The service was always fantastic, whether we had coffees, a glass of wine or a meal. Special thanks to our waiter Nemahja!

Amazing food! The truffle pasta and black risotto were delicious. The setting was absolutely beautiful and peaceful by the sea. Above all, the service was incredible and the staff went above and beyond to make sure we had a good experience. Antun in particular was brilliant, so helpful and made our time at the restaurant one to remember.

The atmosphere of the restaurant is nice and the food is delicious. 
Especially, Josip who serves is very kind and has a good sense.
I had a good dinner thanks to Josip and Mara

Everything was awesome, the service is better than anywhere in Dubrovnik. The food is definitely worth it's price. You can eat a couple dinner for 100 euros and be so full and pleased.
Thanks to the service who let us sit near the seaside.
Special thanks to our waiter Anton, who made our experience special and comfortable, who also brought us another heater lamp especially for us. His food suggestions were awesome too.
Outstanding views topped off with delicious food and exquisite service from Obren! Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik old town.
Amazing views, amazing restaurant and amazing staff. We were served by Obren for dinner and he was very helpful and friendly ! Would highly recommend
Amazing view, really good food and lovely staff! Was served by Obren who was very friendly! Would definitely recommend!
The food was great. The waiter, Marijo Krkić, spoiled us wonderfully. The best service we've had in a very, very long time. The ambience is great.
The food here is delicious, so as the scenery. Robert helped us a lot, such a nice guy!! Rižoto na mornarski is the best. We will come back next time.

Absolutely lovely breakfast - fanatic views and amazing staff. Especially Stjepan. Really friendly and very helpful… beautiful restaurant and views. Very very chilled about 9am … lovely. We’ll be back x

Robert was a fantastic waiter. He made sure we had everything we needed and the food was delicious. If you can, get a table looking over the water — you won’t regret coming by. They even surprised us with a complementary slice of cake for my wife’s birthday. Great experience throughout.
Obren was the best waiter ever! So accommodating and wonderful!! The lunch was great!!! Perfect way to end our trip!! We hope to be back to Dubrovnik and will return here!!

Great place for dinner- beautiful views of the harbour and the staff are very nice and accommodating with heaters/ blankets at night. We were waited on by Obren and Ivan on different nights and they were great! Food is fantastic and staff are so nice. One to add to the list for Dubrovnik!
This is a great spot to eat at any time of the day! Staff are super friendly and welcoming. The views of the harbour are stunning. Obren was a great waiter!

From the moment I stepped inside, I was greeted with warmth and hospitality. Obren was a great waiter. The exquisite cuisine, impeccable service, and inviting ambiance make it a must-visit destination.
Wonderful Food, Service, and Ambiance. We returned twice in two days. The harbor views are gorgeous, and the food and staff are brilliant. This place could be my home away from home. Thank you Ivan.
Excellent location. The view from the terrace is stunning. Food was delicious and service from Obren was top notch. I’d go back any time. Thank you!

all though we didn’t have a reservation the staff were extremely friendly and accommodated us, we were sat at a beautiful table looking over the old port, the soup was incredible! as was all other courses, our server Stjepan was extremely friendly and professional and we will definitely be back again.

Stjepan and his colleagues were fantastic.

Great food, good atmosphere and fabulous views. Service was great and the staff were really friendly.
We have had an excellent meal tonight. The bourbon beef gnocchi was amazing! The service though was the best we have had in a long time, shout out to stjepan who really looked after us. Thank you!

Our waiter Marijo really made our evening! He was so kind and looked after us the entire time we were there - bringing us a heater, hanging our bags for us, and generally making sure we were happy and comfortable the whole time! The food was delicious and the view was gorgeous! We had such a wonderful time and really recommend!
The most beautiful location and delicious food. Lovely welcoming staff: antun (very attentive and conversational waiter) and Anna (brilliant photographer). Would highly recommend a visit here!

Stunning views, elegant setting, and the hospitality was extremely warm, professional, and caring. Our table of six came over an hour early for our reservation, and they swiftly accommodated it with prime seating, and gorgeous views. Food was sublime and showcased the delicious and fresh ingredients of the local seafare. Evo our server was impeccable and kind. Floor manager was also great vibes! We would definitely come here again and it’s great for small and large parties. Best seating and views of the fortress, walls and pier.
incredible service by Mjera Iznos, incredible food and view is awesome, all the staff is kind and the music of the environment is very relaxing, loved this place
Had a great breakfast being served by Marietta! Amazing views if you sit next to the water, great menu items and reasonable prices. Highly recommend!

This is absolutely the best restaurant I have ever dined at. I booked an evening reservation out on the terrace for my wife's birthday. We were treated like royalty from start to finish. Our Hostess and Waiter were impeccable. The food was the best, the wine as suggested was great and our waiter was very knowledgeable and helpful. 

The team very kindly brought over a heated lamp for us when we sat down, and brought over extra blankets for my wife. We never touched the wine or water once. Everything was looked after for us. We received a complimentary happy birthday cake and a congratulations on our birthday and forthcoming wedding anniversary. Absolutely impeccable. 

We visited lots of places during our shop in Dubrovnik but this was above and beyond the best. Thank you so much.

We went for dinner with my family to this restaurant as it was recommended by other friends that came by. I was really surprised about the quality of the whole dinner taking into account the prices we were paying. 
I had a steak that came in a huge cold plate dry as a shoe sole, with cold mash and a very little of a cold sauce it didn’t have any flavors. My mum had the chicken with polenta and puttanesca sauce and it was the same, no taste at all. the polenta was flavorless (coming from italian family we love polenta) the chicken was dry, and the puttanesca a joke like out of a tomato can! all food was cold and with no taste. Then my two friends had the duck which was just barely alright. For entree we shared a plate of zucchini which was just ok (it wasn’t even half a zucchini on the plate), and some grilled vegetables, (that well, you can’t really go wrong with that), plain dry grilled vegetables . We told the waitress when she asked us about how was our meal, and very kindly they offer us two desserts an apple pie and a chocolate cake, and both were the same quality of the food! the apple pie was made with something like boiled mashed apples? Not sure how to describe it, with a very hard pastry and again, tasteless. the chocolate cake seemed to have been in the fridge for at least a few days, it was hard as rock, completely dry and the taste was the same as when you leave something uncovered in the fridge for a very long time and you forgot it was there!
It wasn’t really worth trying to discuss with the waitress anything as it’s not their responsibility to provide for a good quality of food. I’ve payed almost £200 for the four of us. 
Really not worth any of that. 
The day before we went to a small restaurant around there Bura Bistro ( just by mere coincidence) we payed half the price of this dinner and the food was absolutely delicious and great service!

I always go here when I’m in Dubrovnik, it’s one of my favourite restaurants! The food is great, anything you order on the menu is guaranteed to be delicious and the service is outstanding! I have been here with family and friends but also alone several times. Highly recommend visiting here if it’s just for a drink, lighter meal or dinner.
Wonderful restaurant with amazing food, fantastic views and very attentive and kind staff. Would recommend this place 100 percent and we will be returning .

I only purchased a bottle of water here, but the staff at this elegant establishment are probably the kindest and most accommodating in the city. I sort of arrived desperately late at night, close to closing time at midnight, because I wondered if anyone had a spare iPad charging cable I could borrow overnight, as I completely forgot mine at the last hotel I stayed at. Thankfully a member of staff had an extra cord they let me use, and when I asked politely (not expecting a yes) if I could keep it and return it tomorrow morning, they were more than willing to allow it. It was a real lifesaver for me.

Thank you SO SO MUCH to everyone here at Gradska Kavana Arsenal for their hospitality and understanding of my situation! I will return for an actual meal on my next trip to Dubrovnik!
Fab food in a fab location. Very friendly and efficient service from Oberon. Breakfast was delicious. Would recommend. Stunning views.

We had a lovely breakfast here. We had a lovely view from our table of the port. 
Obren was a great server ☺️ would recommend a visit if in Dubrovnik.
Such amazing vibes like no other in the world. Obren our waiter was out of this world such a nice guy and really catered to our needs. Would highly recommend and please ask for Obren if he’s around!
Best food we have had in Dubrovik. The waiter, Obren, was fantastic. We would highly recommend this restaurant for it's outstanding food and service.

Gorgeous restaurant for dinner - really good quality food at reasonable prices for Dubrovnik old town. Staff are lovely and very attentive - our waiter Obren was fantastic. Beautiful to sit by the water

The food was so delicious, incredible service of Nemanja, our kind and proactive waiter. I can recommend the steak tartare, truffle pasta and the almond and lemon cake for desserts. I will definitely come back!

Excellent food excellent service, Obren went all out to give us a fabulous experience and meal. We have been here 8 times and if you like sea bass and fish soup this is the restaurant to eat at. View is magnificent and the variety of cakes are outstanding. Picture here is the almond white chocolate cake. Must have it with sherry. A fabulous restaurant in Dubrovnick with everything and more you would want for a wonderful meal and experience.

I ordered a black risotto and Dubrovnik crème caramel. The food was delicious and I enjoyed local traditional food. The atmosphere on the terrace by the port was amazing! It was great quality overall. On top of that, the waiter Obren was very nice and attentive. He explained food very well and I spent a great time here.

Our Uber driver recommended Arsenal for their espresso and we were worried it was going to be a decent restaurant with a nice view. But boy were we wrong. The food, truffle mushroom pasta, black risotto, sea bass, steak sandwich and cocktails were EXCELLENT! Oh did I mention the service? Our hostess was very lovely and friendly, sharing a story of her recent travels. And our waiter Džoni (Johnny) was attentive without being intrusive, knowledgeable about the menu with great recommendations and so pleasant. We had a lovely afternoon here! 
The view is nice from the veranda. But when you e just finished two walking tours, being inside, away from the elements and in a temperature controlled climate is awesome. 10/10 recommend
Had a great night with my family here, food, view & service was fantastic. Davor, was exceptional. Would highly recommend.

We had a wonderful experience dining at this restaurant! We showed up on a Friday evening without a reservation during low season and were greeted warmly by the hostess. They very fortunately had one prime spot on the patio opening up shortly after arriving. We sat in the comfy lounge chair seating while they cleaned the dining table with a lovely seaside view. Besides the gorgeous view the food was amazing. I had the Black Risotto which was so delicious! Mario was our fantastic waiter!
