He was the sweetest and so attentive and gave the best recommendations not only for food here but also for local sights. I cannot say enough good things about him! I truly believe he was the best waiter I've ever had. We love him so much! You must try the Dubrovnik Creme Carmel for dessert too!!

We had such an enjoyable dinner here that we came back for a second evening. Our waiters Marijo and especially Antun were helpful and attentive. The meat and seafood were extremely good - and we also enjoyed the apple pie. Lovely spot and atmosphere.
This spot is beautiful for a fancy dinner on the water! Around 30 euros per person. The staff were so friendly and very tall.

Turned up looking for good food and it exceeded our expectations, our server Stjepan provided the best service we’ve ever received - made our night truly wonderful, would highly recommend this restaurant to groups and couples. Plus the food was brilliant 😉
Great dinner spot with great service. Stephon was an amazing waiter. Will definitely be back when in Dubrovnik. Ask for Stephon

The staff was amazing! Marijo did a fantastic job as he was very attentive and friendly. 
Great food and wonderful service. 
I would give it a “10”
Wonderful food, wonderful people. Stjepan waited on our table with an enthusiasm and knowledge for wines, all staff are a credit to the restaurant
Fantastic food, beautiful atmosphere in the back patio. Great service and the octopus salad was yummy. Marijo was a great server with great and honest recommendations
We had an excellent lunch. Robert, our waiter was very helpful and spoke excellent English. We highly recommend this beautiful restaurant.
Really nice atmosphere, cocktails delicious, very well priced, Marietta, our server, was really helpful and pleasant to deal with. Food excellent, would definitely recommend

Exceptional service from start to finish. Accompanied by the most amazing view. We had the squid and fillet of the day, both so delicious and fresh, cooked to perfection! Every mouthful was an experience hard to beat. 
Thanks Davor and team. We can't recommend highly enough.

The breakfast went very well, honestly the best I have ever eaten in Dubrovnik.

If we were there one more day we would eat here again.
The service was very good, delicious food! Highly recommended! The staff is very friendly and professional. We enjoyed a wonderful evening.
We had a great experience here! Our server Robert was very friendly and accommodating. The food was delicious and the drinks were too.
Incredible food. Waiter was very attentive and made great recommendations for dinner . Ambiance was superb right on the harbor.
Super great food and great customer service! The staff were incredibly nice and friendly. Amazing view of the sea of Dubrovnik as well! Highly recommend!

Great food, view & service from Obren..
Homemade pasta with crab sauce & uni was fantastic. Highly recommended if you are in Dubrovnik!
Obren was so lovely! Beautiful food, beautiful location right on the water and very well priced too. Will definitely be back! Weather was overcast when I went but still a stunning outlook.

5 out of 5 ! Amazing service, this is off season and we were able to be sat without reservations but I would think in the summer time this place gets packed. The food was perfect !!!! Best of the best ! Hands down a beautiful experience, the views are gorgeous as well.

This restaurant is so wonderful and right on the harbour with amazing views. All the staff can’t do enough for you, especially Ivan who is so fun and attentive. Will deffo recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik for a wonderful authentic experience. Great food, great service and great views.

Obren
The view was so nice.
We can choose a seat seaside or cityside.
I chose the seaside and it gave me a great view. The coffee and the cake is also good. The staff are very friendly. I had a good time.

Location was beauty-full. Right in the water. Heating lamps and blankets made sitting outdoors nice and cozy. Marijo, our server, was very welcoming and attentive. The local white wine and catch of the day paired wonderfully together. Both were incredible light and fresh! Hvala Marijo for the incredible service!
Obren was a great server and very inviting. The seafood risotto was amazing. The location is right on the water with great views of Dubrovnik.

Beautiful view, wonderful food and service. One of a kind experience here in Dubrovnik. Fondest memories 
Our waiter Obran went above and beyond. Couldn't recommend highly enough 👌
Restaurant very agreable and chic at very affordable prices. Obren, was friendly, nice, attentive and the pasta was delicious.
The food there is so good. Robert is so good. He is so heartwarming and enthusiastic. Robert’s service is thoughtful; we had a nice dinner with him. In addition,the view is excellent.

Great location great food great service and good value for money.
What more does anyone want when they are on holidays.
Will be back for more.

Best food and best service. Oberen was the best server, offered great advice on the city and was the perfect amount of service and talkitiveness. We learned so much and had the best time. Best view of the city. I got the seafood risotto, was amazing. My friend got the the mushroom and truffle linguine and it was divine.
Excellent service from Obren! Delicious desert, cocoa and cocktails! Lovely environment, you must try the truffle margarita and the cherry and walnut Croatian brandy if you get the chance :)
Obren was incredible!!!! Such a nice facility. Apple pie and almond cake was amazing, the truffle margaritas are a must try!!! Very pretty venue. Excellent service💗💗

We were here more than once during our stay.
Both breakfast and dinner were exceptionally good.
The portions were large and of good quality.
Our waiter that evening, Obren, was extremely friendly and accommodating. All the other employees there were also very nice and attentive.
Even though this is a very fancy restaurant, the prices are absolutely fair. Some snack bars in the old town charge significantly higher prices.
Absolute recommendation if you are in Dubrovnik.

Best Place in Old Town Dubrovnik, ambience relaxing and charming, food amazing and service exquisite, special mention to Obren, who is very professional, attentive and friendly 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻. I went one day for a drink and came back the next day to try the famous Black Risotto which was delicious. Prices are reasonable having in mind location and amenities.
Marijo was an amazing host; very attentive, great recommendations. The food was perfect and atmosphere lovely. Would absolutely recommend.

I was really pleased to have dinner and celebrate my mom's birthday at this restaurant. Obren was our server and he was so friendly and great to help us enjoy our time here. I could also sing birthday song for mom together and my mom said everything was great. Thank you!
Obren our waiter made us feel at home and the food was phenomenal! Definitely coming again! obren accommodated all of my difficult dietary needs :)

Very kind atention 
And the dishes is very good, 
The recommendations for the dessert was wonderful 
Excellent presentation !!
Enjoyed the meal here, Obren was an attentive waiter too. We had some dubrovnik specialties like black risotto, truffle and mushroom risotto, and fish stew.
Really love the black risotto! We also tried the truffle pasta and the fish stew and were just as yummy. Would recommend ordering these dishes to try

Antun was our server and he was absolutely sweet! Seafood risotto and truffle pasta was perfect:)) Highly recommended! It’s around the exit point of City Wall of Dubrovnik. Perfect place to eat after trolling the city wall!
Delicious, it’s my first time to this country. And I wanted to have fish, this is one of the best fish I can have in europe. Very recommend

Waiter is very kind
His name is Antun Rakudzija. we ordered five menu and 15 min is enough for food. I will come back again.

Dinner was delicious. We got the fish stew and mushroom truffle linguine and it was Devine. Great food with a great atmosphere. Ivan was a fantastic server. Very attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable. Would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik!

The place is very cozy, staffs are welcoming specially Antun who served us our delicious meal. The octopus salad was refreshing and the sailors risotto is a must (with lemon, it will be on another different level)

The iced latte was just a bit disappointing cause its not cold and its still actually a bit warm, but nonetheless all was lovely.
Robert was amazing. Very friendly. Great English and interactive. Thank you very much for the service and we will be back soon for sure.

The strawberry spritz was very refreshing and theseafood risotto was delicious. Service was excellent and our server Marijo was wonderful. So welcoming and gave us great recommendations on food and drinks!
Marijo is a great waiter who has a lot of knowledge and gives great recommendations. Lasagna bolognese was AMAZING. The wine is also so good!
We went to this restaurant for lunch. The blackened rosetto cuddle fish dish was excellent!! I would have it again in a heart. Antun was an exceptional and friendly waiter. Thanks Antun.
Fabulous, heard about black risotto with cuddle fish and it exceeded my expectations. I would come back in a heart beat.
The food is very delicious, and the service is very nice! The waiter is ANTUN, he is so friendly and warm. My friend and I have a very great time here.

Would easily recommend! Worth every penny.

We sat outside as we didn’t have a reservation and it was super packed. The beef and chips were outstanding. The black risotto was one of the nicest risottos ever eaten :)

Unfortunately, there was lots of people smoking outside. We quickly were offered alternative seating which we declined as we didn’t want to stay out. But we were kindly given a discount on our meal and free drinks. 
Sorry we didn’t catch his name :( we are both young women, I’m black and my friend is Asian and we didn’t want to make a fuss. But these guys really looked after us. Our waiters were kind, accommodations and such gentleman! 

Amazing customer service and great food!
Excellent food and excellent service. It’s worth booking which you can do online! Good prices and good views from either restaurant although the Arsonel is better in the summer
This place was great for lunch. Good food and drinks in the center of old town. Joseph and Ivan were amazing and provided excellent service.
Place was amazing and waiters were to personable. Show out Joseph to Ivan, best hosts and the food was amazing. Highly recommended!

My husband had a beef fillet of excellent quality with a mushroom sauce - the specially ordered side dishes were also very tasty (rosemary potatoes with garlic cooked in oil).
The dish I ordered: chicken breast on a kind of ratatouille with polenta, was also super tasty.
The service was excellent and unobtrusively attentive, the ambience very appealing
Great food and very kind personnel. Seafood risotto and the cheesecake are very good. The terras has a great view of the main street

The dubrovačka rozata was so delicious!
And the staff (name Robert)was so nice to us!
I will recommend this cafe to eat and enjoy!
We spent a very nice evening with a group of friends. I drank a very good wine in the company of a friendly staff of the restaurant. I recommend this restaurant.
The Best Restaurant in Town!!! Special food, special service, special location, special experience, special everything.

The best breakfast and the best coffee in the Old Town, with the best view😊
We visited it several times in just e few days.
Very nice ambience and the server is really warm and accommodating. Always making sure that we have what we needed………..
Everything was excellent, a wonderful restaurant, the food was excellent, the staff and the ambience too...all praises. I definitely recommend it🙂
Great food and always great service. 🤗 Apart from that, Gradska Kavana is one of the rare places where you can drink coffee in this winter time in the city.
Excellent service, pleasant atmosphere, first-class food, all praise to the chef. I can't wait to visit again and enjoy everything this restaurant has to offer.
Had an amazing dinner out on the terrace. Food was delicious and service was top notch. Definitely visit this restaurant if you are in Old Town. Ante was a kind and attentive server!

My friend and I had dinner yesterday, we were quite satisfied. The atmosphere is beautiful, we felt welcome. For starters, we had beef tartar and onion soup, which was perfect, silky and full of flavor. For the main course we had sea bass fillet and black risotto, both delicious. Polite, attentive service, we felt like queens. Thank you for the experience and I definitely recommend Gradska kavana Arsenal because it's worth it!

Only had a hot chocolate and glass of water. Service was not what I expected. The restaurant wasn't busy, so I don't understand the lack of decent service I received. I was ignored every time I tried to get a server attention. When I managed that, they seemed bother that I was asking for service. Will not eat here again.

When planning our vacation, I do some much research as far as places to experience authentic cuisine as well as favorite spots. This restaurant exceeded all of the above. Our host “Daniel” was out of this world. From his recommendations on wine pairings down to dessert. My octopus salad and Black Risotto have become the two best dishes I have ever eaten in my entire life. This dinner brought a tear to my eye

This is one of the best restaurants and locations for dining in Dubrovnik. I have been for lunch and dinner 4 times in 2 days. The staff is so professional, kind and polite. The menu, since it is "off season" is limited but really nice choices! I've different waiters at different times but they were amazing. I would like to compliment, in particular, Obren, Nemanja, Vinko, and Ivan. He's in the pic serving me my burger! All great personalities!! They take great pride in their country and work!
Thank you to these wonderful people who made our entire stay in Dubrovnik beautiful and made us feel more than welcome.
Arguably the best restaurant in the old town of Dubrovnik. Had a very pleasant dinner. Definitely recommended!

We ate here during the winter so it was a quiet time in the city. We opted to sit outside on the street side of the building, near the outdoor heaters and we really enjoyed the quiet ambience of the location. I imagine it wouldn't be as quiet during peak tourist season. The gentleman who seated us and then served us was very kind and hospitable. He really gave off a warm and welcoming vibe. Our food was delicious and was served with fresh hot bread. The wine that my husband ordered and the bellini that I ordered were also fantastic. This place was recommended to us by the host at the apartment we were staying at and it was a fantastic recommendation. If you're looking for a nice place to eat in Dubrovnik, I highly recommend it!

Such an incredible experience! We had the black risotto with cuttlefish and the monkfish with spinach mousse, focaccia, and grilled vegetables — everything was incredible but the black risotto in particular was exceptional, literally the best risotto I’ve ever had. The local wines recommended by our server were the perfect compliment to our meal. The dessert was also a showstopper — a mousse with a white chocolate pistachio shell, strawberry gelee center, topped with a strawberry sauce poured tableside. Everyone was warm and welcoming. Our server was tremendous — happy to share his personal thoughts, the history/context of dishes, and guests’ favorites. Would absolutely recommend!

I came here with my wife during our honeymoon.
We were really impressed for delicious foods and warm hospitality.
Obren served us and was a great waiter.
I strongly recommend this restaurant to all of you as one of the best restaurants in Dubrovnik ;)

Obren provided a wonderful experience, explaining the menu, guiding our choices, and providing extra sides of our favorite appetizers. All of the food was excellent, especially the gnocchi steak. 10/10
The black rissotto is delicious you should definetly try it! It is one of the best things i have tried in my life! The service of Joseph is excelent a great person and worker!!!!

We had a fantastic time. Nemanja made our lunch a special experience.
We will definitely come back and thank you again for a wonderful time.

Food was perfect. You should try their seafood risotto and beef steak! Ambience was unique, taking you back to the medieval ages. Obren, was really helpful and kind offering us their speciality. This is a must when you visit Dubrovnik.
It's wonderful place like a dream specially in the night soo romantic we enjoy a lot and the guy who served us very kind obren

The views are spectacular and the food is just as good! I ordered the squid and it was the perfect, light seafood dish. Very fresh and delicious. I also ordered the strawberry spritz which was so refreshing. Highly recommended to all visitors.

Excellent choice in every possible way. Absolutely delicious and well presented food. Nice and efficient service. Lovely view and nice atmosphere. Don't miss to try the black risotto and the truffle and mushrooms pasta!

The food was excellent, the main dishes even fantastic. Ante, our waiter made the evening even more enjoyable. The restaurant has is stylish without being overly luxurious. The main dishes (tuna and sea Bass) were fantastic. So much so, that we will come back tomorrow. Definately a recommandation, even more because the prices are actually lower than in other restaurants in the Old Town where the food and service is not on the same level.

This was an amazing dining experience. We flew in from NYC and had quite a travel journey before walking around and coming across this restaurant. Our waiter Ante was absolutely wonderful! He gave us great recommendations and ensured that my boyfriend and I learned a little culinary history during our dinner. The black risotto was phenomenal and I could not recommend it more! The views of the water were also stunning. HIGHLY recommend!
Obren was an excellent waiter he made our experience pleasant and delightful. The food was delightful- will be back again.
By far the best experience!! The best food!! And more importantly the best service by Robert ,, he was amazing!! And the most beautiful experience I’ve ever had
Exceeded all our expectations! Robert provided the best service we’ve had in Europe all year. Food was immaculate. Couldn’t recommend more!

SUPERB LOCATION FACING THE PORT AND THE SEA
WIDE MAP
GOOD QUALITY PRICE FOR DUBROVNIK
RESPONSIVE AND PROFESSIONAL SERVICE

We had a wonderful evening here for dinner. 

Service impeccable, food delicious, wine was beautifully prepared by our sommelier. A very special evening, made all the more so by the wonderful food, ambience and staff.

We had the platter of local cheese, followed by seafood and the most beautifully tender lamb cutlets. 

The restaurant is in a beautiful location also. 

Highly recommended!

Elegant atmosphere, good food and wine, and excellent service at this lovely restaurant right on the Old Town harbor in Dubrovnik. The tables on the terrace likely need a reservation, but we were seated just behind them and the view was still good. They had a wide variety of seafood and meats, in addition to a very nice vegetarian daily special.
The black rice: delicious, the rice with seafood even better, the service terrible, the waiters with long faces and little patience, the place very very nice

Great food and an even better ambiance. Our serverObren was very friendly and accommodating. 
We ate sure to return.
Dinner was superb! And the ambiance is spectacular. Great for romantic dinner. We will return for sure.

Delicious food with a good variety. 
Beautiful setting on the terrace. 
Staff were excellent, especially nemanja who looked after us extremely well.
Marko was a great server and location was beautiful. Squid is a must have and the fish soup was lovely.
Had the Squid here and it was 10/10. Not to mention the location and especially the service from Marko! I will be recommending this restaurant to all friends back home who are visiting Dubrovnik.

The excellent food was only beaten by the excellent service from the staff. We stopped by on a busy Tuesday lunch but got a table by the sea.

The staff were very accommodating to the children and couldn’t do enough to keep them entertained. They made sure that the experience was first class.

The food was excellent and the seafood risotto was one of the best I have had.

Bravo!

I come to Dubrovnik every few months and nothing makes me feel more at home than spending time at Gradska kavana Arsenal. The ambiance, the spectacular views (both harbour and city side), the warm friendly service and divine gastronomy are consistent with the level you can expect from a Michelin Star! 

Hvala puno to Obren, Ivo and Marijo Krkic as amazing hosts! Marijo’s impressive knowledge of local Croatian wines are nothing short of a sommelier. Looking forward to more fine dining at your lovely place!
Fantastic food and service. Each dish was an exciting taste experience. Fantastic combined. A perfect night out.
Great food and menu - lovely atmosphere and beautiful views over the harbour as the sun went down - staff really attentive and recommended tasty dishes - wonderful last night in this great restaurant

We tried to get a reservation for dinner but they were fully booked 2 nights in a row so we dropped in for a late lunch (about 3pm). We sat on the patio facing the histori harbor; what a fabulous view! We ordered their seafood stew which was incredible. The Croatian chardonnay was one of the best I've had in a long time. Our waiter was attentive and we never felt rushed to finish. I highly recommend this restaurant.

Arsenal must have one of the best restaurant views in all of Dubrovnik. We had a delicious lunch of tuna and chicken with drinks. Ivan was very courteous and friendly, quick to get our food, and made sure everything was to our liking. Arsenal is easy to recommend with tasty food, incredible views, and friendly service!
First class food and service. Would highly recommend this beautiful restaurant in a stunning location. Very reasonable prices too.

Went for drinks and dessert here and it was beautiful.
Would recommend booking in advance to get seated outside. Inside views were still great.
Service was A*

I had booked a table for 20 for lunch on the Saturday as part of an annual photography competition and for dinner for two on our arrival in the city on the Thursday. 

We arrived too early to check into our apartment, so had lunch here on the Thursday too. 

We ended up eating here about five times over four days. Breakfast, lunch and dinner. 

This place has a perfect location. We had tables overlooking the harbour and the square so the views were great. 

The food is excellent and they offer a good varied menu throughout the day. 

The staff are attentive and friendly. 

The prices aren’t too bad for Dubrovnik, which is a very expensive city. 

Highly recommended.

The food is one of the best in Dubrovnik with a reasonable price and super nice view. Igor is also being very helpful and makes us feel welcomed. The shrimp tartare, octopus salad and duck breast are most impressed and definitely recommend to try. Would love to return for another meal than randomly bumped into other restaurants in Dubrovnik.
Super fresh seafood while amazing views of Dubrovnik. I'd highly recommend the fish and chips at this place.
The food and service was fantastic. Situated in a truly beautiful setting at the harbour. We had lunch and it was perfection.

We were seated on the courtyard side and it was beautiful, very atmospheric with piano music playing. My husband is gluten and dairy free and they had a couple of options he could have. This was the best meal we had in Dubrovnik, really great service and would recommend to everyone.
I had a great time in this restaurant! Obren's service was impeccable and the breakfast was really tasty. To top it all off, the view was magnificent!
We had a wonderful 3 course Menu, everything was delicious. The Building is beautiful and the View just stunning. The Service was so friendly and we will surely come again.
One of the best restaurants in Dubrovnik if not the best! Food was amazing and the staff was super friendly.

A great time with friends!
We arrived without a reservation but the waiter did everything possible to find us a table (2 people)
The meal was excellent and a really great waiter who introduced us to local wines!
Best restaurant on our road trip in Croatia.
It still represents a budget but in big cities it is general.
No regrets !

What an amazing restaurant, we were a walk in, very lucky to get a table at the front, it was early 1815. Staff were knowledgeable, friendly and attentive. The food and service was outstanding, cocktails, food and wine, all superb. Deserves a Michelin star, best meal that we had by far in Dubrovnik. Would definitely recommend

My fiance made a reservation here for one of our dinners in Dubrovnik. We sat outside right by the water - such a beautiful ambience with live music. The food was excellent - we had incredible burrata with pesto (that I'm still thinking about), two delicious veggie pastas (both of us are vegetarians), and tiramisu for dessert! Service was great too and we felt that pricing was a good deal given the setting and quality of the food and service. One of our top dining experiences in Dubrovnik for sure!
Stefan provided both excellent service and a great experience. He gave us excellent suggestions on other things to do and gave us his assistance with transportation & entertainment

Had an early dinner at this lovely restaurant overlooking the harbour right a really magical experience, watching the boats coming in and out. Had a table right by the harbour edge.

Just literally pitched up and the friendly staff gave us this lovely table.
It is the Dubrovnik food festival this week and we had the set menu. My husband had the meat menu and I had the fish three courses beautifully presented and explained by the very helpful Waiters. My husband had a couple of glasses of the local wine to accompany the meal. Thoroughly recommend this restaurant and especially the “meal deal “.

Extremely high standard of hospitality, atmosphere, quality of food and preparation. Very friendly staff and personal and appreciative service. The entire team makes the stay a special experience. We felt very well looked after and well looked after. Fantastic location. Highly recommended!

We went last night without a reservation and, after being seated in the bar area for a very short wait, were given a delightful table on the harbour side. Faultless food, wine, service and atmosphere in a stunning, historic location. 
Would especially recommend the soup, breads, tuna, beef gnocchi and almond cake.
Great food, service and atmosphere in the centre of Old Town. Went several time for lunch. Always amazing.

Fantastic view, calm atmosphere, good food - I had breakfast eggs benedict.
Drinks are good, I had a mojito.
In October there are not too many people - so you can get seated without a queue.
Fantastic location, staff are so helpful and the food was amazing! Price is reflective of the area but views are amazing, worth a visit!
Great view with excellent service. Best dinner we had in Dubrovnik. Food was also good. They have good wine selection too.

Great atmosphere, with great terraces with a view of the harbor or the city. 
Ante served us on the first day of the food festival and explained the different dishes to us wonderfully. Special requests for vegetarian guests were also taken into account. 
We thought it was so great that we ate here on two evenings and had breakfast straight away:)

Obren was our server at this lovely port side restaurant (hotel). We were here for breakfast and he was able to get us some delicious oysters from Ston as well. Portions were large, and delicious bread was also provided. He even surprised us at the end with house made liquor. Def recommend!

I ordered a latte with coconut milk, it looked curdled when It arrived, they quickly changed it for a very delicious cappuccino
Beautiful location on both sides of the restaurant, this time I opted for the city view.
Happy waiters happy life!!! 
Perfect service!!!

Arsenal has a great breakfast menu, simple but delicious. The servers are wonderful and make sure you have everything you need. I personally love the Benedict, and their "Orlando" breakfast. Bread baskets are included with a few breakfasts and they have the *best* honey and jam ❤️ highly recommend this spot on the terrace, and thanks to Obren especially for making my multiple visits such a treat!

Really wonderful meal in this fantastic restaurant in a fantastic setting right next to the harbour in Dubrovnik!

Very friendly staff who were extremely helpful and attentive! 

Quality of food was exceptional! 

Would highly recommend! 

We are here twice during our visit to Croatia once for breakfast and once for evening meal. Could not fault anything!

Best meal I had in 20 days of traveling, beautiful place, fantastic atmosphere, smell of the Adriatic, from the hosts to the waiter who served me, Ante (that was his name) they were all super professional, polite, they explained the dishes with care and Everything ended up being perfect.
Bojan was really helpful and the food was amazing! With this view, it’s really worth taking a moment of my Croatia trip to be in this restaurant
Definitely recommend! Excellent location with a beautiful view, and amazing service we had. Thanks waiter Bojan. Delicious cheese paired with wine.

This is a wonderful restaurant. Our host was Obren and he was soooo friendly. The food was delicious. I had Octopus salad! It was extraordinary. The view of Adriatic Sea from our table in the back terrace was spectacular. When you come to Dubrovnik, come to Arsenal.
Nice place with good sevice and delicious local food! Good worth for money! Wide range of warm drinks, wine and sweets.
Couldn’t recommend this place more! The views were amazing & the food was even better (highly recommend the tuna). Obren was the best waiter

After a short search for somewhere to eat in Dubrovnik we picked this restaurant - without booking we walked in for an evening meal - I think booking would be necessary during peak season. The setting, staff, service and food was perfect. We had our meal sat at the front of the restaurant looking at the square then moved to the back for drink and a beautiful view of the harbour. Our meal was just over €100.00 for a bottle of wine, a steak and sea bass so pretty standard. Would definitely recommend
Great service, great menu in heart of old town. Food was exellent. Clean an nice restaurat with a view
Beautiful place! Amazing food and the waiter, Bojan was a highlight! Trully amazing service and his beautiful energy we’ve enjoyed so much! We will be back!

Absolutely fabulous place. Super views- ask for a table overlooking the sea! 
Food was tremendous. Definitely book ahead. We had the special pasta as a starter to share which was very unusual and delicious! Followed by the lamb and the beef steak. Both were perfect. We had the pistachio and chocolate puddings with a glass of the dessert wine. The staff were attentive and polite. The setting is just very special, especially with the pianist and his fellow musician it made the night. Not really any more expensive than anywhere else.

This has an incredible view, it's a very busy restaurant and best to book but the food and service was excellent. Its always good to try other restaurants but for us this was our favourite of the 4 we tried in Dubrovnik.

We were in Dubrovnik for five days and we had breakfast here for three of them. The location by the harbour is beautiful. The waiting staff were all very friendly and welcoming without exception. The breakfast menu had a good choice of food. Between us we tried four of the dishes and they were all very tasty and came with complimentary bread and pastries which were also very good. The coffee was very good too. I would really recommend this restaurant for breakfast.
Wonderful lunch at this beautiful restaurant. Marco gave us great service and the view is unbeatable! Had a wonderful salad and great aperol spritz.

An excellent meal. We both started with fresh oysters followed by the tuna with avocado and broad beans paired exquisitely with the rose (recommended by waiter). Baby potatoes with garlic and rosemary were delicious. Meal completed with an espresso martini. Service was excellent. A memorable meal for the right reasons.
Always fabulous service - so friendly and just an ideal spot to people watch and enjoy the best that Dubrovnik has to offer.

Dubrovnik is a beautiful city and packed with great bars and restaurants. After a couple of days of orientating ourselves, we settled upon Gradska Kavana Arsenal as the perfect spot to sit as the sun goes down, listen to the swallows above and watch the world go by in a fantastic setting.

The service here is so welcoming and friendly from all staff, but Blaise did a great job of looking after us on our second visit here. A really good drinks menu, especially for well made cocktails.

Not eaten here for a meal, but did have a side of fries and tried the amazing almond cake. Both delicious.

First time visiting Dubrovnik and what a way to start the visit. Lovely breakfast of the Orlando and Classic Omelette with a Bloody Mary and mimosa at a very reasonable price. Great view and great service from Ante and the team. Would highly recommend.
Great breakfast with a lovely view and reasonably priced. Ante and the rest of the staff were very attentive and service was great. Would recommend for a breakfast in Old Town.

Great service, delicious food and unbeatable view. Ante was our server and was very attentive yet gave us our time to enjoy our breakfast. We had mimosas- perfect amount of OJ, multivitamin juice- delish, cafe latte- great espresso and the Orlando and ham Benedict. All was delish and very reasonably priced! Might even come back for dinner

Since it was very hot when we arrived, we decided to order beer instead of wine. We ordered the Karlovacko draft, which was very refreshing. From the Cold Dishes we ordered the Oysters, Burrata and Bread selection with a side of olives. For our entrées we ordered the Black Risotto and Chicken. The portion sizes were large and we had no room for dessert. If you come here, I would suggest you make a reservation and if possible, request a table outside by the water, which had very lovely views. I highly recommend this restaurant and would not hesitate to return.

Fantastic food at a very fair price and at a very charming location. Stjepan was extremely helpful with his recommendations which we followed to our delightment. Overall, an experience to remember. Definitely recommended!

Great view, great food, fantastic service. Our server Bojan was very friendly and helpful. They helped us with reservations at their sister restaurant, Restaurant Panorama. We even got some cheesecake on the house.
Just great. The service was the best, the view is great and the food is delicious. A place to enjoy and repeat

This restaurant is perfect in every respect. The food is great, the wines, local are excellent and not overpriced and the location is unbeatable, right on the harbour side. Every member of staff we encountered was friendly and knowledgeable. 5 Star!

Amazing location, fantastic waiter (Stjepan) 
who gave great recommendations of both wine and food. 5/5 - would & will come here agian.
Super nice location, wonderful food with lots of flavor. Friendly and generous staff. I would absolutely go back here for food and drinks.

Walked in on a Sunday evening early October and got a beautiful table on the corner of the terrace inside the square (they also have a terrace facing the water on the other side). The staff was very nice (an especially friendly manager was very helpful). Gnocchi and mushroom pasta were both delicious and the dessert spread had very tasty traditional options (almond cream cake was excellent). Perfect people watching spot for a lovely evening.

This dinner was one of the highlights of our trip. We managed to get a table outside by the marina with Stjepan as our server, who was attentive and very friendly. The food was absolutely delicious, far exceeding our expectations. I’d recommend trying to get a reservation here as it seems like getting a table, even in the shoulder season, is difficult without one unless you dine early. Would 100% come back.

Obren was our wait staff for this evening, he was attentive kind and so patient. 
The show they put on for pouring the wine just sets the mood you’re in for a good experience. 
The food was amazing and the location was perfect. We really enjoyed our meal here, I would say it’s been our favourite all week !
Know this restaurant from a HK YouTuber. The food and the vibe are amazing. Highly recommend this restaurant to both couples and families.

Lovely lunch with a great view, service is amazing as well as the food. The wine that was recommended was a delight. I would especially recommend the Oysters, tuna tartare and the Sailors Risotto. All in all an amazing afternoon at Gradska Kavana Arsenal.
Delicious food in a stunning setting on the harbour. Stjepan was a great host and was very knowledgable. Would definitely recommend.
Kind of over rated. The service was average and menus not exciting. Probably be able to find better in Dubrovnik with little effort.

What an amazing place. Steeped in history in a superb setting. Our host Nemanja was amazing. This was the penultimate event to a fantastic visit to Dubrovnik. If you visit Dubrovnik, then you definitely need come here for a meal. At least once!

Wow, what a way to summarise our honeymoon. Me and my husband went here for dinner on this Tuesday evening and were greeted efficiently and warmly. Every server who saw to us was fantastic, by being friendly, professional and very informative. The highest standard of service we experienced on our holiday by far, we found the service attentive to the perfect balance. 
Despite a haphazard being crosswind, we were very looked after and we're made to feel like VIPs. Food and wine was lovely,.and very reasonably priced for the experience and taste. We appreciated all the efforts and big thanks again to our brilliant servers. 
When we return to the city, will be seeing you again!

Treat yourself to a delicious breakfast ( many options) in a stunning location overlooking the old port. Absolutely excellent service- professional and friendly. Perhaps a bit more expensive than some cafes but worth it!

Outstanding restaurant, food, service, venue, views, and dusk. Helpful hint: they were supposedly full—unable to reserve in advance. We showed up 545 after tour and waited 10 minutes at the bar and got a wonderful seat overlooking the harbor.
View was amazing and the food was oytstanding . Obren our waiter was very nice and very attentive. Definitely worth a visit.
Fabulous service, foods and views - Bojan who served us was very helpful and friendly. Highly recommend breakfast , just drinks or any meal

Amazing service and food. Drinks were great value - better than other bars and restaurants in Dubrovnik - coupled with the live music and fantastic views. Davor was very attentive and looked after us well!
Top of the top in service by Mr. Davor, amazing food and experience 🧡🩷💚 from beginning till end we were very exited and happy. Thank you

Absolutely great location including a sea view.
Although we didn't have a reservation, we were given a very friendly welcome and were shown to a table after a short wait.
We were served excellently by Marko.
We'd love to come back!!!

We stopped by here as we wanted some tea, and not only tea, but cake too. Tea and cake together is hard to find in the Dubrovnik Old Town. The choices of cake looked lovely so we took a seat overlooking the square in front of Orlando’s Column. We only waited about 3-4 minutes for a free table which is well worth it. Many folks came along and when told there were no free tables, they just walked off again. So it was well worth the short wait and we ended up with the best table on the terrace. We were at the front, far right hand corner, overlooking the square. There is seating inside, and even a superb restaurant out the back overlooking the City Port, but we never did that. 

We order our tea and cake and sat watching the world stroll by. A great place to not only people watch, but we saw a couple of newly weds having their photographs taken in the square too. Being a devoted tea drinker, the tea was the best tea I had since I left the UK several weeks prior. It was the most enjoyable pot of tea I had ever had. The pot served two cups, and I even asked if the tea was a viable to buy anywhere (as I am travelling around Europe for a few months and I was desperate for some decent English breakfast/black tea. Sadly, it was not available to buy except here, alas, alas. My partner had a huge slice of apple pie and I had ‘Cake of the Day’, which was chocolate cake with a tiny hint of orange. I don’t normally like chocolate orange as a combination but this was delicious! The tea was so devine and in such a great location to enjoy it that we ordered more. I couldn’t tell you about the food, nor the experience on the other side but I strongly recommend you try anything here for the fine experience. The servers were incredibly smart and professional and very attentive. They were all very handsome in their uniforms and looked like male models. If you ever fancy some fine tea and cake - together, this is the place to go.

This is a lovely, grand restaurant, with two outlooks, one over the small harbour and the other over a busy square. Both are lovely. A classy place for a drink, snack or meal. Staff pleasant too. Worth a visit.

This spot is fantastic. I have to say the service is absolutely amazing and so is the food. Ivan is probably the most professional and lovely person here, he gave amazing recommendations and made this a 5 star experience. This is my second year in a row coming to this restaurant and this will always be my first meal each time in the future!

The place is perfect: in front of the old port in Dubrovnik, in the heart of the old city. The dishes (special mention for the gnocchis) and wine are fantascic! Prices are reasonable regarding the quality.
The service is really nice. You can only have a pleasant time there! Many thanks to Marijo who took care of us during the whole service! We will come back again for sure!

After a couple hours of rain, the skies cleared perfect evening for dining on the Square and old town Dubrovnik ensued. Wanting to try some of the local specialties. I ordered the oysters and the black cuddle fish risotto. The waiter recommended pairing it with a local white wine, a 2022 Malvasija Dubrovacka from Karaman. The risotto was a perfect blend of flavors. Tender cuttlefish, perfectly cooked rice, and richness from the stock. 

The service was attentive but reserved. The ambiance magical. After dinner I was treated to a local walnut liquor. Delicious and complimentary. 

A highly polished operation and a perfect dining experience. 

Thanks to the chef and the whole crew!
Perhaps the best place in Dubrovnik if you consider the quality of the service, the selection of drinks and the location. We recommend everyone to visit this place.

We enquired about booking a table and the waiter told us to come back later as there were allocated seats for walk in customers. We came back at 18.30, only to be told there were no tables and to wait in line for 45 minutes! We didn't wait. Why couldn't he have just told us the truth at the beginning and we coukd have made a decision then?
Fantastic location, attentive service even though it was very busy. Great unpretentious Mediterranean style food. What more to say? Well worth a visit.
Wonderful breakfast, amazing customer service by Marco and an incredible view of the port. We went back the following day! Highly recommend. Also great with us being gluten free.

I had tried to book for dinner but they were full., hence we ended up booking for lunch on our last day. We were seated on the terrace directly at the front with a lovely view of the harbour. Waiters were very attentive. Our meals came quick and we enjoyed them immensely. Beautiful tiramisu for dessert. Lovely waiter brought us a dessert liqueur on him!. Recommend this restaurant highly.

This is like two restaurants one on the harbor one on the main square, both great.

Have breakfast in the harbor, best in town. Have drinks and dinner in the square while people watching. 

If you are lucky you will be served by Robert, great server - polite, friendly, prompt. After first time we specifically went to the sections he served that day. Thanks Robert.

Food was very yummy and well priced. Great views! 

Abcdefghijklmanopqrstuvwxyz now I know my abcs n
Beautiful location and very tasty food for a good price. Absolutely recommended! We'll be happy to come back.
Obren was a wonderful waiter and I had the best food ever (and i went to multiple michelin restaurants). I really advice the black risoto and truffle mushroom pasta. And what a view truly amazing

Today we went to Arsenal for dinner for our final night in Dubrovnik. Obren was our waiter and he did a great job. We asked him things about the food and he was always there to help us. The food itself was the best food I ever ate. We had the truffle and mushroom pasta and also the black risotto. I can only recommend it. Also the view is breathtaking

We had such a lovely evening sipping wine and people watching with amazing views of old town. We came for dinner the food was plentiful and our server Robert was efficient and suggested great wines. Thank you, Robert! We had a great time! 🤩🤩
Bojan was an amazing server and made excellent dinner recommendations. He smiled throughout the entire evening and loves what he does! We highly recommend this restaurant and ask for Bojan!
If I could have given this place 6 out of 5 I would. Staff excellent. Menu choice fantastic. Location perfect. Prices to be expected for the quality of venue, but not eye watering.

This restaurant was perfect. Online said was fully booked, but we were able to still be seated outside with view of the water. Service, food, and experience were excellent. Ivan was an amazing waiter as well. Would definitely return!

This place is a must go Dubrovnik 🙂 you get a vibrant atmosphere, live music, delicious food and e ver so kind staff. On top of all of this you get an exquisite view and elegant room!!! We give a especial Thanks to Vlaho, that welcomed us in such warm and fun way and Mario that gave us an excellent recomendation.
Great breakfast/brunch, excellent service from Obren & colleagues in a perfect location overlooking the harbour. Good coffee & fresh juices.

Very mixed opinion…

We had reserved a table the day before for the following evening, when we arrived, no reservation in our name, we had to “fight while speaking English” to be deigned to accept us…
Once this bad experience was over, we ordered a black risotto (which was very good, I enjoyed it) for €21 and my partner “the chef’s pasta”, so…. Never seen. Pasta for €18 mixed with a kind of carrot and beetroot puree without much flavor...
So far, really not great and very expensive.
Let's not talk about the drinks which are also excessively expensive.

In short, the plus points:
- the framework
- risotto

In really bad points:

- the noise
- pasta
- the costs ! (You will definitely find excellent quality at a better price elsewhere in Dubrovnik)

I expected more based on the comments... quite disappointed for my part.
Food was great as well as the service. Alexander took care of everything! Location is awesome!!!would come back in the future

Arsenal is such a great spot for dinner. You can’t beat the ambiance, the views, but most importantly the food. We has steak, roasted veggies and creamed veg soup. Very tasty and the steak was cooked to perfection! Book ahead for reservation for the best spot. We had a great server Ante and he let us in in his favorite dessert, the pistachio… MUST HAVE!! it’s the perfect ending to our scrumptious dinner.

Excellent, fresh food (try the tuna medium rare), accompanied by kind and attentive service. Aleksandar (the waiter) will fill you in on some pretty special walnut digestive after dinner, he was a pleasure!

We recommend this establishment!
A priori at the beginning which very quickly faded.
Friendly, pleasant service... Yvon is a remarkable guy!
Risotto at its best! Don't miss this signature dish.
Tiramisu very well revisited.
We did not expect this level of quality worthy of a Michelin star.
Not to mention a breathtaking view of the port throughout the meal!
A sure value in Dubrovnik.

Walked in and served a table for two. This was a long day walking around Lokrum Island and made a perfect ending to the day.

We chose from the light bite menu with drinks. Very reasonably priced with beautiful views of the port.

Could not fault the service. Highly recommend.

I have just returned from 11 nights in Dubrovnik. We found this restaurant about 3 days into our stay and had coffee here. It gave a great first impression, and we kept on going back for coffees, lunches and evening meals. First, the food, is exceptional. The menu isn't long, but whatever is served is prepared and cooked to perfection. We tried very many of the choices on the menu across our stay. Second, the location is stunning. Whether you are facing the harbour or the square, or eating inside, the atmosphere is just perfect. Third, the service was second to none. All the waiting staff were great and sometimes watching them, it was like it had been choreographed. But we must give a special mention to Nemanja. He was friendly, attentive, knowledgable, gave us great advice on the wine, and absolutely impeccable in the service he provided. We really could not have asked for a better eating destination, and appreciate so much the contribution Nemanja made to our experience there. What a great guy! Thanks to all at this wonderful restaurant.

I just finished a review of the old town fortress in Dubrovnik Croatia and it was not a good review, but fortunately there is a light in the forest at this location that turns trash into class and personality into hope.
I am talking about the Arsenal Restaurant that is situated in the fortress with a great view to the harbour and a waiter named "ERMIN" who is a professionally trained waiter who knows that presentation and information make for a great meal. 
This restaurant is not cheap to eat at (140 Euros for 3 not including the tip).
This restaurant is nicely appointed, very clean and efficiently ran by well organized servers, which included Ermin.
Ermins recommendations and his upbeat personality made this meal a treat to be remembered.
Thanks to Ermin, he turned an otherwise waisted day in the old town fortress into something enjoyable and positive.
DAVE C
TORONTO CANADA
We went there fir dinner. Beautiful place, and delicious food. Blaze was our server and he was really great.

Just a walk by & asked….? Seated immediately & had a wonderful meal with a superb bottle of wine. Impeccable service.
Wonderful surroundings & a totally joyous evening….. thank you to the staff.

We had an excellent meal at the Gradska, we were lucky to get a table on the front row overlooking the harbor and the view was beautiful. Ante served us and his service was first class, very friendly and helpful throughout the meal. The food itself was fantastic, the truffle pasta was a particular highlight. Highly recommend visiting

Had the best dining experience. The location is beautiful, with a great view of boats coming in and out of the harbour. Ante served us and provided the best service, making our experience great - he even suggested the black risotto which we couldn’t get enough of. Would highly recommend and will definitely be visiting again.

We had our eye on this restaurant during our stay in Dubrovnik, and decided to leave it for our last dinner here. Needless to say I’m so happy we did, because this is the best dinner experience we have had and we will remember it for a while to come. We both had the seafood risotto, and for any seafood lovers out there , this is a must during your stay here. This was the best seafood risotto we have had in Dubrovnik, and very reasonably priced as well. Our waiter Ante was most hospitable, and took care of us during the whole dinner. Thank you for making our last dinner in Dubrovnik special!
Very nice restaurant with fresh fish. Perfect for our first night in Dubrovnik. Wonderful view over the harbor. I’d recommend.

This was a lovely romantic dinner on promenade with bell towers at each end and views of stained glass windows backlit at night. Our service from Nemanja was outstanding as was the meal (veal and truffle pasta dinner). We lingered long our meal enjoying the festive atmosphere! Thank you for a lovely experience.

Came for dinner for two with a baby. The waiters were very accommodating and friendly, special mention to Nemanja. Food was delicious - we had truffle and mushroom spaghetti and the beef gnocchi. A beautiful memorable evening.

Absolutely loved our experience at Gradiska Kavana Arsenal. Our meals were delicious and the service was as amazing and a special mention to Josip for his great personal attention. We will definitely be back again.

Everything from location to food and service was phenomenal. Our waiter, Ante, did an excellent job navigating us through the menu and was on point with his recommendations. He was prompt and polite, and provided the just the right amount of personality. In terms of food, mussels, fish stew and pistachio cake were excellent. Couldn't have asked for a better first night iut in Croatia.
Can’t say enough about this place! It was incredible, all food, drinks, views and service! Ante made our evening and was brilliant! Highly recommend
Beautiful food, excellent service. Marco our waiter was happy to answer all our questions, and very knowledgable about the menu. Perfect location and live music.
Fantastic meal and highly recommend the seabass and mussels, with thanks to Marco for his attentive service
Service was long and friendly. food very fresh. The location is right next to the port. We ordered the black risotto. You must not miss it.

Beautiful restaurant on the water with a cool breeze on hot days. I had the Italian coffee and it was yummy and elegantly served. The food was excellent. Robert was our server and he made our dining experience memorable!

This elegant restaurant overlooking the docks was a wonderful experience during our stay in Dubrovnik! The food was superb and the service was excellent! Marijo was super attentive and I would highly recommend it to any visiting Dubrovnik! I had the baked seabass, cooked the local way and it was delicious! The pistachio cake is a nice end to a meal also.

Lovely place to sit and eat (a well cooked breakfast that is good value for money) overlooking the harbour. Ante our waiter was very friendly and accommodating, would definitely recommend this restaurant

Wonderful food - particularly the squid ink risotto

Great view and atmosphere with live music

Brilliant service by our waiter Obren.

Gluten free friendly.

We have had Excellent service, great views and good food. I would recommend!

The price is fair for the quality of experience.

Beautiful restaurant, amazing waiter named Marijo who was so friendly. He was so attentive to our table and very polite. The food was so delicious, I had the monkfish and it was cooked beautifully. The whole experience was spectacular for our last night in Dubrovnik. I would highly recommend this restaurant for your visit.
The most fabulous restaurant in Dubrovnik with a fabulous view. The food and service was second to none and Ivon was superb!
Lovely setting and service. Nice choice of standard, local fare. Varied beverage selection, including many local wines.

Can’t stop myself from visiting this restaurant over again. 
They take care of every order right and don’t let you wait any longer. 
Everything is simply perfect about this place. Highly suggested. Thank you Gradska Kavana Arsenal 😊

The ambiance…the view and the food was so great..our waiter Ante was so good explaining and taking time to assist and recommend different food and wine for the occasion..everything was first class…i love to come back here

Food was excellent and the service was spectacular. Our server ANTE made sure everything was ok from our appetizer to our main entree and desserts. He was EXCEPTIONAL! Overall experience was AMAZING! Will definitely come back here.
Very tasty fish with a great view over the harbor. Very friendly staff and always present to answer guests' needs
It was such a lovely night we had as our last night in Dubrovnik it was a wonderful finish - delicious food and wonderful service

This evening I had a delicious meal here with my girlfriend in a beautiful location. The service was very friendly.
Definitely recommended to eat here!

Spectacular service and to-die for food! Could not beat this beautiful restaurant on the harbour - or the street front. The wait staff could not be faulted. Truffle linguine was just absolutely amazing - as was the beef steak with parsnip. We would dine here every night if we lived here - or at least for every special occasion. The cellist/pianist duo were fabulously talented with a great mix of modern music with a twist. Could not recommend this restaurant highly enough and the owners should be incredibly proud of what they have achieved 😊

This was a singularly incredible restaurant. Beautiful music. Beautiful and FANTASTIC food

The black risotto was like a warm hug 🫶
Fresh oysters with Negronis were 🥰
Live strings in the background was ☺️

This was wonderful hospitality. Blaise was our host and made us feel so welcome in this city and this country!!

We were in a hurry and they accommodated us perfectly and then our plans changed and they treated us like old friends. 10/10
Great vibe and the black risotto was amazing. Also staff were very nice and funny. We also got the fish stew
Excellent service. .The lamb chops and the beef fillet were really good.The waiters are really good the service is great

Absolutely amazing food and great service, waiter was splendid and always making jokes!
Complimentary shot… Little Bugger haha
Would definitely return!

Obren was an incredible waiter - his recommendations from the menu and for activities to do in Dubrovnik were great. All the food and drinks were unbelievable as well, the best meal we’ve had in Croatia so far!

The location, the food, the drinks, all is super!!!!! Great experience with my wife!!! Actually was the best one in Europ. We went to Italy and France but this restaurant in croatia was the best one! Special thanks to Stjepan!!!! Your guidance and help was great!!!! Thank you Arsenal and Stjepan!
As for a table next to the water, stunning view, very romantic. Friendly staff and great food. Enjoy!

The food was delicious and we thoroughly enjoyed our dining experience, but the service was unparalleled. Our waiter, Marijo Krkic, was extremely helpful in guiding us through the menu and even suggested a personal favorite from the wine selection. He was well versed in wines, and we thoroughly enjoyed hearing about the regional wines. We look forward to returning.

We had a great dining experience here at arsenal, we made this reservation over a month ago and got sat at a table on the patio facing the harbor- simply gorgeous! We started with the burrata which was ordered gluten free, our waiter Marco noticed there was bread added on, took it back and had a new one made for us immediately. He also gave a great Sauvignon blanc bottle recommendation, however due to the business of the dinner service we did have to pour our own wine & water throughout the meal. The black risotto is a MUST order & was insanely delicious - when I dropped some on my dress Marco brought stain remover to save the day. We were treated to a delicious complimentary Croatian pear after-dinner drink to finish a great meal. Was a wonderful evening and we will definitely be returning the next time we are in Dubrovnik!

Obren was fantastic , friendly and professional . 
Highly recommended for those in Dubrovnik . Great place for breakfast , lunch and diner

A fabulous spot nestled within the old town.
Hostess and waiter friendly, helpful and clearly love contributing to such an amazing dining experience. 
Delicious food, good menu selection and fantastic cocktails!!
We would come back for sure :)

Staff is incredible, especially Ivan.

The Prawn Carpaccio was absolutely to die for. Would come back just for that. But the view here is just…wow. What an incredible way to experience Dubrovnik. Highly recommend!!

Both service and the food was amazing! Favorite place so far during our trip to Dubrovnik. Our waiter Ivan was super attentive, friendly and took care of us very well! We definitely recommend the beautiful seating in the back!

Lovely meal and service in a beautiful location within the walls of Dubrovnik’s old city. We had the tuna fillet and the lamb which were beautifully cooked, plated and served. Despite being in a touristy location, the meal wasn’t
We had Bojan as a server and he was absolutely outstanding. We highly recommend and if your lucky enough to get Bojan your in for a great evening with unreal service and great company and attitude.

This is my first time in Croatia and I was excited to dine here due to the great reviews. I came at 4p- an easy time to walk in without a reservation. All was fine initially- was seated at a lovely table near the water, ordered a glass of wine and an appetizer. After that, service disappeared. Waited for forever to order a 2nd glass of wine and another appetizer. In total I had to get up three times just to get someone's attention- shocking since many of the reviews commended the service. It was not busy (many open tables) so there was no excuse. Left early because I was tired of being ignored. Please teach your wait staff to care about EVERY table. I am a travel advisor, here to see/experience Croatia for the first time. This restaurant did not leave a good impression.
Good location, good food and Ivan is the best service you can get. Highly recommended!
Great spot for breakfast. Staff are very helpful. Only one breakfast gluten free options that were recommended by staff (omelette) - still good. Nice view of the wall and boats coming and going.

We were recommended this restaurant by family who had visited a few weeks before and we weren’t able to get a table but turned up late afternoon as a walk in and were delighted to get a table! It’s a beautiful restaurant set in the perfect harbour location and the food and service matches perfectly. The burrata starter and catch of the day were both superb!
Incredible dinner with incredible service. No need to say more - big thanks to Vlaho, Stjpa for making it a night to remember.
Went for dinner had Bojan and he was fantastic - we really enjoyed our night and he made it much more enjoyable.

We went out to celebrate the engagement of family and had an absolutely amazing experience! Our server, Bojan was outstanding and went above and beyond to make sure our experience was perfect. Thank you Bojan for the amazing evening! Highly recommend
Came here to celebrate my engagement with family. The food was great, the atmosphere and views were beautiful, and our waiter, Bojan, made sure to give us a wonderful experience.
Delicious good, warm friendly professional service, outstanding location on the sea. Lovely menu and wine list. Can’t wait to return.
Excellent service from our waiter Bojan, food was very good too! Amazing view! We returned for afternoon drinks on other side of building, beautiful spot!
And a good breakfast it was too. I had the full English ("Orlando") and my wife had eggs Benedict. Obren the waiter gave great service. Recommended!

The service and waiter was excellent. Beautiful location. Large and roomy with live entertainment. Highly recommend the octopus salad and mussels as well as gnocchis with bourbon sauce. Great local wine list as well

Obren was a fantastic waiter, took expert care of my food allergies. The food was cooked beautifully and the view is DIVINE. The location is perfect as well, right by a monument you don’t want to miss.

Absolutely beautiful spot for brunch. Prices were completely reasonable and food was delicious. Service was some of the best we’ve had the entire trip, so friendly and attentive. Highly recommend the mimosas!

Stephen was one of the most handsome yet accommodating friendly waiter we’re had in Dubrovnik. 
Thank you for the pleasant and entertaining conversation
Beautiful views, healthy breakfast was delicious and the mimosas were the best I’ve had in Dubrovnik. Excellent service from Stefan. Highly recommend.
the picture is a very accurate representation of the views- this is a truly brilliant place to have dinner- the food is magnificent, and the service equally so.
Overpriced! Very nice shop and from the most beautiful locations but not quality food and not a nice menu. Expensive for what they offer.

Very well located opposite the port of the old town. Discreet and fast service. Truffle Pasta Very good! Copious and good assortment of cheeses and cold meats. Without reservation on a Sunday lunchtime, no problem.

Dropped in for a drink and a snack, ended up staying for lunch. Fabulous view and great food, made for a relaxing afternoon. The staff were also very good. The prices were quite high, but about what you’d expect with this view in Dubrovnik. Would recommend!

This was our favourite meal in Dubrovnik. The view was incredible so we expected it to be extremely expensive (even more so than what is typical for the old town) but it was about the same as other restaurants without the view.
The service was excellent and very friendly. The food was also some of the best we had during our trip - we got the beef gnocchi and black risotto. 
The place is usually full, especially for dinner so book in advance if you can. We went for lunch after we didn’t manage to get a dinner reservation.
One thing to note: you are allowed to smoke at the table as it is an open air restaurant. This is standard in the area but something to bear in mind (it took something away from the meal when smoke floated over from a neighbouring table). It would have been nice if they separated some tables for those who want to smoke.

By far, best restaurant in town
The breakfast was delicious but the dinner was really superb
The incredible ambiance of the terrace next to the port, the quality and presentation of food, good local wine references, but mainly the excellent service of the crew...
You can go and you can be sure the level of excellence is a must ..congrats guys
Arguably the best location in Dubrovnik, smart waiters and efficient service and fabulous apple and almond pies. I understand it is also a place to be seen!
Excellent restaurant in the old port of Dubrovnik. Affable staff. Good value for money. The location is beautiful and welcoming. The menu is vast and varied. To return

Fabulous food especially the seaman’s paella. Love the ambience waiting to be seated. Cocktails in the cavern type area between the front and rear restaurant, serenaded by pianist and violinist. Fun trying to figure out their interpretation of a modern pop song - reminded me of the music on ‘Bridgerton’ very elegant,
Really fabulous meal at this lovely location in the heart of Old Town. The staff were friendly, welcoming and helpful, the food superb! We’ll be going back.

We went there to celebrate my daughter’s birthday! I booked 2 months ago and we had a great table!The food was fantastic!Top quality food and the most professional service!Very polite people!At the end because it was my daughters birthday they didn’t charge anything for the sweets!It was a surprise for me and made my daughter very happy!Thank you for all and for your fantastic food and service

On the old port this is a fabulous place for breakfast and watching the world go by. 

You can either have a table facing the water or on the other side the town. We opted for the town side as it was in the shade.

We went for an omelette and eggs Benedict which come with pastries and rolls included in the price.

Great coffee and again fabulous service.

With coffees it came to €30 so a great price.
Fantastic. Didn’t have a reservation so had a short wait for a table, but the food and service were excellent. A fine dining experience in the port of the old town and lovely views of the coastlin.

We came for breakfast as well as for lunch on separate days. The food was generally quite good, we had the omelette and Orlando for breakfast, and the fish stew and monkfish for lunch. We did not make reservations for both days and were sat inside with amazing views regardless. We were slightly disappointed with the service as both times we were generally ignored and had to resort to waving and calling in order to catch the waiter’s eyes. We watched as other customers who arrived after us were served earlier. Other than the service, the experience was generally quite good.

Do yourself a favor and go to this restaurant! 
You will see why!
Perfect food, staff, terrace.
Thank you and see you soon.
Delicious breakfast, fantastic price given all the extras included. Wonderful views over the jetty to Lokrum Island and excellent, friendly wait staff, especially Marco!
Unbeatable view and an excellent breakfast! Our waiter Marko was wonderful as well. This place came highly recommended from a friend from Dubrovnik and we definitely see why!
Thats was a really nice place. View from terrace is fantastic and breakfast was perfect. especially thanks to serving personnel ❤️

Me and my partner visited the Gradska Kavana after seeing numerous queues each night during our stay in Dubrovnik. It was clearly very popular and Reservations were fully booked for 10 days in advance with only a number of walk ins each night.

We planned to visit on our last night, however, due to rain, a number of terrace seats were unavailable and we were refused, we revisited twice after and got into the restaurant on our third attempt.

The restaurant was beautiful, the atmosphere was excellent and the staff and food was fantastic. I had the gnocchi and my partner had the linguini, both were extremely tasty and came out promptly after ordering.

Following our mains we were offered a free dessert due to our numerous attempts to get in, which was unnecessary but a lovely gesture. Left feeling full and satisfied after a very lovely evening.

Overall, we were dead impressed with the quality of service and standards of the restaurant, going above and beyond for their customers. Thank you for a great date night and we hope to visit you again soon!

Good location,
Nice view
Good service and interesting menu
But dishes were nothing special
Past was simple
Risotto well done😅

Best lasagna I’ve ever had in my life (and I’ve lived in Italy, which is saying something) I could eat it every day for the rest of my life. The poison pear was delightful - I was worried it may taste like “chemical”, but it was very smoothly done. My husband had the cuttlefish risotto, which he also enjoyed (if you like rich flavours!) will be back for sure! Make you have Mario as your waiter, he was lovely, honest and very attentive!
Obren was amazing!! Breakfast was affordable and the view was gorgeous. It’s a DO NOT miss when visiting Dubrovnik.
This place has the most incredible view of the Old Port and our server Obren had the most bubbly service, always smiling. This place is a breakfast must in Dubrovnik!!
Beautiful view of the water and lovely service. Our servers name was Obren and he was the sweetest! Would certainly recommend.
Obren was an amazing server - very kind & accommodating. The view were amazing, would absolutely come back again.
The food here was spectacular! The views of the sea added that extra touch of magic and our waiter Ivo was awesome! He knew the menu and was on point! So recommend it!! Go check it out!!

We had dinner at this spot, and we fall in Love with the view, the stuff & the food was extra delicious. That’s why we had to go back for breakfast and it was very delicious and not expensive at all. We were served by Bojan Neshovki who was very welcoming and kind. I highly recommend it
Everything was delicious! St Jepan was our waiter and the service was exceptional, he would return without a doubt, a success
Wonderful last dinner in Dubrovnik. Ante was extremely helpful in giving us recommendations. The black risotto was like nothing I’ve ever tasted. Will definitely be coming back.

We came to enjoy a romantic dinner because we spotted the restaurant and the stunning view. The service was the best from the beginning to end. The food was spectacular and we loved every part of the experience and are so thankful for being able to visit and enjoy. Special thanks to our waiter, Ante, who made our night extra special!
Ante was an amazing host. Food was fantastic and the backdrop of the harbour just finished it off. A must visit place for a wonderful evening.

We tried the restaurant again this year, this time for breakfast. The service, the coffee and appetizers were very good, but unfortunately the food was once again, average. We had eggs Benedict, that were unseasoned, the bun was not toasted, and the meat was less than satisfying, consisting of some heated up ham sortiment instead of bacon, according to the recipe. Hollandaise sauce was not rightfully balanced in taste.

A beautiful place with great food and service. Our waiter Stephan was very kind and he is the main reason for this kind review. That being said, the view is perfect, the ambiance is cozy, the food is very tasty, and the prices are okay. It is quite expensive, but everything in Dubrovnik is expensive. Would come again!
Simply top top top!!! Magical location, very friendly and professional service. The food was fantastic!!! The prices were absolutely reasonable. I'm looking forward to the next time!!!

This was one of the best restaurants we have been in Dubrovnik. Ante was amazing and very knowledgeable. He helped us with the best choices of the menu. Drinks were so delicious and the fish was to remember. I will come back when I’m visiting next time. Please give it a try, you won’t be disappointed. 😊
Amazing dinner with great views. Ante/Anthony was an amazing waiter who took his time to talk to us and also debone the fish skillfully.
Excellent food and service. Ante was an amazing waiter. Best place in the old town. Location can not be beaten. Black risotto was amazing
this spot is something special. Everything was so delicious and the service is just super. Ante was very helpful.
We had an amazing dinner, eating monkfish and tuna. Everything was great. Our waiter, Ante, has been so thoughtful and efficient. We recommend this place!

The view from the terrace on the ocean side was great, and the city and ocean were especially beautiful in the evening when the setting sun was setting☺️
It was crowded at night too, so I recommend it! The food was impeccable, with lots of delicious seafood dishes✨
Ante's customer service was great! Thank you so much!

Me. Ante is very nice guy.
He gave me good service and hospitality.
I recommend this restaurant absolutely .
The food was ok, but the service and the spot were incredible. Thank you to the staff, and especially Ante !

This restaurant was gorgeous from start to finish. Outstanding food, great ambiance and excellent service. Also felt very luxurious. We tried to book but they were full until September- so we took our chances and got a table by going early at 6.30 ish. Absolutely worth it! I had the mixed seafood risotto which was delicious

We walked in with a group of 6 and they did everything to get us a table. Where incredibly polite and welcoming Stjepan our waiter was amazing, again incredibly welcoming. Everyone raved about their food, very very happy.

Loved the location and look of this restaurant so checked out the menu and decided it was the perfect venue for breakfast. It didn’t look over priced either like most of the eateries in Dubrovnik. We visited on a Monday, didn’t book and were fortunate to get a table. 
The breakfast was really delicious. My daughter and I had the equivalent to a full English with eggs, bacon, sausage, tomatoes, mushrooms, beans and toast. This was priced at 11.80 Euros and also came with a bread basket containing an assortment of freshly baked rolls and mini croissants with mini jams, butter and chocolate spreads. Really beautifully presented and loads to eat! My husband and son had the Eggs Benedict which was really good too. Morning cocktails were between 6-7 Euros, we had mimosas and a Bloody Mary. Stunning location, excellent service, delicious food and really good value for money.

This a spacious restaurant with a stunning seating area overlooking the water. The service and atmosphere was top notch. I got the fish stew which was very squid heavy and a gorgeous bellini. A great place for some seafood and a relaxing meal.
Excellent dinner and impeccable service (the risotto was delicious)! Wonderful location with beautiful views of the port
Beautiful service from Bojan, very attentive and kind. Definitely coming back service and food was incredible

Great food, great wine and great service from Ante. We had the black risotto, the squid, tuna tartare and mussels. All would recommend. Also great recommendation on white wine. Local white wine posip merga victa.

I recommend this restaurant for the wonderful location on the port of Dubrovnik, the view is spectacular. The food is very good, prepared in a particular way, the staff is really nice and very attentive to personal needs. Drop by if you're on holiday in the area!

This restaurant was definitely 10/10! The best Dagnje na Buzaru (Mussels in white wine sauce) I had in a long time. The wine, the views and the polite staff we're great. Overall a big thanks to Stjepan, he was patience, friendly and very professional. He recommended a very good choice of wine. If we ever come back to Dubrovnik for a break, I will visit again.
So good! Fantastic view, beautiful atmosphere, terrific service and presentation. Bojan is a terrific server. Highly recommend during a visit to Dubrovnik.
Thanks a lot for your restaurant. Good food and with an amazing view. Obren was a very nice waitdresser.

Thank you so much to Obren for everything and the service ! 
The food was amazing ( we came 3 times in a week) and for sure we will come back
Came here for our honeymoon and it was incredible - the service and food from start to finish was amazing. Special shout-out to Ivan for looking after us throughout and for the free cake and shot.

Excellent restaurant and lovely service in a magnificent setting facing the old port
The dishes were very fine and the waiter was very attentive. We had an excellent time in this piano bar atmosphere.
