157€ for 4 main courses and dessert but it was justified!
What a wonderful meal in the most romantic of settings. David gave us us first class service. Would highly recommend.

Found out about this place and its stunning food on a whim, decided to try our luck without reservation and were given a nice spot without any issues. Food was gorgeous, service by Stjepan was above-par and definitely would recommend the experience! In terms of price, we paid 100 euros for 2 nice fish meals and a bottle of wine, which is totally fair.
Great food, great location, great atmosphere, great pianist and trumpeter setting the tone, attentive staff (Stjepan looked after us brilliantly) and reasonably priced.

The food and drinks were phenomenal. The way it was presented was beautiful and the taste was incredible. The staff were very amiable and super helpful. I would recommend this to anyone who intends to visit dubrovnik.

After a day trip with a lot of sightseeing, we enjoyed the end of our day in this restaurant, which is right by the harbor. The service was extremely friendly and helpful. Very good.
I recommend the catch of the day. It doesn't get any fresher than that.

Everything else is expensive in Dubrovnik. This restaurant is no exception. Expect to pay 30 euros per person. Without drinks and without side dishes.

For us, it was a wonderful meal at the harbor in the Old Town.👍🏻😃

A restaurant I found through Google Maps and TripAdvisor. There was a bit of a wait because I didn't make a reservation, but the food, wine, service and view were all good. Thank you especially marijo. I really like the photos you took too. I will definitely make a reservation next time and eat on the terrace. I'll come again.
lunch - nice menu varying from 'brunch' to a full meal. We had a light lunch of seafood and it was delicious

Perfect spot for a romantic dinner. We sat front row which was perfect for taking in the sights and people watching. Waiter was lovely and really helped up choose wine and food. The mussels were tasty and a really big portion so best to share. St hills rose was delicious. Highly recommend a visit

We thoroughly enjoyed our meal at Arsenal with Marijo as our server! He made sure we had everything we needed for our dinner and he went above and beyond to give us a great meal. Would definitely recommend to everyone!
Excellent food and service!! Would recommend the black risotto. Also, Marijo was fantastic. He made our experience amazing.
The spot is great. Dinner was really tasty. Marijo welcome was excellent. I recommand this restaurant without hesitation.

The food was excellent, the prices are affordable and the staff are very nice and pleasant :) 

And thanks to Marijo for his warm welcome ;)
This spot was great! Good food and thank you Marijo for your warm welcome and your excellent service :)
They accommodated 8 of us even though we hadn’t booked. Our waiter was very helpful, the food and drinks were delicious. Try sit out the back of you can.

Lunch in a place with a beautiful view and a sophisticated atmosphere. Pasta of the day, hamburger and veal in tuna puree, all very well prepared. Reasonable food prices and expensive drinks, but it's worth it for the atmosphere. Good service.

The best food experience in Dubrovnik by far! Seating on the terrace to be recomended. Great service and fantastic food. Seabass, mussels and the tuna was lovely. Also recommend the cheese platter for starter tasting great local cheese.

Wow! What a fantastic experience. My husband and I just happen to stumble upon this restaurant while here on a cruise vacation. They were packed for lunch and we didn’t have a reservation, but the hostess Lea went above and beyond to accommodate us and find us a table for two by the water. She easily could have turned us away. While we were there she took the time out of her busy schedule to tell us about her lovely restaurant and her home country. My husband is a former chef and I a former restaurant vice president, and we do not impress easily, but I must say this was a wonderful experience from start to finish. Having such a wonderful young professional at the front of your company set the bar high from the second we walked in until the moment we left. Thank you so much to Lea and the staff for a wonderful afternoon.
Amazing breakfast served by the loveliest host Bojan. He was a great and helped us with everything we needed!
Beautiful food , great attentive service and lovely atmosphere. would definitely reccomend ! Robert was a great waiter !

Service was excellent, food was great but the location was the icing on the cake, situated in the port with great views of the water. I thought the food was reasonably priced as were the drinks. We thoroughly enjoyed our dining experience and would definitely recommend this restaurant.

This is one of the best restaurants in Dubrovnik. Very fresh food and a relaxing atmosphere. We wanted to order the whole menu if it wasn't for our limited collective stomachs. What shone above all was the great service. Bojan, our server, was amazing. His recommendations were exactly what we needed and his smile was contagious. Will visit again for sure!

Excellent dining experience. One of the best in Dubrovnik. Stumbled in for lunch and had one of the best hamburgers in a long time. Brought the family in for dinner and was even more impressed. Setting and service are exceptional. Marijo Krkic is the man with the plan in terms of service.

We enjoy everything about this restaurant and have dined here three times as a result - fresh, delicious seafood (the black risotto is amazing!), nice wine selection, exceptional service, and a pleasant ambiance whether on the seaside or city side. All of the staff are incredibly attentive, but an extra thanks to Marijo who has repeatedly gone above and beyond to ensure an unforgettable experience. Highly recommend this place for lunch or dinner if you are in Dubrovnik!

First things first! You need to have Marijo as your waiter, this is a non-negotiable. Not only did he make our dinner, he truly made our whole trip. What ended up being an early dinner ended up being one of the most fun and entertaining evenings that we had to come back the next day for a night cap. He genuinely cared about our happiness the whole time. In addition the food was impeccable. Highly recommend the beef steak, wine (waiter recommendation), and all the desserts. Will definitely be back. 10/10 best restaurant you can eat at in Dubrovnik.
Wonderful food, culture and service! Thank you Bojan and Luksha for looking after us so graciously! We will return and would recommend for visitors looking to treat themselves!!
The food was amazing, and the service great! The restaurant was in a perfect location and even had live music. Such a cozy athmosphere and ambience, highly recommend!
The most delicious meal enjoyed in the most stunning setting. This was the best meal of our trip. Thank you to Ivan for the help in choosing the delicious wine we had and for the amazing service!

Amazing experience! The food, wine and the view were unreal. Truffle pasta and burrata out of this world! All the staff were very professional and super nice, expessially Marijo! 

Best resturante we went to during this week for sure.

Had an amazing meal and wonderful service , one of the loveliest places I've been to with a fabulous waiter Vlaho, so helpful and a fabulous server. We would come back to Drubrovnik just to come here again, and hopefully get Vlaho again to serve us! Great place. I am coeliac and Vlaho was so helpful. Amazing food and wine.

This Restaurant has the Wow Factor and we loved every minute eating here.
My Husband and I both had the Monkfish which was Superb. The View is Amazing, I could've sat there all day just watching the boats and the beauty of the place. We were given seats at the front of the restaurant which were Amazing and we couldn't have asked for Better. I tried to book online and there was no availability so I called through and was given our booking so worth calling if you're struggling. The staff are lovely, Thank You for the 10% Discount Card for our visit to the Panorama and Thank You so much for our Meal.

Nothing wrong with it, expensive tourist place with mid food… much nicer cheaper restaurants with better food and friendlier atmospheres about 

#UPTHEMARYS

The food was excellent, views were beautiful, and service of a very high standard. Our waiter Vlaho was very kind and offered some advice on the food. We ordered the seafood risotto and beef and bourbon gnocchi - both were fantastic, served with fresh focaccia. Would highly recommend coming here for dinner.

This restaurant was awesome! The food, atmosphere and service was outstanding. We had Croatian white wine that was incredible. The whole sea bream for two was one of the best meals we had traveling through multiple countries. 

Can’t wait to return.

Reservations are required for this restaurant, which seems to be growing in popularity with each passing year. The tables along the platform are very pleasant, those in the open room (huge) a little less so.
Good fish cuisine. Their baked catch of the day is a classic that is well worth the effort. A good address.
Prices remain reasonable in the prevailing inflationary climate.
The food is amazing. The whole experience was taken to another level by the amazing service, advice and professionalism of our charming waiter Bojan.

There are 3 sister restaurants, Arsenal, Panorama: top of the cable car and Dubravka. You may get given a 10% off card that you can use at all 3 restaurants. All very good. Obren was our waiter, twice, at Arsenal. Very helpful.
we had a great experience with great food, a wonderful view and a lovely waiter named bojam, 10/10 would come again.

Just incredible. Worthy of a French semi-gastro without any problem.
Relatively expensive but so much better than the other already expensive restaurants in Dubrovnik.
The icing on the cake ? The tiramisu so creative! The tour with friendly service and a superb view!

We absolutely loved our meal here. We sat looking out over the old port. There was a nice breeze coming in off the water. We ordered mussels buzara and fries, lasagna bolognese, monkfish, and truffle and mushroom pasta. All the dishes were great but the stars were the mussels and lasagna! The buzara sauce was so good we wanted to drink it. Fries were crispy and hot! The mussels were extremely fresh. We had the tiramisu and pistachio cake with white chocolate mousse for dessert. The tiramisu didn’t look or taste like tiramisu we have had before but it was good. The pistachio cake was unique and delicious. We highly recommend this place! They are kid friendly and even brought colored pencils and drawing sheets for my kids!
In a few words, this restaurant is truly exceptional. The fresh tuna and chargrilled vegetables was the best meal I have had in many many years !

Super amazing food. The view is also one of the best I have experienced in Dubrovnik. 
The service team were very friendly as well…

Wow, where do I begin! Firstly, the location is absolutely beautiful and very romantic. As we approached last night, the very kind lady welcomed us and offered to add us to the waiting list and took us to their bar inside. The wait was only 30 minutes and we were very well looked after. The Burratta starter was amazing! And so was my boyfriends steak and my cuttlefish risotto. Thank you for a beautiful first evening!

Excellent service, very good sea food, fabulous view. We were there as a family and they helped us also with our small toddler to warm the babys food - you don't go wrong there if you maybe look for good places to eat with toddlers.

Very friendly atmosphere. We were seated right on the harbour side which was a wonderful view. Our waiter St jepan was simply marvellous; attentive and knowledgeable about the food and the wine. It was clear he wanted to make sure we had a great time and we certainly did!

We chose this gem in the Old Town for my daughter’s birthday due to recommendation, location and excellent reviews. Food and wine were fantastic and Hrvoje, and others went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and cared for! Five stars all around! I would highly recommend!
A perfect spot for a meal in Old Town. Beautiful views of the harbour and surrounding hills. Excellent service and delicious food. Varied food options, would highly recommend.
Food was absolutely wonderful and highly recommend. I had the Tuna and it's got to have been the best Tuna I've ever eaten. Loved the location too and handy as close to cable carts.

Ivan was our server and he was exemplary. He checked on us throughout the meal always with a positive friendly attitude. The food was delicious. From the beverages which were delightful to the main dish which exploded numerous flavors. Dessert our finale was he best cheesecake of my life. A must stop visit

A great ending for our incredible holidays in Croatia. Our waiter Stjepan treated us very well, was very kind and helpful! Food was amazing, black risotto my personal favorite. Amazing view, fair prices and welcoming atmosphere. Definitely recommend!

Absolutely great experience. Very good food and fair prices. Service was fantastic, our waiter mr. Stjepan was friendly, gentle and very helpful. Treated us superbly.

Would recommend it 100%

I came here for lunch when I visited Dubrovnik in 2019. I found myself in Dubrovnik this year in July 2023 and decided to revisit since the first time was so enjoyable. The food did not disappoint! Our server Ante was also very kind and the service was excellent!

This restaurant exceeded our expectations - delicious food, live music, and a beautiful view. The fish stew was sensational, they also do great cocktails. The staff were very attentive too, and Marko was very friendly and hospitable. Would definitely recommend!
Amazing food! We Cleaned our plates. Highly recommend for a nice dinner with a view, and a little history. Our server Marko was very attentive and made the experience even better.

This restaurant has a great location right on the harbour of Dubrovnik Old Town, overlooking the moored boats and the coastline.

We visited here twice and had great food and drinks on both occasions. We hadn’t booked a table but we’re shown through to the bar for a drink until a table became free, which wasn’t long.

Service was excellent, the views from the table were great, and prices were reasonable. The black risotto was really tasty, as was the pistachio cake!
Extremely good value and quality, waiter was very pleasant and professional. We had some bread and drinks and coffee was best i’ve had in Dubrovnik.

Awesome food, service and atmosphere.
Would 100% recommend, not the cheapest… but well worth a visit.

Fabulous restaurant in a fabulous spot. The restaurant provides a calm haven in the midst of the bustle of downtown Dubrovnik. Welcoming, professional and attentive staff. So good we visited twice on a short 5 night break and this was recognised. Certainly not the cheapest restaurant but compared with others it offered superior value for money. An excellent selection of drinks and wine with realistic advice about which (unfamiliar to us) wines to choose. Starters and mains both delicious. Beef carpaccio very flavoursome and one of the best steaks we have had outside South Africa.
If we ever make a return visit to Dubrovnik, this would certainly be on our list to revisit.
Great quality food, nice view and we had a lovely waiter Marijo. I had the truffle mushroom pasta - exquisite and very creamy

This spot was a must while in Dubrovnik. Incredible view and service was wonderful. Ivan was a great server! Food was amazing - we had the mushroom truffle pasta and the mussels. The perfect nice dinner spot for friends, couples or family!

This was our best dinner experience in Dubrovnik. Fantastic atmosphere, very friendly staff (our waiter Ivan was an absolute gentleman), and great value for money.

We had burrata and focaccia for starters, sailor style risotto (see photo) and truffle and mushrooms pasta for main. We finished off with a delicious apple pie. 

Would highly recommend. We will surely be back.

This restaurant opens up to two different directions. We managed to get a table without reservation and a really good one as well. The food was super delicious and service was excellent. I always also check the restrooms (which were clean and nice), since I feel they can reveal if the restaurant is good or not, meaning if they are kept clean and tidy.
Superb harbour view, amazing food enjoyed by all the family, the ambiance . . . what an experience! Absolutely recommended!

We had a wonderful last dinner in Dubrovnik here. Stjepan served us and he was very helpful and patient in answering all questions. We started off with the zucchini appetizer which tasted very fresh. We had the truffle pasta and cannot recommend it enough! We also had the fish stew which was delicious, although a bit salty compared to our usual tastes. We had a perfectly balanced Dubrovnik caramel with a glass of dessert wine. Stejpan treated us an extra glass on the house which made it even more special. Highly recommend this restaurant. Service 10/10, ambiance 10/10, food taste 9/10.

Wonderful experience! The restaurant was busy and we didn’t have a reservation and were seated after a short wait in the lobby. We sat outside and enjoyed a few courses for lunch. Server was well informed on celiac and asked the kitchen for questions - no GF bread but I did enjoy an amazing fish. This was shockingly high quality and refined for a tourist destination
Amazing location, Great food! Ended up spenning 2 nights here on a one week vacation. Marco was our waiter - he was great!
This place is so magical! We sat inside from the afternoon until sunset, and the view is absolutely stunning! The food is tender, the service from Robert is amazing. A must eat in Dubrovnik!
This is the most beautiful spot in Dubrovnik! The food was incredible and the service even more so. Marco made dining here a beautiful experience. We will definitely be back!

This is my favorite restaurant in Dubrovnik. I really love the atmosphere . The restaurant is beautiful, overlooking the beautiful port. The team and the service is impeccable. Everyone is very kind and polite. I go there every year and I am never disappointed. The service is consistent and the food is excellent. 
I highly recommend.
Five stars are not enough for this cafe and restaurant. Amazing view both sides and very nice and elegant atmosphere. Kind and helpful staff, too

Food was excellent. We had the tuna, squid risotto and our teens had beef gnocchi and squid and all plates were clean at the end. Desserts were very nice pistachio cake a favourite overall. Great atmosphere and service

Everything about this place is wonderful. The location, the ambience, the drinks (fantastic margaritas!), the food, but more than that, the welcome! 
We tried to book, but it was full and it was suggested we could try our luck, we did and so glad… after a little wait, with a cocktail and lovely music, we sat down to two (this far!) wonderful meals. The risottos are beautiful… but the team which deliver the best service are the stars!
Can’t recommend strongly enough!
We stumbled across this restaurant quite by chance and what a find. Staff were super attentive and the food was amazing. I had the fish stew which was seriously outstanding
Great service and delicious food. the waiter gave us free desserts just because we didn't show the discount card. very nice!!
Amazing place with super-nice staff. Really reccomend it. If you are hungry after long day of sightseeing, take Lasagna Bolognese - really worth it.
Best brunch spot in Dubrovnik! Robert was very attentive, sweet and professional. The food was wonderful!
Excellent lunch, nice view, and a very good waiter. Tuna steak was definitely worth trying, nice local bubbly, too.

Beautiful views, very classy restaurant with impeccable service ( thank you Robert)

Fresh ingredients and lovely curated menu- a must visit !! 

Exceptional
Wow. Just wow. Our server was extremily friendly and carismatic. Loved the food and the athemosphere. I can only whole-heart recommend this restaurant to everyone who visits Dubrovnik

Our second visit food was amazing and service top notch let’s not forget the vista 100% recommendation. 
Xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

We had a fantastic dinner at Gradska Kavana Arsenal. Marko was extremely welcoming and knowledgable, and the food was delicious- the best we had in Dubrovnik! Worth turning up to see if they have a free table on the night if you’re unable to get a reservation. The restaurant also has a beautiful view over the harbour. I would come back in a heartbeat!
Fantastic foods and excellent cocktails. Michael was a great host, friendly and full of good advice. The risotto and old fashioned were especially good.
The food was amazing! Very good service, the coctails was good, the food came super fast. The people here are very service minded :)

Had chef's burger - was tasty, have tried better, but enjoyed it.

Service was a let down, lucky to get table without reservation, but it took about 15 minutes for server to come back and take drink/food order. After food was finished we sat for 15 - 20 mins to wait for server again to get bill. In this time there were a fair few people turned away due to restaurant being busy - just felt if there was a quicker turnaround these people could have been seated. We wouldn't return because of the wait. We have had more enjoyable eating experiences here in Dubrovnik.
Service was amazing and so was the food! Ante was our server and gave us fabulous suggestions! Would recommend this to anyone that is in Croatia

Everything was amazing… view, music, food, drinks, etc. I could go on and on. Don’t even get me started on our server Ante was even better than the restaurant. He lead us to all of our dinner decisions and drinks and hit the nail on the head! We have been to 7 different countries in Europe and he has been the best server we have had! Love him and the restaurant arsenal. A++++++++:)
What an amazing experience! Our server Ante gave us great suggestions and ensured we had the best time! Make sure to visit this place during your trip.

They had a good breakfast menu. Some of the items on the Orlando breakfast were cold but the flavour was lovely. It came with a bread and pastry basket that they offered to refill. 
The view is outstanding and we sat in the shade over looking the harbour. The breakfast menu is reasonably priced - the Orlando breakfast was only €11. 
Would definitely be back. They also serve dinner and lunch but I would recommend booking in advance for dinner.

We dropped in to check they had our booking for the evening of my birthday and glad we did as they were fully booked, but hadn't let us know - never did get the email. However, they found us a table for lunch (probably helped it was a late lunch) the staff were very helpful and the food was delicious. They kindly brought us out a piece of cake to share with a candle on a birthday plate which was a lovely touch.

We had a lovely experience when we visited for dinner. Although unable to book the lovely hostess helped us to find a table (which had a wonderful view of the water). 

The hostess accommodated us and then David made extra steps to make it the most enjoyable last night in Croatia.

 Not only did he provide valued advice on the menu he also brought us hand wipes without us even asking. Best of all he brought my sisters and I lovely traditional Croatian drink to end our night. Without even knowing it he really helped make our last night in Dubrovnik. Once again thank you David!
Fabulous location, food and wine Ambiance was excellent with a trio playing in the background. Excellent service. Not the cheapest but we thought it was well worth it.
We had one of the best meals of our lives here - the food is incredible, and the view cannot be beaten. Marijo provided excellent service - we can’t recommend this place enough!
Food was amazing, the squid ink risoto in particular was exceptional! The service was great and the place is very nice. We went on a busy sunday lunch

Lovely cool terrace on a hot hot day in dubrovnik. We had the seafood rissoto, mussels, octopus salad and fish stew, all were lovely. 

Service was great also. 

Highly recommended.
Great view, extensive menu and wonderful customer service from Stjepan. On a hot day, lovely to sit and watch the boats come and go in the shaded loggia terrace with a well made cocktail.
Really nice view, delicious food, very nice waiters. Perfect place to enjoy food and watch the city

The view from the restaurant was amazing! But bear in mind that if you are looking to sit at the back of the restaurant for the view of the port, they only open this area from 9 am onwards. 

Otherwise, the food was average - ordered the eggs benedict royale, but the egg yolk was dry, more akin to a hard-boiled egg than a poached one. Coffee was also average. 

Unable to comment about lunch or dinner food as we didn't come back for it. 100% would come for the gorgeous breakfast view of the port, but not because of the food.
Great service ! Amazing food! The Hugo drink is spectacular and the Davor was super nice he brought a cake for my birthday and he was always with a smile!

Very nice place. The food was excellent.
Obren was a fantastic waiter! The restaurant located next to the sea and the athosmphere was lovely. There was a pianist. Very good value for the money!
This is a great spot in the heart of Dubrovnik! Great selection of fish and meat options, also good selection of wine and cocktails.
Great food and service with a lovely atmosphere. Would 10/10 recommend to anyone traveling alone or with family/ friends

The food was outstanding! So delicate and light yet filling. We had a perfect seat and Vlaho looked after us so well and made our experience even better. The margaritas are to die for. For our first restaurant to visit in Dubrovnik, we will certainly return as our last

One of the most beautiful restaurant with nice view on the old town’s port. Service here is over the top, waiters are highly professional. We came here for dinner in the busiest hour and we didn’t waited for our food more than usual. Food is perfectly prepared and presented. We liked so much that we came here next day for a breakfast and we liked even more.

This restaurant is amazing! We went for dinner one night. We were a large party of eight. The waitstaff was attentive and the food was delicious. The views and atmosphere made it even more special for a memorable night. I highly recommend to anyone visiting Old Dubrovnik!

Marko was our waiter tonight and made our last night in Dubrovnik absolutely fabulous. The venue is just superb watching the evening draw in and the lights on the coastline twinkle, not to mention the coming and going of many boats. The food was absolutely excellent but our superb service made our whole evening complete. Thank you Marko.
A excellent place for dinner with an amazing view. Our waiter was very friendly and went above and beyond to give us a great experience. Would highly recommend for anyone visiting Dubrovnik.
Gorgeous view and delicious food. Try the Mushroom Truffle pasta, it is outstanding. Robert took excellent care of us.

We had lunch there today and rather disappointed. My kid had ordered beef steak sandwich and there was just a few pieces of beef. I had ordered tuna salad, it was ok, very average. My wife ordered mussels and most of the flesh inside the shells were very anemic tic-tac size. Service was aloof and inattentive. You paid a premium for the location and view. I guess the view is the reason why the restaurant is so busy. It is the most overpriced meal we had on our trip (we have been here for over 10 days).
Amazing food and atmosphere. The service was lovely, particularly Vlaho! Recommend the gnocchi and plenty of bread
We had a lovely dinner with drinks and great food. Wonderful service from Vlaho. The view from our table was stunning. 10/10
Amazing service and food. Lovely people who ensured we got the best table even though we didn’t reserve and also got free desert. Served by Blaze who was very attentive and friendly

Beautiful steak & new potatoes

Partner had the vegetarian pasta special, which was apparently delicious (I didn’t get a look in)

Incredible spot to sit & watch the boats come in & out

David was an excellent host
Davor was incredible - service and food were amazing start to finish , would highly recommend visiting
Such a lovely evening. Blaze our waiter made the night extra special. The view was gorgeous and the food incredible

We loved it here! Our server Ante was so helpful and knowledgeable about Croatian wines. Both the food and the views were amazing. Highly recommend the squid and the black risotto! I would recommend going on the early side since it fills up!

We had a great experience here. The view is unbeatable, and the service was hospitable and quick. 

We came here for breakfast and ordered the burrata and ham croissant and the smoked salmon salad. The food was tasty and fresh. And Ante, our server, was tentative and nice. 

I definitely recommend eating here for breakfast if you have the chance.
Amazing food, views and friendly service. The Mediterranean croissant was a highlight and our server was extremely friendly and helpful with suggestions

Our server, Ante, was so kind, helpful and friendly! We did not have a reservation but they warmly welcomed us with no hesitation. Our dinner was very delicious, and the views are amazing!! Highly recommend for a nice and elegant date night or special dinner with friends.

We had such a lovely dinner! the view is incredible and the service is excellent. Food was delicious and our server, Ante, was very helpful and friendly! 
the live music is the perfect way to end your evening!
Ande was an impeccable waiter and the food was delicious! Definitely worth the cost and such a gorgeous view for the evening! I would highly recommend!

This is a really Nice spot to have dinner. Its really delicious! And its an amazing spot at the harbour! We had the risotto and the fish stew which was very good and for a good price. Ante was our waiter, he was really helpfull and kind. We loved it!
Fantastic place with a great view of the Harbour. Great service that was quick and efficient, where the waiter Andri was full of knowledge
A stunning restaurant with a spectacular view of Dubrovnik’s port. Food was so tasty and service spot on. Would thoroughly recommend
They have a huge covered patio on the harbor, so good people-watching. Creative cocktails, good food, good service and reasonably priced.
We were on our first night in Dubrovnik and were attracted to this wonderful setting for a restaurant. We had a fantastic meal and service from Ante our Waiter. Recommend highly.

Absolutely fantastic meal from start to finish. We hadn’t booked but got a table right by the harbour at 6:30pm - any later and I think we would have been unlucky. Superb food and service. If you are in Dubrovnik and want a treat then this us definitely the place to go. Not cheap but you get what you pay for. Right up my street. Book so that you are not disappointed.

Saw this restaurant whilst on a walk around the old port area and immediately put it on my list of things I wanted to do whilst in Dubrovnik. I tried to reserve a table for 2, for dinner, however was told they were fully booked until the end of July, but we were welcome to try our luck on the night.

Well, we did, and we were not disappointed! Despite not having a reservation, the staff were extremely welcoming and sat us in the bar area until a table became available. This was maybe a 5 minute wait. There were plenty of others doing the same thing, so maybe they don’t offer some tables for booking to avoid being let down. I wanted to be water side, as that was my favourite view of Croatia so far, and that’s where we were sat. I believe there are also tables in the town side which looked equally as beautiful.

Service was honestly second to none. We both had the steak, which was perfect. The view was ofcourse breathtaking. 

This restaurant comes with a premium price tag, however for the quality of food, the view, atmosphere, and service, it felt more than reasonable (especially compared to Dubrovnik prices). Comparable to London I would say. Service charge hasn’t been automatically added on in our trip so far, not sure if that’s normal for Croatia, so be sure to tip! 

Highly recommend. Will definitely be coming back should we ever visit Dubrovnik again.

AMAZING! Love the view love the boats service was so friendly and THE FOOD! Oh god I cannot recommend the steak sandwich any more it was the best I’ve ever tasted and the chips were perfectly salted with very very tasty mayo :) reasonable price for the centre of the old town too. Ante the waiter made the whole thing perfect!
Ante was great and the food was amazing! Gnocchi was a small portion but still v yummy - beautiful views and beautiful people ;)

Nice place to have breakfast if you’re in old town Dubrovnik. Outdoor patio on wall side opens at 8am, very pleasant settings, good service, breakfast menu average compared to USA but enough I guess. Could use some more fresh options, fruit plates, yoghurts, açaí etc.
Sadly the nicer section on the marina side opens at 9am. If you can wait until 9 and go there for a nicer setting although you may get some sun.
Food is average but fine. Could be better and really it’s only breakfast so not that tough, but pretty good place for breakfast.

Our favorite restaurant in all of our travels! The food, service, view and experience couldn’t have been better! Our waiter Marijo was superb! The risotto was phenomenal! And it was walking distance from our hotel!
Great food in a great setting. Ante was a fantastic waiter, very attentive and also extremely knowledgeable about both the food and wine.
start to finish the service was excellent, the food was impeccable, complemented by fantastic wine
Obern had the best recommendations!! We really enjoyed our dining experience and would highly recommend coming here! Food was excellent!!

Food was amazing and our waiter was lovely! Obern recommended the best wine to go with, definitely recommend having dinner in the back terrace towards the port. We had the Saylor risotto and was full of sea food, delicious!!
Best mussels I had in my life. Great view on old port in Dubrownik. Our waiter was Ante. Great guy. Super nice and helpful, with really great recommendations.

Wonderful tasty meal right in the Dubrovnik’s harbour. Me and my husband had mussells paired with some drinks and amazing fresh bread. Our waiter Ante was very helpful and took care of us throughout the whole meal making sure we are happy every step of the way. Highly recommended!

The restaurant is located in a privileged place, in front of the port. Perfect for a lovely dinner with your couple and receiving the night wind from the sea, while you see the stars and the lights of Dubrinik's houses.
Ante attend us during that night. He was very polite and offering an excellent service.

Wonderful place and best food ever.
Thanks to Ante for the recommendations and the amazing service, he was excelent!
We will come back for sure, i am not afraid to say this is the best place in dubvrobnik 😍

Delicious Food, amazing view, nice mood ! Must visit place in Dubrovnik
You could enjoy Croatia's best sunset here
Truffle pasta, Sailor risotto, Chicken dish, Gnocchi all was awesome
Recommend to book in advance and visit this place 🥂 Very popular for tourists if you are luck you could make walk-in though
Highly recommend to couples for romantic mood in special anniversary. Also thanks for Ante's warm support

맛있는 음식, 멋진 경치, 좋은 분위기! 두브로브니크에서 꼭 가봐야 할 곳
이곳에서는 크로아티아의 최고의 일몰을 즐길 수 있습니다
트러플 파스타, 세일러 리조또, 치킨 요리, 그노치 모두 멋졌습니다
미리 예약하고 이곳을 방문하는 것을 추천합니다 🥂 운이 좋다면 방문할 수 있지만 관광객들에게 매우 인기가 있습니다
연인들에게 특별한 기념일에 로맨틱한 분위기를 권합니다. 또한 Ante의 따뜻한 지원에 감사드립니다

Amazing dinner spot in old town Dubrovnik. The view of the harbor is incredible, while the vibe is relaxed but upscale. Service was excellent and our waiter Anton was courteous and helpful. Every dish we had was absolutely delicious. Definitely worth 5 stars in my book
Alekjender was such a friendly host. Not only were our drinks excellent but he took the time to share tips with us. Both Jann and Alek were great ambassadors for Dubrovnik.

The location is a dream and the food out of this world. My partner and I both had the sea bass and we couldn’t have been happier. The service was friendly, efficient and very attentive. We came back after we left for an espresso and a dessert and these too were superb. Go there!

It’s highly recommended for a reason, right?.
We ordered 2x Fish of the day (Tuna Steak) and Squid
How can I describe the food? 
One bite and it blows you away. 
The twist in their dishes are absolutely amazing.
Don’t take my words for it. Try it and I can ensure you that it’s worth the wait.
Must try when you’re here in the Old Town.
Food aside, view is stunning as well.

We came here for breakfast, and it was a great experience. I had the Eggs Benedict, and my boyfriend had the "Orlando"; fried egg, sausages, beans, toast and bacon. The Eggs Benedict were amazing, perfect runny yolk and Hollandaise sauce on bread. Also included a basket of bread and croissants with butter, jam, honey and chocolate spread. Delicious. The service was excellent, and the setting is spectacular; the view out over Dubrovnik cathedral and the square where the swallows are flying back and forth is really something. Would definitely come back, and try their lunch and dinner menu.
Amazing service and the food was great. They hosted 10 of our family with no complaints. The view itself was incredible, must visit.

We managed to dine there without reservation before 6 pm. Fabulous view from the dining area and excellent service. 

The food is absolutely delicious.

If you’re in Dubrovnik, I’d definitely recommend to give @gradskakavanaarsenalrestaurant a visit because the view is just unbeatable! It was an incredible experience enjoying fresh seafood by the water with the beautiful arch.

The food is good but not superb considering that it’s quite pricey, and there were many people so could be hard to get a hold of the server. I think the mussels can be skipped, but the squid was excellent and I wish I got to try their fish or other seafood as well!

Stefan a fabulous waiter! 
Amazing experience and food was exceptional
Would highly recommend!

Fillet steak was amazing!

Ande was absolutely phenomenal as a server, I can’t sing his praises enough.

His wine and food knowledge was impeccable and made the best recommendations and suggestions to enhance our evening and meal. He kindly explained our food and wine pairings in detail and his personality was incredible - he really made our evening special and added so much flare to each course.

The food presentation was wonderful and a fabulous overall ambience overlooking the beautiful marina of Dubrovnik. 10/10 would recommend and return - the most perfect date night setting for couples, a very romantic evening with wonderful server. Thank you again Ande.

Lovely Restaurant with great views, amazing food and Obren our waiter was great! Best risotto of our trip! Also if you use Dubrovnik pass or dine in one of their sister restaurants (also recommended) you get 10% off.
Lovely lunch at a waterfront table. Great food. Professional friendly service. Able to accommodate a gluten free (celiac) guest. Reservations highly recommended.

Loved this place! Really nice food, great atmosphere and wonderful staff. Our waiter Ante was excellent on giving recommendations and was very service minded. Try the Sailors risotto for main course and the pistachio dessert. You won’t regret it!

It was very good! I had the Sailors Risotto which was very nice, the truffle pasta was ok, could have tasted more I think… the pistachio dessert was to die for!! Ante our waiter was fantastic as well.
Delicious food, beautiful setting, impeccable service. Obren was a gentleman, and made my birthday very special.

Obren was an amazing server and he absolutely made our night. One of the best meals of our lives and made a special effort for my boyfriends birthday complete with cake, firework and piano. Get the black risotto!!

We were walking around town and decided to stop here for coffee. We could see there were some tables with a view of the port so went to ask if we could sit at one. 
The waitress said that the table we wanted was required in an hour and we said perfect!
Really appreciate that we were asked to have a great view for a quick coffee.

I ordered a latte. Seems to be a thing in Dubrovnik that the latte's are small, but this was the smallest one I've had yet.

I was expecting it to be really strong due to the small size of the cup but I was very wrong.
It was a perfectly lovely smooth creamy latte with a great coffee flavour and wasn't too strong at all.

We really enjoyed just sitting for 40 minutes watching the boats come in and out.

We saw some food go past that us that looked really good but obviously can't recommend the food as we didn't have any.
But I would highly recommend the coffee here as it was really really good.

Beautiful location! The Gnocchi were served with the best sauce I've ever had and the quality of the food was on a very high level. So if you want to enjoy a fancy dinner for a very reasonable price you should definitely come here. Ps their cocktails are amazing as well.

We couldn’t book so went as a walk in . Only had to wait 30 minutes in a lovely bar area then were shown to our table. We decided to eat on the water’s edge side of the restaurant as it also has tables facing the old town Main Street. We were not disappointed with our decision as the table was great. Our waiter called Marco was excellent and he guided us through the menu.
Zucchini 
Mussels 
Chicken 
Fillet Steak 
Apple Strudel 
All the food was of the highest quality and taste.
We will definitely 100% return

We had a great evening!!! We didn’t book a table and still they found an outdoor place for us!
The service was amazing! Never had to asked for something because it was already there and never had to fill my glass myself. Super friendly staff and amazing atmosphere. The food was good and we enjoyed every minute. Definitely go here if you are in Dubrovnik! 
Thanks again!
Really good food. Black risotto is a must. The best view in the city. Will definitely return. Robert was a wonderful server, great selection on local wine.

The service from the start where we turned up without a reservation, led to a bar and served straight away whilst we waited for a table for two to become free. What a nice wait and an even better result as they gave us a table for two right at the front overlooking the harbour. Food and the service was exceptional, our waiter Ivan helped us pick the best of what we liked, I had chefs special veal and my wife had the poached sea bass fillet, such amazing food. All finished off with an Irish coffee for myself and a cappuccino for my wife, Ivan was exceptional, very polite, very knowledgeable and great service, would definitely try and get to this restaurant if you can, if you cannot book, you won’t be disappointed with waiting for a table.
We had a wonderful dinner at Gradska Kavana Arsenal restaurant ! The service , dinner , views were amazing !!! We highly recommend coming here !!
Came here for breakfast and the food was very good, really well priced for Old Town Dubrovnik as well. Would highly recommend.
Great wine, great food, and outstanding service from our server, Mario. Live music and view of the old harbor make this restaurant a must visit for anyone. 11/10
Service was great so friendly and food was amazing! Great location and atmosphere. Would definitely recommend.

With its position in the Old Town harbor, this is the best place for coffee in all of Dubrovnik! With a most spectacular view, you feel like being transported back in centuries when Dubrovnik Republic existed. nice sitting in the arcades, with summer breeze circulating and a very good coffee

Our favorite restaurant experience of our visit to Dubrovnik! Absolutely amazing food, drinks and service! The harbor is beautiful. Our server, Marco, was top notch and did an incredible job of making our time memorable. Highly recommend as we visited this restaurant no less than 5 times for food and/or drinks.
Phenomenal food, blown away each time The beef steak is truly delicious along with the truffle pasta
Great restaurant overlooking the old harbour. We could not fault this place with excellent food, nice location and very friendly and efficient service.

This restaurant for ambience, food and value for money is honestly one of the best I have ever come across .The waiter who served us was also absolutely a credit to your establishment and its a pity I didn’t get his name .Absolutely fantastic .
Fantastic spot and the most amazing food! Blaze who served us was excellent and we loved the extra touches with the bread and drinks. The food is incredible as well!

Lunch was amazing, beautiful setting and restaurant 
YOU will not be disappointed!
Ask for VLAHO. Best server

This restaurant is absolutely beautiful, has the best views of the port and Dubrovnik. Food was delicious and service was more than you could ask for. Highly recommend. Was served by Vlaho, who was extremely attentive, very professional and went above and beyond.

This is so relaxing place.
Me and my family enjoyed in this restaurant by the water. We spent such a nice afternoon there. We highly recommend.
Really lovely view and good, service was great. Thanks to our waiter Vlaho, he was very lovely and attentive!

amazing spot with the best location! The service was amazing in particular Vlaho the waiter gave us the best recommendations for dessert and cocktails. Would 100% come back with others we had the best time.

Perfect spot in the old town overlooking the harbour.

Wine waiter fantastic as was the service and food.

We had lovely octopus salad and fish soup, followed by cuttlefish risotto & rib of veal…. Delicious.

We eat here for our wedding meal.

We all enjoyed our meals and the service was great.

The view of the harbour whilst eating was a lovely touch.

First restaurant of our holiday…top of the old town list on Trip Advisor and it delivered. We couldn’t reserve a table but opted to head down early and wait for one. Had a wait for about 5-10 mins! I had the veal chop - really chunky and meaty. The wife had the sea bass - cooked in a parcel with veg n potatoes - lovely!

Really stunning view of the harbour/port and great service. Definitely one to visit when in Dubrovnik

This was a great spot for a date night or a family dinner. Fantastic view of the harbor. Attentive service and great live pianist. The truffle pasta was recommended by the waiter and was the best we’ve ever had.

Such amazing food & with a beautiful view. Not too expensive either (as someone from California). Obren was a great waiter, so attentive & friendly & helped us with all of our questions. Also live music! Definitely recommend!
Our food was also absolutely amazing. Our server Obren was excellent, friendly, helpful, and detail oriented. Will be coming back for sure

The location of this restaurant is unrivalled overlooking the marina in the old town. There wasn’t a table available so we were asked if we wanted to wait at the bar. We agreed and only waited 20 minutes, however we was not offered a drink in this time. One of us didn’t get the dish she ordered but we couldn’t get a server attention and everyone else s food was getting cold and in the end she just ate it. The food was ok , nothing special. Left feeling a bit deflated
Lovely place for dinner. Super views, great ambience and excellent quality food. Really helpful staff. Definitely worth a visit if you can get a table.

We didn’t have a reservation but we were seated promptly at a lovely table. The waiters were very attentive and friendly. The food was devine and the atmosphere was lovely. Live background music and a fabulous view. Definitely will go back again. Highly recommend

The view iteself makes me rate this five stars. To be on the marina on a nice day and people watch is wonderful.

We shared the octopus salad and as always - it's delicious in Croatia. It paired nicely with the rose wine and my husband's Poison Pear drink was so refreshingly good! I wish I had gotten it!

We also had the mussels - whose broth was good with the bread side we ordered. You can't have mussels w/o bread to soak up all the juices.

Great staff - great view - great food and drinks. What more can you ask for?

This place had just reopened after closing for the winter period and had only been reopened for about a week. We had waked past it the night before and thought we'd come back and try it.
We came back and as it was fairly quiet, got a table seated outside under a nice heater as it was still at the end of winter. We sitting inside the walled old city section and not out near the harbour area.
The service was excellent and waitress Romana was prompt, attentive and very friendly. We had a few conversations with her when she was at the table. She was very informative about the old city.
The food was very nice. The restaurant was very nice. The service with Romana as our waitress was excellent.
It was a nice experience and one which I would go back for. Thanks Romana for making our dining experience great.

We thoroughly enjoyed and would recommend that people go to Gradska Kavana Arsenal. 
You get a 10% discount off your bill Included with the Dubrovnik pass. There are three separate dining areas, but the terrace overlooking the dock at the back is lovely.
They serve breakfast, lunch & dinner or if you simply want coffee and cake sit on the terrace facing the pedestrian area and people watch. 
We went numerous times during our stay, they remembered us & gave us great tables, no pressure to eat & go, they were happy for us to simply sit & people watch over a leisurely lunch or afternoon coffee & cake.
We got back from a tour late one night and didn’t go out for dinner till about 21:00 hrs sitting on the rear terrace hearing the sounds of the water led to a very romantic, enjoyable, memorable meal.

We were looking for somewhere for a snack, drink & a spot of people watching. We sat on the terrace inside the old town & had a lovely end to our day trip to Dubrovnik. The tea with a rum was novel, the cheesecake was delicious, comfortable seating & a most excellent waiter.

Not cheap, but worth every penny.

We checked online for a reservation and the restaurant showed as fully booked to the end of June. However when we stopped by for a drink they managed to find us a table for a few nights later. The table we were then given was right at the front with the best view of the harbour - perfect!

The service, food and drink did not disappoint at all, we had an amazing meal and evening. We would definitely return here again when in Dubrovnik and recommend to anyone.

Didn't eat here but sat on the patio out the other [square] side each evening having drinks. 

Nice place to people watch. Staff are excellent too. 

I deduct a star as it is overpriced. Dubrovnik suffers from an undercurrent of price gouging and are pulling it off (for now) charging Switzerland prices in Croatia. 

Good spot though.

A charming place with excellent waiters and an excellent selection of food and drinks. The staff of the bar raised the wonderful atmosphere to an even higher level. We recommend this place to everyone.

First to begin with, when we first walked in the staff were really friendly and welcoming.
They sat us on a table inside, when we ordered some drinks by the time our table (1st row towards the port) was emptied and ready for us.
We ordered 1 bottle of wine (sauvignon blanc) plus 3 dishes squid, octopus salad and sea bass the Croatian way everything was delicious (highly recommend the squid) 
Also service was very fast, waiters are highly professional and attentive, plus prices are more than fair compared to value and prices elsewhere.
Lastly, when we ordered the bill they offered us one delicious cake and 2 walnut liquors ON THE HOUSE!

Overall experience: 5 ⭐️
- Location 5 ⭐️ 
- Service 5 ⭐️ 
- Food 5 ⭐️ 
- Ambience 5 ⭐️ 

HIGHLY recommended

We came here for an early dinner. We were lucky to get a table, the place is usually fully booked. I would recommend booking early or showing up around 5:00. The place is quite big and has a wonderful view directly on the old port. We had mainly sea food and some dessert. The dishes were mostly local specialties, which is something I liked a lot. Everything was very well prepared. Our server was also very friendly and professional and explained everything about our selected dishes. I would definitely recommend this place.
Couldn’t fault this place. Got a beautiful sea view table. Friendly staff, beautiful food and drinks. Reasonably priced. A must visit in Dubrovnik

This was our best night out in Dubrovnik. We were lucky to get a ringside seat on the harbour which would almost have been enough, especially with the aerial display from the Swifts, but food and service were exceptional. Totally recommend finishing off with dark chocolate and orange cake.
This is a lovely restaurant with great food, staff, and drinks. The view is amazing, we went during sunset. I recommend it 100%

We have been to Dubrovnik many times now and always call in to Arsenal. 
It’s a lovely location at the old town marina dock.
The views are lovely and the hustle and bustle of that area is great.
We had two lunches this visit, over the week. 
Both times I had the same dish as it was gorgeous!
I had the gnocchi with beef strips in bourbon, my husband had a fantastic seafood salad 
The staff are always very nice, knowledgeable and welcoming.

Sometimes in busy times I’d book ahead online.
One of the times we got in on spec 
But there is always a queue here for tables.

Try it I’m sure you will enjoy it

We had an amazing dinner with a great view and awesome service from Ivan all for the same amount of money we would spend at any of the other old town restaurants. The burrata and black risotto were both incredible! Ivan was professional and helpful. I would 100% recommend giving them a try!

Obren was amazing! He was so helpful in the wine and food selections. Our meal was spectacular and the view is gorgeous. From the starters to dessert-you will not be disappointed. Absolute must on your trip to old town!!
Beautiful ambience.Friendly staff. We had a lovely meal here - slightly more expensive but the food was good.they helped us move tables under cover when it rained.

A perfect setting for brunch overlooking the sea and marina. We had the equivalent of a full English breakfast and it was well cooked and served. The Croatian sausages were excellent. Along with that we had croissants, a selection of rolls and conserves and tea and coffee as a set menu. We added freshly squeezed orange juice. It started the day off beautifully!

Breathtaking view. Great vibe. Go to back of restaurant for a table on the waterfront. Most tourists only think there are tables and seating on the busy street in Old Town. 
We had coffees and desserts and were charmed by the place. Originally we tried to book dinner but were told there was a 2 week wait. We walked in between lunch and dinner and were seated by a friendly waiter. The timing was perfect.

Food is delicious, service outstanding, views are spectacular. A true dining experience. We had the sea bass as recommended by our server as well as the octopus salad to start. Both were delicious. Friendly and professionally run restaurant. Live music at night

The ideal setting for a romantic dinner, the seating overlooks the Dubrovnik harbour and walls of the Old Town. 

The food was exceptional and reasonably priced for the quality, and the service was warm and attentive. 

Highly recommended!
Very nice service and the food was very good. The fish on today was tuna and it was cooked very well. Nice local wine and also good dessert. Thumbs up!

One of the most gorgeous restaurants I have visited. 

Myself and my partner ate here 5 years ago on our first trip to Dubrovnik. It was memorable that we booked it for this trip for my 30th Birthday dinner.. and it did not disappoint. 
The staff are an absolute credit to the restaurant, they are so friendly and so professional, showing a very high standard. 

The food was just as we had remembered from 5 years ago, outstanding!!! 

We had the most gorgeous night with a gorgeous view. The staff also surprised us with a birthday dessert - it made for a very special night. 

This needs to be a restaurant that everyone visits in Dubrovnik!

Recommended by our food tour guide.

Amazing view to old city pier, tasty food.
Not expensive compared to other places for the view.
We ordered Sailer Risotto and Chicken fillets, selection of breads for the table only €2 🤩

We loved it - delicious food with live music and view.

Perfect location, beautiful view on the old port. Staff very attentive, service impeccable. Food superb.
Sailer risotto was delicious.
Poison pear cocktail was the perfect way to end a unforgettable lunch.

Stunning location. We didn’t have a reservation but the staff accommodated us really well. Great food and the views were stunning. Such a beautiful place! With our breakfast choices we got a selection of breads and pastries. Great value really.

Went with my husband to Gradska kavana in Dubrovnik three times and each time we had a great experience. Gradska Kavana has two terraces, one towards the Sea and one towards the Stradun (the main Street). We were seated towards the Stradun. Gradska Kavana has a great coffee, lovely cheese cake and we also went there for a brunch, which was tasty. The oysters there are very fresh as well. We were served by Aleksandar, who was very friendly, very professional and who spoke fluent english. Great service and experience. Five stars easily.

Our second dinner visit in 10 days and it was as fantastic as the first visit... this time being guided by Ivan. He mqde excellent menu recommendations (veal chop special), including an accompanying wine. He also surprised is with some lovely treats at the end of the meal. Gestures like thia, the very good food, and the wonderful ambience made this one of our favorites while in Dubrovnik.

Really recommend this restaurant, atmosphere, location, quality of food, wine and service is 2nd to none! Our waiter Ivan recommended a lovely local wine, was very knowledgeable and most importantly provided a friendly welcome!

Beautiful setting, lovely seafood (my partner had beef that was great as well), does get busy so would suggest booking. Staff were very attentive and gave some great suggestions. Reasonably priced food and drinks. Good cocktails as well (especially the espresso martinis!)

We had an amazing experience at Gradska Kavana Arsenal! The view, the service from Evon/Ivan (not sure how to spell his name) and the overall quality of the food was phenomenal. Definitely the best food we had in Old City... and that's a big feat because there's a lot of restaurants here.

We went here a couple of times for drinks at lunchtime and were planning to come for dinner on our last night but were slightly put off by the waitress on our second visit who was a bit surly and also tried to charge us for 4 drinks instead of the 2 that we’d had. Such a shame as the location is perfect, there are two terraces to choose from, one with a view of the harbour, the other with a view of the main street , the former being more romantic in the evening.

we had a great dinner here. we ordered
black risotto, octopus salad and fish stew. black risotto was *chef’s kiss*

our waiter Ante was fantastic, made great recommendations and topped off a fantastic evening
The best black risotto is here! Ante is a good staff and wonderful pictures he takes are special memories for us.We will be back again!
Great place with a fantastic view on both ends of the restaurant. Very good service. Breakfast is recommended. Ordered Orlando

Lovely live music (piano and saxophone), beautiful panoramic view of the port, and delicious food. Ambient was nice and we were able to see the historic architecture of the port and also the brick red houses along the hillside. 

Waiter was excellent, polite and professional. He gave us practical advise and lots of great recommendations on food. Memorable fine dining experience. 

Price is reasonable too for the quality and the overall dining experience it offers. Will definitely return when we visit again. Thank you!!

The food is beyond amazing, the atmosphere spectacular and the servers are fantastic. We went there every night for dinner and our server, Evo, treated us like family. Would definitely recommend and will definitely return the next time we’re in Dubrovnik.

Great view and wonderful people watching. Went twice. Service was pleasant overall—except when waiter poured olive oil over our fish dish without asking (results? Too much oil since chef had already done so). Truffle/mushroom pasta (tender and flavorful) had one slice of truffle (if that) and five tiny mushrooms. I’d suggest earlier in day is better, but night lights twinkle across the hills. Just being there next to the water is a good enough reason to go.
Delicious breakfast of egg benedict. Nice coffee and great memosa. It’s a great place to sit and enjoy the view of the harbour

Ambience and surroundings are lovely. Robert our waiter was lovely and friendly. 
We ordered the fish stew which is a local Croatian dish . It was okay. I guess we were expecting a bit more to it so it was slightly disappointing. However on our first visit we had the chefs burger for lunch and it was super tasty and a really good burger so no complaints there..would definitely go back and try other stuff on the menu as the staff and restaurant are lovely

Best food we’ve had in Croatia so far! The server, Robert was excellent and recommended incredible red wine to pair with our meal. He truly added to the experience and the view is unmatched! We are coming back tomorrow again for breakfast. Go enjoy the food, the view, and if you see Robert please let him know he came highly recommended :)
Robert was amazing from a service perspective. We tried the seafood stew, which was one of the traditional dish. Not quite what I expected but the ambiance was great and the view stunning.
The food and wine were superb. The service from our waiter Davor was quite exceptional. Five stars for food and service. Many thanks.

Super food, wine and service at a great price. A beautiful spot and great atmosphere. We had amazingly attentive service from our very informative and professional waiter. We asked for recommendations and followed his advice for food and wine choices. We did not regret it, everything was wonderful.

We stumbled across this place looking for breakfast only to realise we’d already booked for a late lunch! Breakfast in the sunshine watching the world go by as the tourist boats move in and out of the harbour followed later by a leisurely late lunch in the shade. Both well served by attentive friendly staff and delicious food. Mediterranean croissant-buratta was delicious, marinated courgette, focaccia, chicken salad and truffle pasta - all delicious. We took a lunch reservation because even 3 weeks ago I couldn’t get an evening reservation for this week and I can see why - great location, super food and not too expensive.

The location, ambiance, high quality service and food was a perfect choice for our dinner in Dubrovnik. Beautiful presentation of our beef and veal choices with excellent local wine that was decanted at our table. Great staff and lovely setting.
I loved all the experience here, including the wonderful view, beautiful live music, great atmosphere, amazing sunset, delicious food, and the reception of the waiter.
We went there twice for cocktails, both on the city side. The cocktails, especially the signature cocktails, were first class. The service was relaxed. It's very nice to sit there in the evening.
This is a fantastic restaurant. The food was delicious, the service faultless and the view beautiful. Definitely worth a visit

Excellent food, location and service. Went twice with my daughter. Late lunch and returned for their brunch. This and their affiliated restaurant Panorama were a great experience. Also discount with Dubrovnik pass at Arsenal and they give us a card to get 10% off at Panorama that we already had reservations for. Win win!
Amazing service, amazing food, great ambiance. Great place for couples to come on a night out. Not too expensive.

This restaurant is very good mood at nigh.
The octopus salad and truffle and mushroom pasta were so delicious! 
I met good food and I’m love it!
Also, Robert is good guy!!!!! He gave me high quality service.
I recommend this restaurant!!!!

Very nice food and reasonable prices especially compared to the average restaurant in Dubrovnik.
Great location near the cathedral and excellent people watching. Would recommend

The food was v nice. Monkfish was excellent. Wine was expensive but nice. The service was v good. We had a very pleasant professional waiter from Bosnia who could not have been nicer or more attentive
We enjoyed a fabulous breakfast at Arsenal this morning. Robert, our waiter, recommended a homemade tea that was bright and refreshing. The food and the setting are excellent!

Perfect Start into the day!
Beautiful Place, friendly Staff only topped by the excellent food!
Located right at the little historic harbour.
The food was delicious and the seaside view spectacular. Vlaho was our server and he was awesome. We had the sea bass with vegetables. Highly recommend.

Seated on the veranda overlooking the fisherman’s small harbour, Ante was our fantastic waiter and sommelier; highly recommend the merlot, bourbon gnocchi or sailor’s risotto and peach liqueur to finish; start here first night’s meal and stay for a few more - top evening😬

We were served by Ante, who was very professional and attentive. The food was fantastic, we both had the beef steak which was cooked to perfection with a side order of french fries (and the most amazing mayonnaise!). The weather was a bit cooler than normal but they provided us with our very own heater and blankets which made the whole experience very cosy. We would definitely recommend this restaurant and would come again.
Ante was an amazing server! The views and the food were phenomenal! The best restaurant in Dubrovnik!
Ante was such an amazing server! The food was great and the restaurant had such a lovely view of Dubrovnik!
Excellent view. Beautiful food. Classy-yet-inclusive atmosphere! Attentive-yet-unobtrusive Service. Ask for Vhalo!
Lovely old building between a square and the harbour. Thanks to our server Vlaho for looking after us - he was very attentive
This is a nice spot with beautiful water and boat views! Vlaho took great care of us - could not have asked for better service. Food was delicious- I got the black risotto.
We did not have to wait for a table. Our spot was right by the water with an amazing view! We got blankets and a heater since it was a bit chilly. The food and service by Vlaho were amazing!
An amazing experience with great service and a beautiful view. We had Vlaho and he made great recommendations and was helpful with food choices!
This is a great spot by the water with a fun atmosphere and good views. There is a varied menu and the staff was super friendly. Our waiter Vlaho was so kind and took good care of us.

여기 좋아요!
Super Ocean View and amazing cakes. Also High quality service. We went there for three times. Special thanks for Daniel. His service is extraordinary, so we asked his name.
한국분들, 여기 뷰값합니다. 케이크 맛있어요. 칵테일도 괜찮구요. ㅎㅎ 추우면 실내 들어가면 음악 연주도 해줘요. 분위기가 좋습니다
Great restaurant with amazing view of the bay. The services was amazing (Vlaho) and the food was fantastic. Must stop in Dubrovnik for breakfast and dinner.

A beautiful evening out for dinner overlooking the port in Dubrovnik. We were a party of seven, and the restaurant accommodated our party with ease. The beautiful live music set the scene for an incredibly special time as a family for our last night in the city. Our waiter, Marko, was incredibly attentive and ready with recommendations and great photo taking skills for our group! The food was stupendous and above our expectations. Each dish was prepared and served with excellence as were the cocktails. The desserts were varied and a favourite of our group! (Marko recommended the apple pie and it was amazing!). We will definitely return here anytime we are in the city.

My partner found this place by accident and we are so glad he did. We had a wonderful waiter called Marko who was very knowledgable about the menu, he made great recommendation that were thoroughly enjoyed. We would highly recommend and would return again.
Lovely restaurant by the harbour stunning views. Excellent service by the friendly attentive servers and the food was very good.

We stopped randomly at this very nice restaurant. And it was a great experience. The restaurant is beautiful with 2 great views (inside the old town and outside). Food is delicious. We went there again the day after. We have been served twice by Vlaho , the best service and waiter!
So nice restaurant! The staff was the best and we felt really taken cared about! Vlaho was really nice, kind and just a really lovely person! Love this place!
We had an amazing dinner at this place! Our waiter vlaho was exceptional and the service and food was 10/10, also an amazing view and really good prices. Highly recommend!

Absolutely recommend this place. Fantastic experience with our host, Vlaho, looking after us really well. 
Great value for money with superior service

Absolutely a must visit when in Dubrovnik. Right on the water, food is so delicious and the waiters are extremely attentive to your needs. Had a wonderful time here just enjoying the warm weather, wonderful food, and view!
Amazing food, the decor and architecture is stunning, the view is incredible. Vlaho, treated is like kings and queens. They are doing everything right. Go here.

Spectacular restaurant with amazing food, service, and location. They accommodated my gluten-free requests and exceeded my expectations. The seafood risotto, burger, tuna salad were delicious. We wanted to try everything... we will definitely be back here. Thank you for a lunch to remember. Flawless delivery.
You need to book the seaside tables along the rear wall.

Excellent atmosphere, view and service. Catered for the kids as well. Very happy with this place. We had booked a table inside but they happened to have an available table outside for our fairly large group of 8. Waiter was very attentive. Also have the best view to the harbor

Fantastic service and food, would recommend and we would love to come back!.
Our waiter was Davor and he was perfect! Thank you!
The food was excellent. The view was great. Marijo was a great waiter who gave us very good recommendations.

Lovely place to have an evening meal and watch the harbour.
Food is excellent and the service very good (can be a little bit much during courses). Great selection of dishes with a full wine list.
May be best to book a table given its position.

This place also has an outlet through the building adjacent to Stradum.

Apple Pie is addictive.
Beautiful view of old port , very nice breakfast ( delicious and good quantity), excellent service from Mario Krkic! Highly recommended.

On our first trip to Dubrovnik we'd been struck by how good the food was everywhere we ate in the old town and the Graska Kavana Arsenal was no different. It was an off the cuff choice for our anniversary dinner and we couldn't have imagined a better time. The food was superb (we had the mussels and the fish stew) but what set it apart were the staff. From our server who was friendly, charming and engaging through to the musicians in the lounge who did their best to find our wedding song and then took our requests an absolutely excellent night, we couldn't have been happier.
Delicious food. We loved the food at this restaurant and the service was incredible. We had the sea bass which was fantastic and truffle mushroom pasta.

Wonderful spot with marvellous dishes. Good value for the price. We got a table on the beautiful terrace where the temperature was just perfect. The service was amazing and our waiter was extremely kind.
The inside of the restaurant is also great and super stylish. Bathrooms are clean and comfortable. The perfect place.

The restaurant was great, with a gorgeous view of the marina. The service was great and our waiter, Vlaho, looked after us so well. definitely worth popping into and not expensive despite the premium location .

I am glad that we skipped tourist trap, expensive places in old town and paid the same amount at Gradska Kavana Arsenal near old town port for good sit down lunch with squid, Brodetto (fisherman’s stew). Better value to eat at a good rated place. Also this is one of the few places still sells former Yugoslav era Cockta Cockta (knock off version of Coca Cola, it actually tasted like Dr. Pepper).
Nice place to be in Dubrovnik, good experience, nice location, good services and very, very good food ! I will be here again 😉🤗
Outstanding view of harbor, very friendly staff and wonderful food. Came back twice. Would recommend to all.
Beautiful views, incredible food and fantastic drinks. Stjepan our waiter was knowledgeable and very friendly. Great restaurant would recommend.

Brilliant meal, fantastic location and delicious food. Service was fabulous. Would recommend and will be back. Our waiter was Marijo Krkic - thank you for making us feel so welcome and sharing our sense of humour.

Perfect dinner from to start to end. Wonderful location, delicious food and exemplary service from Marijo. Will definitely be back and would recommend. We were lucky to get a table but advise you book.
Excellent service and food. We ordered the black risotto which was excellent and a chicken salad. The black risotto portion was very small so the value was not good for the price.
Excellent view of the marina. Friendly staff. Varied and tasty breakfast. Must visit in the morning and during sunset.

Great for breakfast and they have non-dairy milk which was great. 

It’s also a fab location to look out ontk the harbour.

We had breakfast here twice on our weeks holiday and it was amazing both times. The staff were so attentive and kind and the view over the water and out at the boats were beautiful. We also had drinks there a couple of times too! It’s a must visit if you’re in the old town
A truly beautiful place for dinner, overlooking the harbour. Waiter was very attentive, lovely service and food was very good. Would definitely recommend, stunning setting.
Fantastic food, knowledgeable and friendly staff and great service. Lovely ambient music and a wonderful view. Really recommend.
Excellent staff and great food! Especially the black risotto! Also the view and ambiance is amazing. And try the espresso martini☺️

I just love this place!
This place has the best dishes of risotto and squid. The view is peeeeerfect. Stjepan made us perfect dinner with pleasant wine and services.

First time visiting Croatia and we end up having a lovely lunch in this beautiful place, with an incredible view. The service it was exquisite, especially for Ivan who was the one on charge of the table, and his impeccable recommendation of the dishes. Very nice experience, high customer service. We definitely recommend this place.

Fine dining with a beautiful old Harbour view at the Ploce side of the Old City. Fabulous friendly service by Ivan and his sommelier colleague. The truffle mushroom pasta was delicious and accompanied by impressive Korlat Syrah 2018. Highly recommended

Super location, overlooking the small harbour. A very nice outside (under cover) dining space, with IR heaters, and a smart, glass fronted, indoor space.
6 of us enjoyed some really excellent food, with equally excellent service. The waiting staff were very attentive, with excellent English. They have a good selection of Croatian wine. We booked in advance, but this time of year the town really isn't very busy in the evening.
This is one of a group of three restaurants in the town, and when paying the bill, they give you a card showing all three. The card gives you a 10% discount when dining at any of the restaurants. We were already booked into Panorama, and used it successfully there.
Highly recommended.
Great food! Great service. Delightful location. Really amazing. Would definitely go again! Nine more characters.

We chose this restaurant as it has been voted 4th of the restaurants in Dubrovnik. However, we were somewhat disappointed. It was mid-April and they sat us on the outside edge overlooking the harbour, the only heater was pointed straight at another table.

As it was fairly cold we decided to skip the starters and only had a main course and bottle of wine. I chose the chicken puttanesca with polenta, the chicken was overcooked and dry. My husband chose the Black risotto with cuttlefish and sage, which he said was a bit on the salty side. As it was so cold and breezy our food was getting cold very quick. I was not the relaxing meal it could have been if we had been put on the inside seating.

Overall cost was €72 with the wine.
Great food, excellent service from Ivan, great location with harbor front, highly recommend. We had a great relaxing time.
Amazing ambiance and views! Delicious food. Great service. We had a delicious black risotto, sea bass and octopus salad.

We cannot recommend this restaurant enough. Amazing views, amazing service and outstanding food. We were here to celebrate our 10 year wedding anniversary and Stefan our waiter went out of his way to make it so special for us. The pianist even learnt our wedding song in 10 minutes and played it for us. So special and an experience we won’t forget.

We stumbled upon this restaurant because it looked busy in the square, and upon walking into the building, we realized it had an absolutely stunning view in the back. Plus, the food was good, and it had great service. We were so happy we chose to eat here!

We opted to sit right on the water instead of inside the square. The staff was incredibly accommodating and the Bloody Mary was fresh squeezed. FRESH SQUEEZED. My partner and I both ordered lattes, the royal benedict, and bloodies, and we both ate every crumb. The view was worth it alone, but the food helped.
Such a wonderful dinner and view! Wait staff was wonderful, we were served by Ivan who provided great recommendations and was so attentive to everything we needed. Don’t miss out on this gem!

Gorgeous venue and the BEST service. I got proposed to here and I couldn't have asked for a more perfect dinner or evening. Food was incredible, environment was incredible, I cant say enough good things.
They were so kind, gave us an unbelievable table with a great view the food was great and the service and one of a kind would definitely come here if your around
