A gorgeous place to sit and either watch people go by (on the town side, on the spacious stone patio with lovely cream awnings) or the boats go by (on the harbor side). Delicious cappuccino and white chocolate almond cake. Friendly service. Wonderful way to spend an hour in Dubrovnik!
Very attentive staff made us feel welcome background jazz music helped to relax the mood o would recommend this restaurant for a great evening
Top service, very friendly and good food, from start to finish it was a great experience, what’s not to like 😀 if you are in Dubrovnik please try, you will not be disappointed.
Absolutely fantastic. The view. The waiter, the food the sercive. Amazing...............?....?..... På live it. Just try

Amazing food and atmosphere. Ivan was our waiter and was incredibly attentive and knowledgable. His English was excellent and looked after us well. If we are ever in Dubrovnik again, we will definitely come back.

Visited here twice over my trip to Dubrovnik, both nights were spectacular. Beautiful setting and the food was incredible. Service was amazing and very friendly.
The most reasonably priced restaurant in Dubrovnik yet the highest standard of food and service.
Would come back again and again. Highly recommend!
Fantastic quid and octopus salad. Lovely place with a view and great service. We had a great lunch experience. Recommended

Ivan provided the most excellent service during our visit. It was our last dinner in Dubrovnik and I wish we can across this gem sooner! Stunning setting, menu and people. Wish we came across this restaurant sooner.

Visited for an evening meal on a cool night, nice to see outdoor heaters and blankets on all the chairs. Staff were very attentive from when we arrived. The wine we ordered wasn't available so they offered a suitable alternative and were very apologetic. Food came out very quickly and was very tasty. They even brought us a free apple pie to share as we hadn't finished our wine which was a lovely touch. Would recommend.

Great atmosphere at night. Was rejected for reservation but went early and wasn’t busy (possibly due to high winds weather). Service was great. Portions were small for the price but flavorful. Wine was great. Got a free dessert which really made the night! Had a wonderful time, good value for the money
Had a lovely lunch and the service was impeccable especially from Stvephan who got us seated at a table outside and sorted heaters and blanket. Food and drinks were also good
Wonderful restaurant and service! Our servers Robert and Mata were so friendly and helpful! I highly recommend this restaurant!

Gradska has a amazing spot in the middle of old town! The drinks and food were very tasty and Matta and Robert made sure we had a great time!! I tried the Strawberry Spritz 3 times and can say its a good to go ♡
Amazing food and GREAT service. Thoroughly enjoyed the evening and the view! A beautiful night with the family. You will not regret eating here!

We really enjoyed this restaurant so much so we went back a second time. The service is excellent. Ask for Marjo or Stephan. Marjo knows his wines. The restaurant is in what was the old docks , and the view of the harbor is lovely. Not to be missed.

Such an amazing find - the views from the restaurant at the back overlooking the harbour and walls is just out of this world. The food is incredible - we went for the light bites, steak sandwich and chef’s burger. Delicious. The service was perfect, Robert was great and even picked up on the fact it was my wife’s birthday. A piece of cake was brought to the table making it a fantastic lunch. Will come again!
Lovely meal served by Ivan. Had a smashing veal and fish stew. Recommended the chicken! If your cold heaters are offered in the outside areas along with blankets.

Mornarski risotto was the best I ever tried in my life. We also had lamb chops and beefsteak, they were great! Wine was excellant and the waiters were outstanding. All that fullfilled with amasing view. Warm recommendation.
Ante was an amazing server! Very attentive and kind. The food is delicious and has probably the best view of any restaurant in the city! Don’t miss out on this place.
really nice staff, and the best mussels i’ve ever tried. amazing view from the restaurant aswell. me and my boyfriend had a great time
Great food, great service, great experience, great Croatian wine, great cocktails & amazing setting. Happy to recommend.
Ambience and service was excellent thanks to Ivan. The monkfish which was a dish of the day was excellent.

Whether you sit port side and watch the boats arriving and leaving or the square side and watch the locals and tourists stroll on by it’s a great spot. Lovely staff, nice food and flexible to help my fussy daughter. Great cake too!
Great service and excellent food. Would 100% recommend for a family lunch or dinner even for friends. It’s not too expensive and the venue is truly amazing any time of the year.
Great food and service! Strongly recommend!! The Rissoto, gnocchis and cake were AMAZING! The place is very nice as well
Excelent service, the staff was super friendly and the food was really good. Definitely will come back!

We have been here a couple of times and the service has been exceptional. The food is amazing and it’s very good value for money. On our second visit we were looked after by a gentleman called Ante who made us feel very welcome and his level of service was top class.
It is definitely a beautiful place to visit. Service and food were top. Josip was a wonderful host.

We had a perfect dinner in Grandska Kavana Arsenal. First, our waiter Joseph was terrific, professional, and kind. Always looking to make us comfortable and attended. The food was delicious; seafood risotto and fish stew were both delightful, and we got a couple of glasses of fantastic red wine. The desserts were in the same line, just perfect. The restaurant's atmosphere is very cozy, and the service is superb! If you are in Dubrovnik, this place is a place you shouldn't miss! Thanks, guys!
Ate lunch and dinner here in the same day. Amazing food, amazing service. Will be back next time I’m in Dubrovnik!

We had a fantastic meal and brilliant service from Ivo. The food was fresh, flavoursome, and delicious. The service was prompt, polite and friendly. The restaurant is perfectly situated in the heart of the Old Town, and overlooks the harbour. We would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone visiting Dubrovnik. We ate there on a number of occasions.
Food is perfect and view is breathtaking. All the food is good especially the sailor style risotto. Cheese cake is pretty nice and tasty. Thx stipe for our service tonight🫶🏻

This restaurant has fantastic service, beautiful food and stunning view. The cocktails are lovely and strong, and the waiter provided extra patio heaters and blankets for outside comfort! Would come again

We had a really good experience in Arsenal Restaurant with good meals and extremely kind waiters.
I strongly recommend !!

Absolutely outstanding meal. Service was perfect, view was beautiful, and the food was delicious! We’ll definitely return for another meal before leaving town. Ivo was a great server, very attentive and helpful!

Incredible location right on the water with reasonably priced options. Wait staff provided great recommendations and food/drink was awesome. I had the seafood stew and the strawberry spritz. Ante, our waiter, explained the regional ties of our dishes as well. Highly recommend this stop at least once in your itinerary, but you’ll want to go for more!

First off, Stjepan was amazing. He was affable, outgoing, helpful, & informative. His personal service & the overall service of the team was amazing. We had drinks at the ready, the food was fantastic, & the ambience created was comforting. Overall, we enjoyed our culinary experience & enjoyed ourselves immensely.
Superb food and atmosphere, quite unbelievable service from Stjephan and absolute star. Great advise on both wine and food. A great last night. Thank you
Ante our server was amazing. He made my friend’s birthday so special. The food, view, atmosphere and service was all great. Thanks for an amazing experience

The view in the Restaurant is beautiful and the service is very nice as well. A vast knowledge of wines and very nice dishes. The squid that we had was perfectly cooked. I would also recommend getting dessert. I would definitly go again!

Such a lovely evening, I emailed the restaurant in advance as it was my partners birthday, and they remembered and did a birthday pudding, seated us in an amazing seat. Really kind staff, thank you so much.
The food is fresh and delicious! The services of Davor Pranjic, is fantastic! Thank you for your services!
Amazing atmosphere and amazing food. Stjepan’s service was wonderful and he gave helpful advice about food and drinks. Lovely place, would recommend.
Excellent service (thank you Plaz), wonderful food in a relaxed, comfortable environment seaside. Indoor and outdoor dining available (the bora wind forced us inside) …lovely evening.

During our 10 weeks in Dubrovnik, from January - March, Arsenal become our go-to place for both afternoon coffee and special dinners out. Initially we went because it was one of the few restaurants in the Old City open during the winter. But, we kept returning even after March brought us many other options. Every experience was delightfully pleasant, from the service to the ambience to the food. We were so warmly greeted by the wait staff at every visit. They are real professionals who know how to easily engage in conversation but are also good about giving you space to just "be." There is no rushing to turn over tables here. They also obviously enjoy and take pride in their work. (Our favorite waiter Ivo once told us he likes "everything" about working there, naming in particular the years-long relationships with his colleagues and the fresh food that is all made in-house.) There is no place that you can sit that doesn't have a touch of magic: on the Stradun terrace, upstairs under the arched ceiling, in the front room, or on the back terrace overlooking the eastern harbor. The food is impeccable. We had the sea bass and vegetables in parchment paper over and over, enjoying it immensely each time. The black risotto was the best we had anywhere along the coast and included wonderful garnishes of fried sage and furled rice paper. A daily special roast duck was also very memorable. The chocolate cake with a layer of orange marmalade is delicious, as is the almond cake. There was nothing we tried that wasn't either very good or exceptional - all a great quality for the upscale but reasonable prices. Another thing we appreciated about Arsenal is that it seems to be a regular part of the community - from being filled with locals meeting for coffee to serving drinks and pastries to the music patrons exiting the KMD theater next door after the symphony's annual masquerade concert. In short, we enjoyed Arsenal so much that we chose to eat there for our last dinner out at a restaurant prior to our departure from Dubrovnik. Ivo was our waiter once again and - as always - made our evening warm and memorable. We thank him, Robert, Blaz, and all the other wait staff who so graciously welcomed us time and again.

This was the best dinner experience we had in Europe so far. Our group is from the US and we had a great time enjoying a dinner with the most perfect view. The food was spectacular, fish was very fresh, vegetarian options were also delicious and well cooked. The waiter was so sweet and gave us each a taste of a walnut liquor thats traditional to have in Croatia as a dessert drink. They have 3 restaurants and if you dine at one of them you get a discount for future visits to the other restaurants. Highly recommend this spot.

This spot is great for a date night or dinner with friends. The views are spectacular and the service was also one of the best I have ever experienced. Very attentive and knowledgeable staff. Enjoyed all the food, I highly recommend the truffle and mushroom pasta.

This was my first time in Croatia and I was recommended this place by my tour guide, and it did not disappoint! Incredible service (shout out to Ivan), incredible food and incredible views. 10/10 definitely recommend this to everyone!

Beautiful waterfront restaurant. Food was great. Our server, Marijo, was very friendly and helpful. Recommend!
1190
就在码头旁边 我坐完sunset tour游船回来冷的瑟瑟发抖 急需温暖的食物填报肚肠。个人非常喜欢的食物 我选择了fish stew和seafood rissotto，两道菜都很美味，蘸着面包吃也很香，服务生iven人很nice也很帅，手机没电了还给我充电宝～

Absolutely fantastic service and food, our server Mario was there for our every need and even allowed us to have an impromptu cocktail lesson with the bartender. The food was perfectly cooked and the medium rare steak was rosy pink all the way through and deliciously tender. I recommend the meat and cheese cold starter, the flavors presented were delicious and the entire experience was a joy.
Beautiful dinner on a warm evening! The staff are wonderful and the food was some of the best we’ve had during our week in Dubrovnik. Thanks to Vlaho for making our evening so lovely :)

On my first afternoon in Dubrovnik, I was lucky to walk into this place to have a delicious lunch right by the water. I had the black risotto and a salad - the risotto was one of the best plates of food I had in Dubrovnik! I ended with a rozata which was a bery mice ending to a delicious meal.

Professional service by Ivan. Great view to the old port and enjoying the vacation at the best. Accompanied with the music "Amazing Grace", so one could memorize back the pilgrim way in the old medieval town of Dubrovnik.

The view, service and food were absolutely top tier. Ivan catered for us and did a stellar job of making sure we were well fed and recommended many items on the menu for us, which all turned out to be delicious. We were also served a pear liqueur at the end which was made in-house, which I would recommend to anyone coming here. Fabulous restaurant

What wasn't to love? The location was beautiful, the food was quite good and reasonably priced considering the location, and the service was top notch. My server was very polite and courteous, and then when I showed interest in skipping dessert instead for some rakija, I got to experience his fun side as well. I tried the pear, plum, and grape flavors, and all were excellent. It was nice to share some laughs with the server, and I left with a big smile on my face. A great experience that I would recommend highly!
Dinner with a view! Staff were lovely and attentive, particularly Vlaho. The food was delicious! Would recommend!
Damir was an amazing host and we had the best food and service. The truffle mushroom pasta was delicious and so was the zucchini soup. We will be back when we visit again!!
Damir was amazing!! The food was awesome! Truffle pasta was awesome! Margaritas were strong and delicious! I wish we could eat here everyday! We LOVED IT!!
Marijo served us and provided the best time! He made sure we were always doing good and made us laugh! Highly recommend this restaurant for anyone visiting old town
Definitely recommend this spot if you are walking around Old Town. The food and service is amazing. Damir was a phenomenal server. 10/10!
Food delicious and staff absolutely lovely and attentive.Will definitely come again and would recommend. Lovely restaurant.

This was a phenomenal experience. The food was flavorful (had the gnocchi in bourbon sauce) and delectable. The Dubrovnik crème caramel was also a delight. Very light and fluffy but soooo good. The scenery was romantic and beautiful. Felt as if I was in a movie. Bread oil and balsamic vinegar was delicious as a starter too. Service was great. Very kind and funny server.
This is my first time at Dubrovnik. my friends and I just randomly pick this restaurant. Good environment, foods are good, and the waiter Ante is nice and attentive.
Staff is very friendly, excellent customer service. Food was also delicious. Overall great experience and a great Birthday dinner.

Wow. Incredible food, excellent service, fantastic views and reasonable prices. What more do you want? 
We had the gnocchi and cuttlefish black risotto. Both were phenomenal - we nearly went to a place nearby instead and I’m so glad we didn’t. 
I would whole-heartedly recommend eating here
Amazing restaurant, every dish was great, marinated zucchini and black risotto for starters, soups were great as well. The sea bass was so good and traditionally made, definitely highly recommend.
Had some Amazing food here! The waiter was very kind and pleasant. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone traveling in this area. Every appatizer, soup, entree, and dessert were delicious.
Such a lovely restaurant right in the centre of Old Town Dubrovnik! Fantastic service, amazing food and service!

Can’t think of enough adjectives and compliments when in comes down to this place. 

Location is a wonder just by itself, and the rest is taken care of by the professional service and great offer.

I have to mention the staff, with Ivan in particular. They fully understand how guests should be welcomed and treated.

Thank you for your hospitality.

Looking forward to many more visits.
Food was very good, service was quick and our waiter Ante was very helpful in providing details about food options & drinks.
Good food with even better service. Marijo provided fantastic service set in a great atmosphere.! Definitely Recommend.

Not only is Gradska Kavana Arsenal an iconic landmark, the service is topnotch, food and local wine pairings are excellent, ambience and location are amazing! I spent a few weeks in Dubrovnik last February and found myself gravitating to this restaurant several times. The sea bass, truffle and mushroom pasta, gnocchi with bourbon sauce and cuttlefish risotto were divine! Your host, Marijo, consistently provided excellent personal service and recommendations which made each gastronomic experience truly memorable. Your hospitality and professionalism are appreciated! Looking forward to future visits.

Amazing service! Our waiter was Robert he’s was ver attentive! The good recommendations were great! The ambience of the restaurant was amazing! We ordered the Old fashions with Jameson! We ordered the sea bass which was delicious! This restaurant exceeded our expectations! Thank you !!

The food was absolutely delish! I got the fish stew..could taste the freshness from the first taste! Ante was out server and was very hospitable and helpful. An overall great experience my first time being in Dubrovnik. I will definitely be back!

Had an amazing dining experience. The food was great and the service even better. Our waiter, Ante was so personable and attentive, he took care of us and made us feel welcome! Would definitely recommend this restaurant if you are in the area.

...and ate two of our four Dubrovnik dinners there. Great duck breast and risottos, extensive wine selection (the Croatian wine scene, it seems, has exploded since my last visit [in 1982]). It being winter and all, the outside area was not open, but the inside is pleasant and offers a great chance to watch the world go by. Friendly staff speaking fluent English.

I have been to Arsenal on several occasions and have always been delighted with the service and offer. Fantastic breakfast, tasty coffee, delightful cocktails. The service has always been flawless. It's location is perfect. Next time I will be trying there for lunch or dinner!
We had dinner in this restaurant everynight of our stay in this beautifull city, excellent food and service.

Had a really special time at Gradska Kavana on 14th Feb 23. Not only was the food excellent value for money, but it was superb quality and the ambiance, live piano music, and customer service was outstanding (particularly our host Marijo Krkić)! Would heartily recommend!

We visited Dubrovnik on vacation and feel so lucky we found this restaurant. We were there for 5 days and had dinner there four times. One of the evenings we decided to try a different resultant nearby and decided never again! Gradska kavana Arsenal can’t be beat! This is the very best steak I’ve had in years, and the the gnocchi was perfect! Our servers were all wonderful but special should our to Ivan who made our visit feel extra special. If you drink whisky I highly recommend their whisky sour. It’s made the way it’s supposed to be made. 5 stars all the way!

This restaurant is by far the very best of all of those we’ve tried in Old Town Dubrovnik. The gnocchi is wonderful, the wines excellent, and the waiters have been so charming and attentive. Today we had Ivan and loved him!
We sat overlooking the marina and sipped fresh squeezed orange juice. The breakfast breads were plentiful and I really enjoyed the full breakfast. Friendly service!

Great food and great service. 

Visiting Dubrovnik in the winter means cold temperatures, high winds, and beautiful bright blue skies. It also means much fewer tourists than in the spring and summer. And while that is a huge positive, the negative is that many of the city’s restaurants are closed for the season. Fortunately, Gradska kavana Arsenal Restaurant is not one of them. Situated next to The Rectors Palace right off the main street, it is a cozy, welcoming cafe/restaurant. There are casual sitting areas and proper tables and chairs downstairs and upstairs. (There is outside seating too in the front where one can see and be seen.)

We were greeted warmly and sat at our table. Our waiter was Ivan. Cocktails were ordered and duly arrived. In our admittedly limited experience with this city’s restaurants, we can vouch that these were the best Old Fashioneds we’ve had here. The food menu isn’t extensive, but there is a daily list of specials. We started with sharing a seasonal salad and the soup of the day - a cream based zucchini soup. The salad was lovely - crisp, fresh ingredients in a perfectly balanced vinaigrette. The soup was delicious, and left us wanting more. For mains we had the gnocchi with bourbon sauce off the menu and duck breast with polenta and candied pecans off the specials list. Both dishes were well executed. They presented well and were as tasty as we could have hoped. The beef strips in the gnocchi dish were tender and not overdone, and the gnocchi itself was perfectly cooked. The duck breast was delicious and went very well with the white polenta and cherry sauce with pecans it was served on. We enjoyed a bottle of Dingač Edivo from their accessible wine list. Mains were followed by a super light and fluffy cheesecake from the pastry case and a couple of complimentary glasses of a local karob liqueur. 

Throughout the evening our waiter Ivan was friendly and attentive. He took care of our needs with just the right amount of chat and interaction, and we enjoyed his service thoroughly. 

We highly recommended this lovely place and hope that you sit at one of Ivan’s tables. 

P.S. We also stopped in here for a light lunch on the afternoon of our arrival in Dubrovnik after a rough 2 days of travel to get here. We enjoyed their chicken salad from the light lunch section of the menu and the truffle and mushrooms pasta. Both were delicious and we would heartily recommend this restaurant for lunch as we. 

Note: there is a fancier, more upscale dining area at the back of this restaurant that looks over the water which we understand has a more extensive menu, but it is not open in the winter months.

First meal in Dubrovnik was at Arsenal.
Food was very delicious and service was superb. We especially commend the service by Ivan, very attentive to detail and very pleasant
If you want to sit and have a good coffee while being in the center everything then this cafe bar is the right place for you. They also serve a very good breakfast.

My husband and I went here because we got recommendations for this place. It is located at the heart of the Old town. First we went just for coffee, but later came back to have lunch. Even though I wish portions were maybe larger (we ate mushroom truffle pasta and gnocchi with beef in bourbon sauce), the food was very delicious, wine was great and most important of all, service was - par excellence!! We felt really welcomed there and truly enjoyed our stay there. Unfortunatelly, I don't know the name of the waiter, but I can say that you can expect utmost service and delicious food. Highly recommend!

Absolutely delicious food and excellent service. I had the fish soup and the truffle and mushrooms pasta - both tasted incredibly fresh. I highly recommend this place for its ambiance too - calm, quiet and classy.

Wonderful restaurant with delicious food. The marinated zucchini was absolutely amazing. Ivo, the waiter at the location, is probably the sweetest person we've met yet, a wonderful waiter who is a credit to his profession. Couldn't recommend this place move.

We booked for New Years Eve. The weather was quite mild and we had a table outside overlooking the port. The heaters were on for those that felt a little cold. The waiter was really nice and friendly and offered his help with some of the dishes on offer. Service was excellent and the restaurant is in a great location. There was not a lot on the dessert menu but what we did have was excellent. We rounded our meal off with a local walnut brandy - very potent. We went back another day for coffee and to watch the world go by.

I came to this restaurant three times during my trip.
The service of Amte staff was very good and It was the best restaurant in Dubrovnik.

It is not a tourist trap. It is a place with great food, great service, and cozy feeling. A place to come back to every time I visit Dubrovnik. We had an octopus and burrata salad, squid and tartuf pasta. Each item tastier than another.
From the view to the food to the staff. Mario is one of them. Everything is excellent. Highly recommend this place.

This is truly one of our favorite restaurants in Dubrovnik. Superb service - on a different level than other restaurants. We love the terrace for morning coffee and ‘people watching’. Coffee is great as are all the drinks we’ve tried. Steak sandwich was excellent

We had the fish stew and black risotto both taste delicious and fresh while enjoying the beautiful view of Dubrovnik at night! We were closely assisted by Ante. Great place to enjoy your time with friends and family, but also very great for couples.

A beautiful location, we sat right along the arches along the harbour. The food was a wonderful mix of Croat classics and some really lovely and innovative dishes using seasonal ingredients. 

Ante was our server, he was wonderfully friendly and gave really great recommendations. 

Definitely a highlight to visit in Dubrovnik. 

We had the marinated zucchini, soup of the day (zuchinni cream soup), gnocchi with beef strips and a red wine bourbon sauce, fish stew, carob chocolate cake with wild orange, and Dubrovnik crème caramel.

Very kindly staff, 
We ordered grilled squid with patetos and one portion of beefsteak.
Food was very fresh and perfect cooked.
We spent several evenings in this restaurant. Good food, good drinks, best beer and the best servis! Thank you very much!
Good food and amazing view! Marijo is very friendly and nice! Reasonable price and diversity of good we come here 3times

We had a few aperitivi here in the early evening. Although we’ve been here many times the view never gets old , and the staff are knowledgeable and very friendly. 

😀

Absolutely love this place, I identified my table this morning on my walk and reserved it for this evening. My waiter Marijo was the perfect host and looked after me from start to finish. I kicked off with a Bellini that was perfectly mixed and had soup of the day, which was Pea and Mint followed by the most delicious Truffle & Mushroom pasta, the best I have tasted to date! This was washed down with a very nice local red recommended by Marijo. I will definitely be returning to this excellent restaurant and thoroughly recommend it when visiting Dubrovnik!

Marijo was the best waiter that you could ask for! He is by far the best waiter that I’ve had in Europe. He was very attentive to us, and the food was delicious. I would highly recommend the local wine as well as the burrata salad. The food was served beautifully. The stellar customer service, great food, and stunning view made for a perfect meal. Again-a huge thank you to Marijo!

Had an excellent lunch at the restaurant, with wonderful views of the harbour. The seafood risotto and sea bass were delicious. Our server, Ante, was warm and friendly, and made us feel right at home. Would highly recommend this restaurant.
Excellent spot for a relaxing drink on the terrace after a hard day of sightseeing, and to enjoy some people watching.

One of the best settings in Dubrovnik, overlooking the harbour. We visited without a booking but I wouldn't recommend this as it is rightly very popular. There were no tables free when we arrived but there is a bar area to enjoy a drink while we waited. We were eventually seated near the front with a lovely view. The waiter was exceptional and so was the food.

We went for both a lunch and came back for breakfast the day after. Atmosphere was just great and service were excellent. Waiters gave a super personal service which I always love and appreciate. This place is one of the more expensive in Dubrovnik, but I think its fair to the location and food level. Its worth a visit and have a lovely view on both terrasses.

I’m vegetarian and I had the soup of the day (zucchini) and the truffle pasta. Both were amazing but the truffle pasta blew my mind. It was truly some of the best pasta I’ve had in my life; it was creamy and the truffle flavor was very apparent. My waiter was Vlaho who was kind, attentive, and speedy. Beautiful ambiance as well.

I will definitely be coming back and recommending this restaurant to friends!

Great spot for a nice dinner. We had the black risotto and the truffle pasta. They were both delicious! The wine was great and the wait staff was all super friendly, especially our waiter Vlaho. Would definitely recommend!

My friend and I had an incredible experience at this restaurant. I ordered the Black Cuttlefish Risotto and my friend got the Gnocchi in Bourbon Sauce. Vlaho and Ivo were incredibly thoughtful and checked in throughout the dinner. The staff is truly one of the best parts and the food was delicious! Thank you!!!!
Excellent food and great service! Romantic atmosphere! We all agree the meal reaches Michelin 4 Stars standard!
Very fresh And tasty meal with excellent presentation. Great choice of the meal. Also very welcome staff especially Vlaho. Thank you for great experience.

Amazing food like I can’t help but smile in each bite. I just wish the outside area is open 

Our server Ante is really Hot

Very nice place and nice service. Thanks Ante ! 

The place is also very pretty and food is good. 

Recommend to eat there

Gradska Kavana Arsenal has become my favorite restaurant in Dubrovnik. The atmosphere in the restaurant makes you feel like a royalty in the olden days. The view in the restaurant is spectacular. 

Upon entry, we were greeted by staff, so professional and yet so friendly. For us, they represented Croatia so well that we fell in love with the friendliness and warmth of the Croatian people.

We ate our first breakfast in Dubrovnik at this fine restaurant. The ambience may scare you to enter thinking it’s way more expensive than other restaurants in the Old City of Dubrovnik, but to be honest, it’s the same almost.

The breakfast included a basket of all sorts that we may or may not eat, like honey, marmalades and so on. See photos posted here. 

The restaurant has a different kind of class, high class feel, which makes any food seem special. Anyway, the food they serve are very delicious and for that reason we came back and ate our last dinner at this restaurant with a bottle of wine of course.

We had a fantastic and memorable dinner. We ordered very delicious food that I still remember until now. We had double order of squid as well. I wish to come back and eat at that restaurant again. 

We also received a discount card from them which we used to eat in another restaurant that belongs to their group of restaurants. We ate breakfast the next day there at Dubravka 1836. 10% discount. Good deal. 

I love this restaurant so much that I made a youtube video about it and some facebook and instagram reels as well. 

I highly recommend this restaurant Gradska Kavana Arsenal. It’s not just the food, it’s the experience!

Came for a late lunch with friends. Absolutely top tier service by Ante, helped answer questions, provided interesting information about the restaurant & gave great recommendations. All the meals were presentable and very delicious!! Definitely recommend the sailer style risotto as per Ante. I ordered the soup of the day which was delicious! Definitely coming back for dinner very soon.

This was the second time we’ve visited this restaurant and we plan to be back! Excellent service every time. Ante was our waiter today and he was friendly and helpful. I ordered the Sailors Risotto and it was very tasty. Quality of service and food is wonderful for the price. Great view too!

We were welcomed into Gradska Kavana Arsenal with a big smile and warm greeting. Our group of 4 were guided through to the back of the property to a terrace overlooking the harbour. It was stunning. The twinkling stars shone above and the lights from around created a superb atmosphere. 

We were looked after brilliantly by Vlaho the Head Waiter. He was smartly attired, polite, charming, fun and very professional. Vlaho recommended dishes, which were delicious. 

Food was great: It was hot, colourful, tasty, and full of flavour. Deserts were more-ish. 

A fabulous evening with friends in a gorgeous setting. Thanks to Vlaho and his team.

Wow… what an experience… the view the atmosphere the food the wine and THE SERVICE… impeccable I would genuinely rate this up there as one of the best dining experiences I’ve ever had… if you are visiting Dubrovnik old town this is the place to come for a meal… we had the pleasure of meeting Mica who was our waiter for the afternoon and from the moment we walked through the door he sincerely made every aspect of our experience wonderful… a charming warm bubbly host… thank you :) until next time!

Enjoyed a lovely dinner here was very happy with the food, atmosphere and our incredible friendly waiter Ante. He recommended a great wine pairing with our meals and gave lots of history about Croatian wines!

We had dinner at this wonderful restaurant on a warm evening. The menu is very limited with just a few items to select from for mains and desserts, but everything is exceptional. Prices are super reasonable for Dubrovnik. We spent the same in standard local restaurants for much less impressive meals. Highly recommended.
Very nice view in the afternoon and much better meals and a great staff. Thanks to Ante who was a perfect weiter. We will come back again when we stay in Dubrovnik

We had the best waiter- Vlaho was so friendly, attentive and knowledgeable!! We had such a great meal- ordered the mushroom truffle pasta, sea bass and gnocchi with beef. All were amazing and the view was fantastic!

We had a wonderful dinner and great attention from Vlaho during a recent visit to dreamy Dubrovnik. The truffle pasta and sea bass were delicious and ending the day beside the Adriatic Sea was the stuff memories are made of!

We visited for a leisurely lunch on a sunny afternoon and were seated by the waterfront. The ambience was wonderful - open, spacious and quite a lot of space between tables to ensure privacy. 

We were served by a professional and attentive waiter (Ante) who made us feel very welcome. Great service makes all the difference. 

The food also did not disappoint - we had the black ink risotto, seabass and tiramisu. Reasonable portions, tasty and fresh. Bill came up to €54 (including sparkling water and bread; excluding tip).

Altogether it was a great way to spend a leisurely afternoon. 10/10

Absolutely loved this restaurant. The staff are wonderful, the food exquisite, the cocktails delicious and the views stunning. Can not recommend it enough. Loved both visits in our 4 day trip. Had to go twice it was so good!

Great Service, Great Food, Great Atmosphere - we really had a wonderful last night here. Robert took care of us and was so friendly and attentive. Especially compared to some other places in Dubrovnik you get good value for your money here but for a perfect fine dining experience. Clearly recommended! Same as the restaurant Dubravka outside of the city walls which belongs together with Gradska.
Wonderful experience ! The food is really good, the view on the port is vert beautiful and romantic. Our waiter Ante make you feel like special guests!
Great fish! Efficient service from Ante! The wine is also pretty good! Would have loved to have a dessert there!
We really enjoyed the food - fish stew is really good - and the very nice view! And perfect service! Thanks Ante :)

We had a great lunch.
The sea bass was excellent and our waiter Ante was very nice and efficient.
Highly recommanded place.

Our host Anotini was absolutely amazing and accommodating. His knowledge of wines and the food served was vast and he was able to recommend an array of different culinary options. The prices were also very reasonable for the level of high quality that this restaurant provides. We enjoyed our meal immensely and we will be sure to come back.

We had a great lunch with beautiful view, Vlaho who served us was very kind and the Food was great!
Totaly recomended
We had an amazing lunch, with the perfect view to the Adriatic Sea. I had a meat carpaccio and my mom had a fish soup with some vegetables. Vlaho attended us very well and will definitely return.
This is a wonderful restaurant! The food and cocktails were amazing. Our server Vlaho was so kind and helpful. Definitely recommend!
We enjoyed a delicious cheese plate on the terrace followed by mushroom pasta with our fantastic waiter Vlaho ❤️

Had a wonderful late lunch here overlooking the old harbor in Dubrovnik. Lovely food and beautiful setting watching the boats come in and out. Our waiter Antonio was very pleasant and attentive. A delightful experience for a leisurely meal.

We were warmly welcomed by Stjepan and staff. The food was delicious and served quickly all whilst enjoying a sea view with heaters and blankets after sunset. Well worth the visit. Being with Jade was a memorable moment and I love her with all my heart. Thanks Dubrovnik for this incredible experience.
Great food and location, with port and city wall view from table on the terrace, we have also received incredible nice service from stjepan, it’s a lovely night and we would come back again.
Absolutely fantastic meal The waiter Stjepan was very attentive and professional, guiding us through the menu. His service was first class.

This really was a night to remember from start to finish. We were made to feel so welcome from the minute we entered the restaurant until we left. We had a table at the harbours waters edge which really was a special place to sit and eat dinner. which added to the experience. The food was absolutely stunning and not overly expensive and huge wine list to cater for every taste and budget. This was one of the best meals we have had anywhere, if you are in Dubrovnik you really should eat here.

We had a dinner with family. The service was superb! And the view from the restaurant is great also in the evening. The food was made from good quality ingredients and skilfully prepared. The carpaccio was the best we ever had! Strong recommendation! The kids had off the list chicken with fries and they were happy. 
Lamb chops and duck were very good dishes. The desert cakes were delicious! Of course, quality dinner comes with a price, but it was worth it.
So if you want to have a fine dinner in Dubrovnik this is the place!
We thoroughly enjoyed our dinner here! Ante was amazing and really knew his stuff. Came here for birthday dinner would really recommend

Great service from Ante. Explained the menu well and was very accommodating of my various dietary requirements. Delicious food- top quality with an atmospheric setting over looking the harbour at night- a throughly enjoyable evening
Amazing food and excellent service, fully recommended. Visited twice, once for breakfast and next for dinner, enjoyed both with equal measure
What a lovely evening and food to match. The service made the evening and the setting was beautiful too.
First, our server Antonio was very attentive, knowledgeable, and pleasant. The food was delicious. We visited for lunch. The restaurant had such a great atmosphere.
Really enjoyed sitting in the sunshine each morning of our stay in Dubrovnik overlooking the harbour and eating breakfast at the restaurant. Excellent food and friendly service.
Super food & service with Vlaho. Good value for money too with beautiful surroundings. Highly recommend. The seafood risotto was delicious.
Lovely service from Vlaho! Amazing food, overall a really lovely meal! Really lovely location and would definitely come back again

Great evening. Lovely location overlooking the old City harbour.

Delicious Octopus salad followed by wonderful local Fish stew. 

Vlaho was a real Star. We were looked after so well including a gorgeous Walnut schnapps on the house!

Highly recommended 

G n J

Fabulous location for dinner. The service was excellent, as was the food and wine.

Various dishes were ordered by our group, but I can recommend the buratta and the mint and pea risotto which were delicious.

There were several large tables including our own seated out on the terrace, but the level of service throughout could not be faulted.

I would definitely recommend a stop here for breakfast, lunch or dinner.
Marijo and Robert were extremely friendly and welcoming. They provided excellent service and gave local recommendations for the area. Highly recommend having your breakfast here!
Blaz was a superstar service was excellent/ the Renarta on reception sorted us out with a lovely table / the food was excellent / thank you kitchen team
The food here is delicious, the atmosphere was lovely. There’s a really chilled vibe and our waiter Blaz, was wonderful. Really friendly and welcoming.
Wonderful food. Beautiful view. Amazing waiter (Blaz). Really chilled vibe. Highly recommended. Enjoy!
Great food, views and service. Highly recommend when visiting Dubrovnik. Good value considering the quality of the restaurant.

We’re in Dubrovnik for a week and saw this restaurant whilst having a walk along the port and knew we had to book it for an evening meal. The setting is superb and the ambiance is fantastic with a live pianist and scenic views over the harbour. The server Stjepan was very attentive and knowledgeable about all of the food and wines and gave us a top tier service throughout the night. The food was outstanding start to finish with our table having a combination of seafood and meat and all was met with a great reception. I had the beef carpaccio to start and fillet steak for main which were beautiful and I will attach pictures.

Would highly recommend this place if you’re ever in the old town I would say it’s a must visit and definitely the nicest place we’ve eaten in our week here.
We had the most wonderful meal, a magnificent view and live pianist. Thanks to Blaz for the fantastic service. The best meal of our holiday so far!
Recommended, food good and reasonably priced, restaurant overlooking harbour, service was first class, could not fault. Best meal in Dubrovnik by far.
The restaurant, the food and the service of Ante was perfect ! I really recommend this place in this lovely city.

Really good moment in that restaurant!
Especially with Ante wich was a perfect advisor on dishes and wines!
The beef steak was so tasty i almost took it a second Time.
I recommand 100% percent.
The Gnocchis & Hamburger were delicious.Their regional desserts were fantastic.The service & setting was outstanding.
Wonderful food, beautiful setting, excellent service by our waiter Blaz! Loved our afternoon and lunch here in Croatia!

When you think think of perfect service… Stjepan delivered exactly that… consistently. He made all the difference for me and my friends. The food was delicious And so was his service. We came back three times and had the pleasure to be served by stjepan twice. Great restaurant great Team!

We arrived early in Dubrovnik so headed for the old town while we waited for our apartment. For a seafront old town restaurant this was a real find! Staff were friendly and attentive, the food and cocktails were excellent- we all had eggs Benedict which were delicious and the complimentary bread and pastries are a nice touch! 

We liked it so much we came back here for our last breakfast! Would definitely recommend!
The service was awesome & everyone was so kind! The food was great and it over looks the water! Definitely come here
Most beautiful restaurant and most delicious food!! We all love our waiter Ante!! We would 100% recommended coming here.

We were treated like royalty as soon as we arrived. Our waiter, Marijo Krkic, was fabulous. Everything he recommended was scrumptious. The view is beautiful, overlooking the harbor of Debrovnik. Ambiance and experience was exceptional!! Highly recommend!!

After a walk on the wall we decided to head over for breakfast. The Eggs Benedict, Eggs Benedict Royale, and lattes are all delicious and we had a beautiful spot on the terrace. Robert was a great waiter!

The perfect setting for a romantic meal. Delicious food, spectacular wine but both defeated by the magnificent view!!
Would like to mention the superb attention we received from our waiter Vlaho. 
Will definitely visit again.

I had the pleasure of happening into here after walking around Old Town on my final evening in Dubrovnik. The tiramisu was divine. The French coffee was the perfect balance of coffee and grand mariner. The view was exceptional. Marijo was such an attentive and gracious waiter. Many thanks for him making my last evening special.

location: The Royal Town of Sutton Coldfield, United Kingdom
review:
Blaz was very attentive, thank you.
Great setting & reasonably priced for Dubrovnik.
Would definitely recommend

A truly memorable evening dining on the front of the port. We requested ‘a seat with a view’ in our online booking and they delivered on this with a front row table. The service was exceptional from the moment we arrived, and the little touches such as the blankets on chairs were great. 

My sister and I both had the pasta and it was hot, delicious and beautifully presented. We would recommend both the truffle dish and the bourbon gnocchi. It exceeded some of the pasta we had tried in Rome. 

Thank you for a brilliant evening and we will absolutely return when next in Dubrovnik.
We visited after a recommendation from a friend and are really happy we did! The food was delicious and Ante, our waiter, was even better. Recommended a wonderful dessert for us 👌🏻
Fresh seafood accompanied by breathtaking views of Dubrovnik. Make a reservation in advance for a seat on the terrace. Definitely not a tourist trap.
Really nice location and views of the water. Nice breakfast but could be better considering the price.

We came here a few times for breakfast and dinner while in Dubrovnik, the food was delicious and the service was excellent, nothing was too much trouble, staff were attentive but we didn’t feel rushed. There were even blankets available for when the temperature dropped in the evening. And the views were amazing!
Amazing food, we got s three course menu amd the seafood was just incredible, good for value and excellent views! Would highly recommend.
Marijo have good friendly service and good recommendation for our lunch. We really enjoyed that. And the lunch was really good.
What a view and perfect service in a good location. Very decent food. Will come back and can recommend.

My wife and I went to this restaurant one lunchtime and had such a nice time that over the period of our holiday we simply ended up reserving other days to go back and enjoy the food because the meals were so tasty, the service was amazing and the views of the sea and harbour from the restaurant are stunning (see pic). 
The customer service we received on all occasions we visited was second to none-literally outstanding from our various waiters including Adnan, Anthony and the lady who greets and makes reservations called Maria-thank you so much. We also had another waiter who served us one afternoon who wore glasses (sorry I didn’t get chance to get your name) but he too was great and gave my wife some nice advice about a dish she enquired about. 
We dine out in nice restaurants a lot but have to say this restaurant and the food they serve is now in our top ten, and our top ten includes the likes of The Chiltern Firehouse and The Ivy. Even when the restaurant had to close for a private party one afternoon, Maria still managed to squeeze a booking in for us slightly earlier, so we really appreciate all your support. 
Will definitely revisit when we return to Dubrovnik. Amazing-thank you, much appreciated.

I had breakfast here 2 days in a row and the food was great but the service was even better. Robert was very accommodating and gave us recommendations on what restaurants to try. I would definitely come back.
We came here for breakfast, great food and service from Robert! So we came back twice! The back side has a beautiful view, Mario was very kind as well.
Great service and amazing view! We ordered the tuna tartar to start as well as the daily soup. Both were great and I would highly recommend.

If you enjoy beautiful sceneries, then Gradska Kavana Arsenal is the place to be. Located in the old port of Old Town. Wonderful service and people. We had a beautiful breakfast. We had Marijo as our waiter, he did a wonderful job, he was friendly and kind.

They also offer 10% discount.

Definitely need to go back!

I was there with a couple of friends for the good food festival. Amazing food, we mostly had meat menus, the meat literally melts in your mouth. But I have to mention our waiter Ivan Dzakula, he was extremely professional and kind to us! Thank you so much for the most wonderful service!
Amazing views and even better food and service, stsepan was the best server and helped us pick out the best dishes as well as the best drinks!
Just enjoyed a lovely, relaxing, evening eating an excellent meal and receiving service by Antonio. Highly recommend.
We are here for a lovely long lunch. Mario was attentive to our every need and the food was delicious. I would definitely come to eat here again.

Great view from the restaurant. Nice seafood.
The waiter Ante Kristijan was really kind and gave impressive recommendations.
Will definitely go back again!
Wonderful food, fantastic location and view and exceptional service. Our favourite restaurant from a number we visited over a long city break in Dubrovnik

How can we describe a night as magical as this? The staff is completely charming, the food is exquisite and the view is a dream. Just magic…this is a must. A must!! A special shout-out to Ante, our wonderful, adorable server. He was incredible.
Great service and amazing views. Ant’s suggestions for lunch were spot on. The risotto was amazing. Definitely a place to return several times

We ate at this restaurant twice during our short stay in Croatia. Food was delicious both times. Prices are very reasonable especially for the seaside and old town views. Service was the friendliest we experienced in Croatia. Very engaging and helpful. Would highly recommend this restaurant.

My husband and I spent 2+ hours dining and drinking here on a rainy day in Dubrovnik. The food was soo good and the drinks were really tasty! The bartender took our custom drink orders and was so kind to have made really tasty cocktails for us that were off the menu.

Ivan and Adi were our servers and I want to have a special call out for them and their incredible service!! Loved this experience! Must go - the views are unbeatable and the service and food won’t disappoint.

Don't skimp on a few dollars and miss this gem! We were pretty hungry after a full day of walking and started looking at some of the restaurants in Old Town. This one was a little pricier than the rest, so our first thought was to keep looking. BUT, when we're at home we eat at a 5 star restaurant just a few times per year on special occasions, and if visiting the Old Town isn't a special occasion then IDK what is! We were so glad we decided to splurge a few dollars. Between the 3 of us we had a variety of dishes....duck, beef, chicken....and everything was beyond top shelf, we're talking Michelin star quality. Treat yourself, you'll be sorry if you don't.....

We attended and tried the fish menu - a special offering for the Good Food Festival. We were served by Ante who gave us fantastic wine pairing suggestions for our meals and great service throughout. The black risotto was easily the standout dish. Would happily come back here for a meal!

Best meal we had all week in Dubrovnik - and no dearer than the more commercial restaurants all around the main square. 
We thought it might be too pricey, so avoided it, but had the most fabulous carpaccio, truffle pasta and leek and pea risotto on Saturday night. Top class service, well worth the wait! Do go!
Wonderful dinner, beautiful ambiance and very attentive staff. Ticks all the boxes with relaxed live piano music amd a fabulous view of the marina.
Most amazing meal on our last night In Dubrovnik. Seated on the waterside listening to live music. Great food, service (thank you Ivan) and atmosphere. Highly recommend for that special night,
We had a fantastic evening at Gradska, Ante the waitor really took care of us!! Great guy that made our stay memorable! 😁
We really loved Antis service! Loved the food, the truffles is delicious. Fast and lovely service!!!
Came for a girls trip and we had the best food and service. The view is insane, so make sure you take a second to take it in!
Ante the waiter was so nice and made this meal so pleasant for my friends and I. Not to mention the food was unbelievable and the fish was fresh.

Amazing restaurant, very satisfied. Our waiter Ante was great and treated me like the president. Breathtaking view and great food. Would recommend for anybody staying in Dubrovnik. I personally had the fish stew and it was amazing.

I had an amazing dinner worth my two other friends here in old town Dubrovnik. Our waiter, Ante, was very helpful and attentive to us and our needs. Even though my friends and I are younger, he treated us like any other customer. The staff and food was amazing and I highly recommend if you are in the area.

Amazing food and wine. The beef carpaccio and the truffle and mushroom pasta get a special mention. Our waiter Tomislav was amazing. Selected a delicious wine to our taste and was always there when required. Talked us through whatever we needed and up for a good chat. Thanks again and hopefully be back when we next visit Dubrovnik!!
Wonderful meal with friends while on an exciting trip. Definitely enjoy a selection from their seafood options.

After an overnight trip from the States this was our first stop. The tables on the square were lively and looked like a good place for lunch. What we did not know was the extraordinary view from the tables in the back by the harbor. Our waiter could not have been more delightful, giving us 4 "must dos" -visiting this restaurant "check", walking the wall, "check", taking the ferry to Lokrum Island "check" and taking the cable car to the Panorama Restaurant (a sister restaurant)- the best!

Our meal was wonderful - Seafood Risotto and the Sea Bass special. Fresh wonderful food. Our waiter suggested a Croatian wine, Posip which we loved. We genuinely enjoyed a leisurely lunch at Gradska Kavana Arsenal, complete with delicious food, Croatian wine, and a view you almost think cannot be real. And best of all - a terrific waiter that made this start to our trip one to remember.

Excellent food with a stunning view of the harbour. The seafood risotto was particularly delicious and the ambience was great. Not too expensive either and a very peaceful spot! Our waiter Ante was very diligent

Amazing service from all staff, particularly from Ante who was incredibly engaging. 
The food was outstanding, every dish was delicate and incredibly flavoursome and the wine……..outstanding! Can’t recommend this place enough. Perfect ambassadors for a lovely city.
We'd only been in Dubrovnik for a few hours when we got here. The welcome, the food and the wine was wonderful as was the service from Ante. Wwll worth a visit.

Nautika Restaurant is a great place to eat, lovely view of the harbour as well.
The waiters are very friendly and helpful

Had dinner here on the last night of our holiday and weren't disappointed! Food was fantastic, Dalmatian ham followed by Gnocchi with beef strips in bourbon sauce. Excellent wine selected by our waiter Tomislav who really added to the night with his friendly manner and casual conversation. The view of the harbour from the restaurant is amazing, the food is excellent and the service could not have been better. A must if you're visiting Dubrovnik and a lovely way to finish a holiday..... HINT - book a few days in advance for a table at the front of the restaurant looking directly over the harbour .......

Without a doubt the best meal of our weeks holiday in Dubvronik. We choose here for our last night, the atmosphere and music was beautiful.
What made the night was the genuine friendliness and helpfulness of Tomislav who waited on us along with the superb food. Cannot recommend it enough for an evening meal. Five star service and food.

I came with my husband to Gradska Kavana Arsenal to enjoy a nice dinner on our honeymoon and our meal was fantastic, the view was excellent, overlooking the marina, an overall wonderful experience! Also, Ante, our server was fantastic, very attentive to any need that we had, very polite and respectful. We will definitely come back, thank you Ante!

This was by far our favourite dinner since visiting Croatia (and perhaps anywhere we’ve been in the world?) ! The food was AMAZING! Wine was AMAZING! And our wait Antonio was… AMAZING! Thank you!
Definitely recommend this place for dinner whilst visiting Dubrovnik!
Lovely food. Great staff very accommodating and happy to help. Well priced for standard of food. Must try
Our waiter Ante was amazing and gave us great recommandations regarding both wine and food! Also the prices were reasonable compared to other places in the old town!

An amazing meal to celebrate our engagement, the food was amazing and the staff did everything to make us feel as special as possible. Stjepan was particularly amazing, he made this a meal we will remember forever by his outstanding service. Thank you!

I would like to commend the management for immediately addressing the issues I encountered during my lunch here (first review at the bottom for context and fairness). They were quick to apologize, investigate what happened, and offered a complimentary meal. I was able to have dinner here on the same day - my last full day in Dubrovnik and the dinner experience made up for the mishaps that occurred during my lunch there. At first I didn't want to go back anymore and would rather try another restaurant, but thought I'd give it a chance since Mario was very sincere and apologetic in his messages. They were able to accommodate despite the last minute notice, and it did not disappoint. They gave me one of the best tables by the harbour side, seafood was fresh and the wine pairings were amazing, the customer service was a hundred times better - like it was a totally different restaurant from my lunch experience. I appreciate the friendliness of my waiter, taking the time to explain the origins of the olive oil and some of the local wines, offering a heater and putting a blanket on my shoulders when it got windy. Accountability and the proactive initiative by management to makeup for their lapses are rare, and speak volumes about the company's professionalism.

I am a person of color (South East Asian, not the "fancy" Asian) who look like I'm in my 20's, dining alone for a light lunch, and was possibly profiled by the first waiter to a minimum level of service he was willing put an effort on. I really do hope the staff will be reminded or re-trained to treat customers equally no matter what race or how they look like. I will still go back to Dubrovnik and eat here again and hopefully experience the same level of service during my dinner here.

----

initial review of my lunch experience:

Discriminatory, Insulting, Inattentive Staff, Gave Me Fast Food Style Service

It's the first time in my entire life that when I asked to have my leftover food to go, the waiter gave me a styrofoam container to put the food in there myself. No worries, I can do that but it's terribly, shockingly insulting, especially seeing how attentive they were to other guests. The wind blew the table linens and knocked over the condiments, they fixed other table's set up but just walked past me. Also I was the only table where they didn't serve a bread basket and olive oil and balsamic vinegar, they took a while to get my order and didn't offer that bread basket or even water. The only good thing about this place is the view, food is so-so. I really wanted to like this place and have coffee after my lunch but I felt so discriminated by staff and couldn't help but burst to tears.

Food is just excellent but the service is even better.
Must go place when you're in the old city of Dubrovnik.

Tomislav our server and Nick the manager was just amazing. Even making the reservation was so easy and everyone was so kind. Everybody was smiling the entire night and the food and the drinks were amazing. I can't wait to come back!
Had great time with Tommi, great view and service on the patio. Great food and drinks and friends……….
Fabulous service amazing food. The view and everything about this place is a must eat!! I would rate every item tasted as delicious

Great food and relaxed atmosphere. We had a light lunch and it was good quality and no more expensive than anywhere else (surprisingly for such a reputed place). We sat on the town side terrace of this rather large and magnificent restaurant.
Was absolutely blown away with the joyous restaurant along the water front, great service! Ivan, thank you so much for your exceptional service!
We had an amazing reception by Ivan who recommended the best things on the menu. We had amazing food and service and we cannot recommend enough this place, it's a must!

Best dinner on Dubrovnik on our 6 night stay. We had a table with a view of the port but just inside the glass windows since there was a cold wind blowing and a great waitress. We had local wines, salads, grilled vegetables, grilled salmon, duck and then walnut chocolate cake. Every dish was excellent. We had a relaxed evening with friends who also raves about their food. A wonderful dinner.

Visited last night for my friends 60th birthday and it was outstanding. It made his birthday truly special. We eat at nice restaurants quite a lot and this is one of my top ten favourites ever. Our waiter was excellent and ensured our evening was very special. I had the Gnocchi to start then the duck, both were excellent. The sauces and flavours are carefully put together to create wonderful taste sensations as are the wines. If you are in Dubrovnik this is a must visit.

We stopped for a quick lunch with no booking, the friendly staff gave us a nice table near the front overlooking the ferry landing. We shared a burata and tomato salad and a burger which was quite simply superb. This was possibly our best meal in Dubrovnik, simple food done brilliantly, highly recommended.
Great food at an amazing price, the waiter Marijo was very attentive and polite. Would definitely recommend eating here when visiting the old town.
Amazing place with great service and food. Location was super great!! Marijo was so friendly and attentive. Definitely recommend!
Went here for drinks, great service and lovely atmosphere. Good location, nice for a chill evening..

View, meal, service, and wine all A++. Wonderful main dishes around $20/Euro and local wine about $40/Euro a bottle. Waiter even offered a wine taste to help narrow our choice. Nice piano player added to the atmosphere of this historic location. We tried reservations on the website, but they were fully booked two weeks out yet we were able to walk-in for a table just before 1900.

Fantastic view with even better food and service. We had a lovely meal tonight. Complete with a pianist and cello playing lovely music. We had the sea bass, fish stew and carpaccio. All were delicious and drinks were amazing. Recommend 10/10!!

We had a wonderful dinner here. Absolutely amazing atmosphere, incredible food, fantastic drinks, and a gorgeous view from the patio. Our server Vlaho was extremely professional and provided some of the highest quality hospitality we have had the pleasure of enjoying.
Truly amazing, best meals we have had in a long time, croatia and beyond. The sailor rissoto is so delicious. Amazing service from Vlaho too! A must stop if in Dubrovnik.
The setting was spectacular with a view of the old harbour and seaside mountains. The service was excellent and food was good, but not great (i.e., the mussels were disappointing).

We came across this restaurant whilst wandering around the city looking for lunch. This turned out to be one of the best meals we've had on our trip. The service was amazing, and our waiter Ante made great recommendations from the menu that made our experience all the better and much more personal. Would highly recommend coming here whilst in Dubrovnik.

The title says it all really. 
Ante, our server, was incredible from start to finish. 10/10 seems harsh it was that good.

Bourbon gnocci and Tomato risotto also amazing. 

A must visit in Dubrovnik!
Great food in a wonderful spot overlooking the harbour. The sailor style risotto is particularly delicious. The service was also exceptional so a big thank you to Ante Kristijan.
Amazing place! Atao was amazing as well. The food was good and well priced. Try to seat near the water and watch the boats and people passing by.

We really had a great experiance visiting Grandska kavana Arsenal restaurant. Ante was really polite and helpful. Food was delicious and not that expensive as for dubrovnik Old Town. We really had a great time spent here :)
Lovely brunch with excellent view! We had mimosa’s and eggs Royale, the eggs were beautifully cooked and the salmon was delicious. Ante was a great host, thanks all.

Celebrated my mother's birthday here last night on recommedation from a friend, and what a lovely evening. 

The food was delicious and plentiful, the service attentive and charming and the surroundings and view through the arches beautiful despite torrential rain!

Recommend pre-booking (in person) as it's rightly popular!

Following our wine order our waitor ante was able to tell me about the the award the vineyard just won, the owner, the sticker on the bottle (the owners twin daughters) and the flavour of the wine. Excellent knowledge and service. Wine was incredible.best in croatia. 
Food was excellent and price just sightly above what you would pay down a side alley within the walls so great value for what we got. 

Complimentary bread very nice touch.
What a great meal. The duck was out of this world. Get it medium rare. Everything was on point. I'll be back tomorrow, and everyday if I could. What a spot!

We treated ourselves to a romantic dinner on the last Sunday of our holiday. Waiter was really helpful with his knowledge of local wine, food, and atmosphere all to the highest standard with a stunning backdrop of the old port. Would highly recommend .
Marijo took care of us and left us wanting for nothing. His service was exceptional and the food was delicious. It was a beautiful way to start our vacation here.

We had a truffle Alfredo, a seafood flight and fish soup. Fell in love with the pasta. It was cooked to absolute perfection! This place is also right in the harbor so I recommend lunch on the back patio for wonderful view of the water and the boats.
A fantastic place to have lunch with a view. Great service!! The salmon sandwich was very tasty! Good vibes

Delicious affordable breakfast/lunch meal with beautiful Dubrovnik port view. Marioj was very nice and extremely accommodating for a large group of 9. He gave the table baskets of pastries and a round of mimosas on the house. Could not of had a more of a pleasant breakfast experience!!
Great food and incredible view. Well priced and worth it! Our server, Marijo was kind and attentive. Would recommend!

We enjoyed the final meal of our honeymoon at Gradska Kavana Arsenal and were lucky enough to have a table in the front row with wonderful views out across the water.

We visited for lunch and shared the cold trio (squid / tuna / sea bass) and the tuna fillet. Both were fresh and brilliantly prepared/cooked, with the tuna fillet in particular perfectly medium-rare. 

The service was also very good.

The service was amazing! And the food is the best we've had yet. I had the mushrooms pasta my husband the steak and it was sooo tasty and the potatoes with it and gravy to die for and the price was perfect! Vcaho was our servee and he rocked it. Recommend highly

What can I say, the food: amazing, the service: also amazing, the blankets that came with the food: even more amazing. We had a 10/10 experience and I would highly recommend this restaurant. Also, the view was beautiful! Our server was Ivan and he did an amazing job, cute smile, but even better service. If you’re in Dubrovnik, go to this restaurant!

We visited this restaurant on 2 occasions, tonight being our last. The local fish & wine has been absolutely delicious. There is a relaxed atmosphere and superb service with a 10% discount on our 2nd visit. The fish stew, tuna & sea bass are highly recommended. Thank you.
Brilliant meal in lovely surroundings. We sat outside. The food tasted amazing - best meal on our holiday. Vlaho our waiter was friendly and attentive. Would highly recommend.
We had an enjoyable and delicious breakfast at this restaurant, sitting at the front of the restaurant, enjoying the hustle and bustle of people walking by

Overall we had a fantastic dinner. Ante was our server and provided us with a great evening. His recommendations for food and wine and after dinner drinks made our meal a very pleasurable and memorable experience. Highly recommended!

Can not sing the praises of this restaurant any more! We were made to feel like a million dollars from walking through the entrance to leaving. They listened and adhered to all of our request, where very knowledgeable about both the food and the wine served. Even provided blankets as it is by the port. Ante was the most polite and accommodating waiter who provided top class service! If we ever restore to Dubrovnik this will be the first place we book!
Good excellent , service great. Right on water or street to see people. Romana was server very pleasant and professional.

The service was immaculate as was the food. We had sea food stew, tuna with white beans and sea bass en papillotte - all was delicious. Great advice about wine choices, delicious coffee and cheese. Highly recommended ( and the views are pretty good too)

had an amazing seafood dinner directly at the bay in the old town. the food was amazing (especially the duck and squid was excuisite!), and the waiters were very kind and helpful throughout the dinner.

This place was recommended to us by a local who goes here regularly. After having a meal here we can understand why. Ivan our waiter has a great personality, made us feel like we were regulars even though it was our first time. He even played along with my prank! He is very knowledgeable and provides us with some great recommendations. We will be back to try the other items on the menu!

Oh and the view is stunning!

Our waiter, Tomislav, was absolutely the best! His friendly and warm attention to detail helped make this a truly memorable dinner experience. Apart from that, the food was excellent, and the location in front of Dibrovnik’s bay is hard to match!
Gradska Kavana Arsenal was the best place for an unbelievable dinner. Tomislav is best waiter with a unique service, very elegant and friendly!

Incredible dining experience, food was made perfectly, setting was marvelous, service superb!
Our waiter, Tomislav, was amazing!
Waiters like Ante are gems. 10/10 would eat here again. Food was great. Nothing to complain about when it comes to the service.
Fabulous food and wine in beautiful setting with very attentive and professional staff - we will definite be back before we fly home - too marks !
Very good wine and drinks and great service in a perfect location. Really recommend for any visitors to Dubrovnik.

Ante (our waiter) was so attentive to our needs and described the food masterfully. The location was perfect with a gorgeous view of the marina and the food was just sublime. We had the tuna tartare to start, the lamb chops and the duck breast. Best meal we’ve had in a long while (and we dine out often). If you’re in Dubrovnik then I can’t recommend this spot enough!

Gorgeous food and views, our waiter Ante was very helpful and helped us out on what to order. Would definitely recommend for a nice evening meal out. Tuna and salmon very fab and the pistachio cake for dessert.
We have a lovely last evening here with excellent service and delicious food. I would recommend it to anyone the food, location and staff were great.
We had a lovely dinner, with an excellent water view. The service was top notch, Ante did an excellent job of navigating us through the menu.
Came here for lunch in our honeymoon! Food was delicious..we got the gnocchi and beef steak. They accommodated us without a reservation and service was great!! Highly recommend :) thank you!
We had an amazing brunch for 9 of us. Great food, drinks very attentive and friendly A* service. Amazing views. Perfect for special or memorable occasion. Highly recommend this place!
Lovely food, attentive staff, gorgeous view from the table. Gave us a free round of Mimosas when we were sheltering from the rain.

Fabulous breakfast spot overlooking the marina. Group of 9 ladies celebrating 20 years of friendship. Varied range of breakfast. Fresh juices, croissants, gorgeous coffee and Bellinis. Would highly recommend. We were visiting on a rainy day and it was a fab spot to watch the world go by and enjoy time chatting.

Thank you to our fab waiter Mario who couldn’t do enough to make our breakfast enjoyable.
Great find and made table for 9 people. Service was excellent and great views of the harbour - excellent on a rainy day

The curb appeal on this one is amazing, right on the water. The hospitality was great including Maria who knew it was my first time in Dubrovnik and set me up with the single best table even though I was flying solo and Vlaho who was beyond friendly. And the meal and wine were fantastic. A must go.

Excellent food, fantastic service and great location. While paying our bill there was a slight error noticed which was quickly dealt with by staff and as a gesture of goodwill we were given a glass of wine each in the house. Would definitely recommend a visit

We had the most wonderful evening here. The staff were so warm and welcoming and the food was an experience in itself. Vlaho was the most accommodating, friendly waiter and made us smile every time he came to top up our drinks and check in on us. 

I recommend this place for anyone wanting to try delicious, local cuisine whilst enjoying the harbourside vista. We'll be back!
Vlaho was such a good waiter and the restaurant had just the most perfect setting. Great food, great presentation, lovely stuff

Amazing location in the heart of the old town. 
Marijo were our great waiter, very professional and give us advices on the wine who was a perfect fit for our dishes. 
The traditional foods were delicious. 

I highly recommend this fancy restaurant.

Dinner at Gradska Kavana Arsenal was incredible. The food was impeccable and the server, Vlaho was knowledgeable and so nice. He had great recommendations and was so welcoming to us being tourists in Dubrovnik! Will definitely visit again. Highly recommend!

5 from 5 ! the service, food and ambience was outstanding. A beautiful romantic night enchanted by the magic location.
Our waiter Vlaho Was personable, friendly and informative.
A wonderful evening to conclude our short visit to Dubrovnik.

Delicious food and wine plus fantastic service! Absolutely amazing evening here, the views are incredible, looking over the dock in Old Town. Our server, Vlaho, was super friendly and attentive without being over baring. Highly recommend!

Outstanding food, service, and location. Our last night in Dubrovnik and we wanted a special meal by the water as the sun set. A perfect location on the water. As the sky darkened, the lights from tthe old city walls and harbor glistened on the water. The cheeses and salads were excellent. Salmon was cooked to perfection. The accompanying vegetables with leeks added to a delightful meal. 

We had several white wines per our waiter’s recommendation. They were perfectly paired. Vlaho was an exceptional server whose recommendations were spot on. More importantly, his service was impeccable with excellent timing. He was not intrusive yet always present appropriately. 

Clearly, we will return on our next visit to Dubrovnik

One of the most beautiful settings in Dubrovnik ! Excellent presentation and delicious, elegant food.
Croatian wines are really outstanding- be sure to try several!
Recommend very highly.
An amazing and delicious experience of meal. I enjoyed the ambiance and the service which was excellent. Our waiter Marijo was friendly and attentive as well as helpful.
Very good service. Excellent food. I will come back again. Mario was a good waiter. Good atmosphere.
Had to wait at the bar but had drinks and an app. Attentive servers. The main meal was delicious (i had the squid) and the gnocchi was great as well. Beautiful ambiance.

We were visiting Croatia and walked upon the amazing restaurant. The food, atmosphere and service was unreal! Robert and Vlaho were unbelievable staff with impeccable service, personalities and generosity. So grateful for this experience!
Girls trip in Croatia and loved the service with Vlaho and Robert. Superb food and especially the homemade truffle and mushroom pasta cannot be skipped. Also, get the Burrata dish!

Absolutely try it!!! Location
View
Service
Class 
Affordable 
Close to everything
We had steak octopus lamb 
All excellent 
The staff were so attentive and polite!

Such a special dinner in a fabulous setting - our server Tomislav was just the best - such a delight to be served by him. 

Attentive and kind with such a pleasant, happy and relaxed personality with a professional approach - we loved our drinks and dinner - well cooked, presented with great flavour.
