We’re sure you are truly proud to have such fantastic staff, a credit to themselves as individuals and a real asset to your team. 

We had a magical evening - thank you so much! This makes our holiday in beautiful Dubrovnik even more special and we have some incredible memories to treasure.

Of all our breakfasts in Croatia, this was one of the most lackluster BUT that's because all the rest were so outstanding! The service, price and food were all good. View from the back patio area was gorgeous.

Vlaho was the Best waiter during our two week vacation. The food was amazing, the location breezy and beautiful. He accommodated our request to add two to make us a party of four and we loved every dish he recommended!
Very very good, and excellent staff. I would recommend all three restaurants which belong to the same group. All in Dubrovnik and all good!

We love the Foods, the service and the atmosphere at Granska Kavana Arsenal. When You are in Dubrovnik, you have to visit there.
Ask for Kristijan ore one off the other well trained waiters. We look forwards to our nekst visit.
Oysters for starter, mussels and Sailor’s risotto for main, all of the food was lovely! Amazing service from Vlaho, would highly recommend!

The most gorgeous meal in the old town of Dubrovnik. 

Blown away by the good & service ❤️

We want to personally thank our server Nemanya
Christian recommended a great dry white wine with very attentive service. Lovely location overlooking the main road
Great atmosphere, Christian was a wonderful server . Didn't eat but food smelled amazing and friends reccomended to us. Will return!

My fiance and I went for dinner on a friend's suggestion. The staff were very friendly, especially our waiter Blaze. His recommendation of the fish stew was brilliant, the best meal I have had in Croatia.
Gorgeous food, gorgeous wine, gorgeous views. Tom the waiter was a delight, so friendly and helpful. Highly recommend and can’t wait to come back, thank you! Xoxo
Great food, great wine, and the service from Tom our waiter made the evening! Can’t wait to return it’s been incredible

This was the best restaurant we've been to so far in Dubrovnik. The food is excellent and the service was worthy of a Michelin star. Tom our waiter was extremely friendly and we felt very much at home. Thank you very much and we hope to return!
Over for a wedding and found this amazing restaurant. Christian served us with attention. Food was very tasty and great value.

We enjoyed the most delicious meal and had the most lovely experience! The view and ambiance was spectacularB Kristijan was attentive and guided us through the menu options with great recommendations! We will definitely be back!
Always tasty, we’ve been here a few times and are always comming back. Staff is friendly and professional. My fav is tuna tartar! On the picture are tuna tartar, bureata and truffle pasta.

We continued our tour with a lovely hot breakfast here. It’s very busy but didn’t have to wait more than a minute or two for a table. 

The staff are busy but attentive and the food was prompt, delicious and plated well. We sat outside by the main thoroughfare but you can also sit on the old port side. 

Really enjoyed our breakfast and would happily revisit if there weren’t so many other lovely restaurants to get our chops around. 

At time of writing (September 22), ask for the discount card for their sister restaurants which are equally as good.
Very friendly staff, especially Marijo did an amazing job. Food is great, spectacular view, best breakfast place within the walls
Amazing food and service! Highly highly recommend !! Robert is awesome! It was our last night in Croatia and the best choice we could have made for our last dinner.
Lovely location and great service. The food is similar to those in the new town. But worth visiting.

We had the salmon and the seabass. Both were outstanding. Desserts were a real treat too. Definitely no complaints there. 

The service after the main course however, was excruciatingly slow. As if suddenly our table had lost all importance. Our waiter seemed too happy to spend his time flaunting his knowledge at all the other tables. That in itself is a great quality, but not if it's at the expense of service.

Spent about 30-40 minutes waiting to order dessert. Spent another thirty minutes waiting to order coffee. Then another 30 minutes waiting to get the check. Each time, I had to call him to the table myself.

Still rate this 4 out of 5 because the food was great and because Maria the hostess was a true professional (and absolutely gorgeous).

We came here for early dinner and had the most amazing experience. I’m quite fussy about service in particular but my expectations were exceeded here! 

The food was incredible; we had burrata and oysters for starters, fillet steak and seabass for main, pistachio cake and cheesecake for desert. Every single dish was superb and so tasty. 

View and setting was fabulous. 

Service was genuinely the best I’ve come across in a long time. Stepjan was so lovely! He offered great wine recommendations, was so friendly and chatty and even brought me a bag clip to hang my bag from the table so it wasn’t sitting on the floor. He was attentive without being intrusive and seemed to genuinely care. 

10/10 from a very fussy customer!

Amazing food and even better service from stjepan which was outstanding I cannot rate him higher. I had oysters and fillet steak which were exceptional, my wife had burrata and Seabassx which was so good. Little touches made all difference

Food was fantastic, waiter. Vlaho, was super helpful and knowledgeable about the menu, I am gluten free and he was able to take me through the menu and knew what I could and couldn't have and adapt certain items so i could have them. Also made a cocktail for us that wasn't on the menu.

Stunning local food and wine. Possibly most beautiful wine I have ever had and I love wine. Fish stew and sea bass perfect. The waiter advised us mussels were not in seasons. Service is outstanding. Setting could not be more bewitchinhky beautifully. Food perfect Vladho excellent in wine recommendation

My husband and I had a fabulous experience at Arsenal restaurant. We added our names to the wait list and enjoyed live music and a cocktail in the lounge. We were escorted to our table, right in front of the marina. What an spectacular view! Our server, Ivan, took excellent care of us. We ordered the marinated zucchini for an appetizer and the whole fish special, both of which were delicious. Top notch service, amazing views, and fantastic food. What more could you want?
Kavana Nocni bar was amazing and our server Marijo was incredible!!! Phenomenal views and service would highly recommend coming here it’s a must!!
Food,service, wine and atmosphere is top notch. Special shout out kristijan who really looked after us

Had lunch here the last time I was in Dubrovnik and decided to go back and try again. Can be quite busy but got a front row table and whoa what a view watching the boats come and go whilst enjoying a super lunch. Was reasonably busy but the service was great.
Impeccable place! The view is breathtaking, the staff is very welcoming and helpful and the food is amazing! Great experience! Will be coming back soon!

The most gorgeous view with the nicest service from Marco! He was so kind to us and gave us recommendations for touring beaches near Dubrovnik and for spots in Bosnia for a day trip. The food was delicious too!!
A fantastic service and beautiful setting. A very warm shout out to Damir who was superb a real gem for the hotel a customer service.
Really nice place to have a drink ! The terrace has a beautiful view over the monuments of the town. Our waiter Damir was very nice and had useful advice about the wines and beers.
The food was amazing, best food I've had in Croatia so far, a big thank you to our waiter Damirr for giving us a great experience.
Fabulous dinner, great atmosphere and amazing food. Damir, our waiter, is extremely attentive, knowledgeable and friendly. Beautiful experience

Damir and Niksa were our waiters. They knew their stuff and were very attentive throughout our dinner. The food was great and has been the best meal we have had so far on our holiday. Both the seafood and steak were fantastic! Highlight recommend. Also the setting is beautiful
An amazing dinner! Everything was perfect and lovely staff. Had the mussels and seafood trio for starters and the seafood risotto for mains
Great service. Damir was fantastic and helpful. Gluten free bread too which was a huge plus! Lovely views and delicious aperol spritz.

Decided to eat here for dinner on our first night and it did not disappoint. 2 courses and a bottle of wine for 2 for @£90 no more expensive than at home. Chicken was the best I have ever had it almost melted in the mouth, service was amazing and we were made to feel appreciated. Would definitely return and highly recommend

We had a pasta and a salad dishes for late lunch. Both excellent by the taste and looks. Maybe on the pricy side but you get what you pay for so price vs. value on very good level here. Truly recommending this place.

Prior to our trip we tried to book this place and found out it was booked a month in advance, we can see why. We managed to get a walk-in early in the night and managed to snag one of the best seats in the restaurant. 

Beautiful restaurant, a beautiful ambiance, and amazing food. Hard to argue that this wouldn't be one of the nicest restaurant views in Dubrovnik.

WOW just WOW! My girlfriend and I travelled to Dubrovnik for her birthday and on our first night visited for dinner, we were told earlier in the day that unfortunately we would be unable to reserve a table however if we turned up they would do their best to seat us. We arrived later that evening and was told we could sit in their lounge area and would be seated when a table became available. We sat with a bottle of wine listening to the live band and after what felt like a short period was directed to our table. The service throughout was nothing short of exemplary, the food was incredible and the view stunning. Could not recommend this restaurant more… definitely worth the visit !

Beautiful!
What a gem! Food, service and location beautiful.
Antee was lovely, knowledgeable about the wines snd gave good recommendations for food. Presentation of food was excellent and Antee always kept us topped up!
Would highly recommend! 
Fantastic evening
The view was unreal, the live music was so good, and then the food to top it all off - I would highly recommend!!
Excellent views, food and service! Recommend the steak it is cooked beautifully! Ivan was a lovely welcoming host ! Would definitely come back :) !!!
Fabulous restaurant, very accommodating , fabulous waiter Ivan recommending fabulous dishes. Really reasonably priced and fabulous atmosphere. Beautiful views and location.

Our waiter Ivan was very attentive and gave me two very good recommendations - I was unsure as to what I wanted to eat, but the Squid was delicious. The music was nice to listen to and the aesthetics of the restaurant were lovely. The outside view of the bay made the experience nicer too. Overall a very positive time here.
After walking the walls we stopped here for a girls’ lunch. The view was incredible! The food was excellent and the service was fantastic.
We had such an incredible dinner. We had the seafood risotto and the grilled fish and we had the best experience. Ante was an amazing server. Thank you!!!

The sea bass was to die for, the pasta was lovely and deserts was also very good. The staff were very friendly, informative about the menu and choices of wine being able to give background history on the specific wine we chose -thanks Ante you made our visit very enjoyable and we would recommend paying a visit if in the old town
If you're lucky enough to get a table, you'll be blown away. The service from Ante was first class! The food was amazing, the staff friendly and the setting was out of this world! Thank you.

After a spectacular dinner the previous night at Panorama the sister restaurant, we had high hopes for Gradska, and boy did it deliver. We walked in without a reservation just before sunset expecting to have to wait for an hour for a table, but the lovely Maître d’ accommodated us with a front row to the port table with the condition we gave back the table before the 8pm
Reservation which we happily obliged . Ante our server was outstanding and gave us excellent recommendations on not just the cocktails (we had the Wormwood and Poison pear both top notch) but also food recommendations. We had the fish soup, the bourbon gnocchi and the pea risotto, and the bourbon gnocchi was definitely the star of the meal overall another successful night out in Dubrovnik with good food and great views . Highly recommend Gradska Kavana for a classy evening out in the old town.

Dubrovnik is one of the most charming cities in the world!
Sometimes, the problem is finding the perfect restaurant with a great service and excellent food to complete that exceptional experience! 
Well we find everything in Arsenale, Impeccable service, great atmosphere, and delicious food! 
A special thanks to Ante for making our experience even more magical

Gradska kavana is the ultimate coffee shop and restaurant in Dubrovnik, and Croatia as a whole. Once in Dubrovnik, one must come and enjoy a variety of services and foods it has to offer - either on the terrace overlooking Stradun and the main Old City square, or Arsenal, the terrace overlooking the most beautiful old port in the world.

When in Dubrovnik, we always go for mid-morning coffee - in our case cappuccino (the best ever) on the city-side terrace. We read the newspaper, people watch or meet with friends and family. Gradska kavana offers amazing breakfast - from salmon tartines with champagne, to eggs Benedict, to simple bread, butter and preserves baskets. Or just heavenly croissants that melt in your mouth… During the day and evening, the offer becomes more elaborate but equally fantastic. A lot of delicious fish items or vegetarian options, but also meats and desserts to die for. The wine and cocktail list is very long and good, too. Whenever you go, something will catch your eye and make you happy.

However, the best thing about this place is its people. All of the waiters, servers, hostesses, cooks, managers and cleaning staff are just amazing. Many of them have been working at Gradska kavana for many years and function as a well-oiled machine that feels like family. Professionalism at its best. Impeccable dress, professional attitude, smiling faces and good humor. I am forever grateful for every moment I spent at Gradska kavana. Every day is a celebration there - come and enjoy!

The seafood and fish were fresh and cooked well. I thought everything tasted good, though the sea bass was not grilled, I would say it was rather cooked in the oven on top of some veggies, tasty nonetheless. I myself ordered the mussels “buzara” which I enjoyed a lot. They were exactly what I was looking for: fresh, not too seasoned, a simple Croatian dish, perfect for the southern heat. Also, the view is even better than the pictures, our table was clean, we did not wait too long for our food and overall the service was good. If I ever visit Dubrovnik again I would go back for another meal for sure. My advice: if you enjoy fish cooked in a certain way, just ask them how they make it before you order!

Had a lovely birthday for my mum with our server Tomislav. We couldn’t thank him enough he made the night 100% better. The food was amazing; duck, veal and beef were all delicious and tender. Would definitely recommend for a special night.

We had our final meal of our holiday in Gradska Kavana Arsenal and the whole experience was excellent! We felt so welcomed immediately and had a table right at the seafront. Ante, was our server and he was so knowledgeable about the menu and made our experience very special. The food was delicious, from the starter to the main! Overall, a really enjoyable meal!

One of the best restaurant in the old Town. The dishes are amazing (the sea food risotto is fantastic) and if you have the chance to have a table in front of the port you will have a fantastic view.

Waiters are adorable ! Special thanks to Marijo who was amazing for our two dinners and allow us to have such a good expérience.

Gluten free option, really romantic restaurant.

We will comme back !

We came twice for diner because of the really good plates ! 
Special mention to Marijo who has been our waiter : we were so lucky to have you twice ! 

On est venu dîner deux fois tellement les plats étaient bons ! Mention spéciale à Marijo que l’on a eu la chance d’avoir comme serveur les deux fois. 

& desserts gluten free ❤️
Amazing food and excellent service with a beautiful view of the harbour. Larger selection of desserts would have made the experience better but would definitely recommend!
A beautiful setting with even better food and top quality service from start to finish. Our server Ante had vast knowledge of Croatian wine. Would highly recommend for anyone visiting Dubrovnik.

This is a beautiful restaurant that goes above and beyond. The views are to die for. We could sit for hours in staring in awe. Thank you for a wonderful experience. The service is absolutely amazing, specifically Ivan and Lea. Thank you Croatia for a wonderful and magical night.
Ante was our server and he went above and beyond! Delicious food, beautiful ambience & away from the busy crowds!
What a beautiful setting! Add to that delicious food and a great waiter and you have a perfect evening. Food was of high quality and I would recommend this place immediately

We stayed in Dubrovnik for six days and could not resist the urge to visit this restaurant several times. The food was absolutely sensational and the views are mesmerising. Our waiter, Ante, was very friendly and enthusiastic with his recommendations.
Amazing food and Ante is a delightful man! The view of the water is lovely. The seafood risotto was a highlight

We enjoyed a nice meal at this restaurant, the view and the location is absolutely great. The appetizers were also very tasty and the olive oil was very fulfilling. However, the food didn’t meet our expectations. I had the salmon fillet which came highly recommended, but the taste was no more than average, along with the vegetables it came with. Honestly, you have a pretty high chance of cooking salmon that tastes better at home. The mussels were not seasoned and not flavorful at all, and the wine sauce that was supposed to accompany them was a watery pool at the bottom of the plate. The sea-bass was just boiled and not seasoned again, and no side dish came along with it. Chef’s burger was the best thing at our table, still could be using some improvement but it was pretty good nonetheless.
The service was good and the waiters took good care of us.
Staff and food was amazing I highly recommend, the seafood was cooked perfectly. Tuna tartare entree was amazing
Loved the experience! View is amazing. Had the tuna tartare and seabass both were lovely! Can recommend!
Came here for drinks and really enjoyed it. Nice friendly service and the drinks and view were amazing. Would recommend coming here.

The restaurant is located right on the edge of the old harbour so the views are great and with the open terrace you get to feel the buzz of the city without having to dine in the street.

The prices are very reasonable with a risotto main around £13 and yet the food is of excellent quality. We looked at quite a few restaurants (including the two more expensive ones under the same ownership as this one - Nautica & Panorama) and are very pleased to have made this choice. 

I had concerns that you would be paying for location at the expense of quality of food and service but that could not be further from the truth. The service provided by our waiter Ante in particular really did take this to another level. His knowledge of all the dishes, wine recommendations and clear passion for his job really helped this meal rival many we have had at far more expensive, often Michelin starred restaurants. 

One thing to note is that it does get busy but if you haven't made a reservation and are reading this while trying to decide where to eat this evening fear not for all is not lost - they do hold some tables back for walk-in diners so you might still be in luck and get to enjoy what we found to be a great dining experience. I hope you find it to be as good as we did!

This reastaurant is located in the Old Town uop against the port/marina. The menu is large, reasonably priced and the service is excellent.

The views and atmosphere are brilliant, a restairant not to miss if youy are in Dubrovnik.
Stunning. Fabulous service, wonderful view of the harbour, extremely tasty food. What more could you want? Eat here, you will not be disappointed!

Very delicious food, nice view, waiters are so polite.. only thing i dont like is to wait to much.. very crowded restaurant.. they understood we waited too much.. they offered drinks for us for their apologies, this is good behaviour , they noticed from the crowd that we waited so long and chief waiter came and apologised from us.. very nice
Amazing food with a great view onto the old port, even better waiting staff ,Marco and iwan who where very kind and helpful.
Absolutely gorgeous evening. The service was impeccable nothing was too much trouble. The food was delicious and was great value

Good was really nice and fantastic views of the sea and Old Port. Would recommend 
Waiter very friendly as well

Fantastic time at Kavana Nocni bar!!! amazing staff that are so attentive and helpful with 5 start food and service, we were literally waited on throughout the whole experience and were never rushed through our time there! We only arrived on the day and were seated at a table with beautiful views!!! I want to pay particular gratitude to our fantastic server ivan, who talked to us throughout the evening and and made us feel very welcome🙂 we listened to their recommendations and will definitely be back and recommend this place to everyone we meet☺️

Excellent service from Ante and team for a special lunch. Recommend the Octopus salad to start, the description in the menu does not give the dish justice for its devine array of flavours that came as a pleasant surprise. We then enjoyed the backed fish Al Forna. All round a great experience with a great view.
Very nice lunch with an awesome view. Ante was a great waiter. We would definitely recommend this place when you're in Dubrovnik

We had a delicious breakfast on our last morning in the Old Town. With two young boys, they were very accommodating to our requests and the view can’t be beat. Ante was a wonderful server and made sure our experience was top notch.

Wandered down from Ploce gate into the harbour part with the big pirate galleons and spotted the fabulously positioned Kavana Aresenal restaurant. Had the octopus salad (with some caviar to top) & mouthwatering mozzarella to start. Husband and I shared the fish of the day which was sea bream and was amazing. Accompanied it with recommendation of Posip by the young and very charm it waiter Ante, and boy he knew his stuff! 5star attention from him - thanks for a wonderful first meal in Dubrovnik!
The food was outstanding a must visit when in Dubrovnik. Service was especially of note with start to finish attention and care.

Gradska Kavana Arsenal! What an amazing place!!! The food was exquisite!!! My Tuna Tartare with pistachios and the Seafood Risotto was one of the best summer meals you can get and would want while in Dubrovnik for summer ! The burrata also was delicious: melty and tasty ! 
The service as you can imagine comes along with this beautiful place with amazing view : very professional, nice and informative. Special thanks to our waiter Stjepan, who had the best recommandation and explanation.

Stayed close by and ate here on our final day in Dubrovnik — I only wish we went sooner, as this was the best food we had! The polenta and zucchini were so good, as were the various bread options, and tons of drink options, too. Tomislav was an all-star server and unbeatable location/view.

This restaurant has the most beautiful location and ambience. My friends and I went for a late breakfast, early lunch on our last day in Dubrovnik. Tomislav was our waiter and took great care of us. Checked in regularly (we were having a very slow and steady meal with apps to start then later starting on mains, etc), so we appreciated that he checked in to take our new orders regularly! The ambience is beautiful, away from the tourist crowds. 

We had the polenta, steak sandwich and marinated zucchini which were all delicious. The fresh pressed juices were delightful too. 

We had no trouble getting a table at 11.30am but would recommend a reservation in the evenings. Ask for Tomislav’s section!

Enjoy Dubrovnik!
A delightful start to our week in Dubrovnik. We had lunch on the terrace overlooking the harbour. Excellent service. Good advice on wine list (we knew nothing about Croatian wine) and delicious food

Outstanding meal and different from all the other restaurants in Dubrovnik. Perfect setting and quality of food is beyond perfect!

Our visit was made even perfect by our server Ivan who was extremely helpful and kind

First night in Dubrovnik, we passed by and had the chance to get a beautiful table outside. Everything was just great, fresh seafood, good drinks and live piano music, with a view on the sea and the old-town walls. Huge thumbs up for the service, it was just great! Thank you so much for an unforgettable first night in Dubrovnik!
Great outdoor ambiance on gorgeous courtyard beside the bay! Waiter was attentive and unobtrusive - a rare quality in service these days. Highly recommend the health breakfast - and a Bloody Mary!
Besides the food being absolutely amazing the staff specifically Adnan who served us was very friendly, hospitable and attentive. An absolute must when in Dubrovnik!

Had a wonderful breakfast for three of us with Ante as our server. The iced coffee was delicious, and I had their special croissant sandwich. Great service and great view. If we ever come back to Dubrovnik, we would definitely visit here again!

Go and ask for Ivan the waiter, he is an extremely nice and professional, we had the best time here in dubrovnik because of his hospitality and attitude which left us in a happy mood along with the very nice view
very delicious food with an excellent quality, service is also amazing, it‘s really worth the price!

Great food It was excellent we had some sea bass and the chicken dish was lovely and fresh!

Great service from Ante👏🏽
Fabulous food, service and view! Ante was terrific! Request a seaside table at the oldest restaurant in old town! Refreshing stop!
The food was fabulous as was the view. Our server, Ante, made our visit a wonderful experience. He was so attentive and provided historical background on the area. A must to visit in the Walled City.
What a wonderful lunch spot in the old city! Our server, Anti, was so personable and helpful to us. The food was outstanding with a picturesque view!
Found this place online and decided to come in for some coffee and breakfast. The food was wonderful and the pistachio cake was one of the best I've had. Service was great.

We had a perfect meal.. Ante looked after us and had so much knowledge on the resteraunt and the food. The view was beautiful, the food delicious and it was our best meal in Croatia. I would recommend this to everyone!

Amazing food and service, we came here during our honeymoon and didn’t book a table but we still got a front row table on the terrace with a beautiful view overlooking the bay. Our waiter Ante was very knowledgeable about the menu and explained the food choices very well - sorry for the Prosecco again! Next time we’re definitely getting Croatian wine :-)

First time in dubrovnik , me and my wife was looking for a fine dine in and we so gald we found Gradska Kavama Arsenal very friendly stuff and amazing food service was 5star as well as food . If you in dubrovnik make sure you stop by this place much love from America 
Marios Italian Ristorante (owner)
Most beautiful experience, most lovely service from Ante what a great time. Amazing setting, great service and awesome food
Good experience. Nice food and very good service, nice live music. A Must do in dubrovnik. Amazing view over the port. Ty
Ante was a great waiter! Amazing food and view!! Really good for breakfast and dinner. We had the healthy breakfast and for dinner the Rib Eye. Both were amazing!
Absolutely delicious food and an excellent service in a super location. A 10 out of 10 recommendation!
Ante was great and the food was delicious! The view was great and a nice cool spot to eat out of the sun.
Very good service by Antonio and delicious food. We really enjoyed the view. We highly recommend the marinated zucchini and chicken salad :)

From the minute we arrived the staff were professional and very welcoming. We had the Truffle Pasta and the Pea and Leek Risotto to start and bith dishes were so delicious. For main we chose Steak and Lamb and oh my goodness me it was superb . A little pricey but worth every penny!!!
Food was very good. Staff was absolutely amazing, especially Adnan. Would 100% come back. Unforgettable evening

Great service, great scenery and amazing food. 

We came to katana Nocni on our last evening in Dubrovnik and it did not disappoint! 

The service from when we arrived, was welcoming and helpful, we were escorted inside to the air conditioned bar while we waited for a table, which became available quicker than our wine could be delivered! 

Outside were were lucky enough to bag a front row seat to the busy high street, with great views of the surrounding area and old town.

Ante, our server was quick to arrive and offer support with the menu, asking if we had any questions and making some suggestions. 

The wine was delicious, extra time was taken to explain the origins of the wine, which was a nice mother and daughter story which felt apt as I was dining with my mother. 

Then came the food, which was one of the best meals we’d had all week - a great way to end our trip. The steak is excellent! 

Definitely recommend this spot!
Amazing food, amazing service. Beautiful views of the harbour. I had the sea bass and it was a perfect petition size and great flavours. Would recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik

Incredibly friendly and informative waiter that was enhanced in the dishes and cares about the restaurant and drinks. 

Food tasted great and was good portion sizes

Excellent food and excellent service from ante.
I would highly recommended but you need to book
Fabulous views over the small harbour with seating within the walls of the old town with high stone arches
Staff are really nice and friendly
Wonderful location with excellent food and service! Highly recommend it if you’re visiting Dubrovnik. We’ve had an Amazon e per

This restaurant is a must visit! This place is always fully booked but upon arrival we were greeted very warmly and were offered to have a drink and wait for a table if we would like. We only waited 20 minutes before being seated. It’s in a beautiful setting and the waiters were very attentive and friendly- our waiter was called Ante. Our food was delicious and very reasonably priced. If you would like a special evening to add to your holiday then visit here.
We enjoyed a beautiful dinner with a beautiful view over the harbour. Couldn’t fault the service by Marijo. Would definitely recommend and wouldn’t hesitate to come back.

A beautiful evening with the most beautiful food. This place is a must! Thank you to Marijo for being the most attentive waiter, he couldn’t have done more. Thank you for making our evening so special. The food is mouth watering good

Amazing food and excellent, friendly service. We turned up for dinner without reservation at peak season and they still found a way of fitting us in even though the place was clearly bustling with patrons. The food was exceptional and even though I'm not usually a fish person, I thoroughly enjoyed the fish and seafood. Ante, our waiter, was exceptional at his job, keeping up the fun banter while giving us suggestions about our food options.

We came with a few friends for dinner and had the BEST time with the help of our very kind and helpful server, Stjepan!! He helped us pick the tastiest cocktails, meals, and dessert. This place is usually booked out months in advance, but we were accommodated to a lovely outside seating area. We ordered a variety of thing and would highly recommend this restaurant!! Thank you Stjepan and staff for your hospitality!

We came across this restaurant as we were strolling through old town and it jumped at us as it is set in a beautiful old building, across from St Blaise church and with a beautiful view. The food was good and the waiters friendly. Perfect spot to see and be seen, slightly above the fray. The cocktails were especially superb. Lovely night and perfect vantage spot to take in old town. Great for a romantic dinner.
Very nice bar & restaurant, the oldest in Dubrovnik, amazing staff! We had a iced coffee, very good gelato and cheese cake. Highly recommended!

Our waiter Marijo and he was so lovely. The food was amazing. It has the best ambience. We came back here several times on our trip because the service was amazing & really amazing food. The price is also good for what you get. 
Lovely ambiance! 
Couldn’t recommend enough.

This was our most outstanding meal in Dubrovnik.

Food and service was just perfect. 

The location is exceptional. 

The musicians to accompany our meal, the view and ambience made for an outstanding evening.

We had such a great time at this amazing place. The terrace towards the harbour is even better than the one towards the church. The food is amazing and the advice and service we got from Adnan was outstanding. Many thanks for a great evening!

You have to visit the restaurant when you visit Dubrovnik! A fine dining experience with freshly prepared and very tasty food with discreet and attentive service. Live music, by the sea with the best port view! Great wine selection, great recipes I can’t say more. One of my best dining experiences! 
You have to definitely book a table though the place gets busy during August.

On the last night of our trip through Croatia we visited Gradska Kavana Arsenal and it was great. Both food, and service from Marijo was phenomenal. Views from outside onto the bay are stunning, especially as the sun sets.
I highly recommend the pistachio cake.
My family really enjoyed are experience and I couldn’t recommend enough.
Very busy location but attentive service and lovely food. Great mojitos! Lovely risotto and fish. If you dine here ask for the loyalty card for 10% off the other venues
Service was great, welcoming, attentive and polite. Food was good. Menu in English. Views were brilliant. We went for early dinner and got a great seat.

My family of 4 stopped in here last night for dinner. From the duck, sea bass in parchment to octopus ale also and wine suggest we’re perfect. Add in great service and lovely setting it was a perfect evening

This popular restaurant is one of four under common ownership by "Nautika" in Dubrovnik (see also my review of "Dubravka 1836") and its well worth booking in the high season to avoid a potentially long wait and to get a prime table overlooking the Old Harbour. "Arsenal" is perfectly located in the heart of the Old City close to the Ploce Gate, with tables extending from a small terrace at the rear overlooking St. Blaise Church to a larger terrace at the front overlooking the Harbour. 

From an extensive menu (the restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner) we shared on excellent starter of traditional Croatian mussels "buzaru" (in a sauce of breadcrumbs, tomatoes, garlic, wine and olive oil) followed by mains of "brodet" (assorted fish stew) and veal in sage sauce and garnished with asparagus and mushrooms. All these dishes were very flavoursome and well-presented and we followed them with some delicious desserts. We were also very satisfied with our selection of a dry Croatian Rose wine ("Kutjevo"- HRK 250/c.£31) and we then ordered coffees with 2 well-priced Grand Marnier at HRK 44 per glass. 

The staff deserve a special mention; in particular, our waiter ("Tom"?) was humorous, friendly, attentive and professional. Thanks!

The final bill for dinner for 2 was HRK 1,166 (c.£146), but fortunately we had a 10% discount voucher (keep your eyes open for the local Restaurant Guide which contains some discounts), reducing the final bill ex. tip to HRK 1,049 (c.£131); obviously not cheap, but fairly typical for a good restaurant in Old City Dubrovnik.

Amazing food and the best service we have ever had! So attentive, staff are a credit to you! We cannot get in again for tomorrow even though we tried but absolutely loved our evening with you tonight.

We stumbled upon this must-dine restaurant during the first evening of our trip to Dubrovnik. Our serendipitous encounter (after being exhausted from travel and not researching our first night dining decision) ended up becoming our daily go-to for the next 4 days. Sometimes we stayed for just a drink and others, for the full dining experience which includes solid affordable fare and 2 personalities. The front restaurant space provides a window into the pace and variety of travelers in OT while delivering the perfect location to view beautiful historic aesthetics and access to central restaurants/bars, legendary coral jewelers, nightlife, and more. The back space is right on the water facing the impeccably gorgeous blue Adriatic Sea which is surrounded by stunning cliffs. The view here is incredibly picturesque and provides a completely different experience.

The staff here is also exceptional, especially Mario who went above and beyond to make my cousin feel special on her birthday plus, he always dedicated extra time to make us both smile and laugh whenever we visited (while still providing top notch service to every patron).

We loved Arsenal more than any other restaurant (and there are a ton of worthy candidates in OT) based on the above. We were instantly comfortable from night one and the lively, yet warm energy of their environment consistently earned our business. 5+ stars across the board!

Note -make a reservation in advance and request your preferred experience - you can’t go wrong!

We had a delicious dinner with a great view! We had no reservation booked but ordered a drink at their lounge bar while we waited to be seated, where a live pianist and cellist were playing. We ended up getting a table fairly quickly and were served by Ante, who was fantastic. Highly recommend if you want good seafood and a nice ambience!

Gorgeous restaurant with live music and views of the port. Both the staff and the food were incredible. Loved everything! We had Ante as our server and he took such good care of us! Super accommodating.

Amazing dinner… Ante our server gave us the best recommendations - gnocchi, seafood pasta and fish stew - everything was excellent. The ambience was perfect, live music was Bridgerton vibes which I loved!!!

Super good. Really nice staff who catered really well. Tasty food and everything was very nice. We felt very welcomed and special as our caterer was very kind and helpful. We would definitely recommend eating their! All the dishes we ordered were tasty! A must go in Dubrovnik!!
I had the risotto and it was super! Our server was super friendly and filled all of our needs. We recomend this place!🤩
Very happy with the service, we had a nice waiter who gave us a very personal experience. Delicious salmon and pistachio cake. Great view.

In the world of travelling you have to choose between good food or a good view. This restaurant not only gives you both, but also phenomenal service and the calmest atmospheres. They were extremely careful with my many allergies. 10/10

Great location, great food, amazing service (our waiter was the sweetest, funniest, most attentive person ever).
We had dinner and breakfast, both superb. Music inside, quiet outside, so there is choice.

We wandered in based on the location, one of the few truely great water views in Dubrovnik. The food and drinks were excellent (we went twice in two days!), but the real highlight was our waiter Marijo. We built a real connection with him, had fun, and had two amazing meals.

We had lunch here after a long hot tour of the city. The location & view were great, it's right on the water. The food was delicious, we had a light lunch the chicken salad & octopus salad, it was delicious.

Amazing dinner! Ante was a phenomenal server! Such great service with a smile! The mussels were a great starter! We had the Duck and the Gnocchi in Bourbon Sauce! Both were delicious! Great drinks as well with an amazing view! We would definitely return!

Both terraces have wonderful views, main restaurant has the harbour view and the other is perfect for people watching overlooking the main street, also very romantic night. Hard yo get a seat though as in big demand but the staff are very welcoming and try and help out as quick as possible.

Best service we had in Croatia with a very friendly waiter. The waiter forgot to bring an item and then immediately offered to put it on the house once we asked for it (even though honestly the wait was not that long all in all, since he bought it right away when we asked it). Food was very good and view is amazing. Price is very decent considering the location.

Service, food, and wine is top notch on both visits. Easy place to slow down after a long and hot summer day. Strongly suggest trying their well curated list of Croatian wine. Will definitely revisit...again in a future trip.

On our quest to find the perfect dinner spot, we ended up at idyllic Arsenal restaurant, with a stunning view and our very kind waiter Marko. Lovely food, lovely staff and lovely view. What else could you wish for? Recommended for sure!
The view is fantastic and Marko matched with incredible service. Super attentive with great recommendations and the tuna was a hit. Would absolutely recommend
Excellent food and wine. Service was perfect thank to Marco that make the experience even better!!!!

food was absolutely delicious, came here for breakfast on my birthday with my family and we all enjoyed. drinks were lovely too. service was fantastic! our waiter, Adnan was amazing. 100% recommend to everyone. very reasonably priced for why’s you get as well :)

Amazing service, ambiance and food. We tried a few different places in Dubrovnik but kept coming back to Gradska Kavana Arsenal. Stjepan was our outstanding waiter this evening but service is consistently excellent. To top it off we had one of the best mojitos we ever had and that says a lot coming from New Yorkers. Overall, highly recommended!

We had a wonderful time in Dubrovnik especially on our last night at this very special restaurant. Beautiful views, fantastic food and excellent service! A must for everyone who comes to Dubrovnik…especially if you get served by Ivan. What a gem!

Fantastic dinner restaurant, that belongs to a chain of 3 different restaurants in Dubrovnik. Great service, food, wine, and views! Absolutely loved it! Especially the waiters/waitresses are great and give brilliant recommendations. Pistachio cake as dessert and a white wine called Posip Kunjas were extremely good. Thank you!

Had the best experience ever with one of the most stunning views of the Dubrovnik Old Town Harbour. Must book here before leaving Dubrovnik. Pasta with tryffels and mushrooms was 5/5

The service was really good and helpfull!!
An excellent restaurant in a truly beautiful location. A lovely welcome with no pretentiousness. Service was impeccable. Fabulous!

Booked this restaurant after seeing the reviews on Tripadvisor. We weren't disappointed. Had a table overlooking the harbour and the waiters and other staff couldn't do enough for us. We started off with Gin & Tonics, which came up in decent sized glasses. Ordered 6 oysters and the octopus salad to start. The oysters were so delicious my husband ordered another six! The octopus salad was a good portion and was very tasty with a lovely dressing. Followed that with Tuna Tartar. If we visit Dubrovnik again we will definitely head to this restaurant. They also have a sister restaurant called Nautika Restaurant.
Very central restaurant, great for watching the world go by and people watching after a tour! excellent service by an attentive waiter Vlaho, very helpful and attentive. Thank you

Had a delicious lunch today, mussels, salad, polenta. Very tasty. Beautiful presentation- especially the cocktails. Even my sister, who is a professional chef, was impressed. Lovely location, great ambience, overlooking the square, fun for people watching. Nice breeze from the sea. You can also sit on the harbour-side. We spent a long time here, but did not feel rushed at all.

Very friendly and attentive welcoming service from our waiter Vlaho. Would highly recommend this restaurant.

Love the vibe - great location on an raised patio,
across from a church! Amazing service, great coffee (with alternative milk options - almond, coconut) & great food! Our server Vlaho was very welcoming.
Amazing view, great service, delicious iced coffee with Coconut milk for those that are non-dairy! The terrace is amazing and everyone is very welcoming and friendly.
We had a lovely breakfast over looking the seaside. Service was excellent. Breakfast was just what we were looking for. Marijo was wonderful and so polite.
Food was 10/10. Reasonable portion sizes, amazing taste. Drinks were 11/10. Attentive, accommodating and friendly service. Have gluten free options. Highly recommend.

Lunch was incredible, so we decided to eat dinner here too! The idyllic view of the harbour provides entertainment during the meal. The service was amazing and all our needs were attended to! Pea and leek risotto was a safe gluten-free option for celiacs as was the chicken meal. The food and cocktails are highly recommended!
A beautiful spot with an amazing view on the old harbor. The service is really great! Definitely recommend!

Great service and amazing staff (special thanks to Tom). Great food ! And amazing view!!!
We will definelty come back!!

We had ana amazing meal here for my friend’s hen do! There were 10 of us and we couldn’t have asked for better service and better food! It was amazing! From the beautiful backdrop on the terrace, to the guitarist serenading the room with his great tunes, even played the game of thrones sound track which we enjoyed! 
Damir surprised us at the end of the night with 2 bottles of Prosecco followed by a shot for all the girls to celebrate the upcoming wedding! It was a great touch and made our night! Thanks Damir 😁
Amazing food and drinks with an outstanding service! Would definitely recommend if you want a lovely meal looking onto a beautiful view!
Amazing food with a fantastic view of the harbour. Extremely friendly staff who made the whole evening very pleasant. Would highly recommend!
What a great restaurant, Tom was outstanding, the service, the food, the atmosphere was top notch. Highly recommended

really decently priced and absolutely delicious food with an amazing view of old town port. We didn’t have a reservation on a Saturday night but we sat inside for one drink and before it was finished the lovely staff had already managed to seat us outside. Enjoyed the cocktails, starters, dessert and service.
Nice and cozy restaurant by the ocean. We sat ocean side with a nice view of the old town of Dubrovnik and the mountains. Service, food and drinks was very good!

The first time we visited Arsenal we did not have a table booked, but they fixed it anyway. The food, wine and service was excellent. 
We loved it so much that we felt the need to come back, so we tried to book it for our last day in Croatia. Unfortunately they were fully booked for the following three weeks.

Once again they found a table for us and Ivan made sure we had an excellent time. 
The food, wine and drinks blow our expectations again!
Stunning location and very nice waiters mada a simple sipping of a coffee a truly unique experience.
Gradska kavana Arsenal has extremely nice staff and service, very good food and a fantastic view of the old town port!

We came here on our last night in Dubrovnik, having walked past a few times and feeling the atmosphere of the place pulling us in, we chanced at an attempt of getting a table on our last night and were not disappointed! I had the truffle pasta, and my friend had the seafood risotto which were both amazing with a glass of wine. Out server Mario was also very charming, and we even got a glass of local cherry liquor to finish our night. All in all very much recommend if you're looking for a perfect finisher👌

Having completed a fabulous walking tour of Dubrovnik our tour guide recommended Gradska kavana Arsenal Restaurant for a lunchtime resting spot. A fantastic historic landmark with an amazing view of the port equalled only by the welcoming, friendly staff and delicious food. Highly recommend evading the heat of the day by spending a couple of hours here in this airy, cavernous restaurant.

This is a superb restaurant; the food is if a very high stand great flavours and fantastically presented. The service is impeccable. Approximately £45 per head with starter, main and drinks, Also good for vegetarians and of course, as this is In Croatia the seafood is excellent. Enjoy

The excellent view is matched by the wonderful food and service offered at the Arsenal. I had made reservations months in advance for our family of 7. Looking out over the terrace is a feast for the eyes, and the interior is lovely as well. Everyone in our party loved their meals. The food was prepared perfectly! I don't think you can go wrong with anything you order. Our waiter made wonderful drink recommendations for all in our party and we weren't disappointed. So happy we chose to spend an evening dining at the Arsenal.

First the setting: an old boat warehouse. Then the view: overlooking the old port and the fort, or, on the other side, the old city. And the service: if there’s no table available, you’re welcome to have a drink in the lounge area while waiting for a vacancy. And the service at the table: friendly, professional, helpful. And of course the food: quality ingredients, delicious combinations and beautiful presentation. An unforgettable first dinner in beautiful Dubrovnik!
Great position almost in the Old Town walls and looking out over the old port. Very smart and staff were excellent. Food was very good, although I could have done with a bit more at the price.

We visited this restaurant multiple times on our trip, for lunch and for dinner. Arsenal is a great place and has excellent service any time of the day. Highly recommend this place for lunch, dinner, or drinks!

Great food, wine, view and excellent service. Our waiter, Ante, always served us with a ready smile, paid great attention to detail, had great communication skills and the best recommendations, which made this an unforgettable experience.

Delicious food, outstanding view and fantastic service. I do highly consider Arsenal a must visit while in the Old Town of Dubrovnik. Additionally, our waiter Marko was terrific throughout the night. A truly wonderful evening

Beautiful location, amazing food and lovely staff. Special mention to Ante for amazing service. 

Would highly recommend!
Food was very tasty, friendly waiter, nice view of the port. Need to make a reservation. Although we just showed up and we got lucky because there was a cancellation.

Nice location in the middel of old town, they have two outside areas, we spesifically asked to sit on the side with the water view. No waiting time, this was on a friday around 19:00. Very helpful and service minded staff! We had some whiskey sours and later we ate the veal. Both drinks and food was amazing. It is of course a little over priced for the amount of food you get, but it is because of the good location and nice views, it is a little fancier restaurant. Definitly worth it anyways!
Very good service. Friendly waiter, delicious food, live guitar music, lot of space, great view on the harbour. We had lunch and dinner. Both times no rushing.

First off, i would love to start off with that Ivan our waiter was the best! Secondly, (which probably should have been the first thing that I've said) I've been here twice in our 5 day vacation in Dubrovnik. I was not able to resist the truffle pasta, the food was absolutely amazing! The tuna was cooked to perfection and the service was absolutely amazing. I would like to point out that I'm from NYC and is very experienced when it comes to the food industry. The food was GREAT! So great that i forgot to take a photo of it lol. I highly recommend it here and will be back when i return to Dubrovnik. 

P.s. Try the oysters!
Great food with a great view. No reservation needed. Food came quickly and it was delicious. Extremely friendly waiter.
Fantastic food. Fantastic service in an amazing setting. Book well in advance for an evening meal. Highly recommended. Ante provided great service.

Spectacular views and excellent food. Located in the middle of everything, people watching beyond compare. The truffle pasta should not be missed. With service that is prompt, attentive and generous. A Dubrovnik must do!

Really nice restaurant with the best location in Dubrovnik. We had a table at the port in old town. The service was great, and we really enjoyed the food. The prices were cheaper than at other restaurants in town which are not at this level.
Also beautiful cocktails.
Outstanding service, our waiter Ante Kristijan was brilliant with great recommendations. The food and wine was excellent to suit. Highly recommend.

The view is so worth it. The staff is very friendly and speak good english. The food was very good. It could have more vegetarian options tho, they were a little limited. I had the champignon and truffel pasta which was good.
Amazing service. Great atmosphere, great view and reasonably priced. Thank you for making our first lunch here special 👏

We had a fantastic lunch overlooking the harbour - excellent food (mushroom and truffle pasta, steak sandwich) and brilliant service from Ante (Kristijan Simovic). Would definitely recommend - and book early!

We have had the most amazing meal in the main plaza in Dubrovnik. Ante was a fabulous host, so passionate about the restaurant! He gave us amazing recommendations and the food was exceptional. The views and the atmosphere are both spectacular - the ambience of the main square is complimented by the relaxed fine dining offered in the restaurant. The cocktails were amazing. We recommend getting a seat outside to soak up the atmosphere. The breakfast here is also amazing, known as the best breakfast in Dubrovnik. The service, quality and location of this restaurant are all exceptional. A must visit! We will be back. Thank you Ante, you are an excellent ambassador for Dubrovnik!
The service was really nice. We had a great waiter, he offered us great croatian wines and specialties ! The food was excellent! A really good expérience!
The location was beautiful. The staff were very friendly and helpful and the food was delicious. Our host Ante was very professional and courteous
Fantastic food at reasonable prices. Great service and what a view. Book in advance for dinner as it gets really busy.

Loved our experience at Arsenal! Our server, Ante, wonderfully paired our meals with wine. The food was delicious! We capped off our meal with a wonderful pistachio bar. But what really makes them stand out is the five star service. Ante's ability to provide recommendations on the food, and understand the wine will have us coming back!

Our Air B&B host recommended Arsenal and it was on my list of great places so it became our first restaurant to try when we went to dinner. I ordered the catch of the day and it was great. Had the burrata appetizer and the ingredients were super fresh, it tasted like everything came straight from the garden. The service was excellent and the view is incredible.

We came back on our last day since it was so good. Had the fish stew and it beat the catch of the day. Was more of a seafood stew as it had cuttlefish and mussels too. Excellent red sauce with the right amount of spice so as to not drown out the fish. The food was so good I neglected to take any pictures, but a nice Manhattan was the perfect end to the night. 

10/10 would recommend.
The most perfect place for dinner & drinks. Staff are so lovely and helpful. Food is AMAZING been here a week and eaten here twice and hopefully a soon to be third. Could not recommend more. 😊
Arrived around 6-7pm for dinner, we we're greeted with love and compassion. Ordered our food and it came very quickly. Lovely food and brilliant setting

This restaurant is a MUST when visiting Dubrovnik! Not only is the view of the port beautiful but also the food is outstanding! Our waiter, Ante, recommended our entire meal from the wine to the dessert and it was the best meal we have had in Europe this summer! Great management as well! Definitely make time to eat at this restaurant during your time in Dubrovnik!
Great view, incredible food, fantastic service. Not a bad word to say. Can only recommend for Dubrovnik.

Great service! Outstanding view and delicious food.
Truffle Pasta is amazing and the seafood risotto was mouthwatering.
Amazing food, excelent serving and great views. 5 stars for Ivan and his amability. Definetly a place you should try. Truffle pasta are the best

The elegant cafe terrace is situated at the end of main street Stradun and serves a delicious white chocolad almond cake. This is a classy establishment with vast indoors too which end up in another terrace for the restaurant overlooking the harbour. If you already visited Dubravka by the Pile gate you might have received a complimentary discount card valid throughout your stay in Dubrovnik.

We originally had an online booking for lunch here thinking it was more casual and walked past the restaurant in the old town one evening before and realised it was a beautiful setting and decided to change to dinner instead, glad we did! We were sat at the front, had 3 courses, 3 glasses of house red and 3 cokes and water. Total bill about £150. Food was delivious!
Service was brilliant. Would 100% recommend going there again.

We went here on our last night in Dubrovnik and it was the perfect end - gorgeous views out into the harbour as the sun set, the food and cocktails were both amazing (best food i had in Croatia) and the staff were all super friendly and attentive. The price was also really good in terms of what you get for your money, its worth every penny - would definitely recommend to everyone!!
We loved it here the service is soo great and the vieuw is beautiful definitely recommend this for everybody🥰

We booked a table one month in advance on a recognaissance visit - the girl receiving us when we arrived recognized us surorisingly and we were placed at a table next to the harbor as we had requested a month ago. We ordered pre-courses and main courses for two adults and two kids including coffee and drinks - every piece of the meal was superb including the service. We particularly appreciated the live music in background - all in all a great exoerience!”
Ivan S was our waiter and was fantastic. Recommend the beef carpaccio and the beef steak!! It’s our honeymoon and they managed to fit us in on one of the front port tables. Highly recommend!

We had a wonderful breakfast at this restaurant. The food was lovely and the service was excellent
- all the staff were very attentive. Big thanks to Ivan who looked after us and offered great customer service (bravo). 👍👍👍👍
This restaurant has the best food and service in the old town! Thank you to Marco who served us, he is 10/10!
Such a beautiful experience. The view is absolutely stunning and the service and food to match. Marijo's service was the perfect level of attentive. Thank you!

We visited during a Friday night- we had an excellent time. The service was great, food delicious, and there was live acoustic music to top off a great experience. 
You also can’t beat the waterfront view.

don’t let the initial view of the menu put you off, this place is more than simply breakfasts and light lunches, the service was attentive and friendly from the moment we walked up the steps to the restaurant, the food was brilliant and if they have the Hama i cannot recommend it enough, with a good drinks list and cracking view we are certain to return!
We had a fantastic dinner overlooking the waters of Dubrovnik. The service was excellent with Marko taking care of everything. The food was a very high standard and I would recommend this venue.

Came here based on reviews and was very happy with my brekie. This would be a great spot for lunch too. Just in front of the old town wall facing the port. Magic view. Marco our waiter was excellent, very attentive. 
would come back for sure.

The restaurant has a fabulous view over the port, the staff were super friendly. Our waiter was Marko who was very attentive and welcoming. I had the Orlando breakfast which was really nice. I would recommend a visit
we loved the time we spent here, the place is amazing very peaceful vibes facing the pier. the truffle pasta and mussels are amazing !

We were very well welcomed and served by our waiter Marko. 
We ordered truffle pastas, and it was exquisite. The desserts were tasty, my pistache cake looked like a pastry from a bakery. 
The view is very nice as you can see the port from your table and the passing of medieval-like boats.
Highly recommended.

After turning up with no reservation, staff were kind enough to let us enjoy their lounge bar area whilst waiting for one to be free. Wine very reasonable if not cheap considering Old town prices. The food was incredible. Sailors Risotto was a particular highlight so would recommend.

Live music and an amazing view made this all the more enjoyable. 

Staff extremely professional with a Michelin style professionalism and courtesy. Ante our server was great, he was great fun but was also there to constantly top up our drinks and provide some friendly conversation. 

10/10 I would recommend.
Everything was amazing; the food, the service and the stunning location ! I am coming back for sure 😍

We visited this restaurant after it was recommended by friends, WOW Incredible, the staff are so professional, we waited in a queue and we’re then offered to sit inside while our table was prepared, we were then shown to our table, drinks were ordered and brought promptly, our food order was taken and the food served was perfectly prepared and delicious.

Fantastic food and service in beautiful atmosphere at the terrace with a seaview. Great menu, where you can choose between fresh fish, meat, chicken and a rich and good winelist. Our waiter Marco gave us the best and friendly service. The restaurant was fully booked, but we where lucky to get a table as vi dropped in, and that was worth it! We will be back, for sure❤️
Couldn’t recommend enough - great service - thank you Ante - lovely wine , food and ambience . Settled here for a late lunch and thoroughly enjoyed it !!

We stumbled upon this fantastic restaurant by accident as we were walking in the Old Town. The catch of the day was phenomenal and the service exceptional! Highly recommend for great food, excellent service, and a phenomenal view!
Very spacious, lovely restaurant where you can get an amazing breakfast considering the breathtaking view on the harbour. Service also top notch!
Service and food was great. Server was amazing and such a nice guy. We’ll be coming back in the future
It was an amazing experience. We would surely repeat this experience. A restaurant not to miss when you are in Dubrovnik.

Visited as a family for my husbands 50th birthday. Fantastic evening. St Jepan looked after us
Very well. Excellent food. Great wine recommendations and a surprise birthday cake. Amazing food and service. Great evening
Brilliant service, great food and fantastic setting. Never been anywhere like it. Very impressed with this place.

Had dinner with three of my friends! Best meal so far in Dubrovnik ! We shared four starters and four mains with the recommendation of our amazing waiter Mario who looked after us through the night making sure we had everything we needed! Would 10/10 recommend to everyone who is visiting !
Me and my friend came to this beautiful restaurant multiple times on our trip, great atmosphere and drinks. Definitely recommend a mojito in the square. Lovely staff and very friendly.
Fantastic service with really friendly staff, beautiful food and a gorgeous location. Would definitely recommend!
Wonderful restaurant, great service, lovely staff, incredible ambiance. Ante the waiter is a true professional. Highly recommend
Great location with a beautiful view. Very good food and good drinks. The servants was polite and helpful. Would definetly recommend
The location of the restaurant matched the food, it was great! The gnocchi with bourbon sauce was good. Great drinks.
Amazing choice of food and beverages with lovely attentive staff, especially Marco! It’s so good…we’ve been here 3 days in a row! Fantastic views of the harbour too! Couldn’t recommend enough!!

Incredible location on the port of Dubrovnik. The portions are small but worth it the taste is there. Service is impeccable nothing to say but amazing job. We spend a nice last night in Dubrovnik. The extra cherry on top is the live music which give a nice ambiant to the terrasse. Totally recommend it 
Thanks again
Lovely food, good service with a lovely view of the old port. Would recommend booking as it gets busy

Stunning location in the edge of Dubrovnik with a wonderful view of the hustle and bustle of the harbour. Entertaining to watch a wedding party in kilts and silky finery board a rather large old boat to party too.
Basically every body inside and outside this stunning Resturant was happy, the sun was out.
Great welcome on arrival, smiling waiters and waitresses, stunning menu and great local wine list.
Had octopus salad which was outstanding, local fish, beautiful salads and a deadly dessert. A gin and tonic each and a bottle of crisp Cristian wine, what was not to like. Highly recommended.

We started with the octopus salad, which was a very generous serving of fresh and delicious octopus. We followed with the seafood risotto and the staffs recommendation of the gnocchi with bourbon sauce and beef strips. The gnocchi was the highlight of the night and arguably the best dish we have tried in 5 weeks of traveling around Europe! Not to discredit the risotto as it was also one of the tastiest risottos we have tried in Croatia. Both dishes, again, we generous servings and therefore, great value for money. 
Service was a 10/10! We felt very taken care of all night. The friendly and professional waiters and staff create a fine dining experience and atmosphere. 
All topped off with live music and an amazing view of the surrounding mountains and water.
A must visit!!
The location, vibe and service were all incredible. The food was delicious and reasonably priced for the area. Very much recommended

A Great place to have a morning coffe, breakfast, lunch or after action drinks and dinner. Very nice by all means. Location, service, food, family friendliness.

Enjoy🇭🇷🇭🇷🇭🇷
We came back after having a great experience on our last visit. The service and food was great. We really enjoyed our dinner. It is also one of the most beautiful settings in town

Unreal whisky sour and excellent staff. 
Our sever knows the suss, took a fantastic photo of our group and gave us the directions and all!
The backdrop to the marina is whopper
A fantastic time at Gradska kavana arsenal, where we relaxed with some cold beers and fantastic food. Listen to the waiters, they know what you should order. We look forward to coming back soon!

Storm outside and we found refuge in this place. Initially the hostess told us there was nothing available. We sat around and asked again and the manager was kind enough to offer us a table at what is actually a coffee drinking spot. We have a baby and a child and this was much appreciated. Then came Ermin, who is one of the most genuine and professional waiters we have ever encountered. He was apologetic about the small tables and made sure that our lunchtime meal was not an inconvenience. He went above and beyond to provide outstanding sefvice which was further amplified by the excellent meals. Keep up the excellent work Ermin, and hope the restaurant always maintains this quality of service and food. Well impressed!

We had a table for 4 nearest the water. Nearly a fine dining experience. Marko provided excellent service. One of us didn’t like the hamburger and Marko comped the burger and provided dessert for 4. Really over and above expectations.
Located at the end of the Main Street from the Pile Gate. There are two sides to this place, one fronting the piazza and one fronting the harbor. Very different ambiances, both fine. Depends on what you want.
We came here for an early breakfast and enjoyed eggs Benedict with the bread basket. Great service and excellent food.

We had wonderful service. Ante was a great server - very kind and helpful. Our bar tender was amazing and made us a custom martini even though it wasn’t on the menu. Highly recommend. Outside has a great view.
Wow! What an amazing breakfast and service! Robert provided phenomenal service throughout. This place should definitely be visited during your stay. We will certainly be back again!
We stopped by for some breakfast this morning as the view is stunning! We were served by Robert who was great, very attentive and helpful. Thank you so much Robert, really impressed ☺️
An incredible breakfast with even better service from Lulo. Great healthy breakfast and smoothie selection. Lulo was very accommodating for us and our 18month old baby

We had a delicious meal in a fairy tale setting. The waiter Ante Simovic was very helpful and attentive … my friend had the fish which was exceptional, and my daughter had the mushroom truffle pasta which she said was the most exquisite tasting dish she’d ever had.
Great experience. Great food. Amazing views, especially during sunset. Robert specially did a great job. If you’re in Croatia this is a must eat spot.
Would 100% recommend. The fantastic location and brilliant food were all made better by the great service from Marijo.

Great food (especially the truffle and mushroom pasta) and dessert (pistachio cake)! Fantastic customer service from Ante!! He was very attentive to our needs and provided excellent recommendations on food. Highly recommend!

We were a walk-in and offered the option of two tables, we chose to sit on the terrace overlooking the little harbour. STJEPAN was our waiter and offered attentive service from the start. I have a Molluscs allergy and he checked this with the kitchen. We talked about local wine and his knowledge was exceptional. Great meal and a table with a stunning view, one of the best evenings in Dubrovnik 🥰

My friends and I loved this restaurant! 

The staff was really friendly especially our server Ante and we loved the food. I ordered the fish special and the sailor risotto and both were amazing! Would highly recommend!
Excellent 5 star service. Amazing food and the view was stunning. Ante was a fantastic waiter nothing was too much trouble and his attention to detail was 10/10

We came for the stunning view over the harbour on the outside terrace and both service and food were equally extraordinary. Our waiter Ante Kristijan took great care of us throughout the night and we had one of the best culinary experiences in our stay in Dubrovnik. Highly recommend! :-)
Great spot in the most beautiful place. Our waiter Ante Kristijan Simovic was outstanding. Follow his recommendations - you won’t be disappointed. And the Alpine Swifts add to the experience.

The best service from Ante the waiter he was very polite and helpful. The burger and beef were the best thing we ever have and the cheesecake and pistachio cake no words. Best place with best view at the old town in Dubrovnik.
Excellent location, fantastic food and wine, outstanding service from Ante. Despite being in the epicentre of the Dubrovnik tourist zone this restaurant is a joy!
Mriko - a great waiter! Very quick service and extremely friendly. He checked everything was okay and it was a brilliant experience with a great view! Price was decent.
Fantastic food and setting, Marco was very attentive and knowledgeable about the menu. Would recommend and visit again.
Great dinner views, great food, amazing espresso martini! Ask for Marko as your server for a great dinner experience! ☺️

We have visited here for three meals, once for breakfast and twice for dinner and all three times were exceptional! The service is amazing, the staff are so polite and helpful. The food is perfect, very high quality yet the portions are rather generous. Free bread as well! I would come here for dinner every night if I could. I’ve had the eggs benedict royale, the truffle pasta and the beef gnocchi and I highly recommend them all! I can’t wait to visit again next time I come to dubrovnik!

Ir was the best dinner in Dubrovnik. Marko, the waiter made it special by elegant service: he explained the menu, advised the wine, always had a smile on his face. I’ll come back to the same restaurant next time ai am in Dubrovnik.

This was my favourite restaurant when I visited Dubrovnik back in 2015, and I’m happy to say nothing has changed.
Excellent food, wine and service each time we visited (3 across the week… 1 lunch, 1 dinner and 1 coffee). 
We sat at both sides of the restaurant, one with views to the port, and separately with views of the Main Street, and were welcomed and served very well by all of the staff

Popped here for breakfast. It was lovely and cool sitting by the old port. The staff were really friendly and efficient. The breakfast was really tasting, served with a very varied bread basket. The coffee was the best I’ve had in a long time!
The food was really good! Especially the mushroom tryffel pasta was excellent! The view was beautiful and the service was good! Recommend!
Our server Stjepan was attentive, knowledgeable, and friendly. Great service and amazing food. Truffle pasta was a highlight

I can not say enough good things about this restaurant! The food is out of this world (best pasta of my life) and the view is stunning! Marco, my server was superb - just the right amount of attention and space. So far, this is one of my best experiences in a restaurant in old Dubrovnik! Do come!

I am the less foody person in my family. I prefer to focus on ambiance and views. My family, on the other hand, cares much more about food quality and presentation. This was a win-win for everyone. The most fantastic dinner that we had had in a while. Great cocktails and appetizers and the waiter gave us excellent suggestions for the entrees. Unique flavors and food cooked to perfection...the presentation of some of the dishes and cocktails was quite "performative" ( The fish for two for instance) . We went at 7:30pm and it was the perfect time of the day to enjoy the sunset and see the boats come back from daily trips. This dinner will be one of the most treasured moments of our trip.

Just stopped into this place from the old town and thought it looked cute. To my surprise as we went outside we walked out to the best view of Dubrovnik, right on the port! The food was amazing - had the healthy breakfast :) and our waiter marijo was so friendly and accommodating! Highly recommend this as a stop on your trip to dubrovnik!!

Was served by Marijo and the food was great! He was super helpful and accommodating. If you see the front of the restaurant, walk straight through and you’ll see an amazing view of boats, the water and almost the whole city. Really recommend this place!
Amazing!! Service was excellent and the food was delicious. The views are great of the sea and it’s a shaded area so not very hot! Marijo was a great :) definitely recommend
This has been our favorite restaurant in Dubrovnik, and our waiter Marijo was so friendly and helpful! The view is incredible and so was the food. We appreciate you!

We visited Dubrovnik on a yacht and quite accidentally discovered this fabulously located restaurant. We had no bookings and it was busy but the manager squeezed us in,, twice! Good was fabulous,, staff were great ,, champagne was wonderful! Tbe view of the old harbour was amazing! A “ must visit “ restaurant with a great outside coffee patio in tbe daytime. We loved it. Jonpaul Holt Canada 🇨🇦
Ante made our night. Absolutely amazing dinner from appetizer to dessert, recommend to anyone!! I enjoyed the duck especially. So succulent. Best dinner in Dubrovnik.

We have never experienced better service. Mario was amazing to both ourselves & our 11 month old daughter. The food is exquisite, but the servers make this dining experience memorable. 5 star service from entry to exit. We’ll be back many many more times.

The food is divine, the atmosphere and scenery as well! The staff, especially our waiter Marco mad it into a great experience! We came back several times, and will be back again! I would recommend to book a table in advance, but the hostess Maria will be helpful if you just drop by!

This restaurant has a great atmosphere, and great view. The food is delicious and packed with taste, and so are the drinks! I highly recommend either the gnocchi or the truffle pasta. The staff is lovely, and makes the experience complete. Our hostess Maria and our server Marco were super attentive and nice. We went back several times, and will come back in the future!

We were in Dubrovnik three days and ate at this restaurant six times. We tried a couple other places but kept coming back to Arsenal. It became our happy place. I actually shed happy tears three times and I’m not a crier. We ate at 360 and found that Arsenal was just as good with more reasonable prices. Our waiter, Ivan S., was absolutely fantastic. He made our meals very memorable. We requested him at every meal. Every dish we tried was mouth watering delicious. 

The restaurant is the perfect mix of views with delicious cuisine. Fancy but not too fancy. The prices were very reasonable.
We had a great dinner with a fantastic view, and excellent service by Marko. Will be back next time we are in dubrovnik!

We had an amazing time at this restaurant on our very first trip to Dubrovnik. The lady who greeted us and sat us down was super helpful and friendly and the night just got better from there. Stjepan looked after us all night, gave us amazing food recommendations and was extremely friendly and attentive. The views are also incredible and we sat and watched the boats come in to the port.
We only had streaks and vegetables but everything was delicious. Nice service and a lovely spot overlooking the old port, but in the heart of the old city.
