This restaurant is so beautiful, it’s like a dream. 

The plaza side is so elegant, but the true beauty is the sea side. The ceilings are so tall, airy, and spacious. The service is truly superb - five stars. The best ambiance in Dubrovnik, for sure. The food and drinks are also excellent. My favorite was the strawberry fizz, a version of an aperol spritz. Highly recommend!!

We had a great meal at this restaurant. The ambiance is fantastic - there are great views from both the front and back terraces, it was lively without being noisy and all 7 of us loved our meals. We had a great waiter who helped us choose the wine and he was friendly and efficient. The price was pretty reasonable for the great quality. Portions were a good size so after sharing starters and a main course each we were too full for dessert.
This was our best meal and favourite restaurant in Dubrovnik, 10/10!

This restaurant feels like a super high class star restaurant but at a rather affordable pricepoint.
Out of all the restaurants me and my girlfriend visited in Dubrovnik this one was by far our best experience. The service is on point and the food and drinks were nothing but amazing!
If you are in dubrovnik and you don‘t want to pay hundreds of euros for your dinner but still get the feeling of a high class restaurant where everything is perfect you should definetly visit this place!
Nice restaurant. Amazing views, good food and excellent drinks. We had a front row table right by the harbour which is a great position. Best drinks in Old Town.

A really beautiful restaurant situated on the harbour with lively views. The food is excellent, hearty and very reasonably priced. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful. We ate here every day for our trip as we liked it so much.
I recommend the steak, risotto and also the mussels with chips!! Loved it :-)

We were told we could sit in and have a drink while we were waiting for a table to become available. We got our table and the staff were so apologetic that we had to wait a little longer than anticipated which we didn’t mind and they gave us our first round on the house. The food was incredible and the service was impeccable. The view was also stunning!

Setting and food was perfect. The setting is absolutely beautiful if you get a table on the terrace facing the harbour. We had the burrata, beef fillet and truffle linguine and it was all delicious. The cocktails are a must too with the strawberry spritz and old fashioned hitting the mark. Will absolutely visit again when back in Dubrovnik.

Went here a couple of times during our trip. The location is great on the port and both times we managed to walk in and get a table right on the edge. The food is really good although not as big portions as experienced elsewhere in Dubrovnik. Service is also good, although a bit slow when busy.

We had dinner here twice during our stay in Dubrovnik,seated both in the square and then on the harbour.
The waiter that looked after us on both visits was fantastic (I'm afraid we didn't get his name).
All the food he recommended was superb, especially the truffle pasta !!
This is probably one of the nicest restaurants I have dined in !! 
The food,the staff and the setting were all wonderful.

We had lunch here twice - once on the square and once on the harbor. Both were excellent! Delicious food in a casual setting and seamless service. This place looks like it might be overpriced, but you will be pleasantly surprised at the relatively moderate prices.

This restaurant provides a grand Dubrovnik experience…..delicious food, wonderful Croatian wines, and beautiful views at the front looking onto this amazingly beautiful medieval town and at the back looking onto the walls of the Old Town and the lovely Adriatic. 

We were in Dubrovnik for 12 hours while on a cruise….we ate there twice - for an early lunch and then for cocktails and snacks in the late afternoon. 

We have been to Dubrovnik five times before this visit and have tried several restaurants. This is our first time to eat at the same restaurant twice in one day. 

The staff are wonderful too and add to the pleasure of the experience.

I tried to reserve here a few days before my arrival, and found it fully booked for dinner, several weeks in advance. Fortunately, we could reserve for lunch during the last day of our three-day visit. 

I am so glad that we did! It truly was an outstanding experience. 

I started out with an Aperol Spritz. It was the most beautiful drink I have ever been served! Served in a lovely glass, it cane with a garnish of dehydrated orange slice, a sprig of fresh mint, and -wait for it- tiny little roses and rose petals. It was * almost* too beautiful to drink.

I ordered the seafood risotto. Oh, my! I had to resist the urge to say, " This is so good!" after each bite. 

My husband ordered the duck, and he reports that it was every bit as good as my risotto.

He finished with the creme caramel. Yet again, it was as tasty as it was beautiful. 

The setting is just stunning! Unlike many well-positioned restaurants, here the food lives up to the setting. 

Service was polite and attentive.

It was not only the best meal we had in Dubrovnik, it was also the least expensive. I don't know how they do it! But I am glad that they do.

 Thank you for such a memorable experience.
We had breakfast here and chose for the “healthy breakfast” with egg, guacamole and toast. It was excellent! Staff was friendly also. Thanks a lot!

Excellent services and great foods. Best to book if you like the best view from your table. The atmosphere is great with all the activities around and the serving staff are good and well worth their tips (they prefer in cash, Kona, the local currency).
The fish dish is very good and the seafood risotto is fantastic. The local dish Octopus salad is the best in this restaurant. A glass of the local white (Posip Kvalitetno Suho Vino), a nice lace to take a little rest from all the activities!!

Unbeatable outlook particularly if you can get a front table for two - not easy but we did via our concierge. Service is slick and professional rather than warm and friendly. We both had tuna tartare which was beautifully presented and quite tasty but we have had better. We followed this with sea bass fillet cooked en papillotte with a mix of vegetables - it was very good. The bill including a bottle of wine was about £100 including tip.
Sublime food, incredible atmosphere and the staff were so lovely and gave very thoughtful recommendations

Gorgeous view of the port. Delicious food, especially the fish stew. Most of all attentive charming waiters- service is exceptional. 
We had yummy cocktails a few days earlier prior to a classical concert in the Rectors palace . So pleased we returned for dinner tonight.

We spent almost two weeks in Croatia, 4 days of that in Dubrovnik. We then went on a 45’ catamaran for 7 days through the islands of Croatia. Out of all of the restaurants we ate at, this was by far our favorite. Make sure and eat on the back terrace overlooking the water. The food was outstanding but what made it so special was the service. We had the most attentive waiters - they all helped on all of the tables. It was such an enjoyable and special experience for us.

Fantastic service fantastic food unique scenery 😃 don t look further, this is the place to be when in dubrovnik i will surely go back, looks crowded at first sight but very friendly fast and professional staff and superb organisation. Worldtop!

A large and popular restaurant with indoor and outdoor seating with a lovely view of the old habour. The service was friendly and incredibly professional despite the fully booked outdoor area. The food was very good and well presented. We enjoyed our dinner immensely.

This is a beautiful restaurant by the harbour, excellent atmosphere and sea food. We were here in the evening and had a great meal. I came again for lunch today and had a great tuna steak. Highly recommended
Great food, lovely staff and an amazing view. We had dinner overlooking the marina with an acoustic guitarist playing in the background. We loved it here. The staff were really attentive.

We are so glad we changed our plans and came here! The terrace and the setting are beautiful. We booked 2 nights before. I wish I could remember our waiter because he was so fantastic! We let him choose our wine and then our starter(delicious oysters from Ston)and then our meal lol. Every bite was amazing! Fresh and tasty. And they he bought us a liqueur and a piece of cake on him. Delicious. He made our last night in Dubrovnik very special and memorable. Thankyou so much. Our meal was 1000kuna with tip so fair in Dubrovnik

We started with the marinated zucchini. It had a little bit of a floral taste. It was just ok. We also had the tuna tartar (chunks of tuna, not ground) which was very good. My husband had the seafood risotto which was very good, lots of flavor and kind of spicy but not hot. My daughter has the duck which was also very good. I had the linguini with the truffle and mushroom. I was really looking forward to this dish but it was way too heavy for me. The portion looks small but it is a lot because the bowl is deep and the dish is heavy

Stopped for breakfast, could have stayed all day! Setting, food, ambience, staff - all amazing. The setting is beautiful, sitting on the terrace watching the world go by. Breakfast was lovely, the coffee was fab. Would definitely go back! Ante was lovely and chatted away to my friend who is learning Croatian. It is on the expensive side, but worth it for the view in my opinion.
We had lunch here on Monday and the food, setting & service was excellent. If you have Tom as your waiter then you are in for a treat! He was fantastic! Thank you Tom 😊

This is a Restaraunt NOT TO BE MISSED if you
come to Dubrovnik. The attentiveness of the
waiters, especially Marco and the lovely Maria
who served us and looked after us tonight was
Outstanding. The food, wine, presentation was
absolutely first class. So glad we came here and
we will DEFINITELY be back

Russell & Vicky ( London )

We had eaten at the Panorama Restaurant the day before and had such a great experience we decided to try another of The Nautika Collection restaurants in Dubrovnik.

The Gradska Kavana Arsenal is in Dubrovnik Old Town and has excellent views over the old port.

Again we booked online and had a discount voucher from the Panorama Restaurant.

The food once again was fantastic, and the service was just as good.

There was a great selection of food and drink on the menu, and the restaurant's location makes it a must if you are going to the Old Town.

Exquisite.

We found this restaurant on trip adviser. The setting is picturesque, the staff service is second to none and the food is out of this world. We chose the sharing catch of the day option. The waiter escorted us to choose our fish of a selection of fresh and delicious looking fish. Once we had selected, we were brought fresh bread and local olive oil which was extremely pleasant with a stunning view. 
The fish was delivered to our table and filleted in front of us with great skill and precision. It was delicious. Served with oven roasted vegetables and potatoes. Very simple but very effective. 
The waiters were all very good English speakers and we enjoyed chatting and laughing with them. 
The meal was fairly expensive. Considering we had only a sharing main and no alcohol it was well over £100 - but well worth it for a special and memorable meal. 
We would definitely go back and highly recommend.

We had walked past this restaurant a few times and decided to book a waterside table for an evening meal. We thoroughly enjoyed all our food and wine, the duck and salmon main courses were delicious and we shared a starter and sweet that were equally as good. Wouldn’t hesitate to recommend a visit. They also do an early breakfast on the town square side which was lovely and open at 10 amon the waterside.
The food was excellent, the fish was very fresh and tasty (not touristy at all). The staff was kind and warm. Clean, well presented restaurant. Beautiful view on the old port. Recommended!

If you're visiting Dubrovnik, you must have a meal here. A quick meal is fine, but better if you take some time to linger because the view is stunning and the atmosphere is perfect. The staff are all wonderful and professional (thanks, Marijo -- charming as ever -- for the great hospitality), the food is delicious, and the wine selection is superb. If you drink wine when you come here, for heaven's sake drink Croatian wine; it's excellent.
Everything was great from thevfood to the staff. BiH thanks to Marko who made me feel Like a princess. See you soon. 💜
We had lovely luch with great view. Staff was great and food was good. 👍 We had a burger and a salad. Atmosphere was great 🤩

I came here for breakfast and dinner and had the most amazing service and food! Shoutout to Marijo Krkic and Roberto and the rest of the amazing staff! They will make you feel like family! Get the gnocchi at dinner, it is heavenly! Can’t wait to return one day :)
Most beautiful and peaceful place to sit and have a drink and a meal in Old Town, Dubrovnik. The staff was welcoming and don't rush you out, even if you just have a drink or a coffee.

My daughter and I visited here on the last evening of our holiday and wow, we definitely saved the best till last. We both enjoyed the Ston oysters and the fish stew with polenta was simply sublime. Our waiter was so professional and friendly and he made it feel like a really special evening. Thank you!

We visited Gradska Kvana Arsenal for breakfast.
Although we had been late for, not only did the extra polite personnel (including the kitchen team) accepted to serve us with but also they gave us the best table with an amazing view at the small port behind the castle walls. 
We really enjoyed an amazing freshly cooked American breakfast with so many extras served together. Honestly, it has been such a long time since we last saw such a willing and happy service team. Congratulations!
The prices were more than reasonable if you consider the total quality provided.
It is by far the best choice one can do within the Old City walls for breakfast, lunch or dinner.
Our day couldn't have started better! Thank you!!!

Lovely lunch. Food is great and of very good quality.
The view over the harbour is great. Very friendly staff.
A very special treat for my husband and me.

I’ve visited Arsenal for a working morning while working remote from Dubrovnik. Their service exceeded all my expectations. The prices are beyond reasonable. I’ve spent more than 5 hours there, with the waiters even looking to serve me food in between calls. They’ve found me a table in shade with sufficient plugs and the most amazing view. Recommending it to everyone and will surely be back end September !
Service was incredible, food was outstanding with a lovely view. The waiter was great, he reccomended lovely food and was very polite

Eaten here twice this holiday👍👍👍
Fabulous venue overlooking the old harbour.
Amazing food and the service is spot on👍
A little bit pricy but worth it.

The best service we received whilst in Dubrovnik , the setting is just amazing and romantic. We went with the waiters recommendation on the wine ( Kalazic Chardonnay) and his local fish of the day hama 
Simply gorgeous in every way

Reserved a table here for Saturday night. Firstly may I say how wonderful, accommodating, helpful, polite and pleasant our waiter was. A credit to the restaurant. Ordered the sea bass which was perfectly cooked en papillote. Lovely setting particularly in the evening.

We visited the restaurant on our first night in Dubrovnik based on the Tripadvisor rating. We were not disappointed. The setting was fantastic overlooking the harbour with the lights of the hills surrounding us.

The surprise was the quality of the service, our waiter was excellent recommending local wines and olive oils, he made the evening feel special.

The food was also very good, the beef carpaccio was excellent as was the veal.

A great place to start our visit to Dubrovnik.

Fabulous experience. Reserved me a beautiful table by the harbour . Ermin was very attentive and could not do more for us. If you want to be blown away by the service and the view then this is the place . Really affordable aswell!

Quality restaurant serving quality food, the service was amazing and very attentive especially our waiter Marco who did what ever he could for us to feel as comfortable as possible. Also the Pino coladas are to die for!!
We really enjoyed our dinner thanks to the magical view from the restaurant, great service and perfect food. Hope to return soon!

Beautiful restaurant by the sea. We came on the recommendation of a friend. The food is delicious, no objections. Waiters tidy always at your service and always smiling. I definitely recommend this restaurant.

Great view, great service! We really liked it and we ended up going there for three times: one time for breakfast, one time for coffee and desert and one time for cheese and wine in the late evening. Especially cheese plate with wine in the night view was very romantic. The service was also very attentive and professional. If we had stayed longer in Dubrovnik, we would have gone for the fourth time for dinner.

On our first night in beautiful Dubrovnik we came across this restaurant whilst looking around the harbour area. A very warm welcome led to excellent food with perfect attentive service. Highly recommend.
Lovely people watching spot and good service - Stopped for a coffee, cake and an amazing hot chocolate - Reasonably priced for location

The staff were fantastic and the food was just unbelievable. Professionalism and meticulousness in their place. Be sure to visit this restaurant when you come to Dubrovnik because you will be delighted and I definitely recommend this restaurant.

Everything we had here was absolutely exquisite and the presentation was outstanding. 

Fish stew and Salmon fillet  exceeded expectations. The prices are good for the amount of food and the quality. 

Our waiter  was great. Funny and attentive.

Highly recommend!

We were there on a windy evening and they put out the heaters but still lots of stuff flying off the tables. Felt bad for the people who were trying to have a special occasion meal. The location is great, beautiful views of fort and boats. Service was very nice and the waiter was lovely. Wine recommendations were good. 

However, for the price, the food was average. Nobody really had anything especially nice to say about their food in our group of 4. It was fine, but not memorable. We were ready to leave by the time the meal was over. Probably better spots to eat, but worth have a drink or two here.

We ate here our first night and this set a pretty high standard for the remaining time in Dubrovnik. Wonderful view with tremendous service. Our meal was really good but what set it apart was our waiter. Extremely knowledgeable about wines and meal choices. Returned for a breakfast, and got discount for return. Would highly recommend.

We had 4 meals out in Dubrovnik and our meal here was by far the best we had. When we looked at the menu it seemed quite limited but i suppose if you do a few dishes well you don't need many. We had the Veal and Fillet steak and both were cooked perfectly and the Croatian sauvignon we had was truly superb. I would especially have to applaud the service as our waiter was attentive informative and extremely friendly. Based on where it is situated the overall cost was really good value as well.

Pleasant and professional staff. Excellent fish stew! Beautiful view! Requested a Hugo cocktail and the waiter suggested I try a Croatian Hugo. Delightful, refreshing and floral. Happy he suggested that.

Everything is in the title……
Incredible Service - Impossible to be more polite, helpful & friendly……. they’re very on the ball!!
Amazing Food!!!
Idyllic views - You will struggle to find a better view, it’s picture postcard!!!
The service was wonderful. We had the seafood risotto which was perfectly cooked. Gorgeous location which is also a bonus.

Charming little restaurant where you can sit harbour side or street side within the old city. Staff were very attentive and friendly. The menu was small but there was plenty of choice for all dietary needs. We went for the mushroom and truffle linguine and the bourbon beef gnocchi. A beautiful setting to watch the world go by. The meal was very reasonably priced we paid around £30 including wine. I was expecting to pay nearer £50 for the service we got.

Excellent attentive service by Ante Kristijan. The meals were delicious. This was our second time returning after a great experience. We dined with gluten free, dairy free and vegan party members and nothing was too much trouble. Ante was knowledgeable on the wine pairings and made great reccomendations. True old world european service that we couldn't ask more of. We didnt need to pour our own wine once throughout the night and this experience completed our holiday and solidified our love of Dubrovnik.

Couple of nights ago had this dream dining experience, Amazing food and scenery lifted to the next level by the most attentive and caring staff , the two waiters with their magical touch made the evening very special and unforgettable with the attention to details and words of wisdom and kindness . Thank you !

Booked here after a long day trip to Mostar. The restaurant were very accommodating as we were late and needed to change the time. Service was impeccable and staff offered to explain the menu if we needed it. I needed some info on whether I would need a side dish with my main and they definitely didn’t try to encourage ordering more, they explained that this was enough on its own. The sea bass is so different to what we get in the UK - so tasty and meaty. 
It’s a beautiful setting to eat.

Breakfast with a dreamy view!
We stumbled upon this place and decided to have it as our breakfast spot. We were very impressed with the great service and food. We got free pastries with lots of condiment options. But that view just made it 🤩

Oh my goodness, where to start? 

It's a really amazing restaurant! The food is literally to die for. Their truffle pasta & salmon was soo good, I wanted to order more. And their prosciutto and Dalmatian cheese was some of the best I had in the whole of Croatia - it was surprisingly addicting; And I'm not even a cheese person. 

And not only that, but the service was 1st class, and very outstanding. The staffs, Ivan, Stefan, Ante, were all very accommodating and really gave good 1st class service. They do their jobs very well. 

As for the location, what more can you ask for? It's situated right in the heart of all the action and perhaps the most beautiful part in Dubrovnik. Not to mention, the music was superb; They played really nice jazz, chill lounge, Schwarz & Funk, bossa nova, etc, and not just generic youtube BGM piano lists. 

Perhaps the only con I have is that it's on the pricier side; (Wines start at a minimum of 220 kunas) but it's what you expect from such an amazing place and it's really worth it. 

Will highly recommend!

The best restaurant in Dubrovnik!

This restaurant has the best views, best most polite and well trained staff in Dubrovnik. The food is also the best! Such a friendly fun place to spend your holiday.
Well worth a visit.

As a recently arrived couple looking for refreshment, we wandered along Dubrovnik's seafront and came across this beautiful establishment. Immediately one of the waiters, Ante, welcomed us in a warm and friendly manner. 

He immediately invited us to take our pick of the best tables available, and proceeded to talk us through our questions about Croatian red wine and the different varieties available to us. 

He was invaluable to our experience of a first wonderful evening in Dubrovnik and we have returned here for breakfast, coffee and drinks since then, each having received welcomes as warm and as charming as the first. 

Would thoroughly recommend for

If you're anything like us this is the perfect place to people watch and bask in the midday sun, either on the harbour side or street side. Local beer is hard to pronounce but easy to drink, whilst staff are welcoming and attentive. 10% discount as you leave to spend in any of their 3 restaurants is a nice bonus.

We had a lovely lunch on our last day in Dubrovnik. It was a very fresh fish soup and tuna salad. We had the pleasure to be served by Marko, who was very attentive and friendly. Combined with the romantic view over the port, this is a highly recommended spot for a nice lunch or dinner.

The restaurant was highly recommended by several locals and is located in the centre of the Old Town, a few minutes from Pile Gate. We went there on our 10th year anniversary dinner, and returned a few days later to enjoy oysters and cake for lunch, because our first experience was so good. The food is exceptionally fresh and well prepared. We particularly loved the squid, fresh oysters, and beef carpaccio.

All the waiters are highly attentive. We were served by Marko, who was friendly, welcoming and professional.

On days with good weather, seating can be found at the back of the restaurant, with a beautiful view of the marina. Would definitely recommend visiting at least once when in Dubrovnik.

The place is in the middle of the Old Town, you can sit outside and despite the city walls and buildings have some sun on the terrace. The menu is not too big, which is always a good sign. I chose a late lunch / afternoon snack which was very fresh and very nice. The service was also perfect, especially Marko who did me an unusual favor related with a pepper mill - I got it as a present, when I asked whether I could buy it, since I liked the pepper so much and I was missing fresh pepper at the place where I have most of my dinners during my stay in town ;-)

Often when you go to a restaurant with a nice view you have to sacrifice the food - this is not the case here. Food was lovely. We both had a filet steak with the parmesan potatoes which were amazing and we still talk about the potatoes now! Cocktails were great but very strong! Make sure you book in advance and request an outside table closest to the sea - this has the most beautiful view.

If you're looking for a place to feel real heart of Dubrovnik - stop looking! This is one of the places you choose every day, just to have a coffee, bite something small or have a special breakfast/lunch/dinner. Not to mention their stunning special cakes! And guess what - all of that at the very main street od the Adriatic pearl! You will get real value for money, and wish to stay here forever! Definitely a MUST try.. and come back!

Myself and my boyfriend can honestly say this is one of the best restaurants (if not THE best) we have ever visited! The setting was so stunning and the food was fabulous - we couldn’t fault the evening we had there.

Thank you to our waiter who was extremely attentive the whole evening. My boyfriend had the fillet steak for his main which he loved, and I had the duck breast which was the best I’ve ever eaten! We even returned the next day for lunch it was that good. We booked a table which overlooked the port so I would pre book and request a nice table outside. Will be the first place I’ll be visiting when I return to Dubrovnik!

Do not miss this gem!!
MUST visit when in Dubrovnik. Great food, and best service from Ivan! Authentic local food on the menu and selection of delicious cakes. Will definately come back here again
This has got to be one of the neatest places to sit and have a drink. Clean and very nice rest rooms. Service is prompt and friendly.
Enjoyed an evening coffee here. Beautiful views overlooking marina. Lovely building. Friendly staff. Limited menu for food though

I booked this restaurant for lunch inbetween two organised tours. 
Its location is excellent and has super views of the old port. 
Our waitor was lovely, made us feel very relaxed and brought us delicious food. 
It has a lovely calm atmosphere, just what we needed between activities
.

location: Ras Al Khaimah, United Arab Emirates
review: The food are great and the view is amazing whether you’ll sit with the old town view or the sea view. I tried having dinner there as well and the mushroom truffle pasta tastes amazing.

This was a simply fantastic meal and experience. Firstly the view was spectacular, looking onto the water with some warm blankets provided. There was an excellent wine and cocktail menu and the food good value considering the quality. The fish stew in particular was excellent with all the food plated beautifully! The experience was made all that much better by the superb and friendly waiting staff. Will definitely recommend this place to friends.

This waterfront view is spectacular, the service is over the top and the food is simply amazing. My favorite appetizer is the marinated zucchini - it is unbelievable. The fish stew is unlike anything else that I have tasted. The best!

We kept the best until last and saved dining at Kavana Arsenal until our last night. We were determined to enjoy the beautiful outdoor dining overlooking the harbour so made our dinner reservation slightly earlier and requested a table next to a heater. Along with the blankets provided we were totally comfortable and warm. 

The location is second to none in the old town overlooking the harbour, Lokrum and the hillside apartments and hotels. The food is among the best I have ever had and I will never forget the incredible flavours in the fish stew. My mum is a connoisseur of slow cooked lamb shanks (and she makes a pretty good dish herself!) but said the one she had at Kavana Arsenal beat anything she had ever had before. My daughter had steak which was perfectly cooked and delicious. We were so grateful that my not so hungry younger daughter was accommodated with a simple bowl of plain pasta and cheese.

There is a great cocktail and wine menu. We absolutely loved the Puhelek Sauvignon, superb and not surprising the Croatian's keep this for themselves!! 

Finally a big shout out to our brilliant server Ermin, he was knowledgeable and attentive and made our evening very special.
We loved the breakfast and the fish soup here. Also very much citizens here. Prices are ok for Dubrovnik. Fresh and local products of high quality.

It was a chilly night so no one was outside. We had reservations so we had a table right by the window with direct view to water. Our waiter was very attentive and the food was fabulous. We were too full for dessert after the great meal and grilled vegetables, but couldn't resist the apple pie, so we ordered it to split. Very delicious!! Check this place out!

We had lunch today at Gradska Kavana to celebrate our wedding anniversary. And it was a marvelous experience! The food selections were a pure work of art. Also, the service can hardly be any kinder and more polite. Keep up the good work guys!

It was my last day in Croatia after 3 months of of backpacking, and after a lot of cheap grocery meals,
I thought I’d treat myself for the last day. Immediately upon entering, I felt super welcome - Marijo and the rest of the staff treated me with such kindness, and really made my last day feel special. For a fancy restaurant, with tons of food, it was also a great price! I paid the same amount for half the food at a neighboring place. For its location, staff, and food — this place really is a gem :)

Where to start! The food was absolutely delicious and the wait staff was above and beyond!! We went on what turned out to be a colder, rainy night. Ivan was so kind getting us blankets and moving us to a spot by the heater. His service was so awesome and despite the colder temperatures outdoor the food was one of our best meals in Dubrovnik!
We came back the next day (our last day for lunch and the service and the food were just as exceptional. 
Ivan waited on us again as well as Vhalo. 
Dinner: Had the mussels, Rib eye (excellent) and 1st steak in Croatia, the pasta with mushrooms and wine for dinner. 
No pictures because the bad weather would not do the delicious means any service.
Lunch: mussels again and the steak sandwich with a side of Croatian Swiss chard. Yours is the best!
Wish we found you earlier in our trip

Ask for a table with a view of the harbor. Fish soup with a large piece of polenta served on top was the most popular item. The meat ragu along with the mushroom truffle pasta were also great. Very attentive staff and good service
Had a wonderful lunch at this location. The service, food and location were fantastic. Definitely recommend it for a pleasant time while soaking in the beautiful view.

The food and cocktails here were fantastic with a gorgeous evening view of the old town port. The duck for main was especially good and the cocktails were exceptional. I’d book it you want to go here, we were lucky as walk ins we waited 5/10 mins for a fantastic table. The service was great and I’d definitely go here again.

What a place . We had lunch on our first day where we sat at the back on the Main Street , which was amazing , very clean , attentive and smart staff . 
On our second visit for Dinner we sat facing the marina (front row ) which was even more amazing . Totally stunning setting with food to match . Our waiter Davor was such a nice helpful man , very professional and courteous, thank you Davor . You made our visit all the better . 
Not a huge menu but the food was excellent. 
Give it a go , you won’t be disappointed. 
Enjoy .

Best meal we have had in Dubrovnik! We didn’t look at the reviews, just rocked up as it looked really nice - we did not regret it! The staff were very attentive, the drinks and the food were incredible. Could not fault this place one bit - thank you for an amazing evening.

Have eaten here a few times now, and every time we come to Dubrovnik. We normally sit inside as it is a lot cooler. Slightly strange looking menu that belies the quality of the food when it arrives. Excellent tuna and mussels every time. Service can be slightly slow at times, but relaxed and friendly. There is also a cafe at the other side of the restaurant with great looking pastries and cakes.
We had the carrot soup for a starter which was excellent. The lamb shank was also quite good as was the open faced steak sandwich. The outdoor seating is excellent.

We went for breakfast and had excellent service right from the beginning. The weather wasn't great but even still the setting was beautiful. The food was very good and they serve bloody mary's which made me so happy!

One thing is that on Google the advertised opening time was 08:00 daily, but when we visited they did not open until 10:00. I had made a reservation for 08:30 but they changed it to 10:15 and this is the reason why. Perhaps in the fall they change the opening hours, but it would be good to reflect this on their Google profile.
The title says it all. I had tuna tartar and brodet. Delicious. View was beautiful. Service was good. All in all a good place for sea food and the view.

Amazing setting with the best view at the Old Port. We very lucky to be seated right in the first row to the port! Excellent food, perfectly presented and served by an attentive and capable waiter. Largest selection of local wines we exprienced within two weeks. This combination justifies higher than average prices (which can be eased by holding the Dubrovnik card). 😉
Make reservations ahead of time! Very popular restaurant, in a beautiful setting, very good food and wine, excellent service

One of our favourite restaurants in the city. The staff was really friendly and the location is amazing. Our table had really beautiful views to the port. The food was delicious, we took few starters and pastas. For desserts we took pistaccio and almond cake. The prices are reasonable too. Would definitely recommend!
A gorgeous evening sat on the terrace, with beautiful food & live music on the square. An absolute must visit if you’re in Dubrovnik. A special mention to our waitress Romana - she was outstanding.

The food was very delicious. 
The waiters were so friendly.
The view was wonderful.

I definitely recommend it.
Just to mention; the portions are small.

We had cocktails in the afternoon and then came back the next day for breakfast which is served on the other side. The waiters are extremely good and the food is too.
I don't think that the prices are out of line either.

First off, the views from both the harbour-side and city centre-side terraces are fairly attractive as you can see all kinds of interesting people passing by. Secondly, the value-for-money ration is reasonable for the quality you get. Last but not least, the staff is very nice - I would like to mention Marijo in particular. Try the Bloody Mary (creative and well-spiced) and Espresso Martini!
Had dinner here and it was delicious! The grilled squid in particular was really fresh and tasty! Would definitely recommend!

Had a really nice meal here with the waiter taking into account my food intolerances (gluten and dairy free). I was provided with gluten free bread on the house and the salmon was delicious. Would highly recommend!

It’s really ideal place to eat: old city, view on the bay and tasty food. For example, oysters and cocktails are especially worth your attention. Here everything is special: atmosphere, air and service. Staff is very polite.

My favorite coffee place in Dubrovnik! Beautiful view, and very very good coffe!
Two or three times I had breakfast there and It was also great!

We entered the restaurant and had a very warm welcome, we were told there would be a wait for table but we could wait inside and could have drinks while we waited. We sat for 20 minutes waiting for the table which was very good as we thought it may be longer however not once did we get served for a drink. Once seated at the table it took a further 15 minutes for us to be served. We ordered a coke and a hot chocolate which we saw sat on the side for 5 minutes before it was brought to us. The food took a while to come out but this was understandable and the waiters apologised once they brought the food out to us. The food was incredible, very big portions and very tasty. Our plates were cleared away quite quickly after we had finished. Unfortunately we then sat and waited for the waiter to come back to order desert and more drinks as we had finished ours. No waiters came back over for 20 minutes until I managed to get their attention, we decided to just get the bill instead! The waiters did take some money off of the bill due to the wait for food which was very good however we weren't worried about the wait for the food just how quick we were served.

They have a few set menus for breakfast that are good value for money. We picked the eggs Benedict option which came with fresh OJ, hot drink of choice and a generous bread basket with condiments. The eggs were poached nicely and bread soft and fresh with a tasty Hollandaise. We sat on the side overlooking the marina which was just lovely.

We ate here one evening during our week in Dubrovnik. We had a table right on open to the harbour.
It was the best restaurant we visited during our holiday. Very memorable, amazing view, fantastic service. Great value for money, great atmosphere. I cannot wait to come back! We never felt rushed and spent a couple of hours enjoying our meal.
Our waiter Marco was very helpful and friendly. He asked us to allow him to choose his personal favourite desserts which were lovely ( a lemon cheesecake and an apple pie type dessert) He also gave us complimentary Croatian liqueur to finish the evening which was a lovely touch.
We found ourselves comparing every other restaurant we visited to this one and none came close! Cannot recommend enough.

Went for a lovely dinner with friends while away on holiday and was a fantastic evening. They had listened to our request to sit on the seafront of the restaurant and from then the service only got better and better. Felt like fine dining but without the price, very good value for money. If you are looking for somewhere to special to go in Dubrovnik would highly recommend. The food was faultless, the beef ragu was particularly delicious. Highly recommend.

We just got back from a week-trip to Dubrovnik, and we were at Gradska Kavana every day, at least once, often twice, be it for coffee, lunch, afternoon drinks, dinner, post-dinner drinks. Everything about this place is superb: the atmosphere (exuding the charm of old Dubrovnik, both the terrace facing Orlando and the Arsenal restaurant overlooking the harbour), the service, the food and drinks. We noticed that there were other couples who were regulars there -- that says enough.

Beautiful location, beautiful place with terracce on the main street Stradun, and another terrace by the sea, I eat breakfast which was really tasty and for amazing price. For 94 kuna I got everything in the photo (including drinks). Reccommendation!

The service was good and we were happy that they were willing to arrange us a table at the seafront with a limited 2 hour time, before the next reservation. The harbour view is lovely, the cuisine was good and the service was fast, so we were happy with the quality of food. 

What was strange, was that the waiter insisted that we must order mushrooms and we can't leave them out of the dishes just because we don't like to eat mushrooms. Only allergy would have been a sufficient reason for him to leave the mushrooms out. So then even though, we had asked to leave all mushroom sauce and mushroom related things out of the food, the food came with mushrooms. 

Another thing which was odd, was that the waiter thought he knew better than us, whether we would like to order dessert or not. We hadn’t eaten all day before this, so certainly we were very hungry. But the waiter informed that he will not place an order of the desserts as we had requested, as he thinks we will probably want to reconsider that. You would think that the waiter would be happy to make as much sales as possible, but he didn’t want to do that. 

There was still plenty of time left to eat out of the 2 hours limited time, so this was not the issue. Then we decided, that since the waiter is so reluctant to sell us desserts, we will go to another restaurant after this, to enjoy desserts.

We had a lovely meal here and tried a range of dishes (vegetarian, meat, seafood) which were all delicious. The drinks and atmosphere are perfect too. The service was also great (we loved Ivan!). Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik.

Beautiful views, beautiful food, beautiful wine and incredible staff. 
Always make us feel at home and welcome us back, such a special place. 
Great value

Great place to observe the people passing by from the terrace of this restaurant in the morning. The dishes are fresh and nicely cooked. The staff very friendly and attentive. Think that is a Croatian habit of the staff. The price benefit ratio is amazing. I still do not understand why everybody tells me Dubrovnik is expedsiv. Nothing to complain about. Go for it!

Went here for breakfast , location was perfect. The restaurant is beautifully decorated and price is very reasonable . Standard breakfast menu but everything was nicely presented . Would recommend this place for breakfast

Extraordinary view, very nice food, a good selection of wines and super frindly waiters , Martin was apleasure:).
Loved the place! Highly recommend.

Absolutely loved it here! We luckily booked this restaurant prior to our arrival in Croatia after we’d read some amazing reviews. On the Uber ride to our hotel, the driver recommended here too so we knew it must be good. I cannot fault anything about this restaurant from the views on the terrace of the Old Port, to the food to the waiting staff. My boyfriend and I had Salmon and Steak, I know that sounds basic but it was what we fancied on the day and would have eaten almost everything the restaurant had on the menu. I would 100% recommend here and are planning to return in 2023 on our next trip to Croatia.

We arrived at the restaurant without a reservation and the staff were very helpful and offered us a seat and drinks whilst we waited. 

Given how popular the restaurant is, we weren’t sure if we would be able to eat but thankfully, only around 20-30 minutes wait, we were then offered a table. 

The food was incredible & our waiter Martin made sure that we were always looked after well. The drinks and view were amazing and we couldn’t have asked for a better first night in Dubrovnik. 

Would highly recommend.

No chance to reserve a table as the rest of Dubrovnik know how good the food is and they beat us to it !!! 
Don’t let that deter you, tourists eat early, if you don’t mind eating around 21:00, turn up around 20:30, you will be seated inside, have a drink and maybe a starter while you wait for a table to come free.

The staff were charming and very professional, happy to wax lyrical about the food and how it’s prepared, the region it comes from and what Croatian wines work best with it.

Pick up their business card and get 10% off your bill which is a nice bonus, but even at full price I am looking forward to going back tonight!!

Had a fantastic evening here - fabulous food, drink, location and above all customer service. We felt as though we were treated as royalty!!!

A special mention to Marijo who looked after us all evening - a credit to the restaurant.

Thank you for a wonderful evening.

We visited the restaurant on 3 occasions in the past week . The fish of the day was excellent together with the squid to start . The wine list was extensive and not silly priced . Our 2 waiters Ivan and Marko were very good and attentive. This restaurant gets booked up in advance however the staff are very accommodating . You can have a couple of cocktails in there lounge area until a table becomes available ...well worth the wait

We’ ve eaten here on our previous trips to Dubrovnik , more than 10 years ago and remembered it now deciding to try it out. That was a good choice. In the sea of tourist- trap and mediocre restaurants in old town this is still a good staple of quality. Service is of high standard, fast and proffesional. Our server Martin went out of way to accomodate our wishes. Food was also very delicious- I had grilled squid- done properly without becoming chewy. I lacked taste in rozata - it was a bit bland alrhough also technically done properly. My hubby had a burger - also very delicious . All in all- great value for such a prime location. This is obviously such a well run restaurant!

The staff here was so polite and professional. We were in a slight rush for a tour, and they were kind enough to rush our food. Speaking of the food, it was amazing! The pasta was one of the best I've ever had. To top it off there were beautiful views of the sea and hills. Definitely give them a try!
It was a very pleasant night. The food was exquisite, the cocktail at its best accompanied by good views. Thank you Marijo for serving us yesterday. Without hesitation, it is a must in Dubrovnik.

Beautifully elegant ambiance. Marijo our server was charming, attentive and had impeccable etiquette. The food plating was clean, unique and colorful and our dish was simply delightful! Highly recommended this restaurant.

We usually plan our dinners but left this one to chance, and it was as good as any we may have chosen. Very good pasta with mushrooms and truffle, sea bass, and tuna. Prime location with very good service and food.

We popped in here by chance, and although having to wait for a table, were very well accomodated with a city view table for dinner. We were served by Marco, who was very attentive and ensured that we had a great evening. Would recommend!

We came here after walking round the city walls. We were hot, sweaty and in desperate need of a cold drink and a bite to eat. Not sure we quite appreciated our luck of finding this place. Really lovely, fresh food and friendly staff. We couldn't have planned it better. The bill wasn't extortionate (although high) and felt totally worth it. Clean toilets and we didn't feel rushed (even managed a chilled out cup of tea after we had eaten!). A great venue for lunch!!

Beautiful view, top notch service, great food for great prices. Went twice in one week!! They are few days in advance booked but they always offer you to come into the lounge and have a drink until the seat is free. Both times we waited aprox 15-20 mins to be seated in a beautiful lounge area. Wonderful experience, definitely recommend for couples, friends and/or family!
The new menu is fantastic. We had lamb and duck and couldn't make a better choice. Of course, the view is amazing and the prices are afforable considering this is Dubrovnik.

We reserved a table on the sea facing terrace via the website and the restaurant did not disappoint. We had a wonderful table with an amazing view, in the shade, near a fan and served by polite and attentive Ivan. 

My husband had the Orlando breakfast and I had the healthy breakfast, we ate them all plus the extra complimentary bread basket. He had an americano and me a latte and the breakfasts also came with freshly squeezed orange juice. 

Glad we booked and glad we walked into the old town; it felt elegant and relaxed and not too touristy at all.
The view is nice, but the pasta for my wife was over cooked and served cold, just to bad for such a restaurant. Staff is friendly.
Delicious food, one of the best we experienced in Croatia. Took chicken breast with spinach and polenta. Loved as well location with the view on the port.

We came here twice in one week as it was so great. The duck breast, tuna tartare and truffle pasta were my favourite dishes and Marijo Krkic was a great waiter - top humour and service, thank you so much :)

What a wonderful experience! The food, the atmosphere- everything was top notch! Our waiter Marijo made us feel very special and welcome! Highly recommend this restaurant to everyone visiting Dubrovnik. We will be back!
One of the best restaurants in old city of Dubrovnik and best service ever by konobar Vlaho❤️ I would give them 5 stars, recomended by slovenians🤪

lThe setting is perfect, so is the ambiance, and many locals come for people watching or those who go to performances at Dubrovnik summer festival. I must say their apple cake was on par with anything they can offer in Austria or Germany. Great views too!

As we booked in advance, we were sitting on the front line, directly overlooking the old harbor, and it was magic. Normally for this kind of view you pay a lot for mediocre food. Well, here food was very decent, not the best I've ever had but very decent. Special kudos for the tuna tartar, which was actually scraped as per the original tartar recipe and not cut. It is a big place yet it was buzzing with people and was full most of the evening - and I think it's worth it

We were treated to a complimentary dinner at this restaurant from Diana Belan from House Tereza. Our tour operators had overbooked us and Diana did everything in her power to help make our stay in Dubrovnik more comfortable . Thanks Diana! The 2 bottles of wine that we were given was a delightful surprise 

We were seated right in front of the restaurant with a great view of the harbor.

On to the food - we had the Grilled Squid and a dish called “Sea and Mountains”. Both were fabulous. The desserts were also divine - especially the house ice cream.. The local white wine was refreshing and so was the Virgin Mojito. The wait staff was very friendly and helpful. 

Our experience was lovely and we highly recommend this restaurant. Can’t wait to come back here again !
Super dinner and friendly service. Really great view of the old harbour in Dubrovnik. 10/10 and not expensive at all.

We tried to book - they dont accept bookings but when we arrived at 9pm on a Saturday we had a table for 2 within 5 minutes. Nice views into the harbour and exceptional service levels from well trained staff. It is quite a large restaurant so we expected food/drink service to be slow - but it was the opposite. Drinks arrived within around 2 minutes and our starters within 10. Mains followed without any undue delay. We tried 2 different local wines - both excellent and with good descriptions by the waiters. 
The food was very pleasing - considerably exceeding expectations. Fish soup and "Eclair" starter (fish/prawn on light pastry) were very good. Linguine with mushrooms/truffle also very good. We skipped desert as we needed an early night but this was a very pleasant evening and a definite place to return to.
The atmosphere was wonderful the food was all delicious including cocktails! Service was great too; the view is the best

The restaurant terrace facing the Old Port was excellent for lunch, a delicious sea & mountain pasta made of wild mushrooms and salmon. Seating outside for one was no problem. Taking a look inside I discovered a large tastefully decorated area which further on continued to a cafeteria terrace next to Rector's Palace. Having received their complimentary card already from Dubravka it was an easy choice to return in the afternoon for cake and coffee.

I spent the most amazing 50th Birthday celebration here. The food was local and absolutely amazing. the view was to be expected. It's Dubrovnik after all. And a big shout out to my super waiter, Marijo. A Dubrovnik local who really new his stuff. A super experience all around. thank you!
Beautiful restaurant with even better service and drinks. Server was helpful in choosing a drink and was a lovely place to watch the summer festival.

My wife and I just had the dinner here. Ivan was great, he made great recommendations on foods and the wine. We really enjoy the fish stew and sea bass. Food was great, but Ivan definitely made a big difference.
Delicious, well balanced dishes. Outstanding drinks (I recommend the Old Fashioned). Very professional and friendly staff.

I never write reviews but Arsenal was too good not to write a review! After a quick google search for a good restaurant in Dubrovnik, this restaurant popped up and we decided to try it out. There is a reason why it is one of the first listed. Not only is the location fantastic (right by the boats), but the food is too die for! Our waiter, Ivo, could not have been more pleasant and just a fun personality. He accommodated us at every course and provided top quality service. Ask for him if you are there and you will be in for treat.The food was superb and the desserts were delicious. It was a wonderful way to spent our last evening in Croatia. Go to Arsenal if you want fine dining and a great atmosphere by the water. We will always go back for Arsenal and Ivo.

What can I say?

Ate here twice last year and thought we would come back.

Once again we were not disappointed. The setting is absolutely stunning along with food and service. 

We shared the Dalmatian cheeses and the Zucchini/Courgette. Both were divine, of particular note was the feta that came with the zucchini. 

I couldn’t help myself. I had to have the tenderest fillet steak with mushroom reduction. Just as good as last time. Wife had the seafood risotto……perfect. Son insisted on having the truffle and mushroom pasta. This lasted seconds as I can confirm from tasting it myself. Daughter had chicken and polenta. She loved the chicken but due to being a fussy eater chose to eat some of my fries. I gobbled up her polenta. 

Only regret is that we’re not here long enough to work our way through the menu. 

Thank you.

Price was below 20EUR, and here’s what we had:
- eggs benedict x2 🍳🍳
- scrambled eggs x4 🍳🍳🍳🍳
- boiled egg x1 🥚 
- salad x2 🥗 🥗 
- orange juice x4 🍊 
- toast x3 🍞 
- croissant 🥐 x2
- butter 🧈 x2
- jams x2 (blueberry & apricot)
- nutella x2 
- avocado 🥑 x1 (spread)
- coffee x2 ☕️ ☕️ 
- fetta cheese & orange pieces in salads

1. Eggs Benedict
2. Healthy breakfast

+ view is stunning! One terrace is looking at the port and city walls, the other one one rector’s palace, Stradun and other monuments. 

The staff is VERY kind and professional, we enjoyed every minute

Fresh and great seafood, we ate tuna steak and seafoof risotto, both were excellent. Waiter Ivan’s recommendations and service was extraordinary! Prices are very reasonable, great wine choices. Highly recommended

The setting is superb, sitting under old arches looking into the old port.
Service was also excellent.
Our octopjs salad on a bed of avocado was nice, as was my clear fish soup. The main highlights were our tuna and sea bass, delicious and beautifully presented. Our son had the pasta with beef ragu, which was also fantastic!
Highly recommended place!
Gorgeous brunch complete with complementary basket of breads. Perfect respite for mid day meal during scorching day. Service was so so friendly and professional.

We found this little pearl while looking for brunch. The staff is great and the service we received from Vedran was 10/10. The food is fresh and tasty and matches the price. I usually don’t leave a review while still sitting at the restaurant but I had to bc it’s worth it. Great ambiance and view.

This restaurant has such a lovely location, looking out over the water. There are lots of food options on the menu and all the staff is friendly and efficient. In particular, my favorite waiter is Marijo - friendly, funny, and smart. He kindly offered me an excellent suggestion for the evening. Made me feel right at home; I am sure I will be back.

I had the duck and my friend had the seafood soup. We were able to reserve a table by the water and loved watching the boats come in. They also currently offer a 10% off discount after you get a card from either Panorama, Dubrovaka 1836, or here at Gradska (common owner). The pistachio cake was a special treat to end the meal.

Beautiful restaurant! Amazing food and wine! Highly reccomend the seafood risotto. Impeccable service! Mario was an excellent server...this is my favorite place to eat in Dubrovnik! The view is unforgettable!

I moved here alone a few months ago and every single time I visit this amazing restaurant everyone is so warm & friendly. The atmosphere to work in is great, the breakfast is delicious, the cocktails are spot on and the ambiance in the eve is so romantic. Marijo looks after me always, he’s fantastic & it’s become a home from home here! It’s one definitely not to be missed! And don’t forget to order their home made Rakija! See you soon guys! :)

It was awesome! Fodd was excellent and service was the best! Don't get me started about the view!
My suggestion is to try the calamares!
We had the mushrooms fettuccini, tuna steak and duck with cranberry sauce. All were amazing. One of our best meals in Dubrovnik. Staff we very pleasant and the view was wonderful!

Probably one of the best restaurants in the whole of Dubrovnik. First time we went there we thought it would be a tourist trap because of the great location and gorgeous view- have never been so wrong. The restaurant is absolutely incredible- the food is delicious, the prices are very reasonable and if anything even on the cheaper side for the experience and service you receive. It definitely became our favourite restaurant and we came 2 more times. Vlaho was an exceptional host and waiter, provided outstanding service but was also extremely friendly, down to earth and chatty- setting us at ease, contrary to most pretentious experiences you'd get when the service is of such high level. Can't recommend more :)

This place was awesome! Our waiter Marijo was truly amazing. He not only gave the best recommendations food wise but also local attraction wise as well. The view of the harbour was fabulous and the aesthetics of the restaurant was perfect. The food was absolutely delicious and the wine selection was superb. Definitely will be back during our visit. 11/10 recommend!

Very underwhelmed. The positives, service was good, friendly and efficient. Nice location and clean. Food wise no go. Looks nice on paper but not the standard you would expect from a place like this. The croissant was bland 'paper like' like it had been standing out for days. The orange juice although fresh was just OK. I could have eaten this at home. Even looking around, nothing looked appealing and other guests hadn't fully finished their food. It has that effect, name and location. There are better restaurants in the old town.

Fantastic meal and superior service.
Vegan options and fanciest Long Island iced tea ever! Most impressive servers- kind and attentive. Will be back tonight! Thank you for making our first visit to Croatia special!☮️🌊❤️

Can’t say enough good about this restaurant. Everything from the service, setting and food was top notch. We went back a second night for some small plates and the amazing pistachio cake! The cake was so unique and delicious. We hope to come back to Dubrovnik on other travels and this will be the restaurant (we have been to many here in old town) that we return to. I’d recommend getting a reservation and requesting a table by the harbor.

First, order the duck. You can’t leave Dubrovnik without trying their duck. Their cake is amazing too, but most of all, the service is what I’ll leave remembering. Marijo and Ivo were absolute sweethearts and made the entire experience memorable. Will never forget the food nor them! Got drinks and dessert on the house for revisiting :) they also do 10% off for the second visit / dining at either of their other 2 branches in Dubrovnik - we went to Dubravka 1836 and it was also delightful.

Thank you TripAdvisor for helping us find this place. Food was great (recommend the fish stew) and service from our waitress Romana was outstanding.

Highly recommend.

Well what can I say that is not already said. This city and this restaurant belong to each other.
Igor was my waiter when I took in a perfect lunch (fish stew) on a sunny day.
He recommend me the dish, showed me the champions league winning basketball women team in front of me and was a great waiter.

The plate you will see on my photo, the taste was delicious, the fish was “en point” and the tomatoe sud was rich and full of flavour.

I enjoyed my stay especially in covid times as there are not so many people around and you can actually enjoy Dubrovnik and this restaurant.
Valentino was incredible. We came as a group of 9 and we got great service and delicious fish. Nice cocktails both alcoholic and nonalcoholic. They were very accommodating across the board.

This was our second time there in the past 6 months, and had a spectacular dining experience. Our server Valentino truly went above and beyond to ensure that we were well taken care off. 

We started of with a few appetizers, and thought that the fried calamari was perfectly cooked, but somewhat lacked seasoning. The steak tartar was also really fresh, but a bit blend for our taste. 

That being said, everyone's main courses was spectacular! The fish stew was outstanding, as the dish was perfectly seasoned, and the warmnest of the soup made it for us! The poached seabass with Beet sauce was delicious, and the beef ragu with pasta was really tasty!

At the end of our meal, Valentino even brought us a complimentary shot of Rakia, as well as two desserts, which was such a nice gesture from him. I highly recommend going there for dinner, as the food was amazing, and the service was top notch! Two thumbs way up to Valentino for being such an amazing host!

Two visits.. I had to return. 
On my first I enjoyed the "Fish Stew", of which had a tomato base and topped off with baked polenta, served in a deep clam- shaped bowl. 
My second visit, I enjoyed the "Truffle and button mushrooms linguine" also served in a deep bowl. 
My favorite of the two.. easily, the Fish Stew! It was awesome! 
Both meals presented bread (the dark bread was ++) accompanied with an excellent olive oil & balsamic vinegar. The dry Posip white wine was my favored of the two different white wines I sipped.
My compliments to the chef and the wait staff.. amazingly uncanny timing by the wait staff for my enjoyment there. 

(the restaurant is a beautiful location, just off the far end of the "Stradum" adjacent to the church in Dubrovnik Old Town. Kind of funny in a way.. it's sort of like a Hollywood take, the "perfect" scene of a romantic getaway! 
I'll have to bring my wife along on my next visit 哈哈哈. As of this moment, she's stuck in China)

The views, the ambience and the deliciousness of the food is what i will remember always with a smile and a longing to go back. Josip, Marijo made mine and my sister experience even better. The service was truly amazing, the food top notch. Cant wait to return!!

This is one of the restaurants that was receiving a huge amount of guests even during Covid on August when tourists were at less than half they were in 2019. We did not have reservation and the waiter did find a table but only inside the restaurant. The food here was really great, I went for truffle gnocchi and fish of the day and both dishes were exceptional. Even if the restaurant was full kitchen employees did a great job and prepared our food very fast and it was delicious. Cocktails were also great and my wife highly enjoyed the mojito. After lots of not so great culinary experiences, Croatia was starting to amaze us. So if you are in Dubrovnik and you want a lovely dinner do yourself a service and book a table at Gradska Kavana Arsenal.

The girlfriend and I tried to eat here in August 2020 for a romantic evening meal, every night we were in Dubrovnik it was fully booked. It says a lot about the quality.

In the end we settled for lunch and cocktails. We got a lovely table on the rear veranda; great views, nice weather and awesome drinks. Can highly recommend.

Nice terraces with central old town location for a drink or a meal.

Attentive, friendly personnel.

Clean, hygiene measures in place and restrooms clean as in a high end hotel.

Fair prices for the location.
Came here in the late evening for wine, dessert and coffee. Had the Dubrovnik style rozatta (caramel creme similar to flan) and loved every bite. Service and atmosphere were excellent!

I don’t usually write reviews but I will make an exception.

This is simply the best restaurant I’ve ever been to. A perfect combination of setup, location, excellent fresh food and above all kind and professional staff. I’ve been to some of the best restaurants around the world but if I had to chose my last supper it would be a fish stew and a dry martini at the Arsenal.

Marijo, Romana, Vlaho, and all other members of staff including the ones in the kitchen who we haven’t met: thank you for taking good care of us and for making us feel at home time and time again.

Vidimo se uskoro

I've been to this restaurant countless times over the last 10 years and I've always had excellent food, drinks and service. The entire staff is great. Ask for Marijo if you'd like a superb dining experience with a special touch of hospitality. The terrace overlooking the Stradun is the perfect place to people watch. I usually travel solo and have often met other travelers there. Couples and groups will also love this restaurant. It is well-equipped to handle colder temperatures, providing heaters and blankets to guests seated outside, and it has adapted well to the corona situation - you'll feel completely comfortable. Gradska Kavana is not to be missed!

A great spot for breakfast, good food with full breakfast options at great value. You begin with a selection of croissants and breads, followed by eggs cooked to your choice (we opted for omelette and fried eggs), accompanied by freshly squeezed orange juice and a cappuccino to kick start your day.

It's another perfect location in the heart of the old town to enjoy the incredible architecture of Dubrovnik and people watch.

Very nice restaurant centrally located in Dubrovnik’s old town. Very nice and attentive service and food definitely much over average! I tried dagnje as apetizer and steak for main - and everything was very good and steak rare as requested! It’s not the cheapest place but you get a lot of value for Your money! Highly recomended!
Very nice place to have a breakfast, coffe and juice. Prices are not cheap but you are on the main street of beautiful Dubrovnik.

I’ve been there with my boyfriend, we ordered Stradun breakfast. Everything was really great. First you get little croissant with jams and Croatian version of Nutella then omelette with extra bread. Hot drinks and juice is also included, and the price is really affordable.

This is my second review as we ended up dining here five times on our trip because the food and service was simply outstanding. Special mention to Marijo who made our visit extra special with attentive service and also complimentary cake. Highly recommend the sailors risotto and the cow tongue. Spectacular views when dining on the waterfront. We also dined at their sister restaurant (Panorama) however I would say the food was much better here! Staff and service made our trip extra special. Thank you and hope to see you again in the future.

Gradska Kavana Arsenal was the first restaurant I want to on the first night I was in Dubrovnik! Marijo, my server was the absolute sweetest person! I went they're hoping to try the best Croatian food so of course I asked him for his recommendations and the first two things you recommended me which were wine and fish stew, it blew my mind how awesome it was! So of course I needed him to recommend my dessert and boy.. The traditional Dubrovnik almond cake felt like I was in heaven each bite.. It was so good.. So amazing.

If you're looking for a good food and wonderful service this is The SPOT to go to!

Great place to spend an evening whilst in Dubrovnik Old Town.
The view is superb, the size of the place gives a feeling of splendour, the service is all that you want and the food of good standard.
An enjoyable experience type of venue.

Lovely restaurant with a great harbour view. We watched all the boats go past and it was a great place to shelter when it was raining as there aren’t many places to sit and enjoy. We both LOVED the seafood risotto and I enjoyed the cocktails too. Very chilled and great service

We had a fabulous family lunch looking over the old harbour.The ambiance was perfect. Our waiter Marjo was outstanding and nothing was too much trouble. He was very informative and friendly and happy to suggest dishes and wine for us to try. Definitely going back and asking for Marjo.

We had two meals at the restaurant, and we were happy with the quality of food. 
Had a lovely breakfast at the cafe/restaurant looking over to the main street , and on another day had excellent dinner & drinks in the part of the restaurant looking over the old port
The staff provided attentive service and took the time to explain the different dishes. Highly recommended if you are looking for a nice meal in a cosy atmosphere.

I am back in Dubrovnik for a sun blissed week and as always I visited my favorite restaurant (several times). Gradska Kavana Arsenal has the perfect balance of everything. Location (at the beautiful marina on the seaside or great view of the goings on in the Old City if you are on that side), ambience, delicious food and excellent service. I would recommend at least one meal here. I’ve had everything from beef steak to fish and it has all been delicious. Literally. To add impeccable service with charm to your dining experience try to sit in Marijo’s section. Take his recommendations! He’s the best!

Great service and food, waiters are patient, super friendly and will take their time to explain whatever is on the menu. I've had a tuna steak and my partner had squid ink pasta, both were cooked perfectly and the ingredients were fresh. 11/10 would eat again.
I had a great experience, Marijo was very nice and cordial. He recommended me a dessert and I loved it. I recommend this place!

Spent 8 nights in dubrovnik this was the only restaurant we came back to twice. The location was beautiful under arches in the old town harbour. The food is very nice and reasonably priced. Marijo our waiter was brilliant and even gave us a 10 percent discount on our second visit as well as complementary after dinner shots. Would reccomend to anyone visiting the old town.

The location of this restaurant is great with views over the Old Town harbour and smart modern decor. The food was amazing, we had the sea food risotto, sea bass and catch of the day which was tuna, all absolutely delicious and filling. 

Our waiter, Marijo Krkic, provided an excellent and friendly service with local character. He was very knowledgeable about the menu and recommended wine to go with each of our meals which was a perfect match. 

It was perfect for our last night in Dubrovnik.

Just a spectacular setting to be sitting right by the water, with the views of the wall, the pirate ship, and the fireworks show at night! This definitely enhanced tremendously our dinning experience there!

The food was pretty amazing for the most part. We started off with the octopus salad with caviar, which was fresh, and really unique. The octopus was actually not rubbery at all, and delicious! We then had our favorite dish there, the fish stew! It was just amazing, with so many great flavors all packed into this great bowl. It was spicy, but not overwhelming. Our least favorite dish had to be the cuddlefish squid ink, which was tasteless, and needed a ton of salt. We didn't even finish it was that bad. At least our waiter didn't charged us for it.

The service there started off perfectly! Our server was so attentive from the moment we arrived, and had some great ideas for local dishes. Sadly, our experience wasn't an excellent one, due to the fact that he completely forgot about us for about 35 minutes. Never checked if we needed anything, or even came by our table. That was somewhat frustrating, as it started off so promising. That being said, he was a great server who got overwhelmed with too many tables. 

Our overall experience there was a very positive one though. The food was outstanding for the most part, the service was pretty good, but more than anything, the views were just breathtaking! I highly recommend going there for at least even a few drinks, as you won't regret it!

Congratulations to this restaurant, the food was very good and the service was elegant and professional. I had the Ragu with pasta, not a traditional Italian Ragu but it was delicious and would order it again.
Love this place! It consistently has great food and the waiters are so friendly. Amazing! Thank you!!!!

You wouldn't believe that this restaurant belongs to the same group (Nautika) as the one at the entrance of the Gate (Dubravka). The service as well as the food and drinks are way better. Everything is very classy like in the old days (stylish dishes, plates and glasses), the waiters are super attentive and the price for the food is not too expensive for Dubrovnik. Still you have either a view on the Main Street Stradun and the lovely church or from the other side on the sea and the port.
Great dinner with my girlfriend! Fantastic service, view and atmosphere with appropriate music. Best tuna steak I have ever tried. Great vaule for money, not too expensive.

The best service in Dubrovnik! Me and my friend went for lunch and were greeted by the most charming maitre d'. We were seated at the table with a great view of the old harbour of Dubrovnik. The food was exquisite, especially the tuna tartare. In the end we also received a delicious complimentary cake 😊

Me and my boyfriend visited this restaurant and we were blown away by the amazing food and service. We shared the ham and cheese platter to start, then had the mushroom and truffle linguine and beef ragu. The truffle linguine was insanely good! We booked a table for 7:30 and were sat at the front overlooking the port which was beautiful as it got dark, it soon filled up so I would recommend booking. The sauvignon was delicious too, will definitely return next time visiting Dubrovnik.

Gorgeous view, ask for a first row terrace table (overlooks the port). Very attentive and helpful staff. 

Food is tasty. Not spectacular, but definitely good. The calamari was definitely the best dish we had. It is not battered, but rather grilled squid on a bed of spinach and potatoes.

We enjoyed a lovely lunch here with champagne cocktails. The squid and mussels were so fresh and absolutely delicious. The service was so friendly, professional and efficient. Would definitely recommend this restaurant to anyone visiting Dubrovnik!

We originally booked here for our first night on 22nd but the experience was so good that we ended up eating here twice and coming for drinks every day. The two waiters that we had, Marijo and Romana made us feel extremely welcome on each visit, the food was always both excellent (especially the seafood) and the location qas an absolute dream with views over the port. The meals were unhurried, with no pressure on us to vacate our places despite demand, and the tables were well distanced so we never felt that other people were right ontop of us. Fantastic experience. Highly recommended

Food quality was really great, really fresh and full of flavours. price was reasonable, right on the port with a great view. Had to keep going back as I loved the place. All the staff was so friendly and helpful. My waiter Marijo was super nice and friendly. He knew how to make the customers want to comeback. Thanks for the great experience!

We had a late lunch here after walking the old town wall. 
Beautiful location over-looking the harbour and one of the old forts.
The atmosphere was relaxed, and the food was good. We had cocktails (incl a non-alcoholic one) that were beautifully served.
Service was professional.

Stayed at this restaurant in Aug. 2018 while visiting Dubrovnik. Experience was so good that I had to write a review 2 years later after looking at some photos. Atmosphere was outstanding! Made reservations the night before so as not to be disappointed. View at marina side table was spectacular! Service was excellent! Waiter and manager were extremely polite and friendly. Food was very tasty and plentiful. Reasonably priced. Just an overall great experience!

Had dinner on Monday evening. The food was spectacular and the service first class. The views by the port splendid! 
I would return again.

Is anything ever too much trouble for the superb attentive staff here? Of course, the answer is no!
Such a pity for businesses that Dubrovnik resembles a ghost town but the attention to customers has not waivered one but at our favourite place to eat.
A much reduced food menu reflects the fewer people visiting but the quality remains the highest.
We look forward to when we can return in better times to savour the wonderful chateaubriand that was the highlight of our visit.
In the meantime, the lovely steak sandwich and awesome gourmet beefburger washed down with Hendricks gin and Fentimans tonic really hit the spot.
Wonderful Gradska Arsenal!! We wish you better and more prosperous times ahead.
Lunch was delicious but the atmosphere and views from the port side of the restaurant is the win at this restaurant. And I’ll add that the staff are also a credit to the company
